comment: sit-lo̍h, bô-khì, tsáu-khì, bông-lâng, sí-bông, bia̍t-bông.
hanlo_comment: 失落, 無去, 走去, 盲人, 死亡, 滅亡.

comment: tiū-sūi; be̍h-sūi ê chhiu, chháu ê chiam-bé; koaⁿ-bông, sàu-chiú-bâng; ià-siān.
hanlo_comment: 稻穗; 麥穗 ê 鬚, 草 ê 尖尾; 菅芒, 掃帚芒; 厭𤺪.

comment: khàm thâu-khak; tit-tio̍h, lô-tîn chháu, tsū-khiam ê oē, gín-á, bô-lóe-māu.
hanlo_comment: khàm 頭殼; 得tio̍h, 蘿藤 草, 自謙 ê 話, gín-á, 無 禮貌.

comment: bōe kì-tit, bô-siūⁿ, m̄-bat, khòaⁿ-khin; sit-lo̍h, bông-un.
hanlo_comment: bōe 記得, 無想, m̄-bat, 看輕; 失落, 忘恩.

comment: Hô-lâm séng chi̍t ê siâⁿ ê siâⁿ-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 河南 省 一個城 ê 城名.

comment: khàm-phak ê ì-sù; jī-bú, khàm-ba̍t, gōng, ham-bān, bōe thong-ta̍t.
hanlo_comment: khàm覆 ê 意思; 字母, khàm密, 戇, ham-bān, bōe thang達.

comment: sím-koaⁿ pek-chhiat; bâng-loān, hong-bông, bô-êng; kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, kiáu-jiáu.
hanlo_comment: 審官 迫切; 忙亂, 慌忙, 無閒; 驚惶, 攪擾.

comment: to-bé chiam, to-chhùi lāi; chiam-lāi; mî, to-mî, ū-mî, kè mî-kak.
hanlo_comment: 刀尾 尖, 刀嘴 利; 尖利; 鋩, 刀鋩, 有鋩, 過 鋩角.

comment: hái-tsúi khoah-tōa bô bêng; bông-biáu; àm-àm, kiáu-jiáu, chhong-bông.
hanlo_comment: 海水 闊大 無 明; 矇渺; 暗暗, 攪擾, 蒼茫.

comment: khòaⁿ bōe-bêng, tông-tsú sit-bêng; m̄-tsai ka-kī, bô ha̍k-būn; bông-bông, bông-bū.
hanlo_comment: 看 bōe明, 瞳子 失明; m̄知 家己, 無 學問; 矇矇, 矇霧.

comment: ji̍t-thâu bē-chhut lâi; bô kng-bêng, ji̍t bô-kng.
hanlo_comment: 日頭 未出 來; 無 光明, 日 無光.

comment: ji̍t teh-beh lo̍h, ge̍h bô-kng; siat-lâng, bô kng-bêng.
hanlo_comment: 日 teh-beh 落, 月 無光; 設人, 無 光明.

comment: tsúi ê miâ, sió-sió ê hō͘ bū-bū ti̍t-ti̍t lo̍h; bô-bêng.
hanlo_comment: 水 ê 名, 小小 ê 雨 霧霧 直直 落; 無明.

comment: kiàn-siàu, o͘-àm, iu-būn; ba̍k-chiu bô-bêng.
hanlo_comment: 見笑, 烏暗, 憂悶; 目睭 無明.

comment: oe̍h-oe̍h tn̂g-tn̂g ê chiàn-tsûn, oē chin gâu-tsáu.
hanlo_comment: 狹狹 長長 ê 戰船, 會 真 gâu走.

comment: hûn-bū ê ì-sù; bông-bū; tà-bông.
hanlo_comment: 雲霧 ê 意思; 雺霧; 罩雺.

comment: chi̍t-hō ê chhiah-khiū thô͘, ū-sî ēng tsòe io̍h.
hanlo_comment: 一號 ê 赤糗 土, 有時 用 做 藥.

comment: oáⁿ á-sī pôaⁿ ū tóe tīⁿ-tīⁿ ê chia̍h-mi̍h; toh ū pâi chhài-soe kàu-gia̍h.
hanlo_comment: 碗 抑是 盤 有 貯 tīⁿ-tīⁿ ê 食物; 桌 有 排 菜蔬 夠額.

comment: chho͘ ê phok-siau; ū-sî ēng tsòe io̍h.
hanlo_comment: 粗 ê 朴硝; 有時 用 做 藥.

comment: sió-hō͘; hûn-bū; lûi-tân; kúi-nā tiâu khoe ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 小雨; 雲霧; 雷霆; 幾若 條 溪 ê 名.

comment: chi̍t-hō si̍t-bu̍t ê chhiū-miâ, i ê hio̍h n̂g-sek.
hanlo_comment: 一號 植物 ê 樹名, 伊 ê 葉 黃色.

comment: chi̍t-ê soaⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 一個 山 ê 名.

comment: chi̍t-hō hoe ê miâ, oē tsòe-tit io̍h.
hanlo_comment: 一號 花 ê 名, 會 做得 藥.

comment: kóng-oē bô chiap-sio̍k; loān-loān kóng bô chin-si̍t.
hanlo_comment: 講話 無 接續; 亂亂 講 無 真實.

comment: ka-kī chhut-la̍t; kó͘-bú; bián-lē.
hanlo_comment: 家己 出力; 鼓舞; 勉勵.

comment: tsúi-chiáu ê chiáu-á-thûn; chiáu chhin-chhiūⁿ khóng-chhiok.
hanlo_comment: 水鳥 ê 鳥á豚; 鳥 親像 孔雀.

comment: só͘-tsāi ê kó͘-tsá miâ; tī Hô-lâm séng ê tang-sai kak.
hanlo_comment: 所在 ê 古早 名; tī 河南 省 ê 東西 角.

comment: tiū-á chiam-chiam ê mî; siā-khì ê ngó͘-kok.
hanlo_comment: 稻á 尖尖 ê 芒; 謝去 ê 五穀.

comment: tiū-á chiam-chiam ê mî; siā-khì ê ngó͘-kok.
hanlo_comment: 稻á 尖尖 ê 芒; 謝去 ê 五穀.

comment: chi̍t-hō ê thô͘, á-sī nî-pán-chio̍h, oē kek-tit phok-siau.
hanlo_comment: 一號 ê 土, 抑是 泥版石, 會 激得 朴硝.

comment: chi̍t-ê soaⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 一個 山 ê 名.

comment: bé-hāng-tsang, chiū-sī tī bé ām-kún tn̂g ê mn̂g.
hanlo_comment: 馬項鬃, 就是 tī 馬 頷頸 長 ê 毛.

comment: tōa-tè pò͘; tōa-tiâu kun.
hanlo_comment: 大塊 布; 大條 根.

comment: lâng chhī ê ti; khàm-teh ê bāng.
hanlo_comment: 人 飼 ê 豬; khàm-teh ê 網.

comment: bīn hó-khòaⁿ; tōa bīn-māu, bīn sì-ûi pá-tīⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 面 好看; 大 面貌, 面 四圍 飽滇 ê 意思.

comment: tiū-sūi be̍h-sūi ê chhiu; chháu ê chiam-bé, mê, lāi-lāi ê mê.
hanlo_comment: 稻穗 麥穗 ê 鬚; 草 ê 尖尾, 芒, 利利 ê 芒.

comment: tah-hiahⁿ, hong-bông, chhin-chhiūⁿ tú-tio̍h gûi-hiám ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 搭嚇, 慌忙, 親像 tú-tio̍h 危險 ê 款式.

comment: chhàu-tsúi só͘-siⁿ ê thâng; chhin-chhiūⁿ o͘-bui, báng, kak-phang.
hanlo_comment: 臭水 所生 ê 蟲; 親像 烏bui, 蚊, 角蜂.

comment: chi̍t-tiâu soh, á-sī bāng thang lâi lia̍h lo̍k.
hanlo_comment: 一條 索, 抑是 網 thang 來 掠 鹿.

comment: téng-bīn ê hûn-bū, bô chiap-tio̍h tōe-bīn ê hûn-bū ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 頂面 ê 雲霧, 無 接著 地面 ê 雲霧 ê 意思.

comment: hong-bông; tah-hiahⁿ; khui-khoah; soaⁿ-kok ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 慌忙; 搭嚇; 開闊; 山谷 ê 名.

comment: tsoh-sit lâng, kóng chho͘-ló͘ ê chháu-tē-lâng.
hanlo_comment: 作穡 人, 講 粗魯 ê 草地人.

comment: si-sòaⁿ jû chhiáng-chhiáng, bô khòaⁿ-tio̍h sòaⁿ-thâu.
hanlo_comment: 絲線 jû chhiáng-chhiáng, 無 看著 線頭.

comment: tông-bóng, chiū-sī soaⁿ tsōe-tsōe ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 同bóng, 就是 山 濟濟 ê 款式.

comment: chhù ê thong-niû, á-sī chhù-téng pa̍t-hō ê tōa-ki liāu.
hanlo_comment: 厝 ê 通樑, 抑是 厝頂 別號 ê 大支 料.

comment: si-sòaⁿ jû chhiáng-chhiáng.
hanlo_comment: 絲線 jû chhiáng-chhiáng.

comment: khàm-ba̍t; khàm-teh ê pò͘.
hanlo_comment: khàm密; khàm-teh ê 布.

comment: him-bō͘, liâu-bāng, ǹg-bāng, kia̍h-thâu, khòaⁿ hn̄g.
hanlo_comment: 欣慕, 遼望, ǹg望, 攑頭, 看 遠.

comment: pe ê thâng chhin-chhiūⁿ hô͘-sîn, oē kā lâng kap cheng-siⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 飛 ê 蟲 親像 胡蠅, 會 咬 人 kap 精牲.

comment: gû-pi, sòe ê báng-á, chìⁿ ê miâ, soaⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 牛蜱, 細 ê 蚊á, 箭 ê 名, 山 ê 名.

comment: ba̍k-chiu bô tông-tsú, bōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, chhiⁿ-mî.
hanlo_comment: 目睭 無 瞳子, bōe 看見, chhiⁿ-mî.

comment: chi̍t-hō ê thâng-miâ, tông-lông chiū-sī chháu-kâu.
hanlo_comment: 一號 ê 蟲名, 螳螂 就是 草猴.

comment: tsáu-khì; bô-khì; sit-lo̍h, sí; bia̍t-bông.
hanlo_comment: 走去; 無去; 失落, 死; 滅亡.

comment: bông-bông, chiū-sī ba̍k-chiu bū-bū bô-bêng; bông-bū.
hanlo_comment: 矇矇, 就是 目睭 霧霧 無明; 矇霧.

comment: àm bông-bông, chiū-sī kap àm bong-bong sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 暗 茫茫, 就是 kap 暗 摸摸 相像.

comment: phiàn-lâng; pe̍h-chha̍t, lām-sám, bô-iáⁿ, bô, loān, bōng-tsōng.
hanlo_comment: 騙人; 白賊, 濫糝, 無影, 無, 亂, 妄狀.

comment: ge̍h-îⁿ, kia̍h-thâu khòaⁿ hn̄g; jîn-sîn tī ge̍h-îⁿ ê sî tiâu-kìⁿ jîn-kun ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 月圓, 攑頭 看 遠; 人臣 tī 月圓 ê 時 朝見 人君 ê 意思.

comment: ge̍h hō͘ hûn jia khòaⁿ bōe-bêng, khùn-khì, bô-bêng, chēng-chēng.
hanlo_comment: 月 hō͘ 雲 遮 看 bōe明, 睏去, 無明, 靜靜.

comment: khùn ê sî khòaⁿ-kìⁿ tāi-chì, bāng-kìⁿ; bô iáⁿ-chiah.
hanlo_comment: 睏 ê 時 看見 tāi-chì, 夢見; 無 影跡.

comment: khùn ê sî khòaⁿ-kìⁿ tāi-chì, bāng-kìⁿ; bô iáⁿ-chiah.
hanlo_comment: 睏 ê 時 看見 tāi-chì, 夢見; 無 影跡.

comment: ut-tsut, sim-koaⁿ bô-bêng, gông-ngia̍h, gōng, iu-būn.
hanlo_comment: 鬱卒, 心肝 無明, 昂愕, 戇, 憂悶.

comment: kiàn-siàu, hoân-ló, sim-koaⁿ peh-pak.
hanlo_comment: 見笑, 煩惱, 心肝 擘腹.

comment: kiàn-siàu, hoân-ló, sim-koaⁿ peh-pak.
hanlo_comment: 見笑, 煩惱, 心肝 擘腹.

comment: tú-á khùn-chhíⁿ, sim-koaⁿ bōe cheng-sîn; Soaⁿ-sai séng soaⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 拄á 睏醒, 心肝 bōe 精神; 山西 省 山 ê 名.

comment: sim-koaⁿ bô bêng, ut-tsut, gōng, gông-ngia̍h, kiàn-siàu.
hanlo_comment: 心肝 無 明, 鬱卒, 戇, 昂愕, 見笑.

comment: ge̍h-îⁿ, tsa̍p-gō͘ ji̍t; him-bō͘; ǹg-bāng; oat-bīn m̄-khòaⁿ, ti̍t-ti̍t khòaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 月圓, 十五 日; 欣慕; ǹg望; 斡面 m̄看, 直直 看.

comment: chhù ê tōa-ki thiāu, á-sī chhù-téng ê îⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 厝 ê 大枝 柱, 抑是 厝頂 ê 楹.

comment: hûn-bōng; bōng-khòng; bōng-toh; bōng-pâi; bōng-tiâⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 墳墓; 墓壙; 墓桌; 墓牌; 墓埕.

comment: bōng-bōng hîn, chiū-sī sim-koaⁿ phû-phiò ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 夢夢 眩, 就是 心肝 浮漂 ê 意思.

comment: tsòe chi̍t-bu, chiū-sī khioh tsòe-hé ê mi̍h; á-sī lâng saⁿ tú-tio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 做 一bu, 就是 拾 做伙 ê 物; 抑是 人 相 tú-tio̍h.

comment: chi̍t-bu thô͘, chiū-sī chi̍t-tui thô͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 一bu 土, 就是 一堆 土 ê 意思.

comment: ki-chhì, khòaⁿ-khin hí-lāng pō͘-jio̍k, mē lâng ê oē.
hanlo_comment: 譏刺, 看輕 戲弄 暴虐, 罵 人 ê 話.

comment: ki-chhì, khòaⁿ-khin hí-lāng pō͘-jio̍k, mē lâng ê oē.
hanlo_comment: 譏刺, 看輕 戲弄 暴虐, 罵 人 ê 話.

comment: bú-lāng, chhit-thô, thiàu-bú, iô-iô pái-pái, kha-chhiú phoa̍h-lâi phoa̍h-khì.
hanlo_comment: 舞弄, 𨑨迌, 跳舞, 搖搖 擺擺, 腳手 拔來 拔去.

comment: saⁿ-thâi ê tāi-chì, bú-lāng, chiàn-soah, bú-ióng, ui-giâm, bú-gōe.
hanlo_comment: 相刣 ê tāi-chì, 舞弄, 戰soah, 武勇, 威嚴, 舞藝.

comment: chiáu ê miâ, oē kóng-oē chhin-chhiūⁿ eng-ko, eng-bú.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 ê 名, 會 講話 親像 鸚哥, 鸚鵡.

comment: pó-chio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ phek-ge̍k; tsóng-sī bô hiah tēng, hiah kim.
hanlo_comment: 寶石 親像 碧玉; 總是 無 hiah 碇, hiah 金.

comment: Ô͘-lâm séng chi̍t-tiâu khoe ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 湖南 省 一條 溪 ê 名.

comment: Ô͘-lâm séng chi̍t-tiâu khoe ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 湖南 省 一條 溪 ê 名.

comment: thiàu-bú, tiô-thiàu; seng-khu iô-pái; sim-koaⁿ chhèng-éng.
hanlo_comment: 跳舞, 趒跳; 身軀 搖擺; 心肝 衝湧.

comment: tóe chiú ê hûi-àng-á, chhùi oe̍h tō͘ tōa.
hanlo_comment: 貯 酒 ê 瓷甕á, 嘴 狹 肚 大.

comment: thiám-mī; gâu phô͘-sáng; tsa-bó͘-thé, nńg-chiáⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 諂媚; gâu 扶搡; tsa-bó͘體, 軟茈.

comment: thiám-mī; gâu phô͘-sáng; tsa-bó͘-thé, nńg-chiáⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 諂媚; gâu 扶搡; tsa-bó͘體, 軟茈.

comment: pó-chio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ phek-ge̍k; tsóng-sī bô hiah tēng, hiah kim.
hanlo_comment: 寶石 親像 碧玉; 總是 無 hiah 𠕇, hiah 金

comment: eng-ko, sui-jiân oē o̍h kóng-oē, i iáu-kú sǹg sī chiáu.
hanlo_comment: 鸚哥, 雖然 會 學 講話, 伊 iáu-kú 算 是 鳥.

comment: bong, so, chhiú-hōaⁿ, loa̍h, an-ùi, liāu-lí, sūn-sūn, kín-kip.
hanlo_comment: 摸, 搓, 手扞, 捋, 安慰, 料理, 順順, 緊急.

comment: thióng-ài; an-ùi; liāu-lí; sūn-sūn; kín-kip; pôe-iúⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 寵愛; 安慰; 料理; 順順; 緊急; 培養.

comment: tōa-chhù ê chhim-chíⁿ, tsúi-pân, léng-lông, chhó-bo̍k ê chhiong-sēng, ām-ām, tsōe-tsōe; hong-hòe.
hanlo_comment: 大厝 ê 深井, 水瓶, 兩廊, 草木 ê 充盛, ām-ām, 濟濟; 荒廢.

comment: tōa-chhù ê chhim-chíⁿ, tsúi-pân, léng-lông, chhó-bo̍k ê chhiong-sēng, ām-ām, tsōe-tsōe; hong-hòe.
hanlo_comment: 大厝 ê 深井, 水瓶, 兩廊, 草木 ê 充盛, ām-ām, 濟濟; 荒廢.

comment: hù-sû ê jī, tsòe bô, á-sī bêng-pe̍k ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 副詞 ê 字, 做 無, 抑是 明白 ê 意思.

comment: pha̍k-ta ê bah-phìⁿ, á-sī pha̍k-ta ê hî.
hanlo_comment: 曝焦 ê 肉片, 抑是 曝焦 ê 魚.

comment: tsó͘-chí ê ì-sù, chhin-chhiūⁿ bo̍h-tit, m̄-thang; mn̄g ê oē, á-bô.
hanlo_comment: 阻止 ê 意思, 親像 莫得, m̄-thang; 問 ê 話, 抑無.

comment: ēng chhiú hōaⁿ, loa̍h, tah; an-ùi; liāu-lí; tôaⁿ ge̍h-khîm.
hanlo_comment: 用 手 扞, 捋, 搭; 安慰; 料理; 彈 月琴.

comment: sit-chì ê khoán-sit, kî-koài ê oē, ài-sioh, an-ùi, thiàⁿ-thàng, kap 㒇 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 失志 ê 款式, 奇怪 ê 話, 愛惜, 安慰, 疼痛, kap 㒇 相像.

comment: kok-bú, pē-bú; sèng-bú; jī-bú; kàⁿ-bú; kiuⁿ-bú, sat-bú.
hanlo_comment: 國母, 父母; 聖母; 字母; 酵母; 薑母, 虱母.

comment: tōa-pō͘-bú, tsńg-thâu-bú; kûn-thâu-bú; kha tōa-pō͘-bú.
hanlo_comment: 大步拇, 指頭拇; 拳頭拇; 腳 大步拇.

comment: kang-bú=kang-bó͘; chiū-sī chi̍t-hō phàⁿ ê chhiū oē kek-tit kiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 江bú=江牡; 就是 一號 冇 ê 樹 會 激得 鹼.

comment: kang-bú, bú-ê, chiū-sī cheng-siⁿ ê bú-ê.
hanlo_comment: 公母, 母ê, 就是 精牲 ê 母ê.

comment: bú-thán-chhoa̍h, chiū-sī thán-chhoa̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 舞坦chhoa̍h, 就是 坦chhoa̍h ê 意思.

comment: bú-thún bú-thún, chiū-sī sòe-hàn koh hok-siòng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: bú-thún bú-thún, 就是 細漢 koh 福相 ê 意思.

comment: chhī-bú chhī-chhū=chī-bú chī-tsū, sī kóng-oē sòe-siaⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 嗤武 嗤呲=嗤武 嗤tsū, 是 講話 細聲 ê 意思.

comment: khiàm-kheh; bōe, m̄-sī, bē-ū, bô-siông.
hanlo_comment: 欠缺; bōe, m̄是, 未有, 無常.

comment: ang-îⁿ, sai-kong, chiok-hok, siâ-su̍t, khòaⁿ-miā; só͘-tsāi-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 尪姨, 司公, 祝福, 邪術, 看命; 所在名.

comment: ēng lâ-sâm bak-lâng; un-khut; ka-bû, bû-lōa, húi-pòng; lām-sám.
hanlo_comment: 用 lâ-sâm bak人; 冤屈; 加誣, 誣賴, 誹謗; 濫糝.

comment: bô chèng-tsoh, pha-hng chháu-á hoat tsōe-tsōe, chhiong-sēng, hong-hòe.
hanlo_comment: 無 種作, 拋荒 草á 發 濟濟, 充盛, 荒廢.

comment: chi̍t-hō ê ti-tu, i ê siū tsoh tī chháu-ni̍h, iā-sī to̍k-mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 一號 ê 蜘蛛, 伊 ê 岫 作 tī 草裡, 也是 毒物.

comment: chi̍t-khoán ê bāng; kūn-sī ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 一款 ê 網; 近視 ê 意思.

comment: lâng chia̍h-pá phah-eh; khiàm-kheh bô-khì; bōe, m̄-sī, bē-ū, bô-siông.
hanlo_comment: 人 食飽 phah 噎; 欠缺 無氣; bōe, m̄是, 未有, 無常.

comment: Sek-kàu ēng 南無 nn̄g-jī chiū-sī chí kui-oá ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 釋教 用 南無 兩字 就是 指 歸oá ê 意思.

comment: tōa-chhù ê chhim-chíⁿ, tsúi-pân, léng-lông, chhó-bo̍k chhiong-sēng ê ì-sù, ām-ām, tsōe-tsōe; hong-hòe.
hanlo_comment: 大厝 ê 深井, 水瓶, 兩廊, 草木 充盛 ê 意思, ām-ām, 濟濟; 荒廢.

comment: tōa-chhù ê chhim-chíⁿ, tsúi-pân, léng-lông, chhó-bo̍k chhiong-sēng ê ì-sù, ām-ām, tsōe-tsōe; hong-hòe.
hanlo_comment: 大厝 ê 深井, 水瓶, 兩廊, 草木 充盛 ê 意思, ām-ām, 濟濟; 荒廢.

comment: phah sit-lo̍h; sòng-hiong; bô, phah m̄-kìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: phah 失落; sòng-hiong; 無, phah m̄見.

comment: ēng mi̍h lâi khàm; tōa, khui-khoah; kek-phài.
hanlo_comment: 用 物 來 khàm; 大, 開闊; 激派.

comment: hù-sû ê jī, tsòe bô, á-sī bêng-pe̍k ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: phah 失落; sòng-hiong; 無, phah m̄見.

comment: khúi-khiat ê bīn-sek; bô, m̄-sī; kap 謀sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 詭譎 ê 面色; 無, m̄是; kap 謀相像.

comment: kìm-chí ê ì-sù, chhin-chhiūⁿ bo̍h-ti̍t, m̄-thang; soah, bô; kiám-sī.
hanlo_comment: 禁止 ê 意思, 親像 莫得, m̄-thang; soah, 無; 檢視.

comment: sit-chì ê khoán-sit; khang-khang bô; ài-sioh, thiàⁿ-thàng, an-ùi.
hanlo_comment: 失志 ê 款式; 空空 無; 愛惜, 疼痛, 安慰.

comment: chhut-la̍t tsòe, tsoan-bū pān tāi-chì; bián-kióng, sū-bū, sū-chêng.
hanlo_comment: 出力 做, 專務 辦 tāi-chì; 勉強, 事務, 事情.

comment: kóaⁿ-kín, kiông; bé teh pháu, lām-sám tsáu.
hanlo_comment: 趕緊, 強; 馬 teh 跑, 濫糝 走.

comment: tsúi-bīn ê tà-bū; tōe-khì; hun-àm, ian-bū.
hanlo_comment: 水面 ê 罩霧; 地氣; 昏暗, 煙霧.

comment: chiáu ê khoán-sit chhin-chhiūⁿ ah, chiáu ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 ê 款式 親像 鴨, 鳥 ê 名.

comment: to̍k-chháu ê miâ; bō͘-sēng; só͘-tsāi ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 毒草 ê 名; 茂盛; 所在 ê 名.

comment: téng-bīn ê hûn-bū, bô chiap-tio̍h tōe-bīn ê hûn-bū ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 頂面 ê 雲霧, 無 接著 地面 ê 雲霧 ê 意思.

comment: chhiⁿ ê miâ; Kim-hoa-hú kó͘-tsá ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 星 ê 名; 金華府 古早 ê 名.

comment: bū-tsúi, chiū-sī tsúi tùi chhùi pûn chhut-lâi.
hanlo_comment: 霧水, 就是 水 對 嘴 pûn 出來.

comment: ba̍k-chiu bū, chiū-sī tông-tsú sit-bêng, khòaⁿ bōe-chin.
hanlo_comment: 目睭 霧, 就是 瞳子 失明, 看 bōe真.

comment: si̍h-bu̍h si̍h-sut, chiū-sī sòe-siaⁿ kóng-oē ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: si̍h-bu̍h si̍h-sut, 就是 細聲 講話 ê 意思.

comment: ba̍k-chiu bui-bui, sa-bui; chiū-sī pòaⁿ-ha̍p pòaⁿ-khoeh ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 目睭 bui-bui, sa-bui; 就是 半合 半瞌 ê 意思.

comment: tsu-bui, bâ-bui, chiū-sī ka-kī khòaⁿ-oa̍h chiū-hó ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 滋微, 麻微, 就是 家己 快活 就好 ê 意思.

comment: chhiū-būi, chiū-sī chi̍t-hō chhàu-hiàn ê thâng-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 樹būi, 就是 一號 臭膻 ê 蟲名.

comment: chhùi bun-bun, chhiò bun-bun, chiū-sī chhùi sió-khóa khui teh chhiò ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 嘴 bun-bun, 笑 bun-bun, 就是 嘴 小khóa 開 teh 笑 ê 意思.

comment: chhùi-kak; chim-chhùi; chhùi-tûn-phê; kóng-oē.
hanlo_comment: 嘴角; 唚嘴; 嘴唇皮; 講話.

comment: chhùi-tûn sio-ha̍p, chhùi-kak, kóng-oē, chim-chhùi, chhùi-tûn phê.
hanlo_comment: 嘴唇 相合, 嘴角, 講話, 唚嘴, 嘴唇 皮.

comment: thán-hoâiⁿ koah, koah-âu, pun-khui, tsū-bún.
hanlo_comment: 坦橫 割, 割喉, 分開, 自刎.

comment: chhùi-tûn-phê; chhùi-kak; chim-chhùi, kóng-oē; kūn-sī.
hanlo_comment: 嘴唇皮; 嘴角; 唚嘴, 講話; 近視.

comment: pun-khui; koah-tn̄g; at-chi̍h; tsām-tn̄g.
hanlo_comment: 分開; 割斷; at折; 斬斷.

comment: chhiông-bún, chiū-sī chi̍t-hō chháu-hoe ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 薔bún, 就是 一號 草花 ê 名.

comment: àm-àm, bô kng-bêng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 暗暗, 無 光明 ê 意思.

comment: pe ê thâng oē tèng-lâng, báng, chiū-sī oē tèng-lâng ê báng; ū pan-hûn-ê.
hanlo_comment: 飛 ê 蟲 會 叮人, 蚊, 就是 會 叮人 ê 蚊; 有 斑痕ê.

comment: chhùi-tûn sio-ha̍p, ha̍p-oá; kóng-oē sió-khóa chhiò.
hanlo_comment: 嘴唇 相合, 合oá; 講話 小khóa 笑.

comment: chiong chhiú lâi bong; hû, khîⁿ; chhâ-chhē, séng-chhat.
hanlo_comment: 將 手 來 摸; 扶, 鉗; 查chhē, 省察.

comment: bôa hō͘ i pîⁿ; chhit hō͘ i ta; that-tīⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 磨 hō͘ 伊 平; 拭 hō͘ 伊 乾; 塞滇.

comment: iáu-siū; lâng beh kàu lîm-chiong ê sî ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 夭壽; 人 beh 到 臨終 ê 時 ê 意思.

comment: báng, o͘-bui; i éng ū tsōe-tsōe chiah tsòe-hé teh pe.
hanlo_comment: 蚊, 烏微; 伊 往 有 濟濟 隻 做伙 teh 飛.

comment: báng, o͘-bui; i éng ū tsōe-tsōe chiah tsòe-hé teh pe.
hanlo_comment: 蚊, 烏微; 伊 往 有 濟濟 隻 做伙 teh 飛.

comment: âng-sek ê sóe-á; oē kek-tit chiú; âng-kam-chià.

comment: hî ê miâ; oē pe, thâu-khak pe̍h; seng-khu ū lām-sek ê pan-hûn.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名; 會 飛, 頭殼 白; 身軀 有 濫色 ê 斑痕.

comment: thiⁿ-téng tsa̍p-sek ê hûn.

comment: lâng ê hī-khang thiaⁿ-kìⁿ chiah tsai, siau-sit, hong-siaⁿ, phīⁿ-kìⁿ.

comment: iá-siù ê miâ, khoán-sit chhin-chhiūⁿ ti; sin-bûn, miâ-siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 野獸 ê 名, 款式 親像 豬; 新聞, 名聲.

comment: iá-siù ê miâ, khoán-sit chhin-chhiūⁿ ti; sin-bûn, miâ-siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 野獸 ê 名, 款式 親像 豬; 新聞, 名聲.

comment: chéng-chê ê ì-sù, ūi-hûn, ūi ang-á, siá-jī, bûn-chiuⁿ, tsòe-bûn.

comment: kúi-nā ê, téng-pòe, chiah-ê; hó-hàn, pûi ê khoán-sit.

comment: ēng chhiú bong, séng-chhat, chhâ, khîⁿ, hû, khàm, so, bong.

comment: khiⁿ-lang-kháu, oe̍h-oe̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ mn̂g.

comment: iu-būn, lîn-bín, bián-lē; chhiu-thiⁿ ê khoán-sit.

comment: tiong-pān ê ge̍h, hó ê chio̍h, ū tsōa ê khoán-sit.

comment: chhiu-thiⁿ ê khoán-sit, iu-būn, lîn-bín.

comment: âng-âng ê pó-ge̍k, chhin-chhiūⁿ bé-ló.

comment: chi̍t-hō ê chhêng-peh chhiū; i lāi-sim ê chhâ; tùi i lâu-chhut chit-lia̍p ê ka.
hanlo_comment: 一號 ê 松柏 樹; 伊 內心 ê 柴; 對 伊 流出 一粒 ê 膠.

comment: sim-koaⁿ iu-būn, kiáu-jiáu, hoân-ló, iu-būn.
hanlo_comment: 心肝 憂悶, 攪擾, 煩惱, 憂悶.

comment: sim-koaⁿ iu-būn, kiáu-jiáu, hoân-ló, iu-būn.
hanlo_comment: 心肝 憂悶, 攪擾, 煩惱, 憂悶.

comment: loān-tsa̍p, hun-loān, chiū-sī jû-jû ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 亂雜, 紛亂, 就是 jû-jû ê 意思.

comment: lîm-chiong ê sî ba̍k-chiu bū; thun-kim tsū-chīn; sí-liáu bô miâ-siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 臨終 ê 時 目睭 霧; 吞金 自盡; 死了 無 名聲.

comment: lîm-chiong ê sî ba̍k-chiu bū; thun-kim tsū-chīn; sí-liáu bô miâ-siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 臨終 ê 時 目睭 霧; 吞金 自盡; 死了 無 名聲.

comment: bôa hō͘ i pîⁿ; chhit hō͘ i ta; that-tīⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 磨 hō͘ 伊 平; 拭 hō͘ 伊 乾; 塞滇.

comment: ū pit-hûn ê ge̍k, á-sī hûi ê ke-si; li̍h-hûn, hâm-sau.
hanlo_comment: 有 pit痕 ê 玉, 抑是 瓷 ê 家私; 裂痕, 含酥.

comment: Soaⁿ-tang séng hô ê miâ; pa̍t-im sī lêng-jio̍k, kek-khùi ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 山東 省 河 ê 名; 別音 是 凌辱, 激氣 ê 意思.

comment: kúi-nā-ê, chiah-ê, téng-pòe; hó-hàn, pûi ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 幾若ê, chiah-ê, 頂輩; 好漢, 肥 ê 款式.

comment: sim-koaⁿ kiáu-jiáu, iu-būn, sim-koaⁿ bōe pêng-an ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 心肝 攪擾, 憂悶, 心肝 bōe 平安 ê 意思.

comment: siⁿ-kiáⁿ, chhiⁿ-chhioh, sng-hà ê lé; thâu-mn̂g bô soe jû-jû.
hanlo_comment: 生kiáⁿ, 鮮chhioh, 喪孝 ê 禮; 頭毛 無 梳 jû-jû.

comment: siaⁿ kàu ê só͘-tsāi, hō͘ lâng thiaⁿ-kìⁿ, kā lâng kóng ê siaⁿ-im.

comment: miâ-siaⁿ; phīⁿ-kìⁿ ê bī-sò͘; siù ê miâ khoán-sit chhin-chhiūⁿ ti
hanlo_comment: 名聲; 鼻見 ê 味素; 獸 ê 名 款式 親像 豬.

comment: miâ-siaⁿ; phīⁿ-kìⁿ ê bī-sò͘; siù ê miâ khoán-sit chhin-chhiūⁿ ti.
hanlo_comment: 名聲; 鼻見 ê 味素; 獸 ê 名 款式 親像 豬.

hanlo_comment: lián-būn, 外國 ê 果子, 親像 平果.

comment: būn-pn̄g, chiū-sī tsú ta-ta lia̍p-lia̍p ê pn̄g.
hanlo_comment: 燜飯, 就是 煮 ta-ta 粒粒 ê 飯.

hanlo_comment: 幼but-but, but-but-á, 親像 細漢 gín-á, 抑是 細尾 魚.

hanlo_comment: 魩á 魚, 就是 一號 會 食得 ê 細尾 魚.

comment: tiⁿ but-but, chiū-sī chin tiⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 甜 粅粅, 就是 真 甜 ê 意思.

hanlo_comment: 凡 所有 ê tāi-chì, 分別, 萬物, 人物, 物色.

comment: phah, bu̍t; ēng bé-piⁿ lâi sut; chiong koáiⁿ-á lâi kòng.
hanlo_comment: phah, bu̍t; 用 馬鞭 來 摔; 將 枴á 來 摃.

hanlo_comment: 潛 落 水底 來 bī; 沉水bī.

comment: bu̍t-io̍h, chiū-sī phang-phang ê io̍h-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 沒藥, 就是 芳芳 ê 藥名.

comment: tiâm lo̍h tsúi, tîm-lûn, soah, sí-liáu, sí-bô, bâi-bu̍t.

comment: beh-sí, bu̍t-loān, chiū-sī beh-sí ê bê-loān.
hanlo_comment: beh死, bu̍t亂, 就是 beh死 ê 迷亂.

comment: tâi sin-si; sí-bô; sí-liáu; bâi-bu̍t.

comment: koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ soaⁿ; thah; tōa-keng chhù.

comment: chi̍t-hō koe, á-sī ō͘; ba̍t-ba̍t; ò-biāu; iù-iù.
hanlo_comment: 一號 瓜, 抑是 芋; 密密; 奧妙; 幼幼.

hanlo_comment: eng埃 khàm-teh; 驚人; 跳落 深 ê 所在.

comment: iáu-siū; lâng beh kàu lîm-chiong ê sî ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 夭壽; 人 beh 到 臨終 ê 時 ê 意思.

comment: thâu-khak tsai tī tsúi-ni̍h.

comment: kiáu, hô-mi̍h; loān-loān, chhùi-chhùi; tāu-chiùⁿ; saⁿ-phêng.
hanlo_comment: 攪, 和物; 亂亂, 碎碎; 豆醬; 相秤.

comment: chhiat-pîⁿ, chián-pîⁿ, chhòng-khì hó-sè; io̍h-thiap.
hanlo_comment: 切平, 剪平, 創去 好勢; 藥帖.

comment: lō͘-ni̍h ēng ê mi̍h; tō͘-tsâi, chiū-sī pak-tó͘ gōa ê tn̂g-á-thâu.
hanlo_comment: 路裡 用 ê 物; 肚臍, 就是 腹肚 外 ê 腸á頭.

comment: phâng-mi̍h, tsng mi̍h hō͘ lâng, sio-sàng, kèng-tiōng; thó͘-khùi.
hanlo_comment: 捧物, 裝 物 hō͘ 人, 相送, 敬重; 吐氣.

comment: lō͘-giō á-sī chi̍t-hō chhang ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 蕗蕎 抑是 一號 蔥 ê 名.
new_comment: 「𧆌」係「齏」異體，釋義指「薤」，但音不符。

comment: pe̍h-tsó,chiū-sī Hô-lâm séng ké-chí ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 白棗, 就是 河南 省 果子 ê 名.

comment: tōe ê khì chhèng-koâiⁿ, peh-khí, chiūⁿ-koâiⁿ; kan-khó͘; poa̍h-tó.
hanlo_comment: 地 ê 氣 衝懸, peh起, 上懸; 艱苦; 跋倒.

comment: thiⁿ ê khēng; chhia-tó, sak-tó, chhia-sak.

comment: kúi-nā lâng; chiah-ê, hiah-ê, téng-pòe.
hanlo_comment: 幾若 人; chiah-ê, hiah-ê, 頂輩.

comment: lâng pak-tó͘ gōa ê tn̂g-á-thâu, tsâi, tō͘-tsâi.
hanlo_comment: 人 腹肚 外 ê 腸á頭, 臍, 肚臍.

comment: kāu sèng-tē; siū-khì; giâu-gî; hoân-ló.
hanlo_comment: 厚 性地; 受氣; 僥疑; 煩惱.

hanlo_comment: 挨khoeh, 捏oá, 拺 墜落, 排列, chhia倒, chhia拺.

comment: io̍h-che, chiū-sī tē-jī piàn tsoaⁿ ê io̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 藥渣, 就是 第二 遍 煎 ê 藥 ê 意思.

comment: che-tái; io̍h-che; han-tsû-che, mī-hún-che; tāu-che.
hanlo_comment: 渣滓; 藥渣; 蕃薯渣, 麵粉渣; 豆渣.

hanlo_comment: 齋懺; 就是 釋教 ê 禮, 救 鬼 出 地獄.

comment: che-lâng, chiū-sī chit ê lâng, á-sī chiah-ê lâng.
hanlo_comment: 這人, 就是 chit-ê 人, 抑是 chiah-ê 人.

comment: tsúi teh lâu; chi̍t-tiâu khoe lâu ji̍p hái, kūn tī Hông-hô.
hanlo_comment: 水 teh 流; 一條 溪 流 入 海, 近 tī 黃河.

comment: oē chia̍h-tit ê chhài, chhin-chhiūⁿ tsúi-chhài.
hanlo_comment: 會 食得 ê 菜, 親像 水菜.

comment: ēng chhiú tīⁿ tsúi, á-sī chiap, hō͘ i chhut; lū chhut-lâi.
hanlo_comment: 用 手 掟 水, 抑是 汁, hō͘ 伊 出; 濾 出來.

comment: hî ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ to-hî, bé-ka hî.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, 親像 刀魚, 馬鮫 魚.

comment: tsúi-miâ, kè-tsúi, hō͘-chîⁿ; hó-khòaⁿ, tsōe-tsōe.
hanlo_comment: 水名, 過水, 雨晴; 好看, 濟濟.

comment: bô khòaⁿ-oa̍h; chèng-thâu; phòa-pīⁿ; m̄ chiâⁿ-mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 無 快活; 症頭; 破病; m̄ 成物.

comment: ngiâ-chih, hit-ê, chit-ê, chit-hō, che, chit-tia̍p, àn-ni.
hanlo_comment: 迎接, hit-ê, chit-ê, chit號, 這, chit霎, 按呢.

comment: oe-khoeh, sak, ni̍h-oá, pâi-lia̍t, chhia-tó, chhia-sak.
hanlo_comment: 挨khoeh, 拺, 捏oá, 排列, chhia倒, chhia拺.

comment: tōa-chí, á-ché, chiū-sī hū-jîn-lâng ê chheng-ho͘.
hanlo_comment: 大姊, 阿姊, 就是 婦人人 ê 稱呼.

comment: tōa-chí, á-ché, chiū-sī hū-jîn-lâng ê chheng-ho͘.
hanlo_comment: 大姊, 阿姊, 就是 婦人人 ê 稱呼.

comment: tōa-chí, á-ché, chiū-sī hū-jîn-lâng ê chheng-ho͘.
hanlo_comment: 大姊, 阿姊, 就是 婦人人 ê 稱呼.

comment: hoat-tō͘, kìm, koán-hat, chè-tsō, tû-khì, siah-chhâi kàu hó-sè.
hanlo_comment: 法度, 禁, 管轄, 製造, 除去, 削裁 到 好勢.

comment: ka saⁿ-á, chián-chè, chiàu hoat-tō͘ tsòe-mi̍h, chhòng-tsō, hoat-tō͘, chè-tsō.
hanlo_comment: 鉸 衫á, 剪製, 照 法度 做物, 創造, 法度, 製造.

comment: hiàn-chè, chè-sū, sím-chhat, ēng mi̍h lâi kèng kúi-sîn.
hanlo_comment: 獻祭, 祭祀, 審察, 用 物 來 敬 鬼神.

comment: kau-chiap, hōe-ha̍p ê só͘-tsāi; sî-tsūn, lâu-pái, tāi-chì, sî-chè.
hanlo_comment: 交接, 會合 ê 所在; 時陣, lâu-pái, tāi-chì, 時際.

comment: tsúi-hōaⁿ; tsúi-piⁿ, tsúi-lōa; tsúi-chhiâng.
hanlo_comment: 水岸; 水邊, 水瀨; 水沖.

comment: koah ngó͘-kok hē-teh, thang pa̍k sòa siu khí-lâi.
hanlo_comment: 割 五穀 hē-teh, 通 縛 續 收 起來.

comment: tsó͘-tòng, khan, thoa, thiu, the̍h; nà-kng.
hanlo_comment: 阻擋, 牽, 拖, 抽, the̍h; 爁光.

comment: hûn hun-khui, hō͘-chîⁿ, hō͘ lo̍h soah.
hanlo_comment: 雲 分開, 雨晴, 雨 落 soah.

comment: chi̍t-hō sóe-á, ū îⁿ-îⁿ sòe-sòe ê hoe.
hanlo_comment: 一號 黍á, 有 圓圓 細細 ê 花.

comment: to-siù; ū lâng kóng sī nńg-phê ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 刀鞘; 有 人 講 是 軟皮 ê 意思.

comment: hî ê miâ, thang tsòe chiùⁿ; hó-bī; thâu iā hó-chia̍h.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, thang 做 醬; 好味; 頭 也 好食.

comment: kā á-sī pō͘; ū lâng kóng sī tò-ha̍p-khí ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 咬 抑是 哺; 有 人 講 是 倒合齒 ê 意思.

comment: ba̍k-chiu kim-kim; tùi bīn-chêng keng-kè; ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 目睭 金金; 對 面前 經過; 有 看著.

comment: kè-tsúi, oē-tsòe-tit, hó-sè, pang-tsān, liāu-lí, chiâⁿ, kè, kàu; iu-būn.
hanlo_comment: 過水, 會做得, 好勢, 幫贊, 料理, 成, 過, 到; 憂悶.

comment: lio̍h-lio̍h-á kng, kng; chhiⁿ ê kng; bêng, bêng-bêng.
hanlo_comment: 略略á 光, 光; 星 ê 光; 明, 明明.

comment: lio̍h-lio̍h-á kng, kng; chhiⁿ ê kng; bêng, bêng-bêng.
hanlo_comment: 略略á 光, 光; 星 ê 光; 明, 明明.

comment: tōe ê khì chhèng-koâiⁿ, thiⁿ ê khēng; peh-khí, chiūⁿ-koâiⁿ, kan-khó͘.
hanlo_comment: 地 ê 氣 衝懸, 天 ê 虹; peh起, 上懸, 艱苦.

comment: poa̍h-tó, siak-tó, chhia-tó, chhia-siak.
hanlo_comment: 跋倒, 摔倒, chhia倒, chhia摔.

comment: lâng chiong chit ê teh tsòe tóe chiú ê khì-kū.
hanlo_comment: 人 將 chit-ê teh 做 貯 酒 ê 器具.

comment: hông-thán ê khoán-sit, lô-khó͘ ê pīⁿ, ti̍t-ti̍t sán; hoân-ló.
hanlo_comment: 黃疸 ê 款式, 勞苦 ê 病, 直直 瘦; 煩惱.

comment: pháiⁿ-bī, chhin-chhiūⁿ sio thâu-mn̂g á-sī nōa-bah; chhàu-hiàn ê khì.
hanlo_comment: pháiⁿ味, 親像 燒 頭毛 抑是 爛肉; 臭膻 ê 氣.

comment: oe-khoeh, sak, ni̍h-oá, tūi-lo̍h, pâi-lia̍t, chhia-tó, chhia-sak.
hanlo_comment: 挨khoeh, 拺, 捏oá, 墜落, 排列, chhia倒, chhia拺.

comment: cheng-chè, chiū-sī lâng á-sī mi̍h súi hó-khòaⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 精緻, 就是 人 抑是 物 媠 好看 ê 意思.

comment: tō͘-chè, chiū-sī gín-á chhut-sì tú-tú chi̍t-nî kú ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 度晬, 就是 gín-á 出世 tú-tú 一年 久 ê 意思.

comment: tō͘-chè, chiū-sī gín-á chhut-sì tú-tú chi̍t-nî kú ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 度晬, 就是 gín-á 出世 tú-tú 一年 久 ê 意思.

comment: chioh-chè; khiàm-chè; chè-tsú; pàng-chè; thó-chè; tsáu-chè.
hanlo_comment: 借債; 欠債; 債主; 放債; 討債; 走債.

comment: oan-ke niû-chè, chiū-sī kap lâng tōa oan-ke ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 冤家 量債, 就是 kap 人 大 冤家 ê 意思.

comment: tī chhiū-ni̍h ê thâng, pùn-sò ê thâng, tsúi-ni̍h ê thâng; am-po͘-chê.
hanlo_comment: tī 樹裡 ê 蟲, 糞埽 ê 蟲, 水裡 ê 蟲; 𧌄蜅蠐.

comment: tsûn ê sún, hō͘ lâng khòa-chiúⁿ, thang lâi iô-ló͘.
hanlo_comment: 船 ê 榫, hō͘ 人 khòa槳, thang 來 搖櫓.

comment: kāu sèng-tē; siū-khì; giâu-gî; hoân-ló.
hanlo_comment: 厚 性地; 受氣; 僥疑; 煩惱.

comment: pe̍h-tsó, chiū-sī Hô-lâm séng ké-chí ê-miâ; chhò-chhâ.
hanlo_comment: 白棗, 就是 河南 省 果子 ê名; 剉柴.

comment: bô khòaⁿ-oa̍h; phòa-pīⁿ, chèng-thâu; m̄-chiâⁿ-mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 無 快活; 破病, 症頭; m̄成物.

comment: tsâi, tō͘-tsâi, chiū-sī lâng pak-tó͘ gōa ê tn̂g-á-thâu.
hanlo_comment: 臍, 肚臍, 就是 人 腹肚 外 ê 腸á頭.

comment: chéng-chê; tūi ê sūi; pîⁿ-pîⁿ, chê-chi̍p; siu-chéng.
hanlo_comment: 整齊; 墜 ê 穗; 平平, 齊集; 修整.

comment: chhì-chia̍h; chip-teh; ēng mi̍h hō͘ chhùi-tûn tâm.
hanlo_comment: 試食; 啜teh; 用 物 hō͘ 嘴唇 澹.

comment: piáu-keng; ûi lî-pa ê khoán-sit; tsat-iâⁿ; chē-á, iâⁿ-chē.
hanlo_comment: 婊間; 圍 籬笆 ê 款式; 紮營; 寨á, 營寨.

comment: ûi chhin-chhiūⁿ lî-pa ê khoán-sit, tsat-iâⁿ,chē, chē-á, iâⁿ-chē.
hanlo_comment: 圍 親像 籬笆 ê 款式, 紮營, 寨, 寨á, 營寨.

comment: chē, chhin-chhiūⁿ chē-kiō; chē-thiⁿ; chē-siân; chē-chheng; chē-siàu.
hanlo_comment: 坐, 親像 坐轎; 坐天; 坐禪; 坐清; 坐數.

comment: chē-kòa=tsōe-kòa; siū-chē; sóe-chē; sí-chē.
hanlo_comment: chē-kòa=罪過; 受罪; 洗罪; 死罪.

comment: tuh-ka-chē, chiū-sī ài-khùn ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 拄瞌睡, 就是 愛睏 ê 款式.

comment: gâu-phīⁿ-chē, chiū-sī chin tsai-iáⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: gâu鼻chē, 就是 真 知影 ê 意思.

comment: tò-chē chiū-sī tò-lun ê ì-sù; chhin-chhiūⁿ tò-chē-tsûn.
hanlo_comment: 倒坐 就是 倒lun ê 意思; 親像 倒坐船.

comment: piâⁿ-cheh; cheh-siaⁿ, chiū-sī sio̍k pat-im ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 平仄; 仄聲, 就是 屬 八音 ê 意思.

comment: thiah-sòaⁿ koh chiap tsòe tn̂g-tn̂g ê ì-sù, pháng-cheh.
hanlo_comment: 拆散 koh 接 做 長長 ê 意思, 紡績.

comment: cheh-thoah, chiū-sī phah-sńg mi̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 撮汰, 就是 phah 損 物 ê 意思.

comment: hù-sû ê oē; [sih-chheh|sih-cheh]=sih chi̍t-ē sio-siāng; kiu-cheh lun-cheh=kiaⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 副詞 ê 話; sih-cheh=sih 一下 相像; 勼cheh, 縮cheh=驚 ê 意思.

comment: cheh-ta, cheh khí-lâi, ēng pò͘ ji̍h hō͘ i ta; ēng tsńg-thâu bé chhit.
hanlo_comment: 拭乾, 拭 起來, 用 布 揤 hō͘ 伊 乾; 用 指頭 尾 拭.

comment: ba̍k-kia̍h-cheh, chiū-sī hū-jîn-lâng oê ê kha-āu-tiⁿ ê chhâ.
hanlo_comment: 木屐截, 就是 婦人人 鞋 ê 腳後蹬 ê 柴.

comment: cheh-á chiū-sī kap púi-á sio-siāng ì-sù
hanlo_comment: 癤á 就是 kap 痱á 相像 意思.

comment: sí-che̍h, che̍h-chéng; che̍h sam-tāi; chiū-sī bô hō͘-è ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 死絕, 絕種; 絕 三代; 就是 無 後裔 ê 意思.

comment: tè lâng ê kha-jiah, kha-jiah, iáⁿ-chiah, hêng-chek.
hanlo_comment: tè 人 ê 腳跡, 腳跡, 影跡, 形跡.

comment: kha-ta̍h ê hûn-jiah, hûn-iáⁿ, tè-lâng, chhâ-si̍t, bô͘-iūⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 腳踏 ê 痕跡, 痕影, tè人, 查實, 模樣.

comment: kha-ta̍h ê hûn-jiah, hûn-iáⁿ, tè-lâng, chhâ-si̍t, bô͘-iūⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 腳踏 ê 痕跡, 痕影, tè人, 查實, 模樣.

comment: ki-chhì, hêng-hoa̍t, hiâm, mn̄g, kiû, the̍h; tam-tng, chek-jīm, chit-jīm.
hanlo_comment: 譏刺, 刑罰, 嫌, 問, 求, the̍h; 擔當, 責任, 職任.

comment: khòaⁿ-iūⁿ, o̍h khoán-sit, chiàu hoat-tō͘, jiân-āu, chiū-sī, lu̍t-lē.
hanlo_comment: 看樣, 學 款式, 照 法度, 然後, 就是, 律例.

comment: tsòe kang-khè, kang-hu, pháng si-sòaⁿ sio-chiap; chiâⁿ, kong-lô.
hanlo_comment: 做 工課, 工夫, 紡 絲線 相接; 成, 功勞.

comment: liâm-piⁿ,kūn-oá, àn-ni, kàu-lah; tú-á, beh-chiah, hé-chek-sái.
hanlo_comment: liâm-piⁿ, 近oá, 按呢, 到啦; 拄á, beh-chiah, 火燭屎.

comment: chit-ê, chit-tia̍p, tú-á-chiah, chiū-sī, chiah-sī, chek-sî.
hanlo_comment: chit-ê, chit霎, tú-á chiah, 就是, chiah是, 即時.

comment: chit-ê, chit-cia̍p, tú-á-chiah, chiū-sī, chiah-sī, chek-sî.
hanlo_comment: chit-ê, chit霎, tú-á chiah, 就是, chiah是, 即時.

comment: gō͘-kak ê miâ, sóe-á; kà lâng tsoh-chhân ê sîn ê miâ; gó͘-kok-sîn.
hanlo_comment: 五穀 ê 名, 黍á; 教 人 作田 ê 神 ê 名; 五穀神.

comment: khi-chhiâ, piⁿ-thâu; cheh, piâⁿ-cheh.
hanlo_comment: 欹斜, 邊頭; 仄, 平仄.

comment: chiáu ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ pe̍h-lēng-si; saⁿ-thiàⁿ, chek-lêng.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 ê 名, 親像 白鴒鷥; 相疼, 鶺鴒.

comment: chiáu chi̍t-ê, mi̍h toaⁿ-ê, chiah, chiáu-chiah, chi̍t-chiah.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 一個, 物 單ê, 隻, 鳥隻, 一隻.

comment: ji̍t-chhiâ, ē-po͘-sî, ûn-á-kè, tang-sì, sai-sì.
hanlo_comment: 日斜, 下晡時, 緩á過, 東勢, 西勢.

comment: siaⁿ-im tsōe-tsōe, chhin-chhiūⁿ thâng chiauh-chiauh-háu.
hanlo_comment: 聲音 濟濟, 親像 蟲 chiauh-chiauh哮.

comment: chiong thô͘-kat tsoh bō͘-hia̍t; hé-chek ê hu,chián hé-chek, oàn-hūn, tû-khì.
hanlo_comment: 將 土埆 作 墓穴; 火燭 ê 灰, 剪 火燭, 怨恨, 除去.

comment: thiaⁿ bô-bêng, in-ūi hī-khang tāng; hī-khang ê pīⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 聽 無明, 因為 耳孔 重; 耳孔 ê 病.

comment: jióng ê siaⁿ, tōa-âu-kiò, saⁿ-chiⁿ kóng-oē.
hanlo_comment: 嚷 ê 聲, 大 喉叫, 相爭 講話.

comment: chīn-chhim, chhim-ò, oh-tit thang khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 盡深, 深奧, oh得 thang 看見.

comment: tōa-hoa̍h kiâⁿ; kiâⁿ kiông-kèng ê khoán-sit, ûn-ûn-á kiâⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 大伐 行; 行 強勁 ê 款式, 勻勻á 行.

comment: put-thong, that-ba̍t; móa-móa, tsa̍t-tsa̍t.
hanlo_comment: 不通, 窒密; 滿滿, 實實.

comment: oe̍h-toe̍h, pek-oá; oe-khoeh, bô só͘-tsāi.
hanlo_comment: 狹窄, 逼oá; 挨khoeh, 無 所在.

comment: kiâⁿ tú-tú-á kàu, tiô-thiàu, thún-ta̍h, kha-jiah; kó͘-tsá chha̍t ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 行 tú-tú-á 到, 趒跳, thún踏, 腳跡; 古早 賊 ê 名.

comment: chhiū ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ hoâi-chhiū, i ê ki oē tsòe-tit koáiⁿ-á.
hanlo_comment: 樹 ê 名, 親像 槐樹, 伊 ê 枝 會 做得 枴á.

comment: tōa-tsûn ê sió-tsûn-á; pîⁿ-tóe ê tsûn-á; sam-pán.
hanlo_comment: 大船 ê 小船á; 平底 ê 船á; 舢板.

comment: lâng ê kha-chhioh-tóe; chiáu-á ê kha.
hanlo_comment: 人 ê 腳chhioh底; 鳥á ê 腳.

comment: chi̍t-tiâu soaⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ lêng ê kha-chiah-chit; chi̍t-tsàn ê soaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 一條 山 親像 龍 ê 尻脊脊; 一層 ê 山.

comment: tsúi àm-chīⁿ lâu-lâu chhut-lâi; hiù-tsúi.
hanlo_comment: 水 暗靜 流流 出來; 溴水.

comment: kóng-oē sòa hó-chhiò; lâng hoaⁿ-hí teh chhiò ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 講話 續 好笑; 人 歡喜 teh 笑 ê 聲.

comment: kong-lô; khó-chhú ê phín-hēng, oē kham-tit tit-tio̍h pò-siúⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 功勞; 可取 ê 品行, 會 堪得 得tio̍h 報賞.

comment: bô chhut-tsúi ê chio̍h-pôaⁿ; chhián-tsúi ê soa-chio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 無 出水 ê 石磐; 淺水 ê 沙石.

comment: piah-ē ê tōe-ki; tōe-hō miâ.
hanlo_comment: 壁下 ê 地基; 地號 名.

comment: cheng chheng-khì ê pe̍h-bí.
hanlo_comment: 舂 清氣 ê 白米.

comment: lâng sòe-pō͘ teh kiâⁿ; kiâⁿ-lâi kiâⁿ-khì ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 人 細步 teh 行; 行來 行去 ê 意思.

comment: pek-kín lâng kiâⁿ-lō͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 逼緊 人 行路 ê 意思.

comment: thiah-phòa, á-sī phah-pháiⁿ-mi̍h ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 拆破, 抑是 phah pháiⁿ物 ê 聲.

comment: chi̍t-hō oē chhèng-éng, á-sī bùn-khang ê thâng; ti-tu ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 一號 會 衝湧, 抑是 鼤空 ê 蟲; 蜘蛛 ê 名.

comment: chì-bî-sòe; sòe-hàn ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 至微細; 細漢 ê 意思.

comment: kó͘-tsá hong-bō ê miâ; oáⁿ-bō; thâu-kun.
hanlo_comment: 古早 方帽 ê 名; 碗帽; 頭巾.

comment: hî ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ chit-á, chit-á-hî, chit-pô.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, 親像 鯽á, 鯽á魚, 鯽婆.

comment: hî ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ chit-á, chit-á-hî, chit-pô, tsóng-sī kó͘-bûn ê.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, 親像 鯽á, 鯽á魚, 鯽婆, 總是 古文 ê.

comment: sán-sán ê thó͘-tōe, chhin-chhiūⁿ soaⁿ-ni̍h ê; kē-kē ê hōaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 瘦瘦 ê 土地, 親像 山裡 ê; 低低 ê 岸.

comment: chia̍h-la̍t ê só͘-tsāi, seng-khu ê io-kut; iàu-kín ê hoat-tō͘.
hanlo_comment: 食力 ê 所在, 身軀 ê 腰骨; 要緊 ê 法度.

comment: niáu-chhú-á teh háu ê siaⁿ; thâng teh háu ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 鳥鼠á teh 哮 ê 聲; 蟲 teh 哮 ê 聲.

comment: teh koah ngó͘-kok ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: teh 割 五穀 ê 聲.

comment: hū-jîn-lâng ê kûn-bé khioh-kéng; hoe ê khioh-kéng.
hanlo_comment: 婦人人 ê 裙尾 拾襉; 花 ê 拾襉.

comment: ēng ngó͘-kok chè-hiàn sîn-bêng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 用 五穀 祭獻 神明 ê 意思.

comment: oan-oat lâu ê tsúi, chhin-chhiūⁿ Soaⁿ-sai séng hiah-ê khoe; lâu-soah.
hanlo_comment: 彎斡 流 ê 水, 親像 山西 省 hiah-ê 溪; 流soah.

comment: chi̍t-hō ê giâ-kang, ū lâng, ū lâng kóng oē chia̍h-tsôa.
hanlo_comment: 一號 ê 鵝公, 有 人, 有 人 講 會 食蛇.

comment: loān-loān kóng; kóng-oē bô tsún-tsat.
hanlo_comment: 亂亂 講; 講話 無 撙節.

comment: teh koah ngó͘-kok ê siaⁿ; chit jī hán-tit ēng.
hanlo_comment: teh 割 五穀 ê 聲; chit字 罕得 用.

comment: kóng-oē bô jîn-lûn; loān-loān lóng kàu kè-thâu.
hanlo_comment: 講話 無 人倫; 亂亂 lóng 到 過頭.

comment: sip-sip bô kàu-gia̍h ta; tsúi teh lâu ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 濕濕 無 夠額 ta; 水 teh 流 ê 款式.

comment: ke-thiⁿ, khioh-oá, chek-tsū, tsū-chi̍p.
hanlo_comment: 加添, 拾oá, 積聚, 聚集.

comment: bé-kang; khiâ-bé chiūⁿ-soaⁿ; peh-chiūⁿ koâiⁿ; tiāⁿ-tio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 馬公; 騎馬 上山; peh上 懸; 定tio̍h.

comment: ēng chhiú lâi phah, bu̍t, á-sī kòng.
hanlo_comment: 用 手 來 phah, bu̍t, 抑是 摃.

comment: thòe-oāⁿ, pang-tsān, î-chioh, chioh-lâi, chioh-khi.
hanlo_comment: 替換, 幫贊, 移借, 借來, 借去.

comment: ēng hé pû-mi̍h; sio; chian; jia̍t; chhin-kūn; chiⁿ-iû.
hanlo_comment: 用 火 烰物; 燒; 煎; 熱; 親近; 掙油.

comment: hî ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ chit-á, chit-á-hî, chit-pô.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, 親像 鯽á, 鯽á魚, 鯽婆.

comment: tek-chhio̍h, tek-pán, lô͘-úi, khòng-chhn̂g-pán, chek-tsū.
hanlo_comment: 竹蓆, 竹板, 蘆葦, 囥床板, 積聚.

comment: kúi sí-liáu kiò-tsòe chek; lâng siá chit-jī lâi tû-siâ; hû-bé ê jī.
hanlo_comment: 鬼 死了 叫做 聻; 人 寫 chit字 來 除邪; 符尾 ê 字.

comment: put-hô; chiū-sī bô saⁿ-ha̍p ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 不和; 就是 無 相合 ê 意思.

comment: hêng-hoa̍t ê khì-kū, kha-khàu, chhì-chha̍k, tsó͘-chí; chhia-lûn ê tòng-tsū.
hanlo_comment: 刑罰 ê 器具, 腳銬, 刺鑿, 阻止; 車輪 ê 擋住.

comment: thâng ê miâ, chhiū-siân ê khoán-sit,am-po͘-chê.

comment: siu-si̍p, khioh, khioh-chhek, khioh-mi̍h.

comment: tiām-tiām; kóng-oē bô chhut-siaⁿ; an-chēng.

comment: ìn-tap; siūⁿ-chhò; thî; háu; jiáng; tōa-siaⁿ.

comment: ēng chhiú the̍h-mi̍h; chhit-mi̍h; la̍k thâu-mn̂g.

comment: tsoh-sit; lôe chiū-sī lôe-hn̂g ê khì-kū, chiam-lāi.
hanlo_comment: 作穡; 犁 就是 犁園 ê 器具, 尖利.

comment: tsoh-sit; lôe chiū-sī lôe-hn̂g ê khì-kū, chiam-lāi.
hanlo_comment: 作穡; 犁 就是 犁園 ê 器具, 尖利.

comment: tiah-mi̍h; ēng chhiú at-chi̍h; at-tn̄g.
hanlo_comment: 摘物; 用 手 at折; at斷.

comment: sòe-sòe; iù-iù; thâng ê miâ.

comment: chháu-ba̍k ê kun siⁿ tī tōe-bīn;kià; oá-khò, thok-tiōng.

comment: kiau-so; sái-sō; pái-lōng; liân-lūi.

hanlo_comment: 鬼 死了 叫做 魙, 人 寫 chit字 來 除邪; 也是 符尾 ê 字.

comment: chho͘-ló͘ ê siaⁿ; kā-mi̍h tōa-siaⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ ti; chiām-sî.
hanlo_comment: 粗魯 ê 聲; 咬物 大聲 親像 豬; 暫時.

comment: chhù-téng ê pang; oe-khoeh; chìⁿ-tē; chiú chē-chheng; tek-pâi ê soh.
hanlo_comment: 厝頂 ê 枋; 挨khoeh; 箭袋; 酒 坐清; 竹棑 ê 索.

comment: koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ ê soaⁿ; soaⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 懸懸 ê 山; 山 ê 名.

comment: koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ ê soaⁿ; soaⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 懸懸 ê 山; 山 ê 名.

comment: chhim; ún-ba̍t; chim-chiok; sì-chiàⁿ; tsôe-tsáⁿ; hó-khòaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 深; 隱密; 斟酌; 四正; 齊斬; 好看.

comment: soh-á, kiâⁿ-ta̍h, chìn-kòng; loān-tsa̍p.
hanlo_comment: 索á, 行踏, 進貢; 亂雜.

comment: tng iá-siù ê khì-kū, chhò-chhiū lâi tû-chhâ, chhut-pān tōa.
hanlo_comment: 當 野獸 ê 器具, 剉樹 來 除柴, 出辨 大.

comment: Sòng-tiâu chi̍t-hō káu ê miâ; un-sûn ê káu; khîm-siù ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 宋朝 一號 狗 ê 名; 溫純 ê 狗; 禽獸 ê 名.

comment: chek-tio̍h, chiū-sī kha tak-tio̍h sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 躓tio̍h, 就是 腳 觸tio̍h 相像.

comment: á-chek; chhin-chek; chek-peh; sió-chek; āu-chek.
hanlo_comment: 阿叔; 親叔; 叔伯; 小叔; 後叔.

comment: la̍h-chek; tsúi-chek; chek-tâi; chek-hoe; chek-sái; chek-chián.
hanlo_comment: 蠟燭; 水燭; 燭台; 燭花; 燭屎; 燭剪.

comment: chek-tio̍h, ū-lâng kóng, hàn-jī chiū-sī 躓 jī.
hanlo_comment: 躓tio̍h, 有人 講, 漢字 就是 躓 字.

comment: ēng chhiú chek,chhin-chhiūⁿ chek lia̍p-á; á-sī sóe ò-giô.
hanlo_comment: 用 手 擠, 親像 擠 粒á; 抑是 洗 薁蕘.

comment: tùi-chek, chiū-sī lâng tī sī-tōa ê bīn-chêng lâi piān-lūn.
hanlo_comment: 對責, 就是 人 tī 序大 ê 面前 來 辯論.

comment: chek-lē, chiū-sī kui-kú; la̍p-sòe, chiū-sī la̍p-hiòng.
hanlo_comment: 稷例, 就是 規矩; 納稅, 就是 納餉.

comment: chhì-á, kóaⁿ-kín, chiam-lāi, io̍h-miâ, chi̍t, chi̍t-lê.
hanlo_comment: 刺á, 趕緊, 尖利, 藥名, 蒺, 蒺藜.

comment: oàn-tò͘, ò͘ⁿ-tò͘, chit-tò͘, chek-tò͘, chek-hāi.
hanlo_comment: 怨妒, 惡妒, 嫉妒, 嫉妒, 嫉害.

comment: chhiúⁿ, kiap, siong-hāi, hāi-sí, tsân-jím, húi-lūi, io̍h, chháu-io̍h; chha̍t.
hanlo_comment: 搶, 劫, 傷害, 壞死, 殘忍, 匪類, 藥, 草藥; 賊.

comment: hî ê miâ, tsa̍t, ba̍k-tsa̍t-hî, sī chhin-chhiūⁿ jiû-hî ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, 蠈, 墨賊魚, 是 親像 魷魚 ê 款.

comment: hî ê miâ, tsa̍t, ba̍k-tsa̍t-hî, sī chhin-chhiūⁿ jiû-hî ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, 蠈, 墨賊魚, 是 親像 魷魚 ê 款.

comment: lâng seng-khu bô bah, sán; phòa-pīⁿ, khiām-séng.
hanlo_comment: 人 身軀 無 肉, 瘦; 破病, 儉省.

comment: ài chia̍h tiū-á tsat ê thâng; lâng kiò-tsòe n̂g-thâng.
hanlo_comment: ài 食 稻á 節 ê 蟲; 人 叫做 黃蟲.

comment: ài chia̍h tiū-á tsat ê thâng; lâng kiò-tsòe n̂g-thâng.
hanlo_comment: ài 食 稻á 節 ê 蟲; 人 叫做 黃蟲.

comment: hî-ê miâ, chit-á, chit-á-hî, chit-pô.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, 鯽á, 鯽á魚, 鯽婆.

comment: chhò-chhiū lâi tû-chhâ, oe̍h-toe̍h, chhut-pān-tōa.
hanlo_comment: 剉樹 來 除柴, 狹窄, 出辨 大.

comment: bô lâng tī-teh; ka-tī tiàm; bô-siaⁿ; tiāⁿ-tiāⁿ, chēng-chēng.
hanlo_comment: 無 人 tī-teh; 家己 踮; 無聲; 定定, 靜靜.

comment: bô lâng tī-teh; ka-tī tiàm; bô-siaⁿ; tiāⁿ-tiāⁿ, chēng-chēng.
hanlo_comment: 無 人 tī-teh; 家己 踮; 無聲; 定定, 靜靜.

comment: Hông-tè lôe-hn̂g lâi bián-lē peh-sìⁿ; só͘-siu ê ngó͘-kok tsòe chè-hiàn.
hanlo_comment: 皇帝 犁園 來 勉勵 百姓; 所收 ê 五穀 做 祭獻.

comment: tsu-chheh, ke-kah-phō͘, bîn-che̍k; tsōe-tsōe lâng kóng-oē ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 書冊, 家甲簿, 民籍; 濟濟 人 講話 ê 聲.

comment: chiong mi̍h siâⁿ ku, chiah ēng chhiuⁿ chha̍k lâi lia̍h i.
hanlo_comment: 將 物 siâⁿ 龜, chiah用 鎗 鑿 來 掠 伊.

comment: lī-che̍k, chiū-sī tsòe-lī ê pīⁿ; ài khí kó͘-che̍k.
hanlo_comment: 痢疾, 就是 做痢 ê 病; 愛 起 蠱疾.

comment: ēng nn̄g-chhiú thoa-khui, saⁿ-phah, piān-lūn, tò͘-kháu, saⁿ-kò.
hanlo_comment: 用 兩手 拖開, 相phah, 辯論, 鬥口, 相告.

comment: chhut gōa-bīn kiâⁿ, the̍h, thiu-sòe, phah hoán-loān ê lâng.
hanlo_comment: 出 外面 行, the̍h, 抽稅, phah 反亂 ê 人.

comment: hō͘ I hâng-ho̍k, sòe-tsoh, cheng-hoa̍t, cheng-hoan.
hanlo_comment: hō͘ 伊 降服, 細作, 征伐, 征番.

comment: cheng-chiat, tiāⁿ-tio̍h, chho͘-chhiú, chèng-tō, pok-kòa-mn̄g.
hanlo_comment: 貞節, 定tio̍h, 粗手, 證道, 卜卦問.

comment: têng-pōe, ke-thiⁿ, khah-tsōe, tsōe-tsōe, ka-cheng.
hanlo_comment: 重倍, 加添, khah濟, 濟濟, 加增.

comment: súi ê bí; iù-iù, ba̍t-ba̍t, chiàⁿ-goân-khì, sûn-tsoân, kéng-soán, lêng-thong.
hanlo_comment: 媠 ê 米; 幼幼, 密密, 正元氣, 純全, 揀選, 靈通.

comment: Sek-kàu ê lâng, chiū-sī hê-siūⁿ; io̍h-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 釋教 ê 人, 就是 和尚; 藥名.

comment: kng ê chio̍h; kng-kng; chheng-chheng; tsúi-chiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 光 ê 石; 光光; 清清; 水晶.

comment: koe-chhī tsōe-lâng ê siaⁿ, hōa-hōa-háu; tōa-liōng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 街市 濟人 ê 聲, 嘩嘩哮; 大量 ê 意思.

comment: kha-āu; kha-āu-tiⁿ ê kun; ēng kha tò-that; chhiú-āu-nn̄g.
hanlo_comment: 腳後; 腳後蹬 ê 筋; 用 腳 倒踢; 手後卵.

comment: táⁿ-thàm, thau-khòaⁿ; sòe-tsoh, chiū-sī thàm-thiaⁿ chiàn-cheng ê sū.
hanlo_comment: 打探, 偷看; 細作, 就是 探聽 戰爭 ê 士.

comment: hó ê ì-sù, chiū-sī hó-tiāu-thâu.
hanlo_comment: 好 ê 意思, 就是 好兆頭.

comment: oàn-hūn, chiū-sī sim-koaⁿ khǹg pháiⁿ ì-sù lâi hāi-lâng.
hanlo_comment: 怨恨, 就是 心肝 khǹg pháiⁿ 意思 來 害人.

comment: sì-kak ê hî-bāng pa̍k tek-ko; tsan, tsan-hî, thó-tsan.
hanlo_comment: 四角 ê 魚網 縛 竹篙; 罾, 罾魚, 土罾.

comment: ham-lêng ê khoán, giang-á, chio̍h-kó͘ ê cheng.
hanlo_comment: ham鈴 ê 款, giang-á, 石鼓 ê 鐘.

comment: chhèng-khì, chhe-ké, chèng-lâng, tsōe-tsōe; sī-sòe îm sī-tōa.
hanlo_comment: 蒸汽, 炊粿, 眾人, 濟濟; 序細 淫 序大.

comment: sòe-sòe ê chhiū-ki, môa-tsang ê ki-kut; chhèng-khì, kek-kún-tsúi.
hanlo_comment: 細細 ê 樹枝, 麻棕 ê 枝骨; 蒸汽, 激滾水.

comment: ga̍k-khì ê miâ; chhin-chhiūⁿ khîm, nî-chîⁿ chêng ê thih-bé, hong-chhe.
hanlo_comment: 樂器 ê 名; 親像 琴, 簾簷 前 ê 鐵馬, 風吹.

comment: soaⁿ-thâu, seng-koâiⁿ, chhut-thâu, tsun-kùi.
hanlo_comment: 山頭, 升懸, 出頭, 尊貴.

comment: hū-jîn-lâng ê jī; toan-tsong ê hū-jîn-lâng; un-jiû ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 婦人人 ê 字; 端莊 ê 婦人人; 溫柔 ê 款式.

comment: chhiū-nâ lāi ê liâu-á hō͘ jîn-kun hioh-joa̍h; bāng-ko-liâu; ti-tiâu.
hanlo_comment: 樹林 內 ê 寮á hō͘ 人君 歇熱; 望高寮; 豬椆.

comment: tsōe-tsōe chio̍h-thâu-á tī hn̂g-ni̍h; chio̍h beh ka-la̍uh ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 濟濟 石頭á tī 園裡; 石 beh 交落 ê 款式.

comment: o͘-jîn, ba̍k-chiu-jîn; khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, bô-ài-khòaⁿ chiáu-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 烏仁, 目睭仁; 看見, 無 愛看 鳥名.

comment: ēng bah á-sī hî chian tī pôaⁿ-á-ni̍h.
hanlo_comment: 用 肉 抑是 魚 煎 tī 盤á裡.

comment: sio̍k tī sòe-chiah niáu-chhú ê lūi, ū lâng kiò-tsòe hê-chhú.
hanlo_comment: 屬 tī 細隻 鳥鼠 ê 類, 有 人 叫做 鼷鼠.

comment: té-té ê thâu-mn̂g; pìn-piⁿ ê thâu-mn̂g sàm-sàm.
hanlo_comment: 短短 ê 頭毛; 鬢邊 ê 頭毛 sàm-sàm.

comment: nâ á-sī sòe-kha ê láng-á; tiuⁿ tek ê keng-chìⁿ; sòe-ki tek-á.
hanlo_comment: 籃 抑是 細腳 ê 籠á; 張 竹 ê 弓箭; 細支 竹á.

comment: ti á-sī iûⁿ ê chiaⁿ-bah; chhùi-chhùi ê bah.
hanlo_comment: 豬 抑是 羊 ê 精肉; 碎碎 ê 肉.

comment: khan á-sī chhōa; ga̍k-khì ê khîm-siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 牽 抑是 chhōa; 樂器 ê 琴聲.

comment: phah kim-lūi ê siaⁿ; chhin-chhiūⁿ giang-á á-sī ham-lêng; tâng-lô.
hanlo_comment: phah 金類 ê 聲; 親像 giang-á 抑是 ham鈴; 銅鑼.

comment: kî-lîn chhin-chhiūⁿ pà, ū lâng kóng chi̍t-ki kak, gō͘-ki bé; hô͘-lî.
hanlo_comment: 麒麟 親像 豹, 有 人 講 一支 角, 五支 尾; 狐狸.

comment: koâiⁿ-ê khoán-sit; bāng-ko-liâu; chhiū-nâ lāi ê liâu-á hō͘ jîn-kun hioh.
hanlo_comment: 懸ê 款式; 望高寮; 樹林 內 ê 寮á hō͘ 人君 歇.

comment: kut-chhé ê pīⁿ; chhin-chhiūⁿ hong-thiàⁿ; huih ū to̍k in-ūi kiâⁿ-pháiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 骨髓 ê 病; 親像 風痛; 血 有 毒 因為 行pháiⁿ.

comment: bô thiâm-chēng; kiaⁿ-kiaⁿ, ngia̍uh-ngia̍uh chhoah.
hanlo_comment: 無 恬靜; 驚驚, ngia̍uh-ngia̍uh chhoah.

comment: Kńg-tang séng chi̍t-tiâu khoe ê miâ; Cheng-iông koāiⁿ ê kó͘-tsá miâ.
hanlo_comment: 廣東 省 一條 溪 ê 名; 湞陽 縣 ê 古早 名.

comment: tang-thiⁿ bōe lak-hio̍h ê chhiū-miâ; chí thang tsòe io̍h; chhâ thang tsòe mn̂g.
hanlo_comment: 冬天 bōe 落葉 ê 樹名; 籽 thang 做 藥; 柴 thang 做 門.

comment: chi̍t-hō ê chìⁿ á-sī tóe ê chhiuⁿ-á; tsòe phah-chiáu ê lō͘-ēng.
hanlo_comment: 一號 ê 箭 抑是 短 ê 槍á; 做 phah 鳥 ê 路用.

comment: liâu-tsúi ê chiáu, chhin-chhiūⁿ kau-cheng-chiáu, âng-ho̍h-chiáu.
hanlo_comment: liâu水 ê 鳥, 親像 鵁鶄鳥, 紅鶴鳥.

comment: mn̂g sàm-sàm; khah-siông sī chí chhùi-chhiu.
hanlo_comment: 毛 sàm-sàm; khah常 是 指 嘴鬚.

comment: mn̂g sàm-sàm; khah-siông sī chí chhùi-chhiu.
hanlo_comment: 毛 sàm-sàm; khah常 是 指 嘴鬚.

comment: mn̂g sàm-sàm; khah-siông sī chí chhùi-chhiu.
hanlo_comment: 毛 sàm-sàm; khah常 是 指 嘴鬚.

comment: mn̂g sàm-sàm; khah-siông sī chí chhùi-chhiu.
hanlo_comment: 毛 sàm-sàm; khah常 是 指 嘴鬚.

comment: ēng nn̄g chhiú thoa-khui, saⁿ-phah, piān-lūn, tò͘-kháu, saⁿ-kò, saⁿ-chiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 用 兩 手 拖開, 相phah, 辯論, 鬥口, 相告, 相爭.

comment: ba̍k-chiu bū-bū, chì-bî-sòe; sòng-hiong.
hanlo_comment: 目睭 霧霧, 至微細; sòng-hiòng.

comment: chhit-kōaⁿ ê kun, lêng tiû ê pò͘; siang-têng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 拭汗 ê 巾, 綾 綢 ê 布; 雙層 ê 意思.

comment: kó͘-tsá só͘-tsāi ê miâ, oá tī Soaⁿ-tang séng; Sûi-chiu ê kó͘-tsá miâ.
hanlo_comment: 古早 所在 ê 名, oá tī 山東 省; 隋州 ê 古早 名.

comment: o͘-bīn, chhin-chhiūⁿ Ìn-tō͘ kok ê lâng.
hanlo_comment: 烏面, 親像 印度 國 ê 人.

comment: hiàn chè-sū ê bah, hàng-chéng, gû-chhún; peh-chiūⁿ-koâiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 獻 祭祀 ê 肉, hàng腫, 愚蠢; peh上懸.

comment: pe̍h-chio̍h á-sī po-lê saⁿ kha̍p-tio̍h ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 白石 抑是 玻璃 相 磕tio̍h ê 聲.

comment: kim á-sī ge̍k ê kho͘-á saⁿ tōng-tio̍h ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 金 抑是 玉 ê 箍á 相 撞著 ê 聲.

comment: ke-thiⁿ; ke kóng-oē, ke-oē.
hanlo_comment: 加添; 加 講話, 加話.

comment: kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, kín-kín kiâⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 驚惶, 緊緊 行 ê 款式.

comment: tîⁿ ê soh-á; hiân-á ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 纏 ê 索á; 弦á ê 聲.

comment: ke-thiⁿ, khah-tāng; tāi-seng; bat; beh-thái; soah, siông-siông; Cheng-tsú.
hanlo_comment: 加添, khah重; tāi先; bat; beh-thái; soah, 常常; 曾子.

comment: kî ê tsóng-miâ; kî ê thâu; kî ê hō, bat, piáu-bêng, hun-piat.
hanlo_comment: 旗 ê 總名; 旗 ê 頭; 旗 ê 號, bat, 表明, 分別.

comment: khó͘-khǹg, kàn-chèng ông ê m̄-tio̍h, soah tāi-chì.
hanlo_comment: 苦勸, 諫諍 王 ê m̄-tio̍h, suah tāi-chì.

comment: chìⁿ-pé ê tiong-sim, nî ê thâu-ge̍h, chiū-sī chiaⁿ-ge̍h.
hanlo_comment: 箭把 ê 中心, 年 ê 頭月, 就是 正月.

comment: thiu-hiòng, ho̍k-sāi, kok-ka, kok ê hoat-tō͘, kok-chèng.
hanlo_comment: 抽餉, 服事, 國家, 國 ê 法度, 國政.

comment: tiû-toān ê tsóng-miâ, só͘-tsāi ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 綢緞 ê 總名, 所在 ê 名.

comment: khui keng-chìⁿ, khui-mi̍h lâi khòaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 開 弓箭, 開物 來 看.

comment: iam kang ê bé, siàn-bé.
hanlo_comment: 閹 公 ê 馬, 疝馬.

comment: ba̍k-chiu-jîn, o͘-jîn; khòaⁿ-kìⁿ; m̄-ài-khòaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 目睭仁, 烏仁; 看見; m̄-ài看.

comment: thâng ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ chhân-iⁿ, am-po͘-chê, sih-sut, chhân-iⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 蟲 ê 名, 親像 田嬰, 𧌄蜅蠐, 蟋蟀, 田嬰.

comment: chhang-chhài ê miâ, kú-chhài-hoe; hoe chhiong-sēng.
hanlo_comment: 蔥菜 ê 名, 韭菜花; 花 充盛.

comment: chhe ê khì-kū, tiáⁿ, lâng-sn̂g, gô-chiú-tháng.
hanlo_comment: 炊 ê 器具, 鼎, 籠床, 熬酒桶.

comment: chhiah-sek, ní-chhiah-sek, koh-tsài ní.
hanlo_comment: 赤色, 染 赤色, koh再 染.

comment: ka-kī teh khòaⁿ, sim-koaⁿ teh siūⁿ, sàm-su.
hanlo_comment: 家己 teh 看, 心肝 teh 想, 三思.

comment: oē liâu-tsúi ê chiáu, chhin-chhiūⁿ kau-cheng, á-sī pe̍h-lēng-si.
hanlo_comment: 會 liâu水 ê 鳥, 親像 鵁鶄, 抑是 白鴒鷥.

comment: chi̍t-khoán hî ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 一款 魚 ê 名.

comment: chi̍t-khoán hî ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 一款 魚 ê 名.

comment: tîⁿ ê soh, tîⁿ tsòe-hé, khûn, hiân ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 纏 ê 索, 纏 做伙, 蜷, 絃 ê 聲.

comment: hî ê nâ-á, lia̍h hî ê khì-kū.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 籃á, 掠 魚 ê 器具.

comment: tâng-cheng, sî-cheng, chiū-sī, oē chhut-siaⁿ ê mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 銅鐘, 時鐘, 就是, 會 出聲 ê 物.

comment: hûi ê mi̍h, chhin-chhiūⁿ tsúi-cheng, khàm-cheng, tê-cheng.
hanlo_comment: 磁 ê 物, 親像 水盅, 蓋盅, 茶盅.

comment: cheng-siⁿ, chiū-sī lâng só͘ chhī ê.
hanlo_comment: 精牲, 就是 人 所 飼 ê.

comment: cheng-tio̍h, sī saⁿ-kha̍p-tio̍h ê ì-sù, thâu-khak saⁿ-cheng.
hanlo_comment: 舂tio̍h, 是 相磕tio̍h ê 意思, 頭殼 相舂.

comment: cheng-tio̍h, sī saⁿ-kha̍p-tio̍h ê ì-sù, thâu-khak saⁿ-cheng.
hanlo_comment: 舂tio̍h, 是 相磕tio̍h ê 意思, 頭殼 相舂.

comment: bi̍t-tô-cheng, io̍h ê miâ; iā ū kóng ēng chit jī 僧 jī.
hanlo_comment: 密佗僧, 藥 ê 名; 也 有 講 用 chit字 僧 字.

comment: chéng-tsôe, siu-lí, tsôe-tsáⁿ, chéng-tùn, chhòng-hó, siu-chéng=整 tông ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 整齊, 修理, 齊斬, 整頓, chhòng好, 修整=整 同 意思.

comment: tsúi-khut ê khang, chhim, chheng, chhù-sū, tsúi-chíⁿ, pok-kòa ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 水堀 ê 空, 深, 清, 次序, 水井, 卜卦 ê 名.

comment: lâng ê phê-hu teh chhoah ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 人 ê 皮膚 teh chhoah ê 意思.

comment: ji̍t-thâu chhut tú-hó kàu soaⁿ-téng.
hanlo_comment: 日頭 出 tú好 到 山頂.

comment: hū-jîn-lâng ê lú-tek kap tsa̍p-tsâi; chēng-chēng.
hanlo_comment: 婦人人 ê 女德 kap 十才; 靜靜.

comment: tsúi-khut ê khang, chhim, chheng, chhù-sū, tsúi-chíⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 水窟 ê 空, 深, 清, 次序, 水井.

comment: chéng-tsôe, siu-lí, tsôe-tsôe, chéng-tùn, chhòng-kàu-hó, siu-chéng.
hanlo_comment: 整齊, 修理, 齊齊, 整頓, chhòng到好, 修整.

comment: khiā-tsāi bōe tín-tāng, bô iô-tsoah ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: khiā在 bōe 振動, 無 搖泏 ê 款式.

comment: hé-chéng, chiū-sī khí-hé ê hé-bú.
hanlo_comment: 火種, 就是 起火 ê 火母.

comment: hàm-chéng, kha chéng-chéng; ni-chéng, chéng-ni.
hanlo_comment: hàm腫, 腳 腫腫; 奶腫, 腫奶.

comment: chéng-chí, chhek-chéng, iā-chéng, tsa̍p-chéng-kiáⁿ, che̍h-chéng, chéng-lūi.
hanlo_comment: 種子, 粟種, 掖種, 雜種kiáⁿ, 絕種, 種類.

comment: pō͘-chéng thian-bu̍t, chiū-sī lām-sám khai-hùi.
hanlo_comment: 暴殄 天物, 就是 濫糝 開費.

comment: tsǹg, tsân, chha̍k, chek-thiok, khioh-oá, hêng-la̍t; lòe-mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 鑽, 剸, 鑿, 積蓄, 拾oá, 衡力; 鑢物.

comment: chèng-thâu, pīⁿ-chèng, phòa-pīⁿ, chèng-thâu tîm-tāng.
hanlo_comment: 症頭, 病症, 破病, 症頭 沉重.

comment: ēng sêng-si̍t kā lâng kóng. pîn-kù, kan-chèng, chèng-kìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 用 誠實 kā 人 講. 憑據, 干證, 證見.

comment: chek-pī sī-tōa, chiū-sī kàn-chèng; kóng-oē ū pîn-kù.
hanlo_comment: 責備 序大, 就是 諫諍; 講話 有 憑據.

comment: khui-mi̍h lâi khòaⁿ; khui keng-chìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 開物 來 看; 開 弓箭.

comment: ka-kī teh khòaⁿ, sim-koaⁿ teh siūⁿ, sàm-su.
hanlo_comment: 家己 teh 看, 心肝 teh 想, 三思.

comment: tsó͘-chí lâng ê m̄-tio̍h, saⁿ-chiⁿ, sio-kò.
hanlo_comment: 阻止 人 ê m̄-tio̍h, 相爭, 相告.

comment: khi-chhiâ, kan-siâ ê tùi-hoán, sì-chiàⁿ, kong-gī, chiàⁿ-sī.
hanlo_comment: 欹斜, 奸邪 ê 對反, 四正, 公義, 正是.

comment: thiàⁿ ê ì-sù, chiáng-koán, tsù-ì, koaⁿ-hâm, chèng-sū.
hanlo_comment: 疼 ê 意思, 掌管, 注意, 官銜, 政事.

comment: chèng-lâng, chèng hāng-mi̍h; chèng-sîn, kong-chèng-lō͘.
hanlo_comment: 眾人, 眾 項物; 眾神, 公眾路.

comment: ka-chèng, chháu-chèng, tsang-chèng, koaⁿ-chèng; lóng sio̍k jio̍k-á ê lūi.
hanlo_comment: 茭薦, 草薦, 棕薦, 菅薦; lóng 屬 褥á ê 類.

comment: chèng-tsoh, tsai-chèng, chèng be̍h-tāu; chèng-tsu.
hanlo_comment: 種作, 栽種, 種 麥豆; 種珠.

comment: hō͘-soah, hō͘-chîⁿ, hó-thiⁿ, thiⁿ-chîⁿ, kng-kng.
hanlo_comment: 雨soah, 雨晴, 好天, 天晴, 光光.

comment: sim-lāi ê chì-khì, tāi-chì, chhit-chêng, un-chêng, sū-chêng.
hanlo_comment: 心內 ê 志氣, tāi-chì, 七情, 恩情, 事情.

comment: chhù-sū, têng-tha̍h, kiā-á-tsàn; tsân, chi̍t-tsàn chi̍t-tsàn.
hanlo_comment: 次序, 重疊, 崎á層; 層, 一層 一層.

comment: chi̍t-tsàn chi̍t-tsàn ê soaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 一層 一層 ê 山.

comment: ngó͘-gú-jiân koah-tio̍h ê siong-hûn.
hanlo_comment: 偶遇然 割tio̍h ê 傷痕.

comment: hō͘-soah, hō͘-chîⁿ, hó-thiⁿ, kng-kng; kap 晴 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 雨soah, 雨晴, 好天, 光光; kap 晴 相像.

comment: beh-thái, tāi-seng, siông-siông, bat, hoán-tńg, soah, ke-thiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: beh-thái, tāi先, 常常, bat, 反轉, soah, 加添.

comment: chêng-āu, bīn-chêng, tsá-chêng, chêng-ji̍t, chìn-chêng, chêng-bīn, chêng-lâng-kiáⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 前後, 面前, 早前, 前日, 進前, 前面, 前人kiáⁿ.

comment: bô tín-tāng, bô kiáu-jiáu, tiāⁿ-tio̍h; chheng-khì, soah an-ún.
hanlo_comment: 無 振動, 無 攪擾, 定tio̍h; 清氣, soah 安穩.

comment: chhòng-kàu chheng-khì; iù-iù, kè-bô͘; hô-sūn, an-ún, pêng-tiāⁿ.
hanlo_comment: chhòng到 清氣; 幼幼, 計謀; 和順, 安穩, 平定.

comment: sóe chheng-khì; kôaⁿ-léng, chheng-khì, tsúi-miâ, chēng, chēng-chēng.
hanlo_comment: 洗 清氣; 寒冷, 清氣, 水名, 靜, 靜靜.

comment: sóe-chēng, chēng-si̍t, chēng-hiuⁿ; chheng-khì-siùⁿ, bô-lâ-sâm.
hanlo_comment: 洗淨, 淨實, 淨香; 清氣相, 無lâ-sâm.

comment: tsng-thāⁿ, ūi-bīn, súi, iù-ùi, tiàu-lâi, an-chēng.
hanlo_comment: 裝艷, 畫面, 媠, 幼蔚, 召來, 安靜.

comment: ēng-mi̍h sio-sàng,ke-thiⁿ, siúⁿ-sù; hōng-lâng, khò-hōng.
hanlo_comment: 用物 相送, 加添, 賞賜; 俸人, 犒俸.

comment: khui thô͘-hām, tōe-hām, hām-khiⁿ; khiⁿ ê kau.
hanlo_comment: 開 土陷, 地陷, 陷坑; 坑 ê 溝.

comment: chiū-sī tōe ê khang, lap-o ê só͘-tsāi.
hanlo_comment: 就是 地 ê 孔, 蹋窩 ê 所在.

comment: chiām-sî thêng; khiā-tsāi, tiām-tiām.
hanlo_comment: 暫時 停; khiā在, 恬恬.

comment: hian-khui tē-tô͘ á-sī chhat-á, hō͘-lâng thang khòaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 掀開 地圖 抑是 擦á, hō͘人 thang 看.

comment: siū lâng sàng ê lé-mi̍h; sòa-chiap ka-sán.
hanlo_comment: 受 人 送 ê 禮物; 續接 家產.

comment: lō͘-ni̍h kan-khó͘ teh kiâⁿ, bōe oē kàu-ūi; kha tak-tio̍h; kiâⁿ-lō͘ kēng-tio̍h lâng.
hanlo_comment: 路裡 艱苦 teh 行, bōe 會 到位; 腳 觸tio̍h; 行路 脛tio̍h 人.

comment: hū-jîn-lâng cheng-chiat khiam-pi ê khoán, sán-sòe, oa̍h-tāng, ióng-tsòng.
hanlo_comment: 婦人人 貞節 謙卑 ê 款, 瘦細, 活動, 勇壯.

comment: tiû-toān ê tsóng-miâ; só͘-tsāi-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 綢緞 ê 總名; 所在名.

comment: chhe-mi̍h é khì-kū, tiáⁿ, lâng-sn̂g, gô-chiú-tháng.
hanlo_comment: 炊物 ê 器具, 鼎, 籠床, 熬酒桶.

comment: ba̍k-chiù-jîn, O͘-jîn, m̄-ài-khòaⁿ, khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 目睭仁, 烏仁, m̄-ài看, 看見.

comment: chēng-tsúi, chēng-tāng, chiū-sī tsng-tsòe khah-tāng lâi bōe lâng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 增水, 增重, 就是 裝做 khah重 來 賣 人 ê 意思.

comment: chhut-khì, piàn-oāⁿ, kui-khì, khì-kàu; i, in, hit, chit-ê, hit-ê.
hanlo_comment: 出去, 變換, 規氣, 去到; 伊, in, hit, chit-ê, hit-ê.

comment: hó-chháu ê miâ, hoe-chháu, hó-tiāu-thâu; io̍h-miâ, pian-chi.
hanlo_comment: 好草 ê 名, 花草, 好 兆頭; 藥名, pian梔.

comment: chhiú at tek, chhiū-kun ê khoán-sit, chhiū-ki hun-chhe; hû-chhî.
hanlo_comment: 手 at 竹, 樹根 ê 款式, 樹枝 分叉; 扶持.

comment: chhiū-oāiⁿ khui-chhe, chhiū-tsat, ké-chí-miâ, chhiū-ki, ki-kut.
hanlo_comment: 樹椏 開叉, 樹節, 果子名, 樹枝, 枝骨.

comment: seng-khu ê pah-thé, seng-khu ê sù-chi, chiū-sī kha-chhiú.
hanlo_comment: 身軀 ê 百體, 身軀 ê 四肢, 就是 腳手.

comment: iû-kut tēng, iû-lâ, jūn-te̍k, kng-ku̍t, âng-sek, ian-chi.
hanlo_comment: 油骨 碇, 油垃, 潤澤, 光滑, 紅色, 胭脂.

comment: iúⁿ-mi̍h ê au-á, oē tóe-tit sì-chin, chiú-pân ū sui, chiú-tsóaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 舀物 ê 甌á, 會 貯得 四升, 酒瓶 有 繐, 酒盞.

comment: iúⁿ-mi̍h ê au-á, oē tóe-tit sì-chin, chiú-pân ū sui, chiú-tsóaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 舀物 ê 甌á, 會 貯得 四升, 酒瓶 有 荽, 酒盞.

comment: chhó-bo̍k ê miâ, oē ní-tit n̂g-sek; n̂g-kiⁿ, pian-chi; chi-tsú.
hanlo_comment: 草木 ê 名, 會 染得 黃色; 黃梔, pian梔; 梔子.

comment: niû tn̂g-tóe ê khì-kū; hó tiāu-thâu ê chiáu, chhiⁿ-chhiūⁿ kheh-chiáu.
hanlo_comment: 量 長短 ê 器具; 好 兆頭 ê 鳥, 親像 客鳥.

comment: koat-toàn bêng-pe̍k ê ì-sù; iā-sī chí bô iàu-kín ê sū.
hanlo_comment: 決斷 明白 ê 意思; 也是 指 無 要緊 ê 事.

comment: chio̍h-pâi kha ê chio̍h, hit tè chio̍h ê sún-khang, thìⁿ-koâiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 石牌 腳 ê 石, hit 塊 石 ê 榫空, 撐懸.

comment: keng-tsoh, lê-hn̂g ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 耕作, 犁園 ê 意思.

comment: tsōe-tsōe ê ì-sù, Hok-kiàn séng lâng siông teh ēng ê.
hanlo_comment: 濟濟 ê 意思, 福建 省 人 常 teh 用 ê.

comment: khin-khin ê mn̂g; iù-iù ê mô͘-jiông.
hanlo_comment: 輕輕 ê 毛; 幼幼 ê 毛絨.

comment: ngó͘-kok teh-beh siong-se̍k; ēng ng pò͘ tī chhân-ni̍h.
hanlo_comment: 五穀 teh-beh 相熟; 用 秧 播 tī 田裡.

comment: seng-khu ê pah-thé, sì-chi, kha-chhiú; khah kán-séng ê, kap 肢 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 身軀 ê 百體, 四肢, 腳手; khah 簡省 ê, kap 肢 相像.

comment: thiāu-kha ê tún, tsá ēng chhâ ê, taⁿ ēng chio̍h ê; thiāu-kha ê tōe-ki.
hanlo_comment: 柱腳 ê 礅, 早 用 柴 ê, 今 用 石 ê; 柱腳 ê 地基.

comment: hok-khì, kèng-khiân, tú-hó, to̍k-to̍k, kan-ta.
hanlo_comment: 福氣, 敬虔, tú好, 獨獨, 干單.

comment: chéng, in-ūi cheng-tio̍h, á-sī phah-siong.
hanlo_comment: 腫, 因為 舂tio̍h, 抑是 phah 傷.

comment: kha-chhiú ê phê kāu-kāu; ba̍k-kut ê lia̍p-á; kiat-lan.
hanlo_comment: 腳手 ê 皮 厚厚; 目骨 ê 粒á; 結繭.

comment: seng-chi-sán, chiū-sī io̍h ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 生肌散, 就是 藥 ê 名.

comment: chi-bai, chiū-sī hū-jîn-lâng ê im-bu̍t.
hanlo_comment: 芝屄, 就是 婦人人 ê 陰物.

comment: hó ê bī-sò͘; hông-tè ê bēng-lēng, ì-sù, chí-ì, chì-khì, sèng-chí.
hanlo_comment: 好 ê 味素; 皇帝 ê 命令, 意思, 旨意, 志氣, 聖旨.

comment: chhì-phè, chhì-á-tsâng chhin-chhiūⁿ kiat-á, siong-hāi; io̍h-miâ, chí-khak.
hanlo_comment: 刺phè, 刺á欉 親像 桔á, 傷害; 藥名, 枳殼.

comment: chháu-á miâ, ū tiⁿ-khó͘ ê bī, io̍h-miâ, chí, pe̍h-chí.
hanlo_comment: 草á 名, 有 甜苦 ê 味, 藥名, 芷, 白芷.

comment: jī-bē ê jī, kóng ka-kī; chit-ê; nā àn-ni, tsóa ê sò͘-bo̍k; to̍k-to̍k, chí-ū.
hanlo_comment: 字謎 ê 字, 講 家己; chit-ê; 若 按呢, 紙 ê 數目; 獨獨, 只有.

comment: kau-kài, kài-hān, tōe-kài; tōe-ki, ki-tóe, tsō-chí.
hanlo_comment: 交界, 界限, 地界; 地基, 基底, 造址.

comment: tsńg-thâu-á, tiám-chhut, kà-sī, mē, kí-mi̍h, kí-tsáiⁿ; chí-tiám.
hanlo_comment: 指頭á, 點出, 教示, 罵, 指物, 指指; 指點.

comment: hioh-khùn; kàu-gia̍h; tiàm-teh; soah ê ì-sù; kài-chí, kìm-chí.
hanlo_comment: 歇睏; 夠額; 踮teh; soah ê 意思; 界址, 禁止.

comment: ēng chiam chhiah-siù, chhiah-hoe, siù-chiam; pó͘-thīⁿ, chiam-chí.
hanlo_comment: 用 針 刺繡, 刺花, 繡針; 補綻, 針黹.

comment: kha ê tsńg-thâu-á, kha-tôe; thêng-soah; oê-tóe, tōe-ki, siⁿ tàng-chí.

comment: chiū-sī tsáu ê ì-sù.

comment: mi̍h bōe-bōe-tit, bōe-bōe-tit ê ì-sù.

comment: chiū-sī kôaⁿ-léng ê ì-sù.

comment: chhiⁿ-o͘-sek; thian-chhiⁿ-sek.

comment: chhèng-éng, chiū-sī lâng hián-chhut hoaⁿ-hí ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: chhèng湧, 就是 人 顯出 歡喜 ê 意思.

comment: ka-kī khiā-khí ê khoán-sit; bōe kì-tit lō͘ ê ì-sù.

comment: mn̂g siang-pêng ê thiāu; koáiⁿ-á; pn̄g-la̍t, hoat-tō͘, saⁿ-sûi.

comment: kiâⁿ ê khoán-sit; tiô-thiàu ê khoán-sit.

comment: chhêng-peh, chhêng-peh lūi; chhêng-hô͘, chhêng-lin.

comment: chia̍h-kim-chhêng, chiū-sī sio̍k siâ-su̍t hāi-lâng ê io̍h; soa-chhêng, chiū-sī hái-soa ê thâng-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 食金蠶, 就是 屬 邪術 害人 ê 藥; 沙蠶, 就是 海沙 ê 蟲名.

comment: chia̍h-kim-chhêng, chiū-sī sio̍k siâ-su̍t hāi-lâng ê io̍h; soa-chhêng, chiū-sī hái-soa ê thâng-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 食金蠶, 就是 屬 邪術 害人 ê 藥; 沙蠶, 就是 海沙 ê 蟲名.

comment: khu̍t-chhêng, chiū-sī m̄-hó-khòaⁿ, á-sī pháiⁿ sèng-tē ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 滑松, 就是 m̄好看, 抑是 pháiⁿ 性地 ê 意思.

comment: pūn-chhêng, chiū-sī chho͘-sio̍k, chhún-pūn, pháiⁿ-khòaⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 笨戕, 就是 粗俗, 蠢笨, pháiⁿ看 ê 意思.

comment: chiúⁿ-chhêng, chiū-sī thûn-chiúⁿ téng-ke̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 槳戕, 就是 船槳 頂逆 ê 意思.

comment: thô͘-chhêng, thih-chhêng, ô-chhêng, chiū-sī ó͘-thô͘, kap chhêng-ô ê ke-si.
hanlo_comment: 土戕, 鐵戕, 蠔戕, 就是 挖土, kap 戕蠔 ê 家私.

hanlo_comment: 濟濟 物 貯 tī 器具; 貯, 也 kap chit字 盛 相像.

comment: chhēng-saⁿ, chhēng-oê; chhēng-be̍h, chhēng-chhah.

comment: chiū-sī lâng teh chhiò ê ì-sù.

comment: tn̂g-tóe bô chê; chham-chhi.

comment: bô tì-sek, gōng; sim-sîn phòa-pīⁿ; chhi, chhi-tsoat, chhi-gâi.

comment: bô tì-sek, gōng; sim-sîn phòa-pīⁿ; chhi, chhi-tsoat, chhi-gâi.
hanlo_comment: 無 知識, 戇; 心神 破病; 癡, 癡拙, 癡gâi.

comment: bô tì-sek, gōng; sim-sîn phòa-pīⁿ; chhi, chhi-tsoat, chhi-gâi.

comment: chi̍t-hō ok-chiáu ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ ko͘-n̂g, hó͘-kū.

comment: khiap-sì, îm-loān; chhi-gâi, gōng.

comment: hî ê miâ; thô͘-thoh.

comment: phah-la̍h; tn̂g-mn̂g ê káu.

comment: chia̍h-liáu thò͘-chhut koh-tsāi pō͘, hoan-chháu.

comment: soaⁿ-bīn ū chio̍h, koâiⁿ-tōa; soaⁿ-kiā, khâm-khia̍t.
hanlo_comment: 山面 有 石, 懸大; 山崎, 磡硈.

comment: ku̍t-tó, kiâⁿ ku̍t ê lō͘; sit-sî, hoān-tio̍h, kè-khì.

comment: gê-tsô-chhi, chiū-sī thun-mi̍h ê só͘-tsāi; bî-chhi.

comment: gê-tsô-chhi, chiū-sī thun-mi̍h ê só͘-tsāi; bî-chhi.
hanlo_comment: 牙槽腮, 就是 吞物 ê 所在; 微腮.

comment: î-chhî, i-nāi; oá-khò ê ì-sù.

comment: sió-khóa; ka-la̍uh, pang-lo̍h-lâi.

comment: súi ê tsa-bó͘ gín-á; khin-po̍h ê khoán-sit; chhiong-ki.

comment: hian-khui; khoa-kháu ê oē; tōa pò-iông.

comment: khui-chhùi, tōa ê khoán; hî-chhùi khui ê khoán-sit; hah-hì.

comment: hé teh to̍h, hé-iām, ōng-ōng, kng-bêng, chhiong-sēng, tsōe-tsōe.

comment: to̍k-to̍k, chí-ū, soah; nā-ū; ū-chhun, kè-thâu, tsōe-tsōe.
hanlo_comment: 獨獨, 只有, soah; 若有; 有chhun, 過頭, 濟濟.

comment: chiáu kian-kò͘ ê si̍t; chiáu ê si̍t-kó͘; ióng-béng.

comment: chiáu kian-kò͘ ê si̍t; chiáu ê si̍t-kó͘; ióng-béng.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 堅固 ê 翼; 鳥 ê 翼股; 勇猛.

comment: lâng ê miâ; pan-mâu.

comment: chi̍t-khoán hî ê miâ, chhì-hî, chhì-liu.

comment: kàn-chèng, ta̍uh-ta̍uh, ēng i ê kè-sit lâi kàn-chèng.

comment: chi̍t-khoán ê chhì-mn̂g-thâng, oē tèng lâng.

comment: chhòng pò͘-phit ê tsóng-miâ; tsòe-tiû, tsòe-pò͘, chit-pò͘.

comment: chia̍h-chiú, chhoe-se̍k lâi chia̍h; lāu-jia̍t ê tǹg.

comment: chhe gō͘-kak, lim-chhia̍h ê mi̍h; hì-tsoān, lāu-jia̍t ê tǹg.
hanlo_comment: 炊 五穀, lim食 ê 物; 戲饌, 鬧熱 ê 頓.

comment: n̂g oe̍h ê kî, chhiah-kî; ēng kî piáu-hō, kì-tsài, pa̍k, kî-chhì.
hanlo_comment: 黃 狹 ê 旗, 刺旗; 用 旗 裱號, 記載, 縛, 旗幟.

comment: n̂g oe̍h ê kî, chhiah-kî; ēng kî piáu-hō, kì-tsài, pa̍k, kî-chhì.
hanlo_comment: 黃 狹 ê 旗, 刺旗; 用 旗 裱號, 記載, 縛, 旗幟.

comment: chhâ ê chiam-chhiuⁿ, siong-hāi, thâi, ui-khang, chhiah, chhiah-jī.

comment: chhì-chha̍k, chhì-á, chháu-á-chhì.
hanlo_comment: 刺鑿, 刺á, 草á莿.

comment: oàn-hūn, áu-bân, hiong-ok, siong-hāi, tham-sim.

comment: chhiō-chhì, chiū-sī tiám-hé tī sin-si piⁿ; boah chhì-iû; kìⁿ-chhì.

comment: chhì-khòaⁿ, chhì-chia̍h, chhì-siūⁿ; chhì-ēng, chhì-giām.
hanlo_comment: 試看, 試食, 試想; 試用, 試驗.

comment: chhì-chhè-háu, chiū-sī hō͘ ti̍t-lo̍h ê siaⁿ.

comment: khan-siú, chhiú the̍h bô pàng, hû, tháⁿ, khan; hû-chhî, î-chhî.
hanlo_comment: 牽手, 手 the̍h 無 放, 扶, tháⁿ, 牽; 扶持, 維持.

comment: lâng ê jī-sìⁿ.

comment: chhiūⁿ-chhî, chhî-kauh-kauh, lâu-kōaⁿ chhiūⁿ-chhî.

comment: bóe-bōe ê só͘-tsāi, lāu-jia̍t; bián-lē; koe-chhī, chhī-tiûⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 買賣 ê 所在, 鬧熱; 勉勵; 街市, 市場.

comment: phû soa-lun-á tī khoe ê tiong-ng; tsúi im kàu koâiⁿ chiah thêng.

comment: iúⁿ-chhī, hó-chhī, pháiⁿ io-chhī; chhī gín-á; chhī cheng-siⁿ, chhī-gû.

comment: loān-chhī-chhā, chhī-chhī-kún, chhī-bú chhī-chhā.

comment: khùn-chhī-chhī, chiū-sī tāng-bîn teh khùn.

comment: chhiò-chhī, chiū-sī hoaⁿ-hí hó bīn-sek.

comment: chhiⁿ-chho͘, chhiⁿ-kông, chhiⁿ-kiaⁿ, chhiⁿ-hoan; chhiⁿ-bīn.

comment: chhiⁿ-sîn, chhit-chhiⁿ, khé-bêng-chhiⁿ, tn̂g-bé-chhiⁿ; pháiⁿ-chhiⁿ.

comment: chhàu-chhiⁿ, hî-chhiⁿ, chhiⁿ-chho.
hanlo_comment: 臭腥, 魚腥, 腥臊.

comment: pàng-lēng, iân-chhiân, bān-bān; tîⁿ-tiâu.

comment: gâu-kóng-oē, ngó͘-ge̍k; kî-khá ê oē, gâu, phô͘-tháⁿ, thiám-bī ê oē.

hanlo_comment: 一吊錢, 就是 一貫錢 ê 意思.

hanlo_comment: 拾棧, 加nn̂g棧, 就是 7 月 普度 排餅 ê 意思.

comment: hoe ê miâ; tsòe ní-sek, kap io̍h ê lō͘-ēng.

comment: tsài koaⁿ-chhâ ê chhia-kòa; sī tsòe chhut-tsòng ê tsng-thāⁿ.

comment: chhiⁿ-chhìn, kóaⁿ-kín ê khoán-sit.

comment: chhiⁿ-chhùi hó ê gō͘-kak; chhiū-ba̍k bō͘-sēng, chhiū-miâ.

comment: hó chhiò-iông, súi, hó-khòaⁿ.

comment: chhiong-sēng, siù-bō͘, chhíⁿ-sek ê khoán, chháu-miâ, tē-miâ.

comment: chhiân-kap-á, chiū-sī kap chhân-kap-á sio-siāng.

comment: iân-chhiân, ke iân-chhiân, chhiân i ê kang, chhiân-ūi.

comment: niáu-chhiang, chiū-sī chiáu-chhèng; thai-chhiang, tōa-ki-chhèng.
hanlo_comment: 鳥槍, 就是 鳥銃; 笞槍, 大枝銃.

comment: [jî|=jû] chhiáng-chhiáng, chiū-sī bô-chê ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: jî chhiáng-chhiáng, 就是 無齊 ê 意思.

comment: [jî|=jû] chhiáng-chhiáng, chiū-sī bô-chê ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: jî chhiáng-chhiáng, 就是 無齊 ê 意思.

comment: ûn-á-chhiáng, chhiáng-kha, sī bān-kiâⁿ ná pái-kha; á-sī gín-á thiàu.
hanlo_comment: 勻á蹌, 蹌腳, 是 慢行 若 跛腳; 抑是 gín-á 跳.

comment: chhiàng-miâ, chhiàng khí-thâu; chhiàng lí-le̍k, chhiàng hun-siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 唱名, 唱 起頭; 唱 履歷, 唱 分聲.

comment: chhiàng-chhiàng-tsáu, chiū-sī kín-kín tsáu ê ì-sù.

comment: chhiâng=chhiûⁿ; chiū-sī chhiûⁿ-chhek ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 颺=chhiûⁿ; 就是 颺粟 ê 意思.

comment: iân-chhiâng, chiū-sī ēng bah kap iân lâi tsòe ê mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: iân腸, 就是 用 肉 kap iân 來 做 ê 物.

comment: chhiâng-tsāi, chiū-sī kap put-sî siāng ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 常在, 就是 kap 不時 像 意思.

comment: pâi-chhiâng, kóng-oē ài pâi-chhiâng; chiū-sī tng lâng ê bīn-chêng kóng-oē.
hanlo_comment: 排場, 講話 愛 排場; 就是 當 人 ê 面前 講話.

comment: chhiâng-chhiâm, ké-chí ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ kiat-á ê kam.
hanlo_comment: 橙chhiâm, 果子 ê 名, 親像 桔á ê 柑.

comment: pūn-chhiâng, chiū-sī chho͘-sio̍k, chhún-pūn pháiⁿ-kiâⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 笨戕, 就是 粗俗, 蠢笨 pháiⁿ行 ê 意思.

comment: kún-chhiâng-chhiâng, chiū-sī tsúi tōa-kún ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 滾沖沖, 就是 水 大滾 ê 意思.

comment: chhiāng-chhiāng-kún, chiū-sī kún-kún-kún ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: chhiāng-chhiāng滾, 就是 滾滾滾 ê 意思.

comment: hū-jîn-lâng tsū-khiam ê oē, sòe-î.
hanlo_comment: 婦人人 自謙 ê 話, 細姨.

comment: kiâⁿ, kiâⁿ ê khoán-sit.

comment: ba̍k-chiu tín-tāng, ba̍k tńg-lûn; ba̍k-bâi.

comment: gô kap ah teh chia̍h ê siaⁿ; tsúi-chiáu thun-hî ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 鵝 kap 鴨 teh 食 ê 聲; 水鳥 吞魚 ê 聲.

comment: tsòe-chha̍t, thau-the̍h, su-khia, àm-chīⁿ, ka-kī siūⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 做賊, 偷the̍h, 私khia, 暗靜, 家己 想.

comment: tsū-tsoan, lām-sám tsòe; tsū-khiam ê oē, tsū-chhiap.
hanlo_comment: 自專, 濫糝 做; 自謙 ê 話, 自竊.

comment: gô kap ah teh chia̍h ê siaⁿ, tsúi-chiáu thun-hî ê siaⁿ; siat-to̍k.
hanlo_comment: 鵝 kap 鴨 teh 食 ê 聲, 水鳥 吞魚 ê 聲; 褻瀆.

hanlo_comment: 裝飾 棺柴 ê 鳥毛, 鳥毛扇.

comment: chiū-sī tsúi ê siaⁿ, tsúi kín-lâu ê khoán-sit; bôa ê ì-sù.

comment: pek-chhiat, khek, iàu-kín, sêng-si̍t, koah, siah, chhiat-ì.

comment: chiū-sī ēng chhiú bôa ê ì-sù.

comment: chhia̍t-chhia̍t-háu, chiū-sī chhēng-oê ê siaⁿ.

comment: pi-ai, hoân-ló; iu-būn; chhia-chhí.

comment: bô tsng-tsòe ê o͘-kun; tsá tsòe tòa-hà ê lō͘-ēng, thīⁿ-saⁿ.

comment: chiam-á, thâu-chhah; chhah-tiâu, chhah-lo̍h; chhiah-thô͘ ê ke-si.

comment: chiam-á, thâu-chhah; chhah-tiâu, chhah-lo̍h; chhiah-thô͘ ê ke-si.
hanlo_comment: 簪á, 頭插; 插牢, 插落; 鍘土 ê 家私.

comment: chhiau-chhē, chhiau-khòaⁿ, chhiau-ū, chhiau-bô, chhiau-mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 搜chhē, 搜看, 搜有, 搜無, 搜物.

comment: chhiau-thô͘, chhiau-kàⁿ, chhiau mī-hún, chhiau-tsúi.

comment: chhiau-sim peh-pak, chiū-sī chīn hoân-ló ê ì-sù.

comment: nih-ba̍k tsòe àm-hō ê ì-sù.

comment: hoân-ló; tio̍h-bôa; iu-būn; kóaⁿ-kín; pek-chhiat; chēng-chēng.
hanlo_comment: 煩惱; tio̍h磨; 憂悶; 趕緊; 迫切; 靜靜.

comment: hoaⁿ-hí, hó-chhiò, chhiò-iông, thí-chhiò, iā kap 咲 sio-siāng.

comment: hoaⁿ-hí, hó-chhiò, chhiò-iông, thí-chhiò.
hanlo_comment: 歡喜, 好笑, 笑容, 恥笑.

comment: hoaⁿ-hí, bú-bān, chhiò, hó-chhiò, chhiò-iông, ba-bún-chhiò, thí-chhiò.

comment: phòa-pīⁿ bô khùi-la̍t ê ì-sù.

comment: iù-iù; sòe-sòe; nńg-nńg; kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 幼幼; 細細; 軟軟; 驚惶.

comment: thô͘-chhiâng, chiū-sī chhiah thô͘ ê ke-si, chhiah-thô͘, chian-sî.
hanlo_comment: 土戕, 就是 鍘 土 ê 家私, 鍘土, 煎匙.

comment: thô͘-chhiâng, chiū-sī chhiah thô͘ ê ke-si, chhiah-thô͘, chian-sî.
hanlo_comment: 土戕, 就是 鍘 土 ê 家私, 鍘土, 煎匙.

comment: chhui-chhiâu, bōe chhiâu-tit, chhui-chhiâu tām-po̍h, chhiâu kè-chîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 推chhiâu, bōe chhiâu得, 推chhiâu 淡薄, chhiâu 價錢.

comment: chhih-chhiauh, chiū-sī lâng pháiⁿ-khoán ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 嗤悄, 就是 人 pháiⁿ款 ê 意思.

comment: phah-chhiauh, chiū-sī phah tek-kóng chhiùⁿ-koa ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: phah 悄, 就是 phah 竹管 唱歌 ê 意思.

comment: chhiauh-chhiauh tiô, chiū-sī tiô-thiàu bô-soah.
hanlo_comment: chhiauh-chhiauh 跳, 就是 趒跳 無soah.

comment: chhia̍uh=chia̍uh, chhia̍uh-chhia̍uh-háu, chhia̍uh-chhia̍uh-liām, chhia̍uh-chhia̍uh-nih.
hanlo_comment: chhia̍uh= chia̍uh, chhia̍uh-chhia̍uh吼, chhia̍uh-chhia̍uh唸, chhia̍uh-chhia̍uh𥍉.

comment: chhih-chhoah; chiū-sī tsòe-sū kín-kín, tsóng-sī m̄-hó.
hanlo_comment: chhih-chhoah;; 就是 做事 緊緊, 總是 m̄好.

comment: chhih=chhihⁿ, chhih-chhih thî, chhih-chhih-háu.
hanlo_comment: chhih=chhihⁿ, chhih-chhih 啼, chhih-chhih 吼.

comment: bih-chhih, hé kia̍h khah-chhih, sì-kòe-chhih, thâu-khak chhih-chhih.
hanlo_comment: bih-chhih, 火 攑 khah-chhih, 四界chhih, 頭殼 chhih-chhih.

comment: lāu-jia̍t chhih-chhih, bô êng chhih-chhih, chi̍t-ji̍t bô êng chhih-chhih.
hanlo_comment: 鬧熱 chhih-chhih, 無 閒 chhih-chhih, 一日 無 閒 chhih-chhih.

comment: ok chhih-chhih, chiū-sī kiông-pō ap-lâng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 惡 chhih-chhih, 就是 強暴 壓人 ê 意思.

comment: chhih-chhiauh, chhih-chhih kún; chiū-sī pháiⁿ-khoán ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: chhih-chhiauh, chhih-chhih 滾; 就是 pháiⁿ款 ê 意思.

comment: chhih-chhn̍gh-háu, chhih-chhn̍gh kiò, chiū-sī háu ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 嗤chhn̍gh哮, 嗤chhn̍gh 叫, 就是 哮 ê 聲.

comment: chhi̍h-jîn, chhi̍h-ko, chhi̍h-hoe, hoe-kha-chhi̍h, bú-chhi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 蠽仁, 蠽膏, 蠽花, 花腳蠽, 母蠽.

comment: chhi̍h-jîn, chhi̍h-ko, chhi̍h-hoe, hoe-kha-chhi̍h, bú-chhi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 蠽仁, 蠽膏, 蠽花, 花腳蠽, 母蠽.

comment: kiông-kiông chhi̍h, at-chhi̍h; chhi̍h-lo̍h, chhi̍h-tiâu.
hanlo_comment: 強強 chhi̍h, at-chhi̍h; chhi̍h落, chhi̍h-tiâu.

comment: chhi̍h-chhi̍h háu, chhi̍h-chhi̍h kiò, chiū-sī háu ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: chhi̍h-chhi̍h 哮, chhi̍h-chhi̍h 叫, 就是 哮 ê 聲.

comment: lok chhi̍h-chhi̍h, tâm-chhi̍h-chhi̍h, chiū-sī tâm ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 漉 chhi̍h-chhi̍h, 澹chhi̍h-chhi̍h, 就是 澹 ê 意思.

comment: chhihⁿ-chhihⁿ-thî; chhihⁿ=chhih; chhihⁿ-chhihⁿ-kiò.
hanlo_comment: chhiⁿ-chhiⁿ 啼; chhiⁿ=chhih; chhiⁿ-chhiⁿ叫.

comment: bî-biāu, khǹg-teh; chhián ê tùi-hoán, chhim-tîm.
hanlo_comment: 微妙, khǹg-teh; 淺 ê 對反, 深沉.

comment: ji̍t pìⁿ o͘-chhiah khì ê tiāu-thâu, hó-pháiⁿ ê bī chiām-chhut, chhiong-sēng.
hanlo_comment: 日 變 烏赤 去 ê 兆頭, 好pháiⁿ ê 味 漸出, 充盛.

comment: bé kiâⁿ-kín; kóaⁿ-kín chhiⁿ-kông ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 馬 行緊; 趕緊 生狂 ê 款式.

comment: bé kiâⁿ-kín; kóaⁿ-kín chhiⁿ-kông ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 馬 行緊; 趕緊 生狂 ê 款式.

comment: chim-chhùi, chim chhùi-tûn; chim chi̍t-tiám-á.
hanlo_comment: 唚嘴, 唚 嘴唇; 唚 一點á.

comment: âng-si ê chhiu pa̍k tī thâu-khoe, sī tsòe-koaⁿ lâng teh ēng ê.
hanlo_comment: 紅絲 ê 鬚 縛 tī 頭盔, 是 做官 人 teh 用 ê.

comment: pháiⁿ-nî-tang; pà-chiàm; ûn-ûn-á ji̍p; chhim-chiàm, chhim-chhut.
hanlo_comment: pháiⁿ年冬; 霸佔; 勻勻á 入; 侵占, 侵出.

comment: chhim-hoān tio̍h, chhim-ēng, chhim-khiàm.
hanlo_comment: 侵犯 tio̍h, 侵用, 侵欠.

comment: chhim-i hok-kun, chiū-sī saⁿ, kap thâu-kun tsòe sí-lâng ê lō͘-ēng.
hanlo_comment: 寢衣 幅巾, 就是 衫, kah 頭巾 做 死人 ê 路用.

comment: khek-tiâu, khek-jī; ēng chhiú-jiáu khek-jī tī pán-ni̍h.
hanlo_comment: 刻牢, 刻字; 用 手爪 刻字 tī 版裡.

comment: keng-biō ê āu-lo̍h, khiā-ke ê chhù; hioh-khùn, tó-teh, hûn-bōng.
hanlo_comment: 宮廟 ê 後落, khiā家 ê 厝; 歇睏, 倒teh, 墳墓.

comment: tiô-thiàu, thún-ta̍h; kiâⁿ bô siông-sè ê khoán-sit; ûn-á-chhím.
hanlo_comment: 趒跳, thún踏; 行 無 詳細 ê 款式; 勻á踸.

comment: pe̍h ê kùi-hoe chhiū; kùi-hoe, i ê hio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ pî-pê; kap 𣖽 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 白 ê 桂花 樹; 桂花, 伊 ê 葉 親像 琵琶; kap 𣖽 相像.

comment: chiū-sī poa̍h-kiáu, tàu-su-iâⁿ; khai-hōa ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 跋檄, 鬥輸贏; 開譁 ê 意思.

comment: ûn-ûn-á ji̍p, pà-chiàm; pháiⁿ-pî-tang; chhim-chhú, chhim-chiàm.
hanlo_comment: 勻勻á 入, 霸佔; pháiⁿ年冬; 侵取, 侵占.

comment: chhím-kàu, chhím-khì, chhím-nî, chiū-sī tú-tú ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 纔到, 纔去, 纔年, 就是 tú-tú ê 意思.

comment: tōa-keng chhù; chhù tn̂g chhim-hn̄g ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 大間 厝; 厝 長 深遠 ê 意思.

comment: niau, á-sī káu áu-thò͘ ê ì-sù.

comment: niau, á-sī káu áu-thò͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 貓, 抑是 狗 嘔吐 ê 意思.

comment: Hô-lâm-séng siâⁿ ê miâ, tī-hia ū tsúi-kau; tâm-sip.
hanlo_comment: 河南省 城 ê 名, tī hia 有 水溝; 澹濕.

comment: tsòe-ba̍k ê ke-si; ba̍k-tsù-pit, bi̍h-chhīⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 做木 ê 家私; 墨注筆, 篾刺.

comment: húi-pòng, bû-lōa, kò-sò͘; poan-thio, óng-khut lâng.
