comment: chhîm-chhio̍h, chiū-sī chhâ-mn̄g ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 尋索, 就是 查問 ê 意思.

comment: ba̍k-sái chhîm-chhîm lâu, chiū-sī ba̍k-sái ti̍t-ti̍t lâu.
hanlo_comment: 目屎 潸潸 流, 就是 目屎 直直 流.

comment: ba̍k-sái chhîm-chhîm lâu, chiū-sī ba̍k-sái ti̍t-ti̍t lâu.
hanlo_comment: 目屎 潸潸 流, 就是 目屎 直直 流.

comment: tōa-chhîm-kó͘; chhîm-tih-chhāⁿ, sī chhîm ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 大鑱鼓; 鑱tih-chhāⁿ, 是 鑱 ê 聲.

comment: chhin-kūn, tsū-kí; hun-in, sio̍k-tī i; thiàⁿ-thàng, chhin-ài.
hanlo_comment: 親近, 自己; 婚姻, 屬tī 伊; 疼痛, 親愛.

comment: chiū-sī pē-bú ê chheng-ho͘.
hanlo_comment: 就是 父母 ê 稱呼.

comment: kong-chhin, chiū-sī pān-sū ê lâng, m̄-kú bô koân-pèng-ê.
hanlo_comment: 公親, 就是 辦事 ê 人, m̄-kú 無 權柄ê.

comment: chhin-chhī, chhin-chhī tn̂g-saⁿ, chiū-sī chi̍t-hō si ê pò͘.
hanlo_comment: 新市, 新市 長衫, 就是 一號 絲 ê 布.

comment: chhin-chhíⁿ, chiū-sī súi phiau-tì hó-khòaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 親醒, 就是 媠 標緻 好看.

comment: chhin-chháu, oē kian-tàng, hō͘ lâng thang chia̍h léng ê.
hanlo_comment: chhin草, 會 堅凍, hō͘ 人 thang 食 冷 ê.

comment: gín-á húi-hoāi chhùi-khí ê ì-sù; chiū-sī oāⁿ chhùi-khí.
hanlo_comment: gín-á 毀壞 嘴齒 ê 意思; 就是 換 嘴齒.

comment: gín-á húi-hoāi chhùi-khí ê ì-sù; chiū-sī oāⁿ chhùi-khí.
hanlo_comment: gín-á 毀壞 嘴齒 ê 意思; 就是 換 嘴齒.

comment: chhín-chhiáu, chiū-sī gín-á chih-tsut bô koai ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: chhín-chhiáu, 就是 gín-á chih-tsut 無 乖 ê 意思.

comment: si-chè, siúⁿ-sù, hō͘ lâng mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 施濟, 賞賜, hō͘ 人 物.

comment: siúⁿ-sù, chín-chè, si-chè, hō͘ lâng chîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 賞賜, 賑濟, 施濟, hō͘ 人 錢.

comment: saⁿ ê lāi-pêng, lāi-bīn ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 衫 ê 內爿, 內面 ê 意思.

comment: pau sin-si ê lāi-têng saⁿ, pang-tsān, hián-bêng, siúⁿ-sù.
hanlo_comment: 包 身屍 ê 內重 衫, 幫贊, 顯明, 賞賜.

comment: koaⁿ-chhâ lāi, lāi-têng ê koaⁿ-chhâ, tah seng-khu ê só͘-tsāi.
hanlo_comment: 棺柴 內, 內重 ê 棺柴, 貼 身軀 ê 所在.

comment: chiū-sī pîⁿ-pîⁿ tī-lí ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 平平 治理 ê 意思.

comment: kôaⁿ-chhìn, chhìn-tsúi; chhìn-sim, chhiⁿ-chhìn; chhìn-nah.
hanlo_comment: 寒凊, 凊水; 凊心, 生凊; 凊nah.

comment: kôaⁿ-chhìn, chhìn-tsúi; chhìn-sim, chhiⁿ-chhìn; chhìn-nah.
hanlo_comment: 寒凊, 凊水; 凊心, 生凊; 凊nah.

comment: chhìn-chhái, chhìn-chhái lâng, chhìn-chhái só͘-tsāi.
hanlo_comment: chhìn-chhái, chhìn-chhái 人, chhìn-chhái 所在.

comment: chhìn-á, tōe-chhìn, chhìn-hoe, chhìn-kau, chhìn-thûi.
hanlo_comment: 秤á, 地秤, 秤花, 秤鉤, 秤錘.

comment: kóaⁿ-chhio, khí-chhio, chhio-ko; chhio-koe.
hanlo_comment: 趕chhio, 起chhio, chhio哥; chhio雞.

comment: biô-chhio, chhio-chit, chhùi-chhio, chhio-tiô.
hanlo_comment: 描chhio, chhio脊, 嘴chhio, chhio趒.

comment: chhiò-bīn, chhiò-iông, hó-chhiò, kún-chhiò, thí-chhiò; chhiò-chhī.
hanlo_comment: 笑面, 笑容, 好笑, 滾笑, 恥笑; 笑市.

comment: ka-chhiô, chiū-sī hái-ni̍h sòe-chiah ê giô-á.
hanlo_comment: ka-chhiô, 就是 海裡 細隻 ê 蟯á.

comment: chhiō-kng, chhiō-chha̍t, chhiō-chhì, chiū-sī chiò ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 照光, 照賊, 照試, 就是 照 ê 意思.

comment: kha-chhioh-tóe, kha-chhioh khah-tn̂g; sī oê ē-tóe.
hanlo_comment: 腳尺底, 腳尺 khah長; 是 鞋 下底.

comment: kha-chhioh-tóe, kha-chhioh khah-tn̂g; sī oê ē-tóe, chiū-sī kha-chiah-tóe siāng ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 腳尺底, 腳尺 khah長; 是 鞋 下底, 就是 腳脊底 像 意思.

comment: kha-chhioh-tóe, kha-chhioh khah-tn̂g; sī oê ē-tóe, chiū-sī kha-chiah-tóe siāng ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 腳尺底, 腳尺 khah長; 是 鞋 下底, 就是 腳脊底 像 意思.

comment: chhùn-chhioh; khut-chhioh, a̍h-chhioh, keh-chhioh.
hanlo_comment: 寸尺; 屈尺, 匣尺, 格尺.

comment: ti-chhioh, chiū-sī ti heng-khám-bah pûi ê só͘-tsāi.
hanlo_comment: 豬臅, 就是 豬 胸坎肉 肥 ê 所在.

comment: chhiⁿ-chhioh; chíⁿ-chhioh, chiū-sī sòe-hàn ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 鮮chhioh; 嫩鮮, 就是 細漢 ê 意思.

comment: chhioh-tsúi, chhioh-tâm,chiū-sī ùn-tâm ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 浞水, 浞澹, 就是 搵澹 ê 意思.

comment: ah, á-sī gô teh chia̍h ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 鴨, 抑是 鵝 teh 食 ê 聲.

comment: tîn-chhio̍h, chhio̍h-chháu, bi̍h-chhio̍h, kiâm-chháu-chhio̍h; phah-chhio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 藤蓆, 蓆草, 篾蓆, 鹹草蓆; phah 蓆.

comment: chhîm-chhio̍h, chiū-sī tsa-mn̄g ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 尋索, 就是 查問 ê 意思.

comment: chiáu-miâ, sòe-sòe ê chhek-chiáu-á, hoaⁿ-hí thiàu;khóng-chhiok.
hanlo_comment: 鳥名, 細細 ê 粟鳥á, 歡喜 跳; 孔雀.

comment: ge̍k-miâ, hó tiāu-thâu ê chiáu, chhin-chhiūⁿ kheh-chiáu, hí-chhiok.
hanlo_comment: 玉名, 好 兆頭 ê 鳥, 親像 客鳥, 喜鵲.

comment: chiū-sī lia̍h, khîⁿ, jio̍k, giú ê ì-sù, ēng chhiú liām, chhiok-ná.
hanlo_comment: 就是 掠, 鉗, 搦, 扭 ê 意思, 用 手 捻, 捉拿.

comment: tōa-liōng, khoah-khoah, iân-oān, hoàn-hoàn, tsōe-tsōe, chhiok-hō.
hanlo_comment: 大量, 闊闊, 延緩, 泛泛, 濟濟, 綽號.

comment: súi ê khoán-sit; hū-jîn-lâng ê pīⁿ; kap téng-bīn jī sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 媠 ê 款式; 婦人人 ê 病; kap 頂面 字 相像.

comment: khún-pek, chhe-ēng, tio̍h-bôa, ba̍t-ba̍t, sòe, tio̍h-bôa, chhek-oá.
hanlo_comment: 窘迫, 差用, tio̍h磨, 密密, 細, tio̍h磨, 促oá.

comment: chhiúⁿ-kiap lâi the̍h lâng ê mi̍h; phah.
hanlo_comment: 搶劫 來 the̍h 人 ê 物; phah.

comment: chìm-tsúi, ùn-tâm, sip-lūn; chìm-tsù.
hanlo_comment: 浸水, 搵澹, 濕潤; 浸漬.

comment: tsúi sè ê siaⁿ; hî tîm-phû tī tsúi-ni̍h; chio̍h lī-tsúi ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 水 細 ê 聲; 魚 沉浮 tī 水裡; 石 離水 ê 款式.

comment: ēng to tsām tsòe nn̄g pêng, tsám, khám, chi̍h-tn̄g.
hanlo_comment: 用 刀 鏨 做 兩 爿, 斬, 砍, 折斷.

comment: chhiong-hoān, tak-tio̍h, tú-tio̍h, chhim-chiàm, bak-tio̍h, chhiok-hoān.
hanlo_comment: 沖犯, 觸tio̍h, tú-tio̍h, 侵占, bak-tio̍h, 觸犯.

comment: ēng kha that, kín-kín ê khoán-sit; ēng kha lâi ta̍h, thún-ta̍h.
hanlo_comment: 用 腳 踢, 緊緊 ê 款式; 用 腳 來 踏, thún踏.

comment: ēng kha siong lâng, tsàm lâng; bīn piàn-sek.
hanlo_comment: 用 腳 傷 人, 蹔 人; 面 變色.

comment: kóng-oē kín-kín; khún-pek, pek-chhek; kap chit-jī 促 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 講話 緊緊; 捆逼, 迫促; kap chit字 促 相像.

comment: lâng kín-kín teh kiâⁿ; liâm-piⁿ kiâⁿ, liâm-piⁿ soah.
hanlo_comment: 人 緊緊 teh 行; liâm-piⁿ 行, liâm-piⁿ soah.

comment: chi̍t-khoán hó ê káu; chhut-tī Sòng-tiâu ê sî.
hanlo_comment: 一款 好 ê 狗; 出tī 宋朝 ê 時.

comment: kha só-liān, thì-thâu; chheng-hûn ê lō͘, oh-tit kūn-oá.
hanlo_comment: 腳 鎖鍊, 剃頭; 青雲 ê 路, oh得 近oá.

comment: hó ê saⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 好 ê 衫 ê 款式.

comment: chháu ām-ām, bō͘-sēng; ām-hoat.
hanlo_comment: 草 ām-ām, 茂盛; ām發.

comment: chèng-lâng tī tiong-ng ê mn̂g; tsōe-tsōe.
hanlo_comment: 眾人 tī 中央 ê 門; 濟濟.

comment: chim-chhùi; chhùi teh tsa̍p ê siaⁿ; suh-ji̍p ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 唚嘴; 嘴 teh tsa̍p ê 聲; 欶入 ê 意思.

comment: thoân hō͘ lâng, chha̍k, tsân, thiàⁿ-thàng.
hanlo_comment: 傳 hō͘ 人, 鑿, 剸, 疼痛.

comment: bô hô-sūn, bô chiàu chhù-sū ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 無 和順, 無 照 次序 ê 意思.

comment: chhiok-kha-koe, pái-kha teh kiâⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 踔腳雞, 跛腳 teh 行 ê 款式.

comment: hî-tà, lia̍h hî ê lang; khah-á.
hanlo_comment: 魚罩, 掠 魚 ê 籠; 籗á.

comment: kín-sīn, kèng-kín, liâm-chiat, tsôe-tsáⁿ, hó khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 謹慎, 敬謹, 廉節, 齊斬, 好 款式.

comment: kín-sīn, kèng-kín, liâm-chiat, tsôe-tsáⁿ, hó khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 謹慎, 敬謹, 廉節, 齊斬, 好 款式.

comment: chi̍t-hō ê soa-hî; peh-sìⁿ ài chia̍h, phê oē tsòe-tit to-siù.
hanlo_comment: 一號 ê 鯊魚; 百姓 ài 食, 皮 會 做得 刀鞘.

comment: chhùi-khí chéng-chê; chê-tsáⁿ kín-sīn ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 嘴齒 整齊; 齊斬 謹慎 ê 款式.

comment: sòe-pō͘ lâi kiâⁿ, sió-khóa thêng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 細步 來 行, 小khóa 停 ê 意思.

comment: iu-būn; hoân-ló ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 憂悶; 煩惱 ê 意思.

comment: chi̍t-khoán thâng ê miâ; tha̍k Chhù chiū-sī hô͘-sîn-táⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 一款 蟲 ê 名; 讀 Chhù 就是 胡蠅膽.

comment: tsōe-tsōe, chháu-ba̍k bō͘-sēng; tn̂g ti̍t ê khoán-sit; koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 濟濟, 草木 茂盛; 長 直 ê 款式; 懸懸.

comment: chhiū ê phê, jiâu-jiâu koh pit-hûn, ná chhêng-peh-chhiū.
hanlo_comment: 樹 ê 皮, 皺皺 koh pit痕, ná 松柏樹.

comment: lâng ê miâ, Chê-kok ū chi̍t-ê Gân Chhiok.
hanlo_comment: 人 ê 名, 齊國 有 一個 顏斶.

comment: ēng thiám-bī ê oē lài kiû; kóng hó-oē ê bīn-sek.
hanlo_comment: 用 諂媚 ê 話 來 求; 講 好話 ê 面色.

comment: bôa, chhat khí-lâi, chhit-mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 磨, 擦 起來, 拭物.

comment: kiong-kèng, lâng-miâ; chio̍h ū tsa̍p-sek; tsó͘-gāi.
hanlo_comment: 恭敬, 人名; 石 有 雜色; 阻礙.

comment: phah; bôa, kè-thai; lak-lo̍h-khì, chhin-chhiūⁿ hio̍h ka-la̍uh.
hanlo_comment: phah; 磨, 過篩; 落落去, 親像 葉 交落.

comment: chi̍t-hō chhiū ê miâ; lak-hio̍h, bô hio̍h ê ki; kàu-ūi.
hanlo_comment: 一號 樹 ê 名; 落葉, 無 葉 ê 枝; 到位.

comment: chhiū ê phê, jiâu-jiâu koh-pit, chho͘-chho͘ bô-pîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 樹 ê 皮, 皺皺 koh pit, 粗粗 無平.

comment: chhiū ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ hoa-chhiū.
hanlo_comment: 樹 ê 名, 親像 樺樹.

comment: chhiū ê phê, jiâu-jiâu koh pit-hûn; lāu-lâng phê jiâu-jiâu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 樹 ê 皮, 皺皺 koh pit痕; 老人 皮 皺皺 ê 意思.

comment: tōa chhùi-tûn ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 大 嘴唇 ê 款式.

comment: gōng-ti̍t ê khoán-sit; ēng to lâi tsām, tsám, chhò.
hanlo_comment: 戇直 ê 款式; 用 刀 來 鏨, 斬, 剉.

comment: chhâi-lông heng-khám ê bah.
hanlo_comment: 豺狼 胸坎 ê 肉.

comment: chhùi-khí bô sì-chiàⁿ, tò-ha̍p-khí; chhùi-khí tsū-chi̍p ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 嘴齒 無 四正, 倒合齒; 嘴齒 聚集 ê 款.

comment: ēng chi̍t kha kiâⁿ-lō͘, bô tiāⁿ-tio̍h, chhek-kha-koe, chhiok-kha-koe.
hanlo_comment: 用 一 腳 行路, 無 定tio̍h, 踔腳雞, 踔腳雞.

comment: chèng be̍h tī tiū-á tiong-ng, sòe-sòe, tsá sêng-sio̍k.
hanlo_comment: 種 麥 tī 稻á 中央, 細細, 早 成熟.

comment: that tsúi ê siaⁿ; ū sî thêng bô chhut tsúi ê tsôaⁿ; siat-hoat.
hanlo_comment: 窒 水 ê 聲; 有 時 停 無 出 水 ê 泉; 設法.

comment: ke̍k siū-khì kàu tòng-bōe-tiâu; lâng ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 極 受氣 到 擋bōe-tiâu; 人 ê 名.

comment: chho͘-tōa; soe-soe; mi̍h bô-iù; chho͘-sio̍k; iā kap 觸 sio -siāng.
hanlo_comment: 粗大; 疏疏; 物 無幼; 粗俗; 也 kap 觸 相像.

comment: siū-khì hia̍h-á jiâu-jiâu; sim hoân-ló ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 受氣 額á 皺皺; 心 煩惱 ê 意思.

comment: lâng ê jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 人 ê 字姓.

comment: saⁿ-lī bô-hn̄g; kūn-oá; kan-khó͘, pek-chhat, ì-hiòng.
hanlo_comment: 相離 無遠; 近oá; 艱苦, 迫察, 意向.

comment: lâng sòe-jī bô lām-sám tsòe, kín-sīn, chheng-liâm.
hanlo_comment: 人 細膩 無 濫糝 做, 謹慎, 清廉.

comment: lâng sòe-jī bô lām-sám tsòe, kín-sīn, chheng-liâm.
hanlo_comment: 人 細膩 無 濫糝 做, 謹慎, 清廉.

comment: chi̍t-khoán hó ê káu, chhut tī Sòng-tiâu.
hanlo_comment: 一款 好 ê 狗, 出 tī 宋朝.

comment: sòe-sòe khòaⁿ bōe kìⁿ, iù-iù ba̍t-ba̍t; phah-sǹg, sǹg-siàu.
hanlo_comment: 細細 看 bōe 見, 幼幼 密密; phah 算, 算數.

comment: tōa-liōng; chhiok-hō; lâng-miâ, Ló͘-kok ū chi̍t ê Bēng Kong-chhiok.
hanlo_comment: 大量; 綽號; 人名, 魯國 有 一個孟 光焯.

comment: chìm tī thô͘-bê lāi; nńg-loán ê khoán-sit, bô khùi-la̍t.
hanlo_comment: 浸 tī 土糜 內; 軟loán ê 款式, 無 氣力.

comment: khí-thâu, lâm-pêng ê hn̂g; chéng-tùn, hé.
hanlo_comment: 起頭, 南爿 ê 園; 整頓, 火.

comment: ēng chhiú lâi the̍h; chha̍k, tsân, pio-á.
hanlo_comment: 用 手 來 the̍h; 鑿, 剸, 鏢á.

comment: kúi-nā ê chí-bē ê tōa-chí.
hanlo_comment: 幾nā ê 姊妹 ê 大姊.

comment: lō͘-chhio̍k, chiū-sī lō͘ tâm koh ū làm-thô͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 路浞, 就是 路 澹 koh 有 湳土 ê 意思.

comment: lō͘-chhio̍k, chiū-sī lō͘ tâm koh ū làm-thô͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 路浞, 就是 路 澹 koh 有 湳土 ê 意思.

comment: chhio̍k-tio̍h, chhio̍k hái-thô͘, chhio̍k-tsúi; chiū-sī phùn-tio̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 浞tio̍h, 浞 海土, 浞水; 就是 噴tio̍h ê 意思.

comment: io̍h ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ chio̍h-chhiuⁿ-pô͘ⁿ, á-sī chio̍h-chhiong-pô.
hanlo_comment: 藥 ê 名, 親像 石菖pô͘ⁿ, 抑是 石菖婆.

comment: chhiⁿ-tso̍h, lām-sám tsáu; kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, lām-sám, chhiong-kông.
hanlo_comment: 青tso̍h, 濫糝 走; 驚惶, 濫糝, 猖狂.

comment: chha̍k peng-sng ê siaⁿ; chhim-chhim, un-hô, sòe-hàn, iù-iù.
hanlo_comment: 鑿 冰霜 ê 聲; 深深, 溫和, 細漢, 幼幼.

comment: siú-sek sì-bīn sûi, chhiong, chhiong-thian, kiáu-lā, iô, chhe̍k.
hanlo_comment: 首飾 四面 垂, 沖, 沖天, 攪撈, 搖, chhe̍k.

comment: thong-hāng, tōa-lō͘, tín-tāng, tio̍h, ǹg-hiòng, tí-tng, hut-jiân; chhiong-pōng.
hanlo_comment: 通巷, 大路, 振動, tio̍h, 向向, 抵當, 忽然; 衝磅.

comment: khui-khoah ê tōa-lō͘; chiàn-tsûn, sio-thâi ê chhia, chhiong-pōng.
hanlo_comment: 開闊 ê 大路; 戰船, 相刣 ê 車, 衝磅.

comment: ji̍t ê kng, súi, tāi-kiat, bō͘-sēng, tú-hó, heng-ōng, chhiong-sēng.
hanlo_comment: 日 ê 光, 媠, 大吉, 茂盛, tú好, 興旺, 充盛.

comment: móa, chiâu-pī; siuⁿ-pá; tam-tng; koâiⁿ, tn̂g; súi, kiâⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 滿, 齊備; 傷飽; 擔當; 懸, 長; 媠, 行.

comment: that-hē; chhī-pûi; ji̍h-tsa̍t, chhiong, chhiong-móa.
hanlo_comment: 窒下; 飼肥; 捏實, 充, 充滿.

comment: pháiⁿ ê hū-jîn-lâng, hoe-keng tsa-bó͘, ki-lú, piáu, chhiong-ki.
hanlo_comment: pháiⁿ ê 婦人人, 花間 tsa-bó͘, 妓女, 婊, 娼妓.

comment: chiáu-siù teh chia̍h-mi̍h ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 鳥獸 teh 食物 ê 聲.

comment: ngó͘-kok pòaⁿ-sek; á-sī ta-la-khì; koah ngó͘-kok.
hanlo_comment: 五穀 半熟; 抑是 ta-la去; 割 五穀.

comment: tín-tāng; kiaⁿ tsáu ê kha-pō͘, thiàu-bú ê khoán-sit; tsáu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 振動; 行走 ê 腳步, 跳舞 ê 款式; 走 ê 意思.

comment: kiâⁿ bô sì-chiàⁿ ê khoán-sit; tín-tāng; kiaⁿ tsáu ê kha-pō͘, thiàu-bú ê khoán-sit; tsáu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 行 無 四正 ê 款式; 振動; 驚 走 ê 腳步, 跳舞 ê 款式; 走 ê 意思.

comment: ga̍k-khì ê siaⁿ, siaⁿ-im hô-sūn; khóng-khài ê iông-māu.
hanlo_comment: 樂器 ê 聲, 聲音 和順; 慷慨 ê 容貌.

comment: kui-tīn ê chhia; peng-chhia; sio-thâi ê chhia.
hanlo_comment: kui陣 ê 車; 兵車; 相刣 ê 車.

comment: sim-koaⁿ iô-tāng; kiáu-jiáu; bô tiāⁿ-tio̍h, hoán-hok.
hanlo_comment: 心肝 搖動; 攪擾; 無 定tio̍h, 反覆.

comment: tô-tsáu, siám-pī, tô-siám ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 逃走, 閃避, 逃閃 ê 意思.

comment: sim-koaⁿ ut-tsut bōe pêng-an, iu-būn, hoân-ló.
hanlo_comment: 心肝 鬱卒 bōe 平安, 憂悶, 煩惱.

comment: kim-chio̍h á-sī cheng ê siaⁿ, saⁿ tí-te̍k ê ke-si, chhiuⁿ, to.
hanlo_comment: 金石 抑是 鐘 ê 聲, 相 抵敵 ê 家私, 槍, 刀.

comment: hong ê miâ, hông-kiong, kiong ê mn̂g; thiⁿ ê mn̂g.
hanlo_comment: 坊 ê 名, 皇宮, 宮 ê 門; 天 ê 門.

comment: ke-si ê miâ; chhâ siang-thâu ū chiam, tí-te̍k; thâu-khak àⁿ-lo̍h.
hanlo_comment: 家私 ê 名; 柴 雙頭 有 針, 抵敵; 頭殼 向落.

comment: nńg-kut hî ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ chhiuⁿ-hî, o͘-chhiuⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 軟骨 魚 ê 名, 親像 鯧魚, 烏鯧.

comment: moa-saⁿ; moa-saⁿ bô-tòa, ó-á.
hanlo_comment: 幔衫; 幔衫 無 帶, 襖á.

comment: moa-saⁿ; moa-saⁿ bô tòa, ó-á.
hanlo_comment: 幔衫; 幔衫 無 帶, 襖á.

comment: soaⁿ-ē ê tsôaⁿ, lâu-tsúi ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 山下 ê 泉, 流水 ê 聲.

comment: chiū-sī sim-koaⁿ tín-tāng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 心肝 振動 ê 意思.

comment: chi̍t-khoán ge̍k-chio̍h ê miâ; iā-sī tsòe chhiong-niá ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 一款 玉石 ê 名; 也是 做 衝領 ê 意思.

comment: chhek ê phê, chhek-khak ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 粟 ê 皮, 粟殼 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī ti̍t-ti̍t ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 直直 ê 意思.

comment: chhiū ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ píⁿ-peh, kó͘-thûi, pauh-khí.
hanlo_comment: 樹 ê 名, 親像 扁柏, 鼓槌, 暴齒.

comment: thâng ê miâ, chiū-sī gû-bong, i ê nn̄g siⁿ tī gû-phê.
hanlo_comment: 蟲 ê 名, 就是 牛虻, 伊 ê 卵 生 tī 牛皮.

comment: chiáu-á teh mi̍h; sàu khí-thâm ê siaⁿ, gōng ê khoán, khang kiaⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 鳥á teh 物; 嗽 起痰 ê 聲, 戇 ê 款, 空 驚 ê 意思.

comment: tōa-ki ê pó͘-thâu, sio-thâi ê tōaⁿ-pó͘, loān-phut.
hanlo_comment: 大枝 ê 斧頭, 相刣 ê 大斧, 亂刜.

comment: khui-khoah koh pîⁿ ê tsúi; khoah-tōa.
hanlo_comment: 開闊 koh 平 ê 水; 闊大.

comment: ge̍k-á kap siú-sek pa̍k tī io-tòa tín-tāng ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 玉á kap 首飾 縛 tī 腰帶 振動 ê 聲.

comment: chi̍t-hō ê chháu, hō͘ hū-jîn-lâng tsòe-io̍h ê lō͘-ēng.
hanlo_comment: 一號 ê 草, hō͘ 婦人人 做 葯 ê 路用.

comment: nńg-kut hî ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ chhiuⁿ-hî, o͘-chhiuⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 軟骨 魚 ê 名, 親像 鯧魚, 烏鯧.

comment: ûn-ûn-á, bān-bān, tsū-tsāi, pàng, sià-bián, chhiong-iông.
hanlo_comment: 勻勻á, 慢慢, 自在, 放, 赦免, 從容.

comment: chiàu kong-tō, kong-pîⁿ, khoán-thāi, pîⁿ-pîⁿ, sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 照 公道, 公平, 款待, 平平, 相像.

comment: gōng-gōng, bô tì-sek, gû-chhún.
hanlo_comment: 戇戇, 無 知識, 愚蠢.

comment: chhiuⁿ á-sī pio-á, tsân-chhiuⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 鎗 抑是 標á, 剸鎗.

comment: hô-sūn ê siaⁿ, chhàn-lān, siuⁿ kim ê sek, hoat-tō͘.
hanlo_comment: 和順 ê 聲, 燦爛, 鑲 金 ê 色, 法度.

comment: io̍h ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ jio̍k-chhiong-iông.
hanlo_comment: 藥 ê 名, 親像 肉蓯蓉.

comment: phah-kó͘ á-sī lô, chhek-oá, pâi-lia̍t.
hanlo_comment: phah 鼓 抑是 鑼, 促oá, 排列.

comment: phah-kó͘ á-sī lô, chhek-oá, pâi-lia̍t.
hanlo_comment: phah 鼓 抑是 鑼, 促oá, 排列.

comment: ge̍k ê siaⁿ, ga̍k-khì ê siaⁿ, kim-chio̍h á-sī cheng ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 玉 ê 聲, 樂器 ê 聲, 金石 抑是 鐘 ê 聲.

comment: siong-sim, pi-siong; chhiⁿ-chhám, iu-būn ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 傷心, 悲傷; 淒慘, 憂悶 ê 款式.

comment: chhiùⁿ-khek ê tsa-bó͘-lâng, ín-iú, ki-lú, tsng hì ê lâng, chhōa-thâu.
hanlo_comment: 唱曲 ê tsa-bó͘人, 引誘, 妓女, 妝 戲 ê 人, chhōa頭.

comment: siaⁿ-im, giâm-chèng; tsū-chi̍p; ióng-tsòng; eng-hiông, lī-hāi.
hanlo_comment: 聲音, 嚴正; 聚集; 勇壯; 英雄, 厲害.

comment: siaⁿ-im, giâm-chèng; tsū-chi̍p; ióng-tsòng; eng-hiông, lī-hāi.
hanlo_comment: 聲音, 嚴正; 聚集; 勇壯; 英雄, 厲害.

comment: lâm-pak ê sòaⁿ; thán-ti̍t, ti̍t-ti̍t bô-khiau ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 南北 ê 線; 坦直, 直直 無曲 ê 意思.

comment: bô chhù-chhiûⁿ ê liâu; tsàn-keng, tsòe-kang ê chhiúⁿ; gûn-khòng.
hanlo_comment: 無 厝牆 ê 寮; 棧間, 做工 ê 廠; 銀礦.

comment: kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 驚惶 ê 款式.

comment: tsûn-chhiúⁿ, gī-chhiúⁿ, tah-chhiúⁿ, sī ū chhù-kòa bô chhù-chhiûⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 船廠, 議廠, 搭廠, 是 有 厝蓋 無 厝牆 ê 意思.

comment: kiông-kiông the̍h; hut-jiân kóaⁿ-kín, tsū-chi̍p, chhiúⁿ-the̍h, chhiúⁿ-chhoah.
hanlo_comment: 強強 the̍h; 忽然 趕緊, 聚集, 搶the̍h, 搶chhoah.

comment: chiáu ê iù-iù koh tsa̍t ê mn̂g thang tsòe hiû; tōa tsúi-chiáu ê si̍t.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 ê 幼幼 koh 翼 ê 毛 thang 做 裘; 大 水鳥 ê 翼.

comment: chiáu ê iù-iù koh tsa̍t ê mn̂g thang tsòe hiû; tōa tsúi-chiáu ê si̍t.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 ê 幼幼 koh 翼 ê 毛 thang 做 裘; 大 水鳥 ê 翼.

comment: chhut-sì chiū chhàu-hī-lâng; háng-phiàn, tōng-sim, chhèng-koâiⁿ, bián-lē.
hanlo_comment: 出世 就 臭耳聾; 哄騙, 動心, 衝懸, 勉勵.

comment: ji̍t-thâu tn̂g, thong-thàu, kng kú-kú, thián-khui, khoan-khoah.
hanlo_comment: 日頭 長, 通透, 光 久久, 展開, 寬闊.

comment: khui, lō͘-hiān, bôa, bôa-kng, hián-bêng, koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ, thóaⁿ-pîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 開, 露現, 磨, 磨光, 顯明, 懸懸, thóaⁿ平.

comment: chiū-sī sià-bián khoan-iông ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 赦免 寬容 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī ok pháiⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 惡 pháiⁿ ê 意思.

comment: ēng soa á-sī pa̍t-mi̍h lâi bôa tsòe chheng-khì.
hanlo_comment: 用 沙 抑是 別物 來 磨 做 清氣.

comment: bôa, sóe; kiông-kiông the̍h, chhiúⁿ-kiap, chhiúⁿ-the̍h.
hanlo_comment: 磨, 洗; 強強 the̍h, 搶劫, 搶the̍h.

comment: khǹg, bián-lē, hō͘ lâng kiaⁿ; sái-sō, sō-lōng, kiaⁿ, chhiáng-sū.
hanlo_comment: 勸, 勉勵, hō͘ 人 驚; 使唆, 唆弄, 驚, 縱事.

comment: chiū-sī kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ ê ì-sù, iā kap chit-jī 𢥠 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 就是 驚惶 ê 意思, 也 kap chit字 𢥠 相像.

comment: kiong-kèng, kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ; tín-tāng; tòe, thàn-iūⁿ; chiáu-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 恭敬, 驚惶; 振動; tè, 趁樣; 鳥名.

comment: hō͘ lâng kiaⁿ, khǹg, bián-lē; sō-lōng, chhióng-sú, sái-sō.
hanlo_comment: hō͘ 人 驚, 勸, 勉勵; 唆弄, 慫使, 使唆.

comment: tsòe-thâu, ín-chhōa; tìⁿ-la̍t khan-siaⁿ, chhiùⁿ-khek, chhiùⁿ-koa.
hanlo_comment: 做頭, 引chhōa; 盯力 牽聲, 唱曲, 唱歌.

comment: tsòe-thâu, ín-chhōa; tìⁿ-la̍t khan-siaⁿ, chhiùⁿ-khek, chhiùⁿ-koa.
hanlo_comment: 做頭, 引chhōa; 盯力 牽聲, 唱曲, 唱歌.

comment: kau-chiàn ê khì-kū; pó͘-thâu kheng; tōa-sió-chhèng.
hanlo_comment: 交戰 ê 器具; 斧頭 銎; 大小銃.

comment: tsúi tsōe-pho, tsúi ê khoán, tsúi se ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 水 濟波, 水 ê 款, 水 疏 ê 款式.

comment: sòe-hàn gín-a ê pīⁿ, hong-pīⁿ, hong-chèng.
hanlo_comment: 細漢 gín-á ê 病, 瘋病, 瘋症.

comment: siâ-chèng, phian-su ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 邪症, 偏私 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī bô chhiáⁿ ka-kī lâi ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 無 請 家己 來 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī tûi-phah ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 搥phah ê 意思.

comment: chhōa-thâu, tsòe-thâu, ín-thâu, ín-chhōa, thâu-lâng, chhiòng-siú.
hanlo_comment: chhōa頭, 做頭, 引頭, 引chhōa, 頭人, 倡首.

comment: pàng-sak; hoàn-hoàn, loān-loān, chhiòng-hêng, hòng-chhiòng.
hanlo_comment: 放拺; 泛泛, 亂亂, 縱橫, 放縱.

comment: lok-teh, pàng; loān-loān, hoàn-hoàn, hòng-chhiòng, chhiòng-hêng.
hanlo_comment: 橐teh, 放; 亂亂, 泛泛, 放縱, 縱橫.

comment: tiô-thiàu, chhiok-kha-koe; tsông khí-lâi.
hanlo_comment: 趒跳, 雀腳雞; 蹤 起來.

comment: soat-chhiòng, kóng hó-chhiò ê gōng-oē.
hanlo_comment: 說唱, 講 好笑 ê 戇話.

comment: jio̍k-chhiòng-iông, chiū-sī chháu-io̍h ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 肉蓯蓉, 就是 草藥 ê 名.

comment: chhiûⁿ-ûi, chhiûⁿ-á, tek-ûi, kap chit-jī 牆 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 牆圍, 牆á, 竹圍, kap chit字 牆 相像.

comment: tsûn tiong-ng ê thiāu, thang tiàu-phâng, phiau-hong, tsûn-ûi.
hanlo_comment: 船 中央 ê 柱, thang 吊帆, 飄風, 船桅.

comment: khì-hâi, chhiuⁿ ê khoán-sit, tsân-sí, siong-hāi, chhiông-che̍k.
hanlo_comment: 器械, 鎗 ê 款式, 剸死, 傷害, 戕疾.

comment: chiong thô͘, soa, tsng, thia̍p chiâⁿ; keh-pîn, ûi-pîn pîn-tó͘. chhin-chhiūⁿ lî-pa ê khoán-sit; chhiûⁿ, chhiûⁿ-lō͘, chhiûⁿ-piah.
hanlo_comment: 將 土, 沙, 磚, 疊 成; 隔屏, 圍屏 屏堵. 親像 籬笆 ê 款式; 牆, 牆路, 牆壁.

comment: chiong thô͘, soa, tsng, thia̍p chiâⁿ; keh-pîn, ûi-pîn pîn-tó͘. chhin-chhiūⁿ lî-pa ê khoán-sit; chhiûⁿ, chhiûⁿ-lō͘, chhiûⁿ-piah.
hanlo_comment: 將 土, 沙, 磚, 疊 成; 隔屏, 圍屏 屏堵. 親像 籬笆 ê 款式; 牆, 牆路, 牆壁.

comment: kiong-lú, chiū-sī Hông-tè ê hông-kiong-lāi ê hū-jîn-lâng.
hanlo_comment: 宮女, 就是 皇帝 ê 皇宮內 ê 婦人人.

comment: tsûn-ûi, sī tsûn tiong-ng ê thiāu, thang tiàu tsûn-phâng.
hanlo_comment: 船桅, 是 船 中央 ê 柱, thang 吊 船帆.

comment: âng-hoe ê miâ, chhiûⁿ-bî-hoe, iā ū kóng chhiû-bî-hoe.
hanlo_comment: 紅花 ê 名, 薔薇花, 也 有 講 愁眉花.

comment: chháu-miâ, hoe-miâ, chhiûⁿ-bî-hoe, iā ū kóng chhiû-bî-hoe.
hanlo_comment: 草名, 花名, 薔薇花, 也 有 講 愁眉花.

comment: chháu-miâ, hoe-miâ, chhiûⁿ-bî-hoe, iā ū kóng chhiû-bî-hoe.
hanlo_comment: 草名, 花名, 薔薇花, 也 有 講 愁眉花.

comment: chiong pó͘-thâu tsòe kang; ba̍k-kang, sai-hū, ba̍k-chhiūⁿ.

comment: kiâⁿ ê khoán-sit; tiô-thiàu ê khoán-sit.

comment: thâng ê miâ, ài soh tī ô-khak kap tsûn-tóe.

comment: kín; chiúⁿ, ló͘, kò-chiúⁿ, sī kò-tsûn ê khi-kū.

comment: phah sì-sòaⁿ, tsoān soh-á; saⁿ-liân, khan-tîⁿ, chiap-sòa.
hanlo_comment: phah 四散, 鏇 索á; 相連, 牽纏, 接續.

comment: tsōe-tsōe chhùi; chhùi kap chi̍h teh tín-tāng ê siaⁿ.

comment: ha̍p-hô, tsúi lâu-chhut: kóaⁿ-kín ê khoán-sit.

comment: hô-ha̍p, piān-lūn, gī-lūn; lâng ê miâ.

comment: lo̍h-hō͘, hō͘ ê siaⁿ, tōa-hō͘ ê khoán-sit, tsōe-siaⁿ kóaⁿ-kín ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 落雨, 雨 ê 聲, 大雨 ê 款式, 濟聲 趕緊 ê 款.

comment: lo̍h-hō͘, hō͘ ê siaⁿ, tōa-hō͘ ê khoán-sit, tsōe-siaⁿ kóaⁿ-kín ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 落雨, 雨 ê 聲, 大雨 ê 款式, 濟聲 趕緊 ê 款.

comment: tsûn-chiúⁿ, kò-tsûn; thàn ki-hōe lâi kò͘ ka-kī.
hanlo_comment: 船槳, 划船; 趁 機會 來 顧 家己.

comment: chiū-sī lâng tsōe-tsōe ê khoán-sit.

comment: lo̍h-hō͘; chhut-tsôaⁿ, tsúi kún ê khoán-sit, hô-ha̍p.
hanlo_comment: 器械 收起, 放下, soah; 太平, 聚集.

comment: khi-hâi siu-khì, pàng-hē, soah; thài-pêng, tsū-chi̍p.
hanlo_comment: 器械 收起, 放下, soah; 太平, 聚集.

comment: chiong chháu khàm-chhiûⁿ; pó͘-that, siu-lí; chháu-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 將 草 khàm牆; 補塞, 修理; 草名.

comment: chhài ê miâ, hio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ kiô-be̍h, siⁿ tī tâm-sip ê tōe.
hanlo_comment: 菜 ê 名, 葉 親像 蕎麥, 生 tī 澹濕 ê 地.

comment: chhoeh-chhoeh thî, chiū-sī thî-khàu lâu-ba̍k-sái ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: chhoeh-chhoeh 啼, 就是 啼哭 流目屎 ê 意思.

comment: tsoān soh-á, phah-sì-sòaⁿ; i-ho̍k ē-kha-pô͘, chiap-sòa, khan-tîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 鏇 索á, phah 四散; 衣服 下腳裒, 接續, 牽纏.

comment: oá hī-khang sòe-siaⁿ thau-kóng ê oē; chhùi-chi̍h ê tín-tāng siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: oá 耳腔 細聲 偷講 ê 話; 嘴舌 ê 振動 聲.

comment: chhiū-chiap thang tsòe chhat, iā ēng tsòe ka-chhat ê jī.

comment: chhia ê chhâi-liāu; tsū-chi̍p, khioh tsòe-hóe, hô-ha̍p.
hanlo_comment: 車 ê 材料; 聚集, 拾 做夥, 和合.

comment: io̍h-chháu ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ giû-chhip-chháu.
hanlo_comment: 藥草 ê 名, 親像 牛膝草.

comment: chhiùⁿ-jiā, ip-lé; tsōe-tsōe, hô-ha̍p.
hanlo_comment: 唱喏, 揖禮; 濟濟, 和合.

comment: chhip-chhip kiâⁿ, chiū-sī sòe-jī ûn-ûn-á kiâⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 蹐蹐 行, 就是 細膩 勻勻á 行.

comment: o͘-chhip, tsûn-tóe siⁿ chhip, chiū-sī tsûn-ē kiân ê mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 烏chhip, 船底 生 chhip, 就是 船下 凝 ê 物.

comment: tê-kó͘ chhip, tê-chhip; jiō-tháng-á-chhip.
hanlo_comment: 茶鈷 chhip, 茶chhip; 尿桶á-chhip.

comment: chhip-chhip-á tsúi, chiū-sī sió-khóa tām-po̍h tsúi.
hanlo_comment: 湒湒á 水, 就是 小khóa 淡薄 水.

comment: sò͘-ha̍k ê jī, chhit, chhin-chhiūⁿ chhit-ê, chhit tè, tē-chhit.
hanlo_comment: 數學 ê 字, 七, 親像 七個, 七 塊, 第七.

comment: kap {七Chhit} sio-siāng, chit-jī chiū-sī tōa-pún-jī.
hanlo_comment: kap {七 Chhit} 相像, chit字 就是 大本字.

comment: chhiū ê miâ, chiap oē ní-mi̍h; liâm-tiâu, chhat-chhiū.
hanlo_comment: 樹 ê 名, 汁 會 染物; 黏tiâu, 漆樹.

comment: chhiū ê miâ, chiap oē ní-mi̍h; liâm-tiâu, chhat-chhiū.
hanlo_comment: 樹 ê 名, 汁 會 染物; 黏tiâu, 漆樹.

comment: chhit-chhat, chhit-ta, chhit-mi̍h, chhit chheng-khì.

comment: chhit-chhat, chhit-ta, chhit-mi̍h, chhit chheng-khì.
hanlo_comment: 拭擦, 拭乾, 拭物, 拭 清氣.

hanlo_comment: ma̍uhⁿ-chhip, 就是 僥騙 吞食 人.

comment: ma̍uhⁿ-chhip, chiū-sī hiau-phiàn thun-chia̍h lâng.
hanlo_comment: ma̍uhⁿ-chhip, 就是 僥騙 吞食 人.

comment: sì-kùi ê miâ; sêng-sio̍k, gō͘-kak se̍k; siu-khǹg, sêng-siū.
hanlo_comment: 四季 ê 名; 成熟, 五穀 熟; 收khǹg, 承受.

comment: iu-būn; ui-giâm; chhiⁿ-chhìn; chhiu-thiⁿ, chhiu-chhìn.
hanlo_comment: 憂悶; 威嚴; 清凊; 秋天, 秋凊.

comment: tsòe pá-hì ê soh; thoa-chhia ê soh; chhian-chhiu; bé-āu-kiuⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 做 把戲 ê 索; 拖車 ê 索; 韆鞦; 馬後韁.

comment: tsúi-miâ, ùn-būn iu-chhiû ê khoán-sit; liâng, chhiu-chhìn.
hanlo_comment: 水名, 慍悶 憂愁 ê 款式; 涼, 秋凊.

comment: chi̍t-khoán súi-chhâ ê chhâ-miâ; kap chit-jī 梓 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 一款 媠柴 ê 柴名; kap chit字 梓 相像.

comment: chiū-sī chhia-lûn-kìⁿ, chhia tsū-chi̍p ê só͘-tsāi.

comment: chháu ê miâ, hio̍h phang-phang sio lâi tû-khì chhàu-bī.

comment: tsúi-ni̍h ê tōa-chiáu chhin-chhiūⁿ ho̍h.

comment: chiū-sī hī-khang ki-ki-háu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 耳孔 吱吱吼 ê 意思.

comment: tsù-ba̍k khòaⁿ ê ì-sù.

comment: tsù-ba̍k khòaⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 注目 看 ê 意思.

comment: bé-āu-kiuⁿ, bán-chhiâ ê phê-tòa, bé heng-khám ê soh.

comment: bé-āu-kiuⁿ, bán-chhia ê phê-tòa, bé heng-khám ê soh.
hanlo_comment: 馬後韁, 挽斜 ê 皮帶, 馬 胸坎 ê 索.

comment: gû ê gû-phīⁿ-khian, pàng-hē bōe-pîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 牛 ê 牛鼻牽, 放下 bōe平.

comment: thâng, chiáu ê siaⁿ; gín-á ê siaⁿ, gín-á háu.

comment: koe-á, koe-á-kiáⁿ, chiū-sī sòe-chiah ê koe-á.

comment: hái-ni̍h kap chhân-ni̍h ê hî ê miâ, thô͘-liu, hái-liu, hô͘-liu.

comment: sio, hé-sio, ta-sò, hé ê khoán-sit.

comment: chhiu-chhìn, kín-sīn, hoat-hōng; piàn bīn-sek, chhìn-bīn.

hanlo_comment: 嘴鬚, 氅鬚, 鬍鬚, 痣鬚, 留鬚.

comment: chhùi-chhiu, chhàng-chhiu, hô͘-chhiu, kì-chhiu, lâu-chhiu.
hanlo_comment: 嘴鬚, 氅鬚, 鬍鬚, 痣鬚, 留鬚.

comment: phah-chhiu-hong, chiū-sī thó-chîⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: phah 秋風, 就是 討錢 ê 意思.

comment: liu-chhiu chia̍h-ba̍k-chiu, chiū-sī lâng tio̍h tsòe-chi̍t-ē oē tsai-iáⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 溜鬚 食目睭, 就是 人 著 做一下 會 知影.

comment: kiaⁿ lâng chhiu, chiū-sī m̄-ài lâng ngiau-bīn ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 驚 人 鬚, 就是 m̄-ài 人 ngiau面 ê 意思.

comment: chi̍t-chhiu peng, tōa-chhiu, sòe-chhiu; chiū-sī chi̍t-tīn peng sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 一抽 兵, 大抽, 細抽; 就是 一陣 兵 相像.

comment: khiap-sì, pháiⁿ-khòaⁿ, pháiⁿ; kiàn-siàu, tông-lūi, pí-phēng.
hanlo_comment: 怯勢, pháiⁿ看, pháiⁿ; 見笑, 同類, 比並.

comment: khì-sak; pháiⁿ, khiap-sì; pháiⁿ-khòaⁿ, kap 醜 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 棄拺; pháiⁿ, 怯勢; pháiⁿ看, kap 醜 相像.

comment: sàu lâ-sâm, sàu-tû, tû-khì, sàu-chhiú, sàu-chiú.
hanlo_comment: 掃 lâ-sâm, 掃除, 除去, 掃帚, 掃帚.

comment: kha-chhiú, thâu-chhiú, bōng-chhiú, hù-chhiú, chhé-chhiú.
hanlo_comment: 腳手, 頭手, 墓手, 副手, 扯手.

comment: chi̍t chhiú si, chhiú-bú-nn̄g chhiú-sek.
hanlo_comment: 一 首 詩, 首武卵 首飾.

comment: chhiú-saⁿ, chhiú-chhân, chiū-sī sio̍k-hôe ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 取衫, 取田 就是 贖回 ê 意思.

comment: phòa-pīⁿ bô khùi-la̍t ê ì-sù, loán-jio̍k.
hanlo_comment: 破病 無 氣力 ê 意思, 軟弱.

comment: tsòe lâng chhiàⁿ-kang-ê; tsòe lâng khiā-tsāi láu-si̍t ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 做 人 chhiàⁿ工ê; 做 人 khiā在 老實 ê 款.

comment: tsúi-chíⁿ ê tsng-á piah, siu-lí hit-ê piah ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 水井 ê 磚á 壁, 修理 hit-ê 壁 ê 意思.

comment: táⁿ-tia̍p beh siu-chhùi ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 打揲 beh 收嘴 ê 意思.

comment: ēng phê-tòa pa̍k-ân, jiâu-jiâu, phê ê khioh-kéng.
hanlo_comment: 用 皮帶 縛ân, 皺皺, 皮 ê 拾襉.

comment: lú-pī, tsa-bó͘-kán; pîⁿ-pòe ê lâng, pîⁿ-pîⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 女婢, tsa-bó͘𡢃; 平輩 ê 人, 平平 ê 意思.

comment: saⁿ-khò͘ chhìn-chhái hē ū jiâu-jiâu ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 衫褲 chhìn-chhái 會 有 皺皺 ê 款.

comment: iù-iù, tōe-á, chit ū hoe ê tiû-toān, jiâu-jiâu, jiàu-se.
hanlo_comment: 幼幼, 苧á, 織 有 花 ê 綢緞, 皺皺, 皺紗.

comment: khiû-khiû bô-ti̍t, bô kng-tsn̂g; ba̍k-bâi-thâu iu, iu-būn, chiâⁿ-bûn.
hanlo_comment: khiû-khiû 無直, 無 光全; 目眉頭 憂, 憂悶, 成紋.

comment: hoân-ló, pi-ai, iu-būn, kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, tsū-chi̍p.
hanlo_comment: 煩惱, 悲哀, 憂悶, 驚惶, 聚集.

comment: kín-sīn, piàn bīn-sek, hoat-hōng, chhìn-bīn.
hanlo_comment: 謹慎, 變 面色, 發烘, 凊面.

comment: ìn-tap, ēng oē lâi ìn-tap; phiàn-lâng; chiù-tsó͘.
hanlo_comment: 應答, 用 話 來 應答; 騙人; 咒詛.

comment: chhiû-soh, chhiû-sòaⁿ, chhiû kun-goân; bán-koe chhiû-tîn.
hanlo_comment: 揪索, 揪線, 揪 根源; 挽瓜 揪藤.

comment: chhiû-soh, chhiû-sòaⁿ, chhiû kun-goân; bán-koe chhiû-tîn.
hanlo_comment: 揪索, 揪線, 揪 根源; 挽瓜 揪藤.

comment: chhiū-m̂, chiū-sī ké-chí ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 樹梅, 就是 果子 ê 名.

comment: chhiū-ba̍k, chhiū-tsâng, chhiū-phê, chhiū-ki, chhiū-oāiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 樹木, 樹欉, 樹皮, 樹枝, 樹oāiⁿ.

comment: pháiⁿ bīn-chhiuⁿ, chiū-sī bīn pháiⁿ-khòaⁿ pìⁿ-bīn ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: pháiⁿ 面chhiuⁿ, 就是 面 pháiⁿ看 變面 ê 意思.

comment: chio̍h-chhiuⁿ-pô͘, chiū-sī io̍h-chháu ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 石菖蒲, 就是 藥草 ê 名.

comment: chhiuⁿ-hî, chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán hî ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 鯧魚, 就是 一款 魚 ê 名.

comment: chhiuⁿ-to, khau liâm-chhiuⁿ, chhiuⁿ-bah, chhiuⁿ-to, chhiuⁿ-pìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 鎗刀, khau 鐮鎗, 鎗肉, 鎗刀, 鎗柄.

comment: gī-chhiúⁿ, kong-chhiúⁿ, kim-kong-chhiúⁿ, tah-chhiúⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 藝廠, 工廠, 金工廠, 搭廠.

comment: gī-chhiúⁿ, kong-chhiúⁿ, kun-kong-chhiúⁿ, tah-chhiúⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 義廠, 工廠, 軍工廠, 搭廠.

comment: chhiúⁿ, kiap, kiông-chhiúⁿ, chhiúⁿ-the̍h, chhiúⁿ-hoān, chhiúⁿ-chia̍h.
hanlo_comment: 搶, 劫, 強搶, 搶the̍h, 搶犯, 搶食.

comment: chhiúⁿ cheng-sîn, chiū-sī ēng īⁿ-toan ê lé-sò͘ hō͘ phòa-pīⁿ hó.
hanlo_comment: 取 精神, 就是 用 異端 ê 禮數 hō͘ 破病 好

comment: phah-ka-chhiùⁿ, chiū-sī kap phah kha-chhiùⁿ sio-siāng.

comment: chhiùⁿ-koa, chhiùⁿ-khek, chhiùⁿ pak-koán, sió-chhiùⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 唱歌, 唱曲, 唱 北管, 小唱.

comment: chhiùⁿ-jiā, chiū-sī ip-lé ê ì-sù, chhiùⁿ-hiā.
hanlo_comment: 唱喏, 就是 揖禮 ê 意思, 唱讓.

comment: àm-chhiùⁿ, chiū-sī àm-àm chhin-chhiūⁿ mî-sî ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 唱歌, 唱曲, 唱 北管, 小唱.

comment: chhiûⁿ-hong-kó͘; chhiûⁿ-hong, chhiûⁿ-chhek, chhiûⁿ-be̍h.
hanlo_comment: 颺風鼓; 颺風, 颺粟, 颺麥.

comment: chhiûⁿ-piah, siâⁿ-chhiûⁿ, ûi-chhiûⁿ; tháng-chhiûⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 牆壁, 城牆, 圍牆; 桶牆.

comment: chhiûⁿ-piah, siâⁿ-chhiûⁿ, ûi-chhiûⁿ; tháng-chhiûⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 牆壁, 城牆, 圍牆; 桶牆.

comment: chhiûⁿ-bî-hoe, chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán hoe ê miâ.

hanlo_comment: 中指 ê 中節, 十分 長, 短短, 量米, 法度.

comment: chhûn liông-sim, bô chhûn tsú-kò͘; bô chhûn-āu.
hanlo_comment: 存 良心, 無 存 主顧; 無 存後.

comment: saⁿ-chhûn, tsun-chhûn, chhûn-kèng, chhûn-tōa-sòe.
hanlo_comment: 相存, 尊存, 存敬, 存大細.

comment: chhūn chi̍t-ē, chiū-sī ēng tsńg-thâu-á lâi liàm.
hanlo_comment: chhūn 一下, 就是 用 指頭á 來 捻.

comment: chhó-bo̍k chhut-gê ê khoán-sit; chhut-khì gōa-bīn; tô-tsáu; siⁿ-chhut.
hanlo_comment: 草木 出芽 ê 款式; 出去 外面; 逃走; 生出.

comment: chhut-thâu, chi̍t-chhut hì, hì-chhut, tiah-chhut, khó͘-chhut.
hanlo_comment: 齣頭, 一齣 戲, 戲齣, 摘齣, 苦齣.

comment: tang-e-chhài, chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán chhài ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 茼萵菜, 就是 一款 菜 ê 名.

comment: e-chhài, chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán chháu ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 蒿菜, 就是 一款 草 ê 名.

comment: e-á, hûi-e, tê-e, tīm-e, e-kòa, tâng-e, siⁿ-e.
hanlo_comment: 鍋á, 瓷鍋, 茶鍋, 燉鍋, 鍋蓋, 銅鍋, 鉎鍋.

comment: e-lê, e-e lê-lê, chiū-sī gín-á lô-so kiáu-jiáu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 鍋螺, 鍋鍋 螺螺, 就是 gín-á 囉嗦 攪擾 ê 意思.

comment: e-hoan, ok kah ná e-hoan ni̍h.
hanlo_comment: 倭番, 惡 到 若 倭番 裡.

comment: e-lah, chiū-sī saⁿ-kap chhut-la̍t ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: e-lah, 就是 相合 出力 ê 聲.

comment: é-káu, é-siaⁿ, khàu kàu é-siaⁿ, gûn-siaⁿ é-é.
hanlo_comment: 啞口, 啞聲, 哭 到 啞聲, 銀聲 啞啞.

comment: é-é, é-é m̄-thang háu, chiū-sī kìm-chí i m̄-thang háu.
hanlo_comment: 啞啞, 啞啞 m̄-thang 吼, 就是 禁止 伊 m̄-thang 吼.

comment: jī-bú tùi (丿Phiat) chhut, thoa ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 字母 對 (丿Phiat) 出, 拖 ê 意思.

comment: saⁿ-á-ku, lō͘-bé, sè-hē; āu-tāi; khoe-kah; hō͘-è.
hanlo_comment: 衫á裾, 路尾, 世系; 後代; 盔甲; 後裔.

comment: ín-chhōa; thoa; the̍h-khì.
hanlo_comment: 引chhōa; 拖; the̍h起.

comment: saⁿ-á-ku, sè-hē, lō͘-bé, āu-tāi, khoe-kah; hō͘-è=裔
hanlo_comment: 衫á裾, 世系, 路尾, 後代, 盔甲; 後裔=裔

comment: chiū-sī chè-hiàn ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 祭獻 ê 意思.

comment: tsóa ê bé-oaⁿ, lâng ēng hé lâi sio hō͘ sí-lâng ê lé-sò͘.
hanlo_comment: 紙 ê 馬鞍, 人 用 火 來 燒 hō͘ 死人 ê 禮數.

comment: thoa; ín-chhōa, the̍h-khì.
hanlo_comment: 拖; 引chhōa, the̍h起.

comment: tn̂g-tn̂g ê tsûn-chiúⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 長長 ê 船槳 ê 意思.

comment: saⁿ-tn̂g ê khoán-sit, tn̂g ê phē-toaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 衫長 ê 款式, 長 ê 被單.

comment: chiū-sī tiū-á ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 稻á ê 名.

comment: chiū-sī tsōe-tsōe oē; iā-sī hoaⁿ-hí ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 濟濟 話; 也是 歡喜 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī tsōe-tsōe oē; iā-sī hoaⁿ-hí ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 濟濟 話; 也是 歡喜 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī kóng-oē tsōe-tsōe ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 講話 濟濟 ê 意思.

comment: kiⁿ-si; ká-tiâu; chhui-ām, tiàu-soh, tiàu-sí.
hanlo_comment: 經絲; 絞牢; 催頷, 吊索, 吊死.

comment: chiáu-miâ, hōng ê khoán-sit; jia-tsa̍h, bia̍t-bô, ìm-ńg; chiáu-bé tōa-pha.
hanlo_comment: 鳥名, 鳳 ê 款式; 遮閘, 滅無, 蔭影; 鳥尾 大葩.

comment: chiū-sī thô͘-soa, tîn-ai ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 土砂, 塵埃 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī tio̍h-bôa kan-khó͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 tio̍h磨 艱苦 ê 意思.

comment: chháu ê miâ, chháu bō͘-sēng ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 草 ê 名, 草 茂盛 ê 款式.

comment: o͘ ê chhâ, o͘-o͘ ê ì-sù; koāiⁿ-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 烏 ê 柴, 烏烏 ê 意思; 縣名.

comment: tóe keng-chìⁿ ê khì-kū, chìⁿ-tōe; kán-séng siá tsòe chit-jī 醫 jī.
hanlo_comment: 貯 弓箭 ê 器具, 箭袋; 簡省 寫 做 chit字 醫 字.

comment: chhiú teh pài, chhiú kiong-kèng ip-lé kàu tōe; ip-lé ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 手 teh 拜, 手 恭敬 揖禮 到 地; 揖禮 ê 意思.

comment: ba̍k-chiu phòa-pīⁿ, chhin-chhiūⁿ ū hûn jia; khí-è, chhiūⁿ-è.
hanlo_comment: 目睭 破病, 親像 有 雲 遮; 起翳, 上翳.

comment: hō͘ chìⁿ siā-sí; tsâu-bia̍t; tsoa̍t-tn̄g; chīn-thâu; sí; phak-teh.
hanlo_comment: hō͘ 箭 射死; 剿滅; 絕斷; 盡頭; 死; 覆teh.

comment: o͘-im chiū khí-hong; jia-tsa̍h ji̍t ê kng bô-bêng.
hanlo_comment: 烏陰 就 起風; 遮閘 日 ê 光 無明.

comment: chhàu-sng ê pn̄g; pn̄g siuⁿ-tâm, chhàu-bī.
hanlo_comment: 臭酸 ê 飯; 飯 siuⁿ澹, 臭味.

comment: thiⁿ o͘-im; thô͘-hún; o͘-àm ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 天 烏陰; 土粉; 烏暗 ê 意思.

comment: ún-tsún, thang; lín-ê; àn-ni, nā-sī.
hanlo_comment: 允准, 通; lín ê; 按呢, 若是.

comment: chiū-sī sūn-thàn ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 順趁 ê 意思.

comment: tsúi ê khoán-sit; éng tōa ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 水 ê 款式; 湧 大 ê 意思.

comment: chhiah chhiⁿ o͘ ê sek; pau to-kek ê saⁿ; hu-jī, jī-kù thâu, nā-sī.
hanlo_comment: 赤 青 烏 ê 色; 包 刀戟 ê 衫; 虛字, 字句 頭, 若是.

comment: sì-sòaⁿ, lī-khui khì; ûn-ûn teh pe; hoat-chhut; tsōe-tsōe; tsúi-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 四散, 離開 去; 勻勻 teh 飛; 發出; 濟濟; 水名.

comment: sì-sòaⁿ, lī-khui khì; ûn-ûn teh pe; hoat-chhut; tsōe-tsōe; tsúi-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 四散, 離開 去; 勻勻 teh 飛; 發出; 濟濟; 水名.

comment: tn̂g ê phē, tn̂g-saⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 長 ê 被, 長衫 ê 款式.

comment: è-tio̍h lâng; è lâ-sâm; è-ò͘ thiⁿ-tōe, è-ò͘ sîn-bêng.
hanlo_comment: 穢著 人; 穢 lâ-sâm; 穢惡 天地, 穢惡 神明.

comment: kiông-béng ê oē; khoa-kháu; kóaⁿ-kín kóng ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 強猛 ê 話; 誇口; 趕緊 講 ê 款式.

comment: ê-hng, kin-ê-hng, ê-hng-àm, ê-po͘.
hanlo_comment: ê昏, 今ê昏, ê昏暗, ê晡.

comment: góa-ê, i-ê, lâng ê kha; hó-ê, kim-ê, hit-ê, chit-ê.
hanlo_comment: 我ê, 伊ê, 人 ê 腳; 好ê, 金ê, hit-ê, chit-ê.

comment: góa-ê, i-ê, lâng ê kha; hó-ê, kim-ê, hit-ê, chit-ê.
hanlo_comment: 我ê, 伊ê, 人 ê 腳; 好ê, 金ê, hit-ê, chit-ê.

comment: góa-ê, i-ê, lâng ê kha; hó-ê, kim-ê, hit-ê, chit-ê.
hanlo_comment: 我ê, 伊ê, 人 ê 腳; 好ê, 金ê, hit-ê, chit-ê.

comment: téng-ē, téng-ē-ji̍t, thiⁿ-ē, hái-ē, ba̍k-ē, chhiú-ē, hó-ē, pháiⁿ-ē.
hanlo_comment: 頂下, 頂下日, 天下, 海下, 目下, 手下, 好下, pháiⁿ下.

comment: Ē-mn̂g, só͘-tsāi ê miâ; Ē-mn̂g soaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 廈門, 所在 ê 名; 廈門 山.

comment: tsai-ē, ē-kàu, jiá-ē, khí-ē, gín-á khí tōa-lâng ē.
hanlo_comment: 災禍, 禍到, 惹禍, 起禍, gín-á 起 大人 禍.

comment: tsai-ē, ē-kàu, jiá-ē, khí-ē, gín-á khí tōa-lâng ē.
hanlo_comment: 災厄, 厄到, 惹厄, 起厄, gín-á 起 大人 厄.

comment: phài-ē, sio̍k tah-lo̍h chi̍t-ê phài-ē; sī sio̍k sím-mi̍h phài ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 派下, 屬 tah-lo̍h 一個 派下; 是 屬 甚物 派 ê 意思.

comment: eⁿ-á, ū-eⁿ-á, tsa-bó͘ eⁿ-á.
hanlo_comment: 嬰á, 有嬰á, tsa-bó͘ 嬰á.

comment: eⁿ-eⁿ-háu, chiū-sī teh háu ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 嚶嚶吼, 就是 teh 吼 ê 聲.

comment: phah-eh, phah chhiah-sng-eh; eh-sng, eh-tsúi, kho͘-eh.
hanlo_comment: phah 噫, phah 刺酸噫; 噫酸, 噫水, 呼噫.

comment: phah-eh, phah chhiah-sng-eh; eh-sng, eh-tsúi, kho͘-eh.
hanlo_comment: phah 呃, phah 刺酸呃; 呃酸, 呃水, 呼呃.

comment: tsai-eh, khó͘-eh, eh-ūn, ū eh-ūn, tsôa-siong hó͘-eh thiⁿ-tōe sò͘.
hanlo_comment: 災厄, 苦厄, 厄運, 有 厄運, 蛇傷 虎厄 天地 數.

comment: kāu-e̍h, ai-e̍h, àu-e̍h; chiū-sī ut-tsut ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 厚鬱, 哀鬱, 燠鬱; 就是 鬱卒 ê 意思.

comment: khng-e̍h, chiū-sī oe-chhek ê chhek-sap, cheng-bí teh ēng-ê.
hanlo_comment: 糠e̍h, 就是 挨粟 ê 粟屑, 舂米 teh 用的.

comment: e̍hⁿ-e̍hⁿ-kiò, chiū-sī gín-á khùn-chhíⁿ ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: e̍hⁿ-e̍hⁿ 叫, 就是 gín-á 睏醒 ê 聲.

comment: chhiong-sēng; chìn-chêng; ke-thiⁿ, khah-tsōe; it-hoat, lī-ek.
hanlo_comment: 充盛; 進前; 加添, khah濟; 益發, 利益.

comment: khì-kū ê tsúi lâu-chhut; tīⁿ, móa, ek-chhut, pò-iông, chēng-chēng, sì-sòaⁿ, phêng-tô-chí.
hanlo_comment: 器具 ê 水 流出; 滇, 滿, 溢出, 播揚, 靜靜, 四散, 秤鉈子.

comment: chiū-sī heng-khám-kut ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 胸坎骨 ê 意思.

comment: that-ba̍t, gûi-hiám, kài-hān, khòa-gāi, tsó͘-gāi; pek-kín.
hanlo_comment: 窒密, 危險, 界限, khòa礙, 阻礙; 逼緊.

comment: siàu-liām; kì-tit tāi-chì; ioh, siūⁿ; it-tio̍h, it-tit.
hanlo_comment: 數念; 記得 tāi-chì; 臆, 想; 憶tio̍h, 憶得.

comment: chhiú-hōaⁿ, at, ji̍h, iok-sok, tī-lí; un-khut, sún-hoāi, tńg-oē ê jī.
hanlo_comment: 手按, at, 揤, 約束, 治理; 冤屈, 損壞, 轉話 ê 字.

comment: tōa-chiah ti, ū tōa-la̍t ê ti.
hanlo_comment: 大隻 豬, 有 大力 ê 豬.

comment: kim-tiâu jī-tsa̍p niú tāng, iā ū kóng saⁿ-tsa̍p, sì-tsa̍p.
hanlo_comment: 金條 二十 兩 重, 也 有 講 三十, 四十.

comment: chiū-sī lo̍k chia̍h-chháu liáu-āu koh thò͘-chhut lâi pō͘, lo̍k hoan-chháu.
hanlo_comment: 就是 鹿 食草 了後 koh 吐出 來 哺, 鹿 翻草.

comment: khòa tī gû-bé ām-kún téng ê hoâiⁿ-chhâ, gû-taⁿ, kha-chhia.
hanlo_comment: khòa tī 牛馬 頷頸 頂 ê 橫柴, 牛擔, 腳車.

comment: chhiò ê khoán-sit, chhiò ê siaⁿ; sí liáu-āu chheng-ho͘ ê jī.
hanlo_comment: 笑 ê 款式, 笑 ê 聲; 死 了後 稱呼 ê 字.

comment: heng-khám ê bah; phah-sǹg, siūⁿ; at-chí; móa, tiùⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 胸坎 ê 肉; phah 算, 想; 遏止; 滿, 漲.

comment: sò͘-jī, tsa̍p-bān tsòe chi̍t ek; tsōe-tsōe; phah-sǹg; kiong-kip; hioh, an-jiân.
hanlo_comment: 數字, 十萬 做 一 億; 濟濟; phah 算; 供給; 歇, 安然.

comment: lia̍h, khîⁿ, jio̍k, kia̍h, chhiú-liām, tùn-chhiú; lā ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 掠, 鉗, 搦, 攑, 手捻, 頓手; 抐 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī la̍p oê-tóe ê ì-sù; si-sòaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 納 鞋底 ê 意思; 絲線.

comment: chi̍t-khoán jūn-jūn ê chhâ, oē tsòe-tit keng kap chìⁿ ê lō͘-ēng.
hanlo_comment: 一款 韌韌 ê 柴, 會 做得 弓 kap 箭 ê 路用.

comment: chiū-sī iau ê ì-sù; iau ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 就是 iau ê 意思; iau ê 款式.

comment: tsûn-thâu tsòe ek-chiáu ê thâu, tsúi-chiáu ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 船頭 做 鷁鳥 ê 頭, 水鳥 ê 名.

comment: tsúi-chiáu, khoán-sit chhin-chhiūⁿ pe̍h-lêng-si, tsóng-sī khah tōa-chiah.
hanlo_comment: 水鳥, 款式 親像 白鴒鷥, 總是 khah 大隻.

comment: it-hoat, chhiong-sēng, ke-thiⁿ, khah-tsōe, lī-ek=chit-jī 益 jī.
hanlo_comment: 益發, 充盛, 加添, khah濟, 利益=chit字 益 字.

comment: iok-sok, tī-lí; at-chí, siūⁿ, sim-lāi só͘ hoat-chhut ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 約束, 治理; 遏止, 想, 心內 所 發出 ê 意思.

comment: kài-hān, that-ba̍t, lō͘-oe̍h, pháiⁿ-kiâⁿ, kap chit-jī 阨 jī sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 界限, 窒密, 路狹, pháiⁿ行, kap chit字 阨 字 相像.

comment: nâ-âu kek; ian-âu; phah-eh; ut-khì; chhiò ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 嚨喉 嗝; 咽喉; phah 呃; 鬱氣; 笑 ê 聲.

comment: koan-ài ê sió-mn̂g; oe̍h-oe̍h ê ì-sù; khùn-khó͘.
hanlo_comment: 關隘 ê 小門; 狹狹 ê 意思; 困苦.

comment: khòa tī gû á-sī bé ām-kún ê hoâiⁿ-chhâ; gû-taⁿ; kha-chhia.
hanlo_comment: khòa tī 牛 抑是 馬 頷頸 ê 橫柴; 牛擔; kha車.

comment: koe á-sī chiáu teh háu ê siaⁿ; ek chhut-lâi; phah-eh.
hanlo_comment: 雞 抑是 鳥 teh 吼 ê 聲; 溢 出來; phah 噎.

comment: chhiú chhi̍h, ji̍h, liām, at ê ì-sù; gû-taⁿ, kha-chhia.
hanlo_comment: 手 chhi̍h, 揤, 捻, at ê 意思; 牛擔, 腳車.

comment: chhiú chhi̍h, ji̍h, liām, at ê ì-sù; gû-taⁿ, kha-chhia.
hanlo_comment: 手 chhi̍h, ji̍h, 捻, 遏 ê 意思; 牛擔, kha車.

comment: chiáu háu ê siaⁿ; eh-ūn, phah-eh; kho͘-eh.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 吼 ê 聲; 厄運, phah 呃; 呼呃.

comment: kài-hān, that-ba̍t, pháiⁿ-kiâⁿ, lō͘-oe̍h, kan-khó͘, phí-lō͘.
hanlo_comment: 界限, 窒密, pháiⁿ行, 路狹, 艱苦, 鄙陋.

comment: gûi-hiám, tsai-ē, khùn-khó͘, oe̍h-oe̍h, khoeh-khoeh, ut-khì; pek-chhiat.
hanlo_comment: 危險, 災禍, 困苦, 狹狹, khoeh-khoeh, 鬱氣; 迫切.

comment: é-káu; kóng-oē bōe bêng, bōe-hiáu kóng-oē ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 啞口; 講話 bōe 明, bōe曉 講話 ê 意思.

comment: tsōe-tsōe lâng phòa-pīⁿ, pīⁿ ê khì teh hoat teh-kiâⁿ; un-e̍k, e̍k-chèng.
hanlo_comment: 濟濟 人 破病, 病 ê 氣 teh 發 teh行; 瘟疫, 疫症.

comment: kùi-mi̍h ê piah-khi̍t; chìⁿ pa̍k sòaⁿ; siā-chìⁿ; chiáu hioh ê chhâ.
hanlo_comment: 掛物 ê 壁杙; 箭 縛 線; 射箭; 鳥 歇 ê 柴.

comment: lóng-tsóng; lēng-gōa; koh-tsài; tsóng-sī, á-sī, ia̍h-sī.
hanlo_comment: lóng總; 另外; koh再; 總是, 抑是, 亦是.

comment: kái-e̍k, chiū-sī me̍h bān kiâⁿ; si̍t-e̍k, chiū-sī gâu chia̍h ê pīⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 改e̍k, 就是 脈 慢行; 食e̍k, 就是 gâu 食 ê 病.

comment: chiū-sī ìn-lâng ê oē ê ì-sù.

comment: âu-kiò ê siaⁿ, tōa-siaⁿ teh kiò.

comment: hûn-bōng, tâi sin-si, bâi-tsòng ê só͘-tsāi.

comment: hó ê chio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ ge̍k, ge̍k kng-kng, kim-kim, kng-bêng.

comment: tsúi se̍h-lâi, sòe-sòe tiâu ê kang ê tsúi.
hanlo_comment: 水 se̍h來, 細細 條 ê 江 ê 水.

comment: soaⁿ chhim-chhim ê khoán-sit; soaⁿ koâiⁿ ê ì-sù.

comment: soaⁿ-chhim ê khoán-sit; chio̍h saⁿ-bôa ê siaⁿ, soaⁿ-koâiⁿ ê khoán-sit.

comment: koâiⁿ-soaⁿ, koâiⁿ; tōa, ui-hong.

comment: êng-êng, thàn-êng, êng-sî; bô-êng-kang; siuⁿ-êng; êng-lâng, êng-oē.
hanlo_comment: 閒閒, 趁閒, 閒時; 無閒工; 傷閒; 閒人, 閒話.

comment: hoaⁿ-hí o-ló ê siaⁿ, khan tn̂g-siaⁿ, gîm-si, chhiùⁿ-koa.
hanlo_comment: 歡喜 o-ló ê 聲, 牽 長聲, 吟詩, 唱歌.

comment: bih kiâⁿ tī tsúi-tóe, chhàng-bī; tiâm-bī lâi thit-thô.

hanlo_comment: 酒醉, 酒亂; 小人人 用 食酒 做 歡喜.

comment: chè-hiàn ê miâ; chè san-chhoan ê sîn, lâi bián-tit khòng-hān un-e̍k.
hanlo_comment: 祭獻 ê 名; 祭 山川 ê 神, 來 免得 亢旱 瘟疫.

comment: thâu-mn̂g loān-loān jû-jû ê khoán-sit.

comment: phòa-pīⁿ put-chí siong-tiōng; nâ-âu ê pīⁿ.

comment: khui-chhùi ê khoán-sit, tōa-khang.

comment: chhia-lûn piⁿ ê chhâ ê ì-sù.

comment: mn̂g koaiⁿ-teh; khui-li̍h; khang-hi ê ì-sù.

comment: chhùi-khí bô-pîⁿ, bô-chiàⁿ, tò-ha̍p khí; m̄-thiaⁿ lâng ê oē.
hanlo_comment: 嘴齒 無平, 無正, 倒合 齒; m̄聽 人 ê 話.

comment: tōa-chhù, tōa-thiaⁿ, tòa ê só͘-tsāi; bô tsôe-tsáⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 大厝, 大廳, tòa ê 所在; 無 齊斬 ê 意思.

comment: bô sì-chiàⁿ ê khoán-sit; la̍k, chhi̍h, khiú, khîⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 無 四正 ê 款式; 搙, chhi̍h, 揪, 鉗 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī jīn; kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ hâng-ho̍k ê khoán-sit.

comment: saⁿ ngiâ-chih; liāu-lí hō͘ i pîⁿ.

comment: chio̍h-lún; súi ê chio̍h; kng-kng ê chio̍h.

comment: ngiâ-chih, kî-koài, thó͘-khùi, giâu-gî, gî-gā.
hanlo_comment: 迎接, 奇怪, 吐氣, 僥疑, 疑訝.

comment: tōa ê só͘-tsāi, tōa-chhù, tōa-thiaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 大 ê 所在, 大厝, 大廳.

comment: chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán ê sòe-chiah ti ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 一款 ê 細隻 豬 ê 名.

comment: chhi-gâi, ham-bān bô ki-khiàu ê ì-sù.

comment: soaⁿ-piⁿ, tsúi-piⁿ; ba̍k-chiu-piⁿ, siū-khì khòaⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 山邊, 水邊; 目睭邊, 受氣 看 ê 款式.

comment: soaⁿ koâiⁿ-kiā, soaⁿ-piⁿ; tsúi-piⁿ pông-hōaⁿ, tsoh-koâiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 山 懸崎, 山邊; 水邊 旁岸, 作懸.

comment: chio̍h bô sì-chiàⁿ ê khoán-sit, soaⁿ-piⁿ, kap {崖Gâi} sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 石 無 四正 ê 款式, 山邊, kap {崖Gâi} 相像.

comment: tsúi-khín, tsúi-kîⁿ, piⁿ-thâu, kiông-chīn.
hanlo_comment: 水khín, 水墘, 邊頭, 窮盡.

comment: chiū-sī tí-tng, ûi-keh; tsó͘-chí ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 抵當, 圍隔; 阻止 ê 意思.

comment: sim-sîn phòa-pīⁿ, chhi-gâi; pîn-tōaⁿ ê mâu-pēng; pīⁿ liáu gōng.
hanlo_comment: 心神 破病, 癡gâi; 貧惰 ê 毛病; 病 了 戇.

comment: káu ài khòe-mi̍h; káu sio-kā.
hanlo_comment: 狗 愛 齧物; 狗 相咬.

comment: káu ài khòe-mi̍h; káu sio-kā.
hanlo_comment: 狗 愛 齧物; 狗 相咬.

comment: ba̍k-chiu kia̍h-khí; ba̍k-chiu piⁿ; oàn-hūn teh khòaⁿ, ba̍k-chiu gîn.
hanlo_comment: 目睭 攑起; 目睭 邊; 怨恨 teh 看, 目睭 凝.

comment: káu-á bōe hiáu hun-piat; gōng, sit-chì; pháiⁿ, chhi-gâi.
hanlo_comment: 狗á bōe 曉 分別; 戇, 失志; pháiⁿ, 癡gâi.

comment: khiû-khiām, liám-séng, kiâm-siap, tàng-sng.
hanlo_comment: khiû儉, 斂省, 鹹澀, 凍霜.

comment: chiū-sī sng-seh ê pe̍h-sek; pe̍h-pe̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 霜雪 ê 白色; 白白 ê 意思.

comment: sit-chì ê khoán-sit, gōng, pháiⁿ, chhi-gâi.
hanlo_comment: 失志 ê 款式, 戇, pháiⁿ, 癡gâi.

comment: liâm-le̍k-to, bôa-lāi, chhiat-tn̄g, chhiat-chhiat, kám-tōng, khûn-kín.
hanlo_comment: 鐮礪刀, 磨利, 切斷, 切切, 感動, 勤謹.

comment: khòng-kū, tsó͘-tòng, nôa-tsa̍h, kha̍p-tio̍h, siong-tio̍h, tī-lí, khòa-gāi.
hanlo_comment: 抗拒, 阻擋, 攔閘, 磕tio̍h, 傷tio̍h, 治理, khòa礙.

comment: khòng-kū, tsó͘-tòng, nôa-tsa̍h, kha̍p-tio̍h, siong-tio̍h, tī-lí, khòa-gāi.
hanlo_comment: 抗拒, 阻擋, 攔閘, 磕tio̍h, 傷tio̍h, 治理, khòa礙.

comment: thô chhek-chiáu-á, sio̍k-bú ê; kî-khá ê hū-jîn-lâng.
hanlo_comment: 桃 粟鳥á, 屬 母 ê; 奇巧 ê 婦人人.

comment: chhiū oan-khiau tàm-tàm bô thóng-chhut; chhiū bô koâiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 樹 彎曲 tàm-tàm 無 thóng出; 樹 無 懸.

comment: koaiⁿ-mn̂g, tsó͘-chí; ū kan-gāi; thòe chiū gûi-hiám, chìn-chêng sī soaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 關門, 阻止; 有 干礙; 退 就 危險, 進前 是 山.

comment: koah-chháu; tī-lí; hó tsâi-chêng ê chheng-ho͘.
hanlo_comment: 割草; 治理; 好 才情 ê 稱呼.

comment: chháu-miâ; súi, hó, tī-lí; le̍k-kè; saⁿ-khòaⁿ; soah, iúⁿ-chhī, pò-tap; hiāⁿ, hé-hiāⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 草名; 媠, 好, 治理; 歷過; 相看; soah, 養飼, 報答; 艾, 火艾.

comment: kán-séng siá kap 嶽 jī sio-siāng; ga̍k-hū, ga̍k-bú.
hanlo_comment: 簡省 寫 kap 嶽 字 相像; 岳父, 岳母.

comment: koâiⁿ ê soaⁿ-chiam, tn̂g ê kak; koâiⁿ, tsun-kùi; phêng-khó͘, soaⁿ-ga̍k, tang-ga̍k.
hanlo_comment: 懸 ê 山尖, 長 ê 角; 懸, 尊貴; 評苦, 山岳, 東嶽.

comment: kî-pôaⁿ tiong-kan ê kî-jí.
hanlo_comment: 棋盤 中間 ê 棋子.

comment: hó tiāu-thâu ê chiáu, chhin-chhiūⁿ hōng ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 好 兆頭 ê 鳥, 親像 鳳 ê 款式.

comment: pat-im ê tsóng-miâ, ga̍k-khì, ga̍k-tūi, tsok-ga̍k, Hàn-ga̍k, Se-ga̍k.
hanlo_comment: 八音 ê 總名, 樂器, 樂隊, 作樂, 漢樂, 西樂.

comment: bô tì-hūi; bōe ka-kī an-ún; chīn-thâu chiū khì-sak; jiâu-jū.
hanlo_comment: 無 智慧; bōe 家己 安穩; 盡頭 就 棄捒; 饒裕.

comment: khùn ê sî, chhoán-khùi chhut-siaⁿ teh hôaⁿ ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 睏 ê 時, 喘氣 出聲 teh 鼾 ê 聲.

comment: chiū-sī súi ê ge̍k ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 媠 ê 玉 ê 意思.

comment: bô tì-hūi; hì-lāng ê oē, saⁿ-kap kóng-oē.
hanlo_comment: 無 智慧; 戲弄 ê 話, 相合 講話.

comment: soaⁿ-iûⁿ nā-sī tōa-chiah ê, kak sòe-sòe.
hanlo_comment: 山羊 若是 大隻 ê, 角 細細.

comment: koâiⁿ-kiā ê soaⁿ, chio̍h-khang; chio̍h-khut; koâiⁿ, tōa, ū khùi-la̍t.

comment: khùn ê sî chhut-siaⁿ, khùn teh kóng-oē, hâm-bîn.

comment: thâu-chêng, tiāⁿ-tio̍h, mi̍h-kiāⁿ, eng-kai, bô-soah, kàu-gia̍h, gia̍h-siàu, thâu-hia̍h.
hanlo_comment: 頭前, 定tio̍h, 物件, 應該, 無soah, 夠額, 額數, 頭額.

comment: soaⁿ koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 山 懸懸 ê 款式.

comment: tē-á, chiū-sī hiuⁿ-tē ê ì-sù.

comment: chiáu-miâ, khoán-sit chhin-chhiūⁿ thī-koe; tsa̍p-sek ê chiáu.

comment: chiū-sī pōe-biū bô sūn-thàn ê ì-sù, kap chit-jī 逆 sio-siāng.

comment: chiū-sī áu-thò͘, áu-ge̍k, khì-ge̍k ê ì-sù.

comment: gín-á put-chí léng-lī; thong-ta̍t, tek-hēng koâiⁿ.

comment: chiū-sī giâ teh háu, gô teh háu ê siaⁿ.

comment: chiū-sī giâ teh háu, gô teh háu ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 鵝 teh 吼, 鵝 teh 吼 ê 聲.

comment: sio-mē ê oē; sī-tōa hoan-hù sī-sòe giâm-hat ê oē.

comment: pó-ge̍k, ké-ge̍k, chhài-ge̍k; so͘-ge̍k, âng-ge̍k, ge̍k-a̍h.

comment: kaⁿ-ge̍k, ge̍k-koaⁿ, lô-ge̍k, chē-ge̍k; tē-ge̍k, lo̍h tē-ge̍k, phah tē-ge̍k.

comment: keng-thián hō͘-i khui; keng-chìⁿ, tn̂g-tn̂g ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 弓展 hō͘伊 開; 弓箭, 長長 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī bô-bah ê ì-sù; sán-sòe ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 就是 無肉 ê 意思; 瘦細 ê 款式.

comment: giàn-giàn, sán-giàn; ài-giàn, kè-giàn, giàn-hun, giàn-tsa-bó͘, giàn-kiáu.
hanlo_comment: 癮癮, 瘦癮; 曖癮, 過癮, 癮薰, 癮tsa-bó͘, 癮徼.

comment: chhùi kóng-oē, kóng; giân-gâi, giân-tâm.
hanlo_comment: 嘴 講話, 講; 言騃, 言談.

comment: kńg tn̂g chi̍t-chio̍h sì-chhùn; tōa-ki ê tōng-siau, tōng-siau ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 管 長 一尺 四吋; 大枝 ê 洞簫, 洞簫 ê 聲.

comment: thiám-bī, súi, chheng-siù, hó, hó-khòaⁿ, gâu.
hanlo_comment: 諂媚, 媠, 清秀, 好, 好看, gâu.

comment: thiám-bī, súi, chheng-siù, hó, hó-khòaⁿ, gâu.
hanlo_comment: 諂媚, 媠, 清秀, 好, 好看, gâu.

comment: soaⁿ ê khoán-sit, chiū-sī kap tha̍k Gián sio-siāng ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 山 ê 款式, 就是 kap 讀 Gián 相像 意思.

comment: iá-káu chhin-chhiūⁿ hô͘-lî; kap tha̍k Gián sio-siāng ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 野狗 親像 狐狸; kap 讀 Gián 相像 意思.

comment: iá-káu chhin-chhiūⁿ hô͘-lî; kap tha̍k Gián sio-siāng ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 野狗 親像 狐狸; kap 讀 Gián 相像 意思.

comment: kng-ku̍t ê chio̍h, hīⁿ-chio̍h (iā ū tha̍k Giân).
hanlo_comment: 光滑 ê 石, 硯石 (也 有 讀 Giân).

comment: gâu chia̍h-chiú, tsùi-tsùi; tsùi giān-giān.
hanlo_comment: gâu 食酒, 醉醉; 醉 giān-giān.

comment: giang-á, sai-kong-giang, gin-gong-giang, gin-giang.
hanlo_comment: 鈃á, 司公鈃, gin-gong鈃, gin-giang.

comment: giang-á, sai-kong-giang, gin-gong-giang, gin-giang.
hanlo_comment: 鈃á, 司公鈃, gin-gong鈃, gin-giang.

comment: súi giang-giang, chiū-sī chin súi ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 媠 妍妍, 就是 真 媠 ê 意思.

comment: súi giang-giang, chiū-sī chin súi ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 媠 妍妍, 就是 真 媠 ê 意思.

comment: giàng-giàng, giàng-gê, chhùi-khí giàng-giàng.
hanlo_comment: 齴齴, 齴牙, 嘴齒 齴齴.

comment: khong-giâng, chiū-sī koâiⁿ-soaⁿ, soaⁿ-chiam ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 空giâng, 就是 懸山, 山尖 ê 款式.

comment: tiàu-cheng ê îⁿ-á, ióng-tsòng, pún-hūn, thâu-lō͘, keng-kí, tāi-chì ki-gia̍p, kong-gia̍p.
hanlo_comment: 吊鐘 ê 楹á, 勇壯, 本份, 頭路, 經紀, tāi-chì 基業, 工業.

comment: chiū-sī ín-chhōa; thoa-chhia ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 引chhōa; 拖車 ê 意思.

comment: pâng, thīⁿ, pó͘-saⁿ; ēng-soh lâi pa̍k-ân ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 縫, 綻, 補衫; 用索 來 縛ân ê 意思.

comment: pâng, thīⁿ, pó͘-saⁿ; ēng-soh lâi pa̍k-ân ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 縫, 綻, 補衫; 用索 來 縛ân ê 意思.

comment: hong-gia̍p; gia̍p-miā, gia̍p-chè, chiū-sī pháiⁿ-miā ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 風孽; 孽命, 業債, 就是 pháiⁿ命 ê 意思.

comment: chhùi-khí ê phòa-pīⁿ, chiū-sī chiù-khí.
hanlo_comment: 嘴齒 ê 破病, 就是 蛀齒.

comment: chiong chhùi-khí lâi kā, khòe, chia̍h; gia̍t-tio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 將 嘴齒 來 咬, 齧, 食; 齧著.

comment: kā, khòe, gia̍t-mi̍h, hō͘ lí bōe giat-tit.
hanlo_comment: 咬, 齧, 齧物, hō͘ 你 bōe 齧得.

comment: gûi-hiám, tsōe-gia̍t, put-an, bô an-ún; hoat-tō͘.
hanlo_comment: 危險, 罪孽, 不安, 無 安穩; 法度.

comment: chi̍t-ki chhâ tèng tī tōe-ni̍h; chhòaⁿ-mn̂g ê mn̂g-khiā.
hanlo_comment: 一支 柴 釘 tī 地裡; 閂開 ê 門khiā.

comment: khòe, pō͘, ēng chhùi-khí kā, kā-gê; tông-hā; iā ū tha̍k Ngáu.
hanlo_comment: 齧, 哺, 用 嘴齒 咬, 咬牙; 同下; 也 有 讀 Ngáu.

comment: ēng chhùi-khí lâi kā-mi̍h, á-sī khòe, chia̍h.
hanlo_comment: 用 嘴齒 來 咬物, 抑是 齧, 食.

comment: bô an-ún; iô-tāng bô an-ún ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 無 安穩; 搖動 無 安穩 ê 款式.

comment: chìⁿ-pé ê tiong-sim, mn̂g-khū, hoat-tō͘, chīn-thâu; koaⁿ-miâ, àn-chhat-si.
hanlo_comment: 箭把 ê 中心, 門臼, 法度, 盡頭; 官名, 按察司.

comment: piⁿ-thâu ê mn̂g, mn̂g-lāi, mn̂g-khiā; hō͘-tēng koâiⁿ, tsó͘-chí ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 邊頭 ê 門, 門內, 門khiā; 戶碇 懸, 阻止 ê 意思.

comment: chhiū-tiong ê thâng, chhiū-chhàu, giat-á; piáⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 樹中 ê 蟲, 樹臭, 蠍á; 餅 ê 名.

comment: chia̍h, lim, kā; siū, tam-tng.
hanlo_comment: 食, lim, 咬; 受, 擔當.

comment: giat-á, giat-lá, giat-á-thâng, tsúi-giat-á.
hanlo_comment: 蠍á, 蠍lá, 蠍á蟲, 水蠍á.

comment: giat-kiàn, chiū-sī phah-kiû thit-thô ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: giat-kiàn, 就是 phah 球 𨑨迌 ê 意思.

comment: sù-chhut ê kiáⁿ, bô chèng-keng siⁿ ê; kiâⁿ-pháiⁿ ê koan-hē.
hanlo_comment: 庶出 ê kiáⁿ, 無 正經 生 ê; 行pháiⁿ ê 關係.

comment: tsōe-sio̍k, puh-íⁿ, chhiong-sēng, tsōe-gia̍t, tsok-gia̍t, iau-gia̍t.
hanlo_comment: 罪贖, puh-íⁿ, 充盛, 罪孽, 作孽, 妖孽.

comment: chhiū chhò-liáu koh-tsài hoat-íⁿ, puh-gê.
hanlo_comment: 樹 剉了 koh再 發íⁿ, puh芽.

comment: chhiū chhò-liáu koh-tsài hoat-íⁿ, puh-gê.
hanlo_comment: 樹 剉了 koh再 發íⁿ, puh芽.

comment: be̍h-hún, kàⁿ-bú, gō͘-kak hoat-gê.
hanlo_comment: 麥粉, 酵母, 五穀 發芽.

comment: chhiū-ba̍k ê kî-koài kiò-tsòe iau, thâng-thōa ê kî-koài tsòe gia̍t; iu-būn.
hanlo_comment: 樹木 ê 奇怪 叫做 妖, 蟲豸 ê 奇怪 做 孽; 憂悶.

comment: soaⁿ ê khoán-sit, kî-têng, chhī-lâu; koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 山 ê 款式, 旗亭, 市樓; 懸懸 ê 意思.

comment: hōaⁿ-koâiⁿ, soaⁿ ê khoán-sit, kî-têng, chhī-lâu; koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 岸懸, 山 ê 款式, 旗亭, 市樓; 懸懸 ê 意思.

comment: gī-lūn chē-kòa; phòaⁿ-toàn; kháu-keng, chiū-sī hun-sò͘ ê oē.
hanlo_comment: 議論 罪過; 判斷; 口供, 就是 分訴 ê 話.

comment: chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán be̍h ê miâ, gê-be̍h.
hanlo_comment: 就是 一款 麥 ê 名, 芽麥.

comment: lú-pī sòe-î ê tsóng-chheng; iau-gia̍t, kap chit-jī 𧕏 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 女婢 細姨 ê 總稱; 妖孽, kap chit字 𧕏 相像.

comment: bô só͘ thiaⁿ-kìⁿ; m̄-thiaⁿ-siū ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 無 所 聽見; m̄聽受 ê 意思.

comment: hō͘-tēng koâiⁿ; mn̂g-khiā, piⁿ-thâu ê mn̂g; mn̄g-lāi; tsó͘-chí ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 戶碇 懸; 門khiā, 邊頭 ê 門; 門內; 阻止 ê 意思.

comment: tio̍h chìⁿ-pé ê tiong-sim, mn̂g-khū, hoat-tō͘, chin-thâu; koaⁿ-miâ, àn-chhat-si.
hanlo_comment: 著 箭把 ê 中心, 門臼, 法度, 蓁頭; 官名, 按察司.

comment: phòa-àng; ta-sò; phòa-li̍h, li̍h-khui ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 破齆; 乾燥; 破裂, 裂開 ê 意思.

comment: koah-phīⁿ, koah, koah-tn̄g ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 食, lim, 咬; 受, 擔當.

comment: chia̍h, lim, kā; siū, tam-tng.
hanlo_comment: 食, lim, 咬; 受, 擔當.

comment: kim ê lūi, khòng-bu̍t, hòa-ha̍k goân-chit ê chi̍t-hāng, sek pe̍k ná gûn, bô khoài siⁿ-sian.
hanlo_comment: 金 ê 類, 礦物, 化學 原質 ê 一項, 色 白 若 銀, 無 快 生鉎.

comment: chiū-sī kiò ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 叫 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī siah, phe ê ì-sù; siah-mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 就是 削, 批 ê 意思; 削物.

comment: koâiⁿ, hn̄g; hó tek-hēng; kó͘-tsá Hông-tè ê miâ, Giâu-sùn.
hanlo_comment: 懸, 遠; 好 德行; 古早 皇帝 ê 名, 堯舜.

comment: soaⁿ koâiⁿ ê khoán-sit, koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ; Thài-san ê koâiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 山 懸 ê 款式, 懸懸; 泰山 ê 懸.

comment: soaⁿ koâiⁿ ê khoán-sit, koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ; Thài-san ê koâiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 山 懸 ê 款式, 懸懸; 泰山 ê 懸.

comment: siù ê miâ, Tiō, Gūi lâng kóng gû-bé thiàu-bú ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 獸 ê 名, 趙, 魏 人 講 牛馬 跳舞 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī pak-tó͘ tiong chi̍t-khoán tóe ê thâng, oē siⁿ-khí pīⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 腹肚 中 一款 短 ê 蟲, 會 生起 病.

comment: chhâ-chháu, chháu-á, chhài-miâ, io̍h-miâ; khioh-chhâ, kiâu-hoe.
hanlo_comment: 柴草, 草á, 菜名, 藥名; 拾柴, 喬花.

comment: oé-oé, oé-lâng, chiū-sī sòe-hàn kē-kē ê lâng.
hanlo_comment: 矮矮, 矮人, 就是 細漢 低低 ê 人.

comment: giâu-gî, hoān-giâu, tâu-á-giâu.
hanlo_comment: 憢疑, 犯憢, 骰á僥.

comment: giauh-giauh-háu, chiū-sī thâng tín-tāng ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: giauh-giauh哮, 就是 蟲 振動 ê 聲.

comment: gia̍uh-gia̍uh-tāng, gia̍uh-lâi-gia̍uh-khì, gî-bú-gī-gia̍uh.
hanlo_comment: gia̍uh-gia̍uh動, gia̍uh來gia̍uh去, gî-bú-gī-gia̍uh

comment: gi̍h-gi̍h-chhoah, gi̍h-gi̍h-tsùn, chiū-sī chin-kiaⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: gi̍h-gi̍h-chhoah, gi̍h-gi̍h顫, 就是 真驚 ê 款式.

comment: sán-gi̍h-gi̍h; sòng-gi̍h-gi̍h, chiū-sī chīn-sàn ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 㾪gi̍h-gi̍h; sòng-gi̍h-gi̍h, 就是 盡散 ê 意思.

comment: thâu-khak tàm-tàm kóaⁿ-kín kiâⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 頭殼 tàm-tàm 趕緊 行 ê 意思.

comment: chit bûn-chhái, tsa̍p-sek, hó-khòaⁿ, súi, tiû-toān ê khoán, gím-tiû, gím-siù.
hanlo_comment: 織 紋綵, 雜色, 好看, 媠, 綢緞 ê 款, 錦綢, 錦繡.

comment: tsúi-gím; sàu-chiú-gím, chiū-sī teh pa̍k sàu-chiú ê mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 水錦; 掃帚錦, 就是 teh 縛 掃帚 ê 物.

comment: sim-lāi teh siūⁿ; chhiùⁿ-liām, khan-siaⁿ; chhan, thó͘-khùi.
hanlo_comment: 心內 teh 想; 唱唸, 牽聲; 孱, 吐氣.

comment: sim-lāi teh siūⁿ; chhiùⁿ-liām, khan-siaⁿ; chhan, thó͘-khùi.
hanlo_comment: 心內 teh 想; 唱唸, 牽聲; 孱, 吐氣.

comment: soaⁿ sòe koh-tsài koâiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 山 細 koh再 懸.

comment: saⁿ-kap tsòe-hé khiā ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 相合 做伙 khiā ê 意思.

comment: chìm-tsù; tsúi-miâ; liâu-tsúi, n̂g-tsúi, hî-tî, lo̍h-hō͘ tsōe ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 浸漬; 水名; 撩水, 黃水, 魚池, 落雨 濟 ê 款式.

comment: chiū-sī chi̍t-tsàn chi̍t-tsàn ê gîm.
hanlo_comment: 就是 一層 一層 ê gîm.

comment: chiū-sī hām-khiⁿ thô͘-hām ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 陷坑 土陷 ê 意思.

comment: soaⁿ ê lím-kîⁿ; koâiⁿ gûi-hiám ê só͘-tsāi, gîm, kiā-á-gîm, gîm-kîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 山 ê lím墘; 懸 危險 ê 所在, 崟, 崎á崟, 崟墘.

comment: koâiⁿ-soaⁿ, chhim-hiám, gîm-kîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 懸山, 深險, gîm墘.

comment: chiū-sī thâu-khak tín-tāng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 頭殼 振動 ê 意思.

comment: gīm-tiâu, gīm-ân, gīm-mi̍h, chiū-sī ēng-chhiú la̍k-ân ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: gīm-tiâu, gīm-ân, gīm物, 就是 用手 la̍k-ân ê 意思.

comment: gīm-tiâu, gīm-ân, gīm-mi̍h, chiū-sī ēng-chhiú la̍k-ân ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: gīm-tiâu, gīm-ân, gīm物, 就是 用手 la̍k-ân ê 意思.

comment: kap téng-bīn nn̄g-jī sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: kap 頂面 兩字 相像.

comment: gin-giang, gin-gong-giang, chiū-sī cheng-á ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: gin-giang, gin-gong鈃, 就是 鐘á ê 聲.

comment: chhùi tōa-khui ê khoán, chhiò ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 嘴 大開 ê 款, 笑 ê 款式.

comment: tōa chhùi-tûn ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 大 嘴唇 ê 款式.

comment: gín-á, gín-á-thûn, gín-á-sek, gín-á-lâng, tsa-bó͘ gín-á.
hanlo_comment: gín-á, gín-á豚, gín-á式, gín-á人, tsa-bó͘ gín-á.

comment: kiaⁿ-lâng, tsáiⁿ-le̍k, che-tái, kiaⁿ-lâng-phoh.
hanlo_comment: 驚人, 怎碌, 渣滓, 驚人粕.

comment: ba̍k-chiu gîn, ba̍k-chiu kek gîn-gîn, gîn-góa.
hanlo_comment: 目睭 睨, 目睭 激 睨睨, 睨我.

comment: ba̍k-chiu gîn, ba̍k-chiu kek gîn-gîn, gîn-góa.
hanlo_comment: 目睭 睨, 目睭 激 睨睨, 睨我.

comment: tsáiⁿ-le̍k, kiaⁿ-lâng, kap tha̍k Gìn sio-siāng ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 怎碌, 驚人, kap 讀 gìn 相像 意思.

comment: mn̄g, kín-sīn; koh-tsài; kam-goān, chhiò ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 問, 謹慎; koh再; 甘願, 笑 ê 款式.

comment: mn̄g, kín-sīn; koh-tsài; kam-goān, chhiò ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 問, 謹慎; koh再; 甘願, 笑 ê 款式.

comment: lâng siū-khì teh saⁿ-jióng ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 人 受氣 teh 相嚷 ê 聲.

comment: gīn-lâng, khòaⁿ-liáu chiū gīn; lâng-gīn, put-chí lâng-gīn; gīn-sîn.
hanlo_comment: 恨人, 看了 就 恨; 人恨, 不止 人恨; 恨神.

comment: giô-ê; giô-á, chiū-sī ū khak ê mi̍h, hún-giô.
hanlo_comment: 蟯ê; 蟯á, 就是 有 殼 ê 物, 粉蟯.

comment: giô-poe, chiū-sī tsûn ê chiúⁿ, tsòe pê ê lō͘-ēng.
hanlo_comment: 橈棓, 就是 船 ê 槳, 做 扒 ê 路用.

comment: ò-giô, ò-giô-chí, ò-giô-tàng, chiū-sī hō͘-lâng chia̍h chí chhùi-ta ê mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 薁蕘, 薁蕘子, 薁蕘凍, 就是 hō͘人 食 止 嘴乾 ê 物.

comment: lō͘-giō, chiū-sī chhin-chhiūⁿ chhang-á oē chia̍h-ti̍t ê mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 蕗蕎, 就是 親像 蔥á 會 食得 ê 物.

comment: gāi-gio̍h, ngāi-gio̍h, thiaⁿ-liáu put-chí ngāi-gio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 礙謔, 礙謔, 聽了 不止 礙謔.

comment: gio̍h lâng, gio̍h-sio̍h, saⁿ-gio̍h, gio̍h-góa, gio̍h-lâi-gio̍h-khì.
hanlo_comment: 謔 人, 謔誚, 相謔, 謔我, 謔來謔去.

comment: kùi-khì ê chio̍h, pe̍h-sek; súi, chheng-khì, chiâⁿ, tin-tiōng, pó-ge̍k.
hanlo_comment: 貴氣 ê 石, 白色; 媠, 清氣, 成, 珍重, 寶玉.

comment: bô jîn-chêng, khok-hêng, tsân-jím, lêng-lek, chho͘-sio̍k, siong-hāi, tsai-ē, pō-ge̍k.

comment: kóng tōa-oē; tōa, hōa-hōa jióng, kok ê miâ.

comment: gō͘-sî, gō͘-sî chiàⁿ, tùi gō͘-sî, tsa̍p-jī tiám ê sî-tsūn.

comment: gō͘-tsoh, gō͘-tsoh-giām, chiū-sī giām sin-si ê koaⁿ.

comment: góa-ê, góa tsòe-ê, lí-góa, chheng-ho͘ ka-kī ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 我ê, 我 做ê, 你我, 稱呼 家己 ê 意思.

comment: góa-ê, góa tsòe-ê, lí-góa, chheng-ho͘ ka-kī ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 我ê, 我 做 ê, 你我, 稱呼 家己 ê 意思.

comment: tsōe-tsōe oē, kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ ê khoán-sit; sit-siaⁿ; chhia ê siaⁿ; bô-bī.
hanlo_comment: 濟濟 話, 驚惶 ê 款式; 失聲; 車 ê 聲; 無味.

comment: gōa-piāng, chiū-sī gông-ngia̍h lâi chhut-siaⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 外唪 就是 昂愕 來 出聲 ê 意思.

comment: gōa-kang, gia̍h-gōa, gōa-chheh, chhut-gōa, mn̂g-gōa; gōa-phê.

comment: chiū-sī khòaⁿ-mi̍h ê ì-sù, khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.

comment: chiū-sī hó iông-māu ê ì-sù.

comment: chiū-sī pó-pòe ê ì-sù, hó, hô-hó.

comment: soaⁿ-miâ, kok-miâ; iàu-kín ê só͘-tsāi.

comment: ha̍k-si̍p kàu ià; khòaⁿ bô iàu-kín.

comment: thit-thô ê ge̍k; hì-lāng, bú-bān; ha̍p-si̍p; sòe-jī khòaⁿ; pó-pòe, sióng-goán.

comment: chhiū ê miâ, tōa-tsâng chhiū, phê-kāu, bī khó͘-siap.
hanlo_comment: 樹 ê 名, 大欉 樹, 皮厚, 味 苦澀.

comment: tōa-tiâu khoe ê miâ, tī Hûn-lâm séng ê sai-pêng.
hanlo_comment: 大條 溪 ê 名, tī 雲南 省 ê 西爿.

comment: goán-ê, goán-pē, goán-tau, goán-chhù, goán ê lâng.
hanlo_comment: 阮ê, 阮爸, 阮兜, 阮厝, 阮 ê 人

comment: goán-ê, goán-pē, goán-tau, goán-chhù, goán ê lâng.
hanlo_comment: 阮ê, 阮爸, 阮兜, 阮厝, 阮 ê 人

comment: tsoe̍h-tn̄g; siah-mi̍h liâm-le̍k-to; khek ìn-á.

comment: koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ, soaⁿ chiam ê khoán-sit.

comment: to̍k-tsôa, tōa-bé tsôa; kap chit-jī 蝮 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 毒蛇, 大尾 蛇; kap chit字 蝮 相像.

comment: thiⁿ-tōe bān-mi̍h ê khì, khí-thâu, tōa, tn̂g, Chiu-ông ê miâ, Goân-tiâu, goân-khì.

comment: thâu-khak khún-ân; gû-thâu-thóaⁿ, am-gōng, áu-bân.
hanlo_comment: 頭殼 捆ân; 牛頭剷, 闇戇, 拗蠻.

comment: tōe koâiⁿ koh pîⁿ, kun-pún, goân-thâu, sêng-si̍t, sià-bián, koh-tsài, iû-goân.
hanlo_comment: 地 懸 koh 平, 根本, 源頭, 誠實, 赦免, koh再, 猶原.

comment: tsúi-tsôaⁿ ê kun-pún; tsúi-goân, goân-thâu.
hanlo_comment: 水泉 ê 根本; 水源, 源頭.

comment: chiū-sī Chîn-ip ê miâ; Chìn-hô͘ hoa̍t Chîn-kok tī Goân-sin siâⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 秦邑 ê 名; 晉侯 伐 秦國 tī 邧新 城.

comment: Khiong-goân, chiū-sī ke̍k-tsá Hông-tè phian-hui ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 姜嫄, 就是 極早 皇帝 偏妃 ê 名.

comment: chiū-sī pe̍h pak-tó͘ ê bé.
hanlo_comment: 就是 白 腹肚 ê 馬.

comment: siān-lâng, tsôa; niû-á.
hanlo_comment: 蟺蟲, 蛇; 娘á.

comment: thāu-hî; chháu-á lâi chhá-i āu-lâi hē tī tsúi-ni̍h, hî chiū sí chiū phû.
hanlo_comment: 毒魚; 草á 來 炒伊 後來 hē tī 水裡, 魚 就 死 就 浮.

comment: chiū-sī léng, kôaⁿ-chhìn ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 冷, 寒凊 ê 意思.

comment: khau, siah-mi̍h; hê-hok bô si̍t-tsāi; hō͘ i pîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 刮, 削物; 回覆 無 實在; hō͘ 伊 平.

comment: bâ-pì; kha-chhiú m̄-tsai thiàⁿ bâ-pì.
hanlo_comment: 麻痺; 腳手 m̄知 疼 麻痺.

comment: iûⁿ-kak tōa-ki thang tsòe khì-kū, goân-iûⁿ ná Gô͘-iûⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 羊角 大枝 thang 做 器具, 羱羊 若 吳羊 ê 款式.

comment: hái-ni̍h ê mi̍h, chhin-chhiūⁿ pih chīn-tōa.
hanlo_comment: 海裡 ê 物, 親像 鱉 盡大.

comment: chhiū ê miâ, tōa-tsâng chhiū, bī siap, phê kāu.
hanlo_comment: 樹 ê 名, 大欉 樹, 味 澀, 皮 厚.

comment: chiū-sī kap tha̍k Goán sio-siāng.

comment: pò͘-pe̍k âng-n̂g sek; chhiⁿ ê kang-pò͘; taⁿ ēng âng-ê.

comment: goân-som, goân-sun; goân-bú, chiū-sī hiân-bú.
hanlo_comment: 玄參, 玄孫; 玄武, 就是 玄武.

comment: goân-som, goân-sun; goân-bú, chiū-sī hiân-bú.
hanlo_comment: 玄參, 玄孫; 玄武, 就是 玄武.

comment: úi-goân, chiū-sī úi-oân; goân-gōe, goân-chhe.
hanlo_comment: 委員, 就是 委員; 員外, 員差.

comment: thâu-khak tōa; ài, ì-ài, ǹg-bāng; him-bō͘, ì-sù; kam-goān; li̍p-goān.

comment: chi̍t-khoán chháu ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 一款 草 ê 名.

comment: ji̍t ê saⁿ-tùi, im ê cheng, kok-miâ, ge̍h-niû; ge̍h-ji̍t.

comment: chiū-sī tōe-hō miâ.

comment: chiū-sī soaⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 山 ê 名.

comment: at-chi̍h, chhia-sim; thiah-khui.

comment: chiū-sī tsám-tn̄g-kha ê ì-sù.

comment: chhia-chêng pa̍k bé ê chhâ.

comment: lâng ê jī-sìⁿ.

comment: lāi-bīn ê tùi-hoán, soe, sì-sòaⁿ, hn̄g; gōa-bīn, í-gōa.

comment: kang-gōe, chhiú-gōe, kī-gōe, hó-bú-gōe, pí-bú-gōe.

comment: kang-gōe, chhiú-gōe, kī-gōe, hó-bú-gōe, pí-bú-gōe.
hanlo_comment: 工藝, 手藝, 技藝, 好武藝, 比武藝.

hanlo_comment: 錯愕, 驚惶 ê 款式; 阻礙 無 照 次序.

comment: chiū-sī chhùi-lāi ê go̍k.

comment: hoe-sim thò͘-chhiu, hó-khòaⁿ; hoe thò͘-go̍k.

comment: hoe-sim thò͘-chhiu, hó-khòaⁿ; hoe thò͘-go̍k.
hanlo_comment: 花心 吐鬚, 好看; 花 吐萼.

comment: giâm-kín ê khoán-sit; kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ.

comment: soaⁿ-piⁿ, tû-khì, tiān ê gîm-kîⁿ koâiⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 山邊, 除去, 殿 ê gîm墘 懸 ê 款式.

comment: kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, kan-ta phah-kó͘ ê ì-sù; ti̍t-ti̍t kóng; tì-bō koâiⁿ ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 驚惶, 干單 phah 鼓 ê 意思; 直直 講; 戴帽 懸 ê 款.

comment: chhùi-khí-lāi téng-ē-bīn ê bah, khí-hōaⁿ, chiūⁿ-kiuⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 嘴齒內 頂下面 ê 肉, 齒岸, 上腔.

comment: kóng-oē; chèng-ti̍t ê oē; ti̍t-ti̍t kóng; lâng-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 講話; 正直 ê 話; 直直 講; 人名.

comment: chiū-sī tsōe-tsōe ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 濟濟 ê 意思.

comment: thia̍p chio̍h bô tsāi, gûi-hiám ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 疊 石 無 在, 危險 ê 款式.

comment: soaⁿ-piⁿ, chiū-sī kap chit-jī 崿 sio-siāng ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 山邊, 就是 kap chit字 崿 相像 意思.

comment: chiū-sī to-kiàm ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 刀劍 ê 名.

comment: chiū-sī to-kiàm ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 刀劍 ê 名.

comment: kóng-oē chèng, ti̍t-ti̍t giân; chhiong-kông.
hanlo_comment: 講話 正, 直直 言; 猖狂.

hanlo_comment: 相刣 ê 刀; 劍 ê 雙頭尾; 利刀 ê 柄, 排列 lóng 懸 ê 款.

comment: hî ê miâ, ná siān-lâng; go̍k-hî, go̍k-hî tn̂g 2 chhioh gōa ū sì-kha; chhùi-khí oāⁿ 3 pái.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, 若 蟺蟲; 鱷魚, 鱷魚 長 2 尺 外 有 四腳; 嘴齒 換 3 擺.

comment: tú-gū, tú-tio̍h khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, saⁿ tú-tio̍h, chhiok-tio̍h; ûi-ke̍h.
hanlo_comment: 抵遇, tú-tio̍h 看見, 驚惶, 相 tú-tio̍h, 觸tio̍h; 違逆.

comment: hoan-hù ê oē, sī-tōa giâm-hat hoan-hù sī-sòe ê oē.
hanlo_comment: 吩咐 ê 話, 序大 嚴轄 吩咐 序細 ê 話.

comment: gin-gong-giang, chiū-sī ge̍k á-sī mi̍h, saⁿ kha̍p-tio̍h ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: gin-gong鈃, 就是 玉 抑是 物, 相 磕tio̍h ê 聲.

comment: bé-thâu koâiⁿ, bé siū-khì ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 馬頭 懸, 馬 受氣 ê 款式.

comment: bé-thâu koâiⁿ, bé siū-khì ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 馬頭 懸, 馬 受氣 ê 款式.

comment: chhiong-pô͘; chháu hoat tī tî-tsúi ê piⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 菖蒲; 草 發 tī 池水 ê 邊.

comment: ji̍t khí khah koâiⁿ, kia̍h-khí, koâiⁿ, kng-bêng.
hanlo_comment: 日 起 khah 懸, 攑起, 懸, 光明.

comment: pa̍k-bé ê thiāu; kian-tēng.
hanlo_comment: 縛馬 ê 柱; 堅定.

comment: chhù ê chhiâ-kak, kiò-tsòe hui-gông.
hanlo_comment: 厝 ê 斜角, 叫做 飛昂.

comment: soaⁿ-koâiⁿ ê khoán-sit; soaⁿ-chio̍h koâiⁿ gûi-hiám ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 山懸 ê 款式; 山石 懸 危險 ê 款.

comment: tsúi-ni̍h ê tsúi-ku-á, lio̍h-á chhin-chhiūⁿ am-pô͘-chê.
hanlo_comment: 水裡 ê 水龜á, 略á 親像 am蜅蠐.

comment: koâiⁿ, tōa, kè-chîⁿ koâiⁿ; kám-kek, gông-ngia̍h; góa.
hanlo_comment: 懸, 大, 價錢 懸; 感激, 昂愕; 我.

comment: kiâⁿ bô toan-chiàⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 行 無 端正 ê 意思.

comment: soaⁿ ê miâ tī Oa̍t-tâm koāiⁿ ê tōe-kài.
hanlo_comment: 山 ê 名 tī 越郯 縣 ê 地界.

comment: bô tì-sek; gû-chhún, gām-gām, gōng, gōng-ti̍t.
hanlo_comment: 無 知識; 愚蠢, 憨憨, 戇, 戇直.

comment: bô tì-sek; gû-chhún, gām-gām, gōng, gōng-ti̍t.
hanlo_comment: 無 知識; 愚蠢, 憨憨, 戇, 戇直.

comment: khòng-gōng, chiū-sī kiau-ngō͘ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 悾戇, 就是 驕傲 ê 款式.

comment: chhī-bé ê lâng; chhī-bé ê só͘-tsāi, hông-tó͘, kok ê kau-kài.
hanlo_comment: 飼馬 ê 人; 飼馬 ê 所在, 防堵, 國 ê 交界.

comment: chiū-sī iông-māu tōa ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 容貌 大 ê 意思.

comment: tio̍h-siong ê khoán-sit; lâng gū-tio̍h hō͘ ê ì-sù, kap 俁 tâng.
hanlo_comment: tio̍h傷 ê 款式; 人 遇tio̍h 雨 ê 意思, kap 俁 同.

comment: ga̍k-khì; bô an-ún ê khoán, mi̍h bô sáⁿ thò-tòng; tî-thâu ê lūi.
hanlo_comment: 樂器; 無 安穩 ê 款, 物 無 啥 妥當; 鋤頭 ê 類.

comment: ga̍k-khì; bô an-ún ê khoán, mi̍h bô sáⁿ thò-tòng; tî-thâu ê lūi.
hanlo_comment: 樂器; 無 安穩 ê 款, 物 無 啥 妥當; 鋤頭 ê 類.

comment: ga̍k-khì ê miâ; kìm-chí, soah, siâⁿ; chhī-bé ê só͘-tsāi, Kau-kài.
hanlo_comment: 樂器 ê 名; 禁止, soah, 城; 飼馬 ê 所在, 交界.

comment: ēng tek pa̍k hō͘-lâng bōe-tit óng-lâi; tî-piⁿ ûi-tek lâi chhī-hî.
hanlo_comment: 用 竹 縛 hō͘人 bōe得 往來; 池邊 圍竹 來 飼牛.

comment: kui-kûn lo̍k tsòe-hé tsū-chi̍p ê khoán; chhiò ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: kui群 鹿 做伙 聚集 ê 款; 笑 ê 款式.

comment: iá-siù ê miâ; lo̍k-kang.
hanlo_comment: 野獸 ê 名; 鹿公.

comment: haiⁿ-haiⁿ chhan, chiū-sī teh chhan ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 唉唉 孱, 就是 teh 孱 ê 聲.

comment: háiⁿ-lō-sō, chiū-sī tsòe-kang bô chīn-la̍t chim-chiok ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: háiⁿ-lō-sō, 就是 做工 無 盡力 斟酌 ê 意思.

comment: háiⁿ=hái, chiū-sī hiàm cheng-siⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: háiⁿ=嗨, 就是 喊 精牲 ê 意思.

comment: hàiⁿ-ah, chiū-sī ūi-tio̍h lâng hián-chhut siū-khì, hoân-ló thó͘-khì ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: hàiⁿ-ah, 就是 為tio̍h 人 顯出 受氣, 煩惱 吐氣 ê 聲.

comment: hàiⁿ-ah, chiū-sī ūi-tio̍h lâng hián-chhut siū-khì, hoân-ló thó͘-khì ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: hàiⁿ-ah, 就是 為tio̍h 人 顯出 受氣, 煩惱 吐氣 ê 聲.

comment: hāiⁿ-lō-sō, chiū-sī tàu chhut-la̍t ê siaⁿ; thàn-lâng tsòe tāi-chì.
hanlo_comment: 唉lō-sō, 就是 鬥 出力 ê 聲; 趁人 做 tāi-chì.

comment: hāiⁿ-hāiⁿ háu, thó͘-khùi pûn-hāiⁿ, taⁿ-tāng, á-sī kan-khó͘ thó͘-khùi ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 唉唉 哮, 吐氣 pûn唉, 擔重, 抑是 艱苦 吐氣 ê 聲.

comment: nńg-hāiⁿ-hāiⁿ, lâng chīn-siān ài-khùn ê khoán-sit, sin-thé loán-jio̍k ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 軟hāiⁿ-hāiⁿ, 人 盡𤺪 愛睏 ê 款式, 身體 軟弱 ê 意思.

comment: hai̍hⁿ-ah, chiū-sī siū-khì á-sī hoân-ló ê siaⁿ, ūi-tio̍h lâng só͘ tsòe m̄-hó.
hanlo_comment: hai̍hⁿ-ah, 就是 受氣 抑是 煩惱 ê 聲, 為tio̍h 人 所 做 m̄好.

comment: chhùi áu-thò͘ ê khoán-sit; áu ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 嘴 嘔吐 ê 款式; 嘔 ê 聲.

comment: chiū-sī ti ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 豬 ê 名.

comment: siā ê khì-kū, khì-kū ê miâ, chīn-thâu, tsong-tso̍k; tām-po̍h.
hanlo_comment: 石 ê 器具, 器具 ê 名, 盡頭, 宗族; 淡薄.

comment: kak-phang, chiū-sī phang ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 角蜂, 就是 蜂 ê 名.

comment: koe-kak, koe-kak-á, ah-kak, gô-kak.
hanlo_comment: 雞kak, 雞káka, 鴨kak, 鵝kak.

comment: kap-lâng ke-kak, kap-lâng kak-khó͘, kap-lâng khó͘-kak.
hanlo_comment: kap 人 雞kak, kap 人 角口, kap 人 口角.

comment: soaⁿ-ni̍h ū tsōe-tsōe tōa ê chio̍h, chio̍h ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 山裡 有 濟濟 大 ê 石, 石 ê 聲.

comment: thàn-iūⁿ, siū kà-sī; tha̍k-chheh; hiáu-gō͘, tsai; o̍h-i, o̍h-tn̂g.
hanlo_comment: 趁樣, 受 教示; 讀冊; 曉悟, 知; 學伊, 學堂.

comment: ji̍p-o̍h; ha̍k-si̍p, ha̍k-hāu, ha̍k-būn; ha̍k-hū.
hanlo_comment: 入學; 學習, 學校, 學問; 學父.

comment: thô͘ kian-tēng; soaⁿ tsōe-tsōe tōa-tè-chio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 土 堅定; 山 濟濟 大塊石.

comment: tōa-kha siuⁿ; tóe-bí ê khì-kū.
hanlo_comment: 大kha 箱; 貯米 ê 器具.

comment: tóe-mi̍h ê khì-kū; ū lâng kóng tsa̍p-táu, iā ū kóng tsa̍p-chio̍h; chiûⁿ-ha̍k.
hanlo_comment: 貯物 ê器具; 有 人 講 十斗 也 有 講 十石; 牆斛.

comment: chiáu-mn̂g tsòe kng-ku̍t ê khoán, chheng-khì; tsúi-pe̍h kng ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 鳥毛 做 光滑 ê 款, 清氣; 水白 光 ê 款.

comment: io̍h-chháu ê miâ; ha̍k-eng, ha̍k-chhài.
hanlo_comment: 藥草 ê 名; 斛英, 斛菜.

comment: ta ê tsôaⁿ, Hē-thiⁿ ū tsúi, tang-thiⁿ bô; tsúi ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: ta ê 泉, 夏天 有 水, 冬天 無; 水 ê 聲.

comment: ta ê tsôaⁿ, Hē-thiⁿ ū tsúi, tang-thiⁿ bô; tsúi ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: ta ê 泉, 夏天 有 水, 冬天 無; 水 ê 聲.

comment: chhiū ê miâ, tn̄g-gōa koâiⁿ; tōa-tsâng chhiū.
hanlo_comment: 樹 ê 名, 丈外 懸; 大欉 樹.

comment: chiū-sī o̍h-tn̂g, ha̍k-jī ê pún-jī, ha̍k-hāu.
hanlo_comment: 就是 學堂, 學字 ê 本字, 學校.

comment: kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ; kóaⁿ-kín khòaⁿ; liâm-piⁿ, hut-jiân.
hanlo_comment: 驚惶; 趕緊 看; liâm-piⁿ, 忽然.

comment: kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, chīn, po̍h, khì-kū ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 驚惶, 盡, 薄, 器具 ê 名.

comment: ha̍k-hî, chiū-sī chi̍t-hō hî ê miâ khah sòe bé-ka-ê.
hanlo_comment: 礐魚, 就是 一號 魚 ê 名 khah 細 馬鮫ê.

comment: hái-lāi ê kap-lūi; ū khak ê ham, o͘-ham.
hanlo_comment: 海內 ê 蛤類; 有 殼 ê 蚶, 烏蚶.

comment: chia̍h-chiú kàu khòaⁿ-oa̍h, iáu-bē tsùi, chhiong-chiok, hó-khùn, chiú-ham.
hanlo_comment: 食酒 到 快活, 猶未 醉, 充足, 好睏, 酒酣.

comment: tōa ê soaⁿ-kok, soaⁿ-kok tiong-kan ū tōa-khang ê khoán, tsōe-soaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 大 ê 山谷, 山谷 中間 有 大空 ê 款, 濟山.

comment: thit-thô khit-chia̍h lâng ê mi̍h; tham-tsâi.
hanlo_comment: 𨑨迌 乞食 人 ê 物; 貪財.

comment: á-sī, kiám-chhái; tín-tāng ê siaⁿ, tńg-siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 抑是, 檢彩; 振動 ê 聲, 轉聲.

comment: chia̍h-chiú-tsùi, khoàiⁿ-oa̍h; hó-khùn, iàu-bē tsùi; chiú-ham.=酣
hanlo_comment: 食酒醉, 快活; 好睏, 猶未 醉; 酒酣.=酣

comment: tài-kah ê lūi, siⁿ tī Tang-hái ná giô, tsóng-sī píⁿ-píⁿ ū-mn̂g.
hanlo_comment: 帶甲 ê 類, 生 tī 東海 若 蟯, 總是 扁扁 有毛.

comment: ham, chhin-chhiūⁿ giô ū hûn ná chhù-hiā; pāng ê lūi.
hanlo_comment: 蚶, 親像 蟯 有 痕 若 厝瓦; 蚌 ê 類.

comment: gōng, khám, khám-gōng.
hanlo_comment: 戇, 憨, 憨戇.

comment: só͘-tsāi ê miâ, chhiong-sēng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 所在 ê 名, 充盛 ê 意思.

comment: á-sī, siaⁿ tín-tāng, kiám-chhái, tín-tāng siaⁿ, tńg-siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 抑是, 聲 振動, 檢彩, 振動 聲, 轉聲.

comment: chia̍h koe ê thâng; Sng-tsâi hio̍h-téng ê thâng.
hanlo_comment: 食 瓜 ê 蟲; 桑材 葉頂 ê 蟲.

comment: chhiong-chiok, khòaⁿ-oa̍h; bô-kiaⁿ, hó-khùn.
hanlo_comment: 充足, 快活; 無驚, 好睏.

comment: ba̍k-chiu ham-ham, siⁿ ba̍k-ham.
hanlo_comment: 目睭 蚶蚶, 生 目蚶.

comment: téng-ham, ē-ham, chiū-sī chhùi ê téng-ē bīn.
hanlo_comment: 頂頦, 下頦, 就是 嘴 ê 頂下 面.

comment: thô͘-bê lô-lô; tsú niû-á-kián ê thng; tsúi móa ê khoán-sit, tiâm-lo̍h-khì, ám-bê.
hanlo_comment: 土糜 濁濁; 煮 娘á繭 ê 湯; 水 滿 ê 款式, 沉落去, 泔糜.

comment: khǹg siū-khì; oh-tit tsai, súi, kng-iām ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: khǹg 受氣; oh得 知, 媠, 光焰 ê 款式.

comment: tōa-phûn, tōa-àng ná phûn, tóe-peng khǹg chia̍h-mi̍h lâi bián-tit sio.
hanlo_comment: 大盆, 大甕 若 盆, 貯冰 khǹg 食物 來 免得 燒.

comment: iô-tāng, kòng-tio̍h, hḿ-tio̍h; hám-tio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 搖動, 摃tio̍h, hḿ-tio̍h； hám著.

comment: tōa-siaⁿ kiò, siū-khì ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 大聲 叫, 受氣 ê 聲.

comment: tsúi móa ê khoán-sit Ē-mn̂g pe̍h-oē ū lâng siá-tsòe ám-bê.
hanlo_comment: 水 滿 ê 款式 廈門 白話 有 人 寫做 泔糜.

comment: hó͘ ê siaⁿ, khîm-siù siū-khì ê siaⁿ, hám-hám-kiò.
hanlo_comment: 虎 ê 聲, 禽獸 受氣 ê 聲, 鬫鬫叫.

comment: chhùi-phóe lāi, chhùi-kâm, chhùi-ē-táu ē, thâu-àⁿ, thâu-iô, thâu-thìm, ām-kún; chháu-hâm.
hanlo_comment: 嘴phóe 內, 嘴含, 嘴下斗 下, 頭向, 頭搖, 頭thìm, 頷頸; 草含.

comment: sòe-chiah káu teh pūi ê siaⁿ; káu ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 細隻 狗 teh 吠 ê 聲; 狗 ê 聲.

comment: béng-siù siū-khì ê siaⁿ, hám-hám kiò ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 猛獸 受氣 ê 聲, 闞闞 叫 ê 聲.

comment: tōa-chhùi-chia̍h, pō͘-chia̍h, thun-lo̍h-khì.
hanlo_comment: 大嘴食, 哺食, 吞落去.

comment: ài tit-tio̍h, tham-sim ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 愛 得tio̍h, 貪心 ê 意思.

comment: âng-hám-hám, chiū-sī chin-âng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 紅撼撼, 就是 真紅 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī théng-koâiⁿ ê ì-sù; théng-khí ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 就是 逞懸 ê 意思; 挺起 ê 款式.

comment: lām-sám kóng-oē, khoa-kháu; siū-khì, tiáu-tsa.
hanlo_comment: 濫糝 講話, 誇口; 受氣, 佻臢.

comment: seng-khu á-sī kha hàng-chéng ê pīⁿ, chhin-chhiūⁿ kó͘-tiòng.
hanlo_comment: 身軀 抑是 腳 hàng腫 ê 病, 親像 蠱脹.

comment: hó͘ ê siaⁿ, khîm-siù siū-khì ê siaⁿ, kap tha̍k Hám tâng.
hanlo_comment: 虎 ê 聲, 禽獸 受氣 ê 聲, kap 讀 Hám 同.

comment: lóng-tsóng, saⁿ-tâng, siông-siông, piàn-piàn, ga̍k-khì ê miâ Hâm-hong.
hanlo_comment: lóng總, 相同, 常常, 遍遍, 樂器 ê 名 咸豐.

comment: chhùi ū mi̍h, kóng bô-bêng, kāu-kāu; pau-koat, pau-iông, pau-hâm; hâm-hūn.
hanlo_comment: 嘴 有 物, 講 無明, 厚厚; 包括, 包容, 包含; 含恨.

comment: chhùi kā-mi̍h, bé kā-kiuⁿ; kám-kek, niá-siúⁿ, chhùi kâm-teh, koaⁿ-hâm.
hanlo_comment: 嘴 咬物, 馬 咬韁; 感激, 領賞, 嘴 含teh, 官銜.

comment: chhùi kā-mi̍h, bé kā-kiuⁿ; kám-kek, niá-siúⁿ, chhùi kâm-teh, koaⁿ-hâm.
hanlo_comment: 嘴 咬物, 馬 咬韁; 感激, 領賞, 嘴 含teh, 官銜.

comment: chhùi-lāi hâm, kap {銜Hâm} {啣Hâm} sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 嘴內 含, kap {銜Hâm} {啣Hâm} 相像.

comment: hoe-m̂, liân-hoe teh khui ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 花莓, 蓮花 teh 開 ê 意思.

comment: tóe-mi̍h, iông-ún, pau tsāi-lāi; chhùi lāi-bīn chi̍h ē; phoe-lông.
hanlo_comment: 貯物, 容允, 包 在內; 嘴 內面 舌 下; 批囊.

comment: hong-phoe, phoe-tsat, chiàn-kah.
hanlo_comment: 封批, 批札, 戰甲.

comment: hong-phoe, phoe-tsat, chiàn-kah.
hanlo_comment: 封批, 批札, 戰甲.

comment: lâu-tsúi ê hûi-kóng; ū hī ê tsúi-àng; âm, tsúi-âm.
hanlo_comment: 流水 ê 瓷管; 有 耳 ê 水甕; 涵, 水涵.

comment: soaⁿ ê miâ; iā-sī chí chit-jī 函 jī, Hâm-kok-koan.
hanlo_comment: 山 ê 名; 也是 指 chit字 函 字, 崡谷關.

comment: kóng bô bêng; siū-khì ê siaⁿ; hâm-hô͘, chiū-sī oē bô bêng-pe̍k.
hanlo_comment: 講 無 明; 受氣 ê 聲; 含糊, 就是 話 無 明白.

comment: chiū-sī chīn-kôaⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 盡寒 ê 意思.

comment: chìm-tâm, tsúi tsōe phoah-ji̍p tsûn; chhim-tîm.
hanlo_comment: 浸澹, 水 濟 潑入 船; 深沉.

comment: tiāu-chhú, hô-sūn, sêng-si̍t.
hanlo_comment: 調處, 和順, 誠實.

comment: kún-chhiò thó-mi̍h; ài, hō͘-lâng.
hanlo_comment: 滾笑 討物; 愛, hō͘人.

comment: toh-kūi, poe-pôaⁿ, iā kap chit-jī 函 jī thong.
hanlo_comment: 桌櫃, 杯盤, 也 kap chit字 函 字 通.

comment: khoe̍h-á, chiú-poe, iông-ún.
hanlo_comment: khoe̍há, 酒杯, 容允.

comment: khoe̍h-á, chiú-poe, iông-ún.
hanlo_comment: khoe̍há, 酒杯, 容允.

comment: chhùi ē-táu, téng-ē ham, hâm-chi̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 嘴 下斗, 頂下 頦, 含舌 ê 意思.

comment: soaⁿ-kok ê khang; tōa-khui ê khoán, chhim-chhim ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 山谷 ê 空; 大開 ê 款, 深深 ê 款式.

comment: kâm teh chhiò; tham-sim ài ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 含 teh 笑; 貪心 愛 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī kâm-ge̍k; sàng sng-hà ê pó-khì.
hanlo_comment: 就是 含玉; 送 喪孝 ê 寶器.

comment: the̍h-mi̍h kâm tī chhùi-ni̍h lâi pō͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: the̍h物 含 tī 嘴裡 來 哺 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī chhiú-ńg ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 手袂 ê 意思.

comment: sio̍k-jī kap 頷 jī sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 俗字 kap 頷 字 相像.

comment: bīn n̂g-sek, chhùi-phóe-lāi; chhùi-kâm, chhùi ē-táu ē; thìm-thâu; chháu-hâm.
hanlo_comment: 面 黃色, 嘴phóe內; 嘴含, 嘴 下斗 下; thìm頭; 草含.

comment: tiong-pān ê ge̍k; chio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ ge̍k, Kat-soaⁿ ē tsōe-tsōe hâm-chio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 中pān ê 玉; 石 親像 玉, 葛山 下 濟濟 瑊石.

comment: soaⁿ-iûⁿ tsóng-sī tōa-chiah ê, ka̍k sòe-sòe.
hanlo_comment: 山羊 總是 大隻 ê, 擱 細細.

comment: bô-chiáⁿ, khó͘ ê bī, kiâm ê bī; tōe-miâ; kiâm-bī, kiâm-siap, sīⁿ-iâm.
hanlo_comment: 無chiáⁿ, 苦 ê 味, 鹹 ê 味; 地名; 鹹味, 鹹澀, 豉鹽.

comment: chia̍h koe ê thâng, hioh tī sng-tsâi hio̍h-téng.
hanlo_comment: 食 瓜 ê 蟲, 歇 tī 桑材 葉頂.

comment: ng kâm-sim ài súi; hoe-lúi, hoe-khui.
hanlo_comment: 秧 含心 愛 媠; 花蕊, 花開.

comment: siaⁿ tín-tāng; kiám-chhái, á-sī; tńg-siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 聲 振動; 檢彩, 抑是; 轉聲.

comment: siaⁿ tín-tāng; kiám-chhái, á-sī; tńg-siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 聲 振動; 檢彩, 抑是; 轉聲.

comment: tōa-siaⁿ kiò; siū-khì ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 大聲 叫; 受氣 ê 聲.

comment: chhùi kā-mi̍h; chhùi kâm-mi̍h; kâm-teh.
hanlo_comment: 嘴 咬物; 嘴 含物; 含teh.

comment: chhùi kā-mi̍h; chhùi kâm-mi̍h; kâm-teh.
hanlo_comment: 嘴 咬物; 嘴 含物; 含teh.

comment: pa̍k siuⁿ-láng, koaⁿ-chhâ ê soh, khún-pa̍k; hong-ba̍t, chēng-chēng.
hanlo_comment: 縛 箱籠, 棺柴 ê 索, 綑縛; 封密, 靜靜.

comment: hó chháu-hâm; tōa-kháu-hâm, chiū-sī ài chia̍h tsōe-tsōe chîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 好 草含; 大口含, 就是 ài 食 濟濟 錢.

comment: hâm-sau, hâm-he̍hⁿ, chiū-sī phah pit-hûn ê hûi, á-sī he-ku sàu ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 含酥, 含he̍hⁿ, 就是 phah pit痕 ê 瓷, 抑是 he痀 嗽 ê 聲.

comment: koâiⁿ lo̍h kē, poa̍h-lo̍h-khì, tūi-lo̍h, phah-pháiⁿ, siong-hāi, sit-chhò, hām-khiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 懸 落 低, 跋落去, 墜落, phah pháiⁿ, 傷害, 失錯, 陷坑.

comment: sim bô hoaⁿ-hí, oàn-hūn, ut-tsut.
hanlo_comment: 心 無 歡喜, 怨恨, 鬱卒.

comment: chiū-sī piáⁿ-lāi ê bah.
hanlo_comment: 就是 餅內 ê 肉.

comment: tńg-siaⁿ, kap tha̍k Hâm sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 轉聲, kap 讀 Hâm 相像.
