comment: pī-pān, chhân-hōaⁿ ê lō͘.
hanlo_comment: 備辦, 田岸 ê 路.

comment: koe-chhī ê lâng, tsōe-tsōe ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 街市 ê 人, 濟濟 ê 聲.

comment: āu-chím-kut, āu-náu, ām-kún; bō ê āu-chhiu; tōa, téng-lūi; chi̍t-hāng, gûn-hāng.
hanlo_comment: 後枕骨, 後腦, 頷頸; 帽 ê 後鬚; 大, 等類; 一項, 銀項.

comment: âng ê soa hòa tsòe súi-gûn; khì bōe hun-piat ê khoán; tsúi chhim-khoah.
hanlo_comment: 紅 ê 砂 化 做 水銀; 氣 bōe 分別 ê 款; 水 深闊.

comment: hāng-tāng, kóng-oē hāng-tāng.
hanlo_comment: 項重, 講話 項重.

comment: hé-hāng, chiū-sī lâng ēng teh ûi lî-pa ū-chhì.
hanlo_comment: 火巷, 就是 人 用 teh 圍 籬笆 有刺.

comment: suh lâi lim ê ì-sù; tsōe-tsōe ê siaⁿ, i-chiûⁿ hian-khí ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: suh 來 lim ê 意思; 濟濟 ê 聲, 衣裳 掀起 ê 款式.

comment: hî ê miâ, hî-chhùi tín-tāng ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, 魚嘴 振動 ê 款式.

comment: tōa-chhùi chheh, lim-chia̍h teh chheh ê siaⁿ, chhoán, hî chiâⁿ-kûn, gap-tsúi.
hanlo_comment: 大嘴 啜, lim食 teh 啜 ê 聲, 喘, 魚 成群, 呷水.

comment: gâu-hap, chhùi lām-sám hap, chiū-sī lām-sám kóng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: gâu哈, 嘴 濫糝 哈, 就是 濫糝 講 ê 意思.

comment: tsúi ê miâ, tī Hā-iông koāiⁿ; lâng ê jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 水 ê 名, tī 夏陽 縣; 人 ê 字姓.

comment: chiū-sī saⁿ-ha̍p; tōa-chia̍h, tōa-lim ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 相合; 大食, 大lim ê 意思.

comment: lāi-bīn sòe ê mn̂g; sòe-keng pâng, lāi-bīn ê lâng.
hanlo_comment: 內面 細 ê 門; 細間 房, 內面 ê 人.

comment: chhùi kâm-oá; saⁿ-tâng, hô, tsū-chi̍p; ìn-tap, phit-phòe, saⁿ-hap, hû-hap.
hanlo_comment: 嘴 含oá; 相同, 和, 聚集; 應答, 匹配, 相合, 符合.

comment: chhia thâu ê thih, sng-á, thih-sng.
hanlo_comment: 車 頭 ê 鐵, 栓á, 鐵栓.

comment: chiū-sī kha-be̍h kap phê-oê ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 腳襪 kap 皮鞋 ê 意思.

comment: chhia-lûn-sng, tsoán-tńg, koán-hoat.
hanlo_comment: 車輪栓, 轉轉, 管發.

comment: ēng tōe-á chit-be̍h; chho͘-pò͘, mn̂g-pò͘, môa-pò͘, pîn-chiān ê lâng.
hanlo_comment: 用 苧á 織襪; 粗布, 毛布, 麻布, 貧賤 ê 人.

comment: chiáu ê miâ, sèng ngī-ti̍t, chhin-chhiūⁿ khī-koe.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 ê 名, 性 硬直, 親像 雉雞.

comment: siong-sú, tiong-jia̍t, sio-lō, jia̍t, hē-thiⁿ tōa-joa̍h peh-sìⁿ tsōe joa̍h-sí.
hanlo_comment: 傷暑, 中熱, 燒烙, 熱, 夏天 大熱 百姓 濟 熱死.

comment: chi̍t ba̍k ha̍p chhiⁿ-mî, gōng.
hanlo_comment: 一 目 合 chhiⁿ-mî, 戇.

comment: khoah ê soaⁿ-kok, thong-ta̍t, khang-hu, khui, khoah-tōa, khai-tián.
hanlo_comment: 闊 ê 山谷, 通達, 空虛, 開, 闊大, 開展.

comment: khong-kiān ê khoán-sit; bô ià-siān, pîn-tōaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 康健 ê 款式; 無 厭𤺪, 貧惰.

comment: soaⁿ-kok, khiⁿ-kau, thong-thàu, khang-hi, kap chit-jī 豁 siāng.
hanlo_comment: 山谷, 坑溝, 通透, 空虛, kap chit字 豁 像.

comment: tēng-o͘ ê ì-sù, tì-hūi, lâng-miâ, sió-jī Hat, Tsô-sóng.
hanlo_comment: 碇烏 ê 意思, 智慧, 人名, 小字 黠, 曹磉.

comment: chhia ê siaⁿ, chhia-lûn sng, chiáng-koán, tsoán-tńg, koán-hat.
hanlo_comment: 車 ê 聲, 車輪 栓, 掌管, 轉轉, 管轄.

comment: the̍h, the̍h-mi̍h, kia̍h, tú ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: the̍h, the̍h物, 攑, 抵 ê 意思.

comment: hoān-lâng tô-tsáu ê ì-sù, tsáu-hoān.
hanlo_comment: 犯人 逃走 ê 意思, 走犯.

comment: nâ-âu ta, ài-lim-tsúi; âu-ta ê siaⁿ, siū-khì háng-hiàm ê siaⁿ; hoah-hiàm.
hanlo_comment: 嚨喉 ta, 愛lim水; 喉ta ê 聲, 受氣 哄喊 ê 聲; 喝喊.

comment: mn̄g ê oē, siáⁿ-sū, chī-tsūi, tsáiⁿ-iūⁿ, beh thái-m̄.
hanlo_comment: 問 ê 話, 啥事, chī-tsūi, 怎樣, beh thái-m̄.

comment: mô͘ tiong-ng tn̄g hit-tsat; tiū-kó lu̍t phè khí-lâi.
hanlo_comment: 毛 中央 斷 hit節; 稻稿 捋 phè 起來.

comment: thêng, soah, chīn; hioh-khùn, hioh-kang.
hanlo_comment: 停, soah, 盡; 歇睏, 歇工.

comment: chhâ-lāi ê thâng; kā, chia̍h; su-io̍k.
hanlo_comment: 柴內 ê 蟲; 咬, 食; 私慾.

comment: chhùi, hī-á ē ê kut; jī-sìⁿ; bīn n̂g ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 嘴, 耳á 下 ê 骨; 字姓; 面 黃 ê 意思.

comment: siáⁿ-sū, sím-mi̍h, beh-thái, siáⁿ-sū m̄, tsó͘-chí, háng; lún-neh, tsáiⁿ-iūⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 啥事, 甚物, beh-thái, 啥事 m̄, 阻止, 哄; 忍凹, 怎樣.

comment: ēng ui-giâm hō͘-lâng hâng-ho̍k, háng-hoah.
hanlo_comment: 用 威嚴 hō͘人 降服, 哄喝.

comment: hat-á, hat-lá, hat-lá-tòa, sī oē tóe-tit gûn ê io-tòa.
hanlo_comment: hat-á, hat-lá, hat-lá帶, 是 會 貯得 銀 ê 腰帶.

comment: ū hī ê chiú-poe; niû gō͘-kak ê khì-kū; kha-pôaⁿ, kha-tôe; po̍h, kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, kè-thâu.
hanlo_comment: 有 耳 ê 酒杯; 量 五榖 ê 器具; 腳盤, 腳蹄, 薄, 驚惶, 過頭.

comment: ha̍t tiāⁿ-tio̍h, ha̍t-tsúi; ha̍t chîⁿ-thâu; ha̍t jōa-tsōe chîⁿ; giâm-ha̍t.
hanlo_comment: 乏 定tio̍h, 乏水; 乏 錢頭; 乏 偌濟 錢; 嚴乏.

comment: khan-ha̍t, siⁿ-lia̍p-á khan-ha̍t.
hanlo_comment: 牽核, 生粒á 牽核.

comment: khan-ha̍t, siⁿ-lia̍p-á khan-ha̍t.
hanlo_comment: 牽核, 生粒á 牽核.

comment: nâ-âu ê pīⁿ, kú-kú liân-liân chhoán, he-pīⁿ, he-ku.
hanlo_comment: 嚨喉 ê 病, 久久 連連 喘, he病,he痀.

comment: tōa siū-khì ê siaⁿ, kiaⁿ ê siaⁿ, iá-siù háu ê siaⁿ; tōa siaⁿ kiò.
hanlo_comment: 大 受氣 ê 聲, 驚 ê 聲, 野獸 哮 ê 聲; 大 聲 叫.

comment: chiū-sī tōa-hán ê ì-sù; chho͘-phoh ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 就是 大喊 ê 意思; 粗朴 ê 款式.

comment: koâiⁿ chì-khì; khai-ta̍t ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 懸 志氣; 開達 ê 款式.

comment: hó͘ teh háu, kian-kò͘, béng-siù tōa ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 虎 teh 哮, 堅固, 猛獸 大 ê 款式.

comment: kiò, khoa-kháu, phòng-hong, kóng tōa-oē, hau-siâu.
hanlo_comment: 叫, 誇口, 胖風, 講 大話, hau-siâu.

comment: hó͘ beh kā lâng ê siaⁿ, káu ê siaⁿ; kok-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 虎 beh 咬 人 ê 聲, 狗 ê 聲; 國名.

comment: keng tiān ê khoán, keng-chhù koâiⁿ; chhim-hn̄g khang ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 宮 殿 ê 款, 宮厝 懸; 深遠 空 ê 款式.

comment: kiò, ēng oē kek-lâng; siaⁿ kín ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 叫, 用 話 激人; 聲 緊 ê 意思.

comment: khoa-kháu, kóng tōa-oē, phòng-hong; kù, hau-siâu.
hanlo_comment: 誇口, 講 大話, 胖風; 句, hau-siâu.

comment: súi, hok-khì; khèng-hō, sió-khóa; hó, hô-ha̍p; ut-tsut.
hanlo_comment: 媠, 福氣; 慶賀, 小khóa; 好, 和合; 鬱卒.

comment: siaⁿ-seh, hó͘ ê siaⁿ; chiáu teh háu ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 聲說, 虎 ê 聲; 鳥 teh 吼 ê 聲.

comment: khoa-kháu ê oē, bô iáⁿ ê oē; kiaⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 誇口 ê 話, 無 影 ê 話; 驚 ê 款式.

comment: bô-iàu bô-kín ê khoán-sit; khì pûn chhut; tōa-siaⁿ-kiò, jióng, mē, só͘-tsāi miâ.
hanlo_comment: 無要 無緊 ê 款式; 氣 pûn 出; 大聲叫, 嚷, 罵, 所在 名.

comment: hau-pau, hau-pau-tòa, hau-pau-sok, hau-pau-chhiu.
hanlo_comment: 荷包, 荷包帶, 荷包束, 荷包鬚.

comment: bīn hau-hau, chiū-sī bīn chho͘-chho͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 面 hau-hau, 就是 面 粗粗 ê 意思.

comment: háu-kiò, pak-lāi háu; háu-iau, háu-oan, háu-hoah.
hanlo_comment: 吼叫, 腹內 吼; 吼iau, 吼冤, 吼喝.

comment: háu-kiò, pak-lāi háu; háu-iau, háu-oan, háu-hoah.
hanlo_comment: 吼叫, 腹內 吼; 吼iau, 吼冤, 吼喝.

comment: gín-á hōng-sêng pē-bú, sūn bô ûi-ke̍h ê ì-sù; sng-hà, tòa-hà, hàu-kèng.
hanlo_comment: gín-á 奉承 父母, 順 無 違逆 ê 意思; 喪孝, 帶孝, 孝敬.

comment: kāu siū-khì ê siaⁿ; mē, kiàn-siàu; thí-jio̍k.
hanlo_comment: 厚 受氣 ê 聲; 罵, 見笑; 恥辱.

comment: lāu-hàu, lāu-hàu-chí, lāu-hàu-khak, lāu-hàu-hoe.
hanlo_comment: 老蔻, 老蔻籽, 老蔻麴, 老蔻花.

comment: su-thong, kan-tsà, îm-loān, kan-îm; kam-chhng.
hanlo_comment: 私通, 奸詐, 淫亂, 姦淫; 疳瘡.

comment: chhì-chha̍k, thòng-hūn ê siaⁿ, thó͘-khùi ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 刺鑿, 痛恨 ê 聲, 吐氣 ê 意思.

comment: siaⁿ-seh; kha-kut ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 聲說; 腳骨 ê 意思.

comment: liû-eng, sòe-sòe ê liû ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 瘤癰, 細細 ê 瘤 ê 意思.

comment: ēng chè-sū lâi kiû hok-khì.
hanlo_comment: 用 祭祀 來 求 福氣.

comment: chiū-sī chí hū-jîn-lâng ê jī.
hanlo_comment: 就是 指 婦人人 ê 字.

comment: chiū-sī lâng ê jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 人 ê 字姓.

comment: chiū-sī lâng ê jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 人 ê 字姓.

comment: tio̍h-bôa, chīn-la̍t thàn, o̍h, chiâⁿ, èng-giām.
hanlo_comment: tio̍h磨, 盡力 趁, 學, 成, 應驗.

comment: hóng-iūⁿ, o̍h, chhin-chhiūⁿ, èng-giām; chhut-la̍t, kong-lô, koan-hē, kong-hāu.
hanlo_comment: 仿樣, 學, 親像, 應驗; 出力, 功勞, 關係, 功效.

comment: hî ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ mô͘-hōe; kiáⁿ thang tsòe chiùⁿ, hāu, hāu-khak, hāu-hia.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, 親像 毛蟹; kiáⁿ thang 做 醬, 鱟, 鱟殼, 鱟桸.

comment: kiáu-jiáu, kiáu-chhá, jiáu-loān ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 攪擾, 攪吵, 擾亂 ê 意思.

comment: o̍h, thàn-hoat-tō͘; hóng-iūⁿ, chhut-la̍t, bián-lē, hāu-giām, kong-hāu.
hanlo_comment: 學, 趁法度; 仿樣, 出力, 勉勵, 效驗 功效.

comment: súi, thiám-bī, îm-loān, kan-îm; jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 媠, 諂媚, 淫亂, 姦淫; 字姓.

comment: tì-hūi, chhang-miâ, sóng-khoài, khoàiⁿ-oa̍h.
hanlo_comment: 智慧, 聰明, 爽快, 快活.

comment: lâng ê jī-sìⁿ; thiám-bī, súi; îm-loān, kan-îm.
hanlo_comment: 人 ê 字姓; 諂媚, 媠; 淫亂, 姦淫.

comment: hiáu-gō͘; kà-sī; thàn-khoán, o̍h bô͘-iūⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 曉悟; 教示; 趁款, 學 模樣.

comment: chhin-chhiūⁿ, thàn-iūⁿ, kong-hāu.
hanlo_comment: 親像, 趁樣, 功效.

comment: o̍h, hóng-iūⁿ, thàn hoat-tō͘; chhut-la̍t; bián-lē, hāu-giām, kong-hāu.
hanlo_comment: 學, 仿樣, 趁 法度; 出力; 勉勵, 效驗, 功效.

comment: o̍h ê miâ; bé-tiâu; koaⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 學 ê 名; 馬椆; 官 ê 名.

comment: hāu-siⁿ, hāu-siⁿ sun; hāu-siⁿ ke, khit hāu-siⁿ; goán hāu-ê.
hanlo_comment: 後生, 後生 孫; 後生 家, 乞 後生; 阮 後ê.

comment: hāu-hiaⁿ-phè, hāu-phiaⁿ-phè.
hanlo_comment: 鱟hiaⁿ-phè, 鱟骿phè.

comment: hauⁿ-hauⁿ-háu, chiū-sī háu ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: hauⁿ-hauⁿ吼, 就是 吼 ê 聲.

comment: háuⁿ-háuⁿ-pūi, chiū-sī káu pūi ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: háuⁿ-háuⁿ吠, 就是 狗 吠 ê 聲.

comment: hàuⁿ chia̍h-mi̍h, hàuⁿ sio-chiú; hàuⁿ-sū, hàuⁿ poa̍h-kiáu.
hanlo_comment: hàuⁿ 食物, hàuⁿ 燒酒; hàuⁿ事, hàuⁿ 跋檄.

comment: hâuⁿ-teh, hiân-teh; chiū-sī tāi-chì bô pān,hē-teh ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: hâuⁿ-teh, 懸teh; 就是 tāi-chì 無 辦, hē-teh ê 意思.

comment: hauh-khak, hauh khí-lâi, chiū-sī lak khí-lâi ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: hauh殼, hauh 起來, 就是 落 起來 ê 意思.

comment: hauhⁿ-tio̍h, hō͘ káu hauhⁿ-tio̍h, chiū-sī hō͘ káu kā-tio̍h.
hanlo_comment: ha̍uhⁿtioh, hō͘ 狗 ha̍uhⁿtioh, 就是 hō͘ 狗 咬tio̍h.

comment: pit ha̍uhⁿ-ha̍uhⁿ, chiū-sī chīn-pit ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: pit ha̍uhⁿ-ha̍uhⁿ, 就是 盡pit ê 意思.

comment: ngīⁿ-ha̍uhⁿ, sī tsú pòaⁿ-chhiⁿ-se̍k, ha̍uhⁿ-ha̍uhⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: ngīⁿ-ha̍uhⁿ, 是 煮 半生熟, ha̍uhⁿ-ha̍uhⁿ ê 意思.

comment: ha̍uhⁿ-ha̍uhⁿ háu, ha̍uhⁿ-ha̍uhⁿ-pūi; chiū-sī káu pūi ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: ha̍uhⁿ-ha̍uhⁿ 哮, ha̍uhⁿ-ha̍uhⁿ吠; 就是 狗 吠 ê 聲.

comment: khi-môa, sim-koaⁿ m̄-ài ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 欺瞞, 心肝 m̄-ài ê 款式.

comment: sng ê bī, chiùⁿ-liāu, sng-chhò͘, chiùⁿ-liāu-lāi thâng ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 酸 ê 味, 醬料, 酸醋, 醬料內 蟲 ê 名.

comment: he-ku, ham-he, he-ku-sàu; he-ku-tū; leng-he.
hanlo_comment: 痚痀, ham痚, 痚痀嗽; 痚痀注; 奶痚.

comment: khò͘-he-sek chiū-sī khò͘-hoe-sek.
hanlo_comment: 蔻灰色 就是 蔻花色.

comment: khò͘-he-sek chiū-sī khò͘-hoe-sek.
hanlo_comment: 蔻灰色 就是 蔻花色.

comment: he-hún, chio̍h-he, khak-he, he-iô, he-sî, he-thâu.
hanlo_comment: 灰粉, 石灰, 殼灰, 灰窯, 灰匙, 灰頭.

comment: siu-mi̍h khàm-ba̍t ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 收物 khàm密 ê 意思.

comment: chia̍h-pn̄g ê hé-si̍t, chhù-ni̍h ê ke-hé; hé-kì, tâng-phōaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 食飯 ê 伙食, 厝裡 ê 家伙; 伙計, 同伴.

comment: hé-hāng; hé-kim-chhiⁿ, hiuⁿ-hé, hé-chiú, iû-hé, hé-sok.
hanlo_comment: 火巷; 火金星, 香火, 火酒, 油火, 火速.

comment: hé-tiúⁿ, ha̍p-hé, chhat-hé; hé-kì, tàu hé-kì, hé-to, hé-kńg.
hanlo_comment: 夥長, 合夥, 擦夥; 夥計, 鬥 夥計, 火刀, 火管.

comment: hé m̄-sī; hé, m̄-thang; hé, kiám m̄-sī àn-ni.
hanlo_comment: hé m̄是; hé, m̄-thang; hé, 敢 m̄是 按呢.

comment: siáⁿ-hè; hè-mi̍h, lám-hè, hè-tóe, hè-sek, hè-bu̍t, tsa̍p-hè.
hanlo_comment: 啥貨; 貨物, 荏貨, 貨底, 貨色, 貨物, 雜貨.

comment: chiū-sī ge̍k-hong ê siaⁿ.

comment: chiū-sī tsáu ê ì-sù.

comment: hoaⁿ-hí, thiòng-lo̍k, ài, him-bō͘; him-soān.

comment: jia̍t-khì chhut phê-hu, chéng-khí.
hanlo_comment: 熱氣 出 皮膚, 腫起.

comment: iûⁿ-hîn, iûⁿ-hîn pīⁿ, iû-hîn koe-á.

comment: hîn-hông; koh-miâ koe-kè-chio̍h; io̍h-miâ iā tsòe hû ê lō͘-ēng.

comment: hioh-khùn, hioh-kang, hioh-ńg, hioh-chhoán; hioh-tiàm.

comment: hoh=huh; chiū-sī ēng ta ê tiáⁿ lâi chian ê ì-sù.

comment: pe̍h-ho̍h, chiū-sī chiáu ê miâ.

comment: ìn-tap ê siaⁿ; hó, àn-ni, sī á m̄-sī ê ì-sù.

comment: chi̍t tiâu khoah ê pò͘, chi̍t ê kńg ê tsóa; móa, chi̍t pak pò͘, chi̍t pak jī.

comment: thâng ê miâ; bi̍t-pô, hok, pián-hok.

comment: thiⁿ pó-pì lâng; hó, chiâu-pī, pì-iū, pù-ū; saⁿ-tâng; hok-khì.

comment: thiⁿ pó-pì lâng; hó, chiâu-pī, pì-iū, pù-ū; saⁿ-tâng; hok-khì.

new_comment: 據《康熙》引揚雄《方言》：「南楚母謂之媓。」「楚母」非專名，不宜連寫。

new_comment: 據《康熙》引《說文》：「水出金城臨羌塞外，東入河。」「臨羌」係地名，「ji̍p tang-hô」亦不確。

comment: pau-bah ê phê, khín-khín, pak-siah, pak-phê, hó, siū, boah, pho͘-pîⁿ, lī-khui, phê-hu, ki-hu.

comment: phīⁿ chhut-ji̍p ê khùi; chheh-khùi, thî-háu, kiaⁿ, hu-hu-háu.

comment: thok-tiōng; kau-hō͘-lâng, kià; chhut-tsāi i; kau-hù, hù-thok.

comment: kiap chhia-piⁿ ê chhâ, chhùi-phóe-kut; saⁿ pang-tsān, hù-tsō͘.

comment: tio̍h-bôa pang-tsān kok-ka, ū kong-lô tī kun-ông tau; kong-hun.

comment: chhù ê tōa-thiāu, tiong-chit-îⁿ; jia-chhia ê môa-pò͘; chhiū-ba̍k chhap-tsa̍p hun-loān.

comment: ian-bū ê khì, lo̍h-seh ê khoán-sit; hó ê khì.

comment: chháu-á tú-á hoat; phang-chháu, phang-phang; hô-sūn, tsōe-tsōe, loān-loān.

comment: hé-ian khí, hun bah ê bī-sò͘.

comment: phang-chháu; sio lâi hun-mi̍h; phang-bī, bī-sò͘, sio, kù.
hanlo_comment: 芳草; 燒 來 燻物; 芳味, 味素, 燒, 灸.

comment: ji̍t-lo̍h iáu-bē àm; ē-hng, ji̍t-hông-hun.

comment: ba̍k-chiu bū-bū o͘-àm; ba̍k-chiu khòaⁿ kàu hun-biáu.

comment: ē-hng sî koaiⁿ-mn̂g, kìm-chí ê ì-sù; kò͘-mn̂g ê lâng.

comment: chiú-tsùi; lim liáu ū chiú-khì teh to̍h; hô-sūn hoaⁿ-hí ê khoán.

comment: [hun-io̍k|Hun-io̍k], Hàn-tiâu kiò-tsòe [hiong-lô͘|Hiong-lô͘]; Thài-ông sū [Hun-io̍k|hun-io̍k].

comment: iûⁿ-bah kiⁿ bô chham chhài ê, hiuⁿ hó ê miâ.

comment: tsúi tńg ê só͘-tsāi, siang pêng-piⁿ ū hōaⁿ; tsúi-chhim, chhim-hái, chhim-ian.
hanlo_comment: 水 tńg ê 所在, 雙 旁邊 有 岸; 水深, 深海, 深淵.

comment: nâ-âu; âng-sek ê mi̍h, hū-jîn-lâng ēng teh boah chhùi-tûn; ian-âu, ian-chi.
hanlo_comment: 嚨喉; 紅色 ê 物, 婦人人 用 teh 抹 嘴唇; 咽喉, 胭脂.

comment: keng siang-thâu bé khah oan ê só͘-tsāi.
hanlo_comment: 弓 雙頭 尾 khah 彎 ê 所在.

comment: mi̍h bô chhiⁿ, chia̍h-mi̍h chhàu-sng; chhàu ê chháu.
hanlo_comment: 物 無 鮮, 食物 臭酸; 臭 ê 草.

comment: chiū-sī nâ-âu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 嚨喉 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī phah-kó͘ ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 phah 鼓 ê 聲.

comment: bīn chhiò-chhiò, súi, hó-khòaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 面 笑笑, 媠, 好看.

comment: tsúi ê miâ, chhut tī Siong-iông ê Gî-siâⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 水 ê 名, 出 tī 襄陽 ê 宜城.

comment: Lâm-to͘ koāiⁿ-miâ; Tēng-kok ê tōe-hō miâ.
hanlo_comment: 南都 縣名; 鄭國 ê 地號 名.

comment: thâng ê miâ, tōe-hō miâ.
hanlo_comment: 蟲 ê 名, 地號 名.

comment: hé ê khì, hé-hun; hun-hio̍h lâng teh suh ê hun; hé-ian, hun-ian, ian-bū.
hanlo_comment: 火 ê 氣, 火燻; 薰葉 人 teh suh ê 薰; 火煙, 燻煙, 煙霧.

comment: hé ê khì, hé-hun; hun-hio̍h lâng teh suh ê hun; hé-ian, hun-ian, ian-bū.
hanlo_comment: 火 ê 氣, 火燻; 薰葉 人 teh suh ê 薰; 火煙, 燻煙, 煙霧.

comment: sin-niû, tsa-bó͘ gín-á tsòe tiāⁿ-tio̍h, chhin-chiâⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 新娘, tsa-bó͘ gín-á 做 定tio̍h, 親成.

comment: sin-niû, tsa-bó͘ gín-á tsòe tiāⁿ-tio̍h, chhin-chiâⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 新娘, tsa-bó͘ gín-á 做 定tio̍h, 親成.

comment: that-ba̍t, that-tsúi hō͘ i tò-tńg-lâu.
hanlo_comment: 窒密, 窒水 hō͘ 伊 倒tńg流.

comment: thô͘-tui, thô͘-soaⁿ, that-ba̍t; kap {堙Ian} thong.
hanlo_comment: 土堆, 土山, 窒密; kap {堙Ian} 通.

comment: tîm-lo̍h, bô-khì; tâm, bak-tio̍h, tò͘-tio̍h, tsúi-miâ, that-ba̍t; tông-siōng.
hanlo_comment: 沉落, 無去; 澹, bak-tio̍h, tò͘-tio̍h, 水名, 窒密; 同上.

comment: tē-jī têng ê siâⁿ-mn̂g, oan-oat ê siâⁿ tsó͘-chí, nôa-tsa̍h, that-ba̍t.
hanlo_comment: 第二 重 ê 城門, 彎斡 ê 城 阻止, 攔閘, 窒密.

comment: that-teh, that-ba̍t ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 窒teh, 窒密 ê 意思.

comment: kok ê miâ, Ian-kok; lâng ê jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 國 ê 名, 燕國; 人 ê 字姓.

comment: koāiⁿ ê miâ, sîn-sian ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 國 ê 名, 神仙 ê 名.

comment: sng, sòe-sòe ê tsó-á, ní=sek; phang=chháu.
hanlo_comment: 酸, 細細 ê 棗á, 染=色; 芳=草.

comment: hûi-khì, tsng-hiā, séng-chhat, bián-tit, kèng-kín, piáu-iūⁿ, tōe-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 磁器, 磚瓦, 省察, 免得, 敬謹, 表樣, 地名.

comment: kut-tsat thàng-thiàⁿ, kut sng-nńg; ut-tsut.
hanlo_comment: 骨節 疼痛, 骨 酸軟; 鬱卒.

comment: n̂g chham o͘ tsa̍p-sek ê chiáu; jī kù-bé ēng, sī gî-ngái ê ì-sù; that-thó, sím-mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 黃 chham 烏 雜色 ê 鳥; 字 句尾 用, 是 疑騃 ê 意思; that-thó, 甚物.

comment: nâ-âu, chia̍h-mi̍h teh thun-mi̍h ê só͘-tsāi; ian-âu, ian-chi.
hanlo_comment: 嚨喉, 食物 teh 吞物 ê 所在; 咽喉, 咽chi.

comment: nâ-âu, chia̍h-mi̍h teh thun-mi̍h ê só͘-tsāi; ian-âu, ian-chi; thun-chia̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 嚨喉, 食物 teh 吞物 ê 所在; 咽喉, 咽chi; 吞食 ê 意思.

comment: ian-chhun, chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán chiáu ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 鵪鶉, 就是 一款 鳥 ê 名.

comment: soah, hō͘ i soah, hâng-ho̍k, sit-chì ê khoán-sit; tó-teh, thán-tó, ián-tó, saⁿ-ián.
hanlo_comment: soah, hō͘ 伊 soah, 降服, 失志 ê 款式; 倒teh, 坦倒, 偃倒, 相偃.

comment: tsúi tn̂g lâu; tn̂g, khoah, thong-thàu, ha̍k-si̍p, sip-lūn; ián-bú, pā-ián.
hanlo_comment: 水 長 流; 長, 闊, 通透, 學習, 濕潤; 演武, 罷演.

comment: im-tsúi, tsúi-móa, tsōe-tsōe, khoah-tōa, súi, hó, pûi, thit-thô, sán-ián, iû-ián.
hanlo_comment: 淹水, 水滿, 濟濟, 闊大, 媠, 好, 肥, 𨑨迌, 瘦衍, 游衍.

comment: sì-kha siù chhin-chhiūⁿ niáu-chhú, phīⁿ tn̂g chiam chhin-chhiūⁿ chhiūⁿ, iā kóng chîⁿ-chhú.
hanlo_comment: 四腳 獸 親像 鳥鼠, 鼻 長 尖 親像 象, 也 講 錢鼠.

comment: thâng ê miâ, siān-lâng ê khoán-sit; ū lâng kóng siām-pô͘-chê ê lūi.
hanlo_comment: 蟲 ê 名, 蟺蟲 ê 款式; 有 人 講 是 am蜅蠐 ê 類.

comment: hî ê miâ, thâu-khak pe̍h, seng-khu îⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, 頭殼 白, 身軀 圓.

comment: chi̍t-khoán ê hó tiāu-thâu ê chiáu sī bú-ê.
hanlo_comment: 一款 ê 好 兆頭 ê 鳥 是 母ê.

comment: só͘-tsāi miâ, toan-chiàⁿ, sêng-si̍t.
hanlo_comment: 所在 名, 端正, 誠實.

comment: chiū-sī tōa-chhiò ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 大笑 ê 意思.

comment: lō͘-kô͘-bê; tsúi sún-siong ê khoán-sit; thô-téng ū tām-po̍h tsúi.
hanlo_comment: 路糊糜; 水 損傷 ê 款式; 頭頂 有 淡薄 水.

comment: saⁿ ām-kún ê niá; kó͘-tsá lâng ēng tsa̍p-sek sòaⁿ lâi siù.
hanlo_comment: 衫 頷頸 ê 領; 古早 人 用 雜色 線 來 綉.

comment: chiū-sī koāiⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 縣 ê 名.

comment: chiū-sī kiâⁿ-lō͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 行路 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī thâng ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 蟲 ê 名.

comment: tsúi miâ, tsúi chhut tī Hô-tang ê tang-pêng; tsúi lâu ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 水 名, 水 出 tī 河東 ê 東旁; 水 流 ê 款.

comment: chiū-sī tn̂g-tn̂g ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 長長 ê 意思.

comment: bih-teh, ún-khǹg ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: bih-teh, 隱khǹg ê 意思.

comment: mi̍h saⁿ-tn̄g-tio̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 物 相tn̄g-tio̍h ê 意思.

comment: that tsúi hō͘ i bô lâu; hōaⁿ, tsúi-tsa̍h.
hanlo_comment: 塞 水 hō͘ 伊 無 流; 岸, 水閘.

comment: tn̂g ê chhiuⁿ, tîn-pâi, chhiuⁿ ê lūi; lâng-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 長 ê 鎗, 藤牌, 鎗 ê 類; 人名.

comment: lô-ián-sê, chiū-sī kui-tīn ê gín-á, pài-pu̍t ê sî, iô ga̍k-khì ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 鑼演垂, 就是 kui陣 ê gín-á, 拜佛 ê 時, 搖 樂器 ê 意思.

comment: an-lo̍k, hioh-khùn; chhiáⁿ lâng-kheh, iân-sia̍h, siat-iân, àn-chhài.
hanlo_comment: 安樂, 歇睏; 請 人客, 筵席, 設筵, 按菜.

comment: saⁿ-kap kóng-oē, iân-sia̍h, khoàiⁿ-oa̍h, an-hioh, an-ún, chēng-chēng.
hanlo_comment: 講話, 筵席, 快活, 安歇, 安穩, 靜靜.

comment: súi, an-ún; hô-sūn ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 媠, 安穩; 和順 ê 款式.

comment: o͘-sek ê chiáu-miâ; hoaⁿ-hí; iân-sia̍h; êng-êng, chēng-chēng; an-ún; siat-to̍k; ìⁿ-á, chhài-iàn.
hanlo_comment: 烏色 ê 鳥名; 歡喜; 筵席; 閒閒, 靜靜; 安穩; 褻瀆; 燕á, 菜燕.

comment: koāiⁿ ê miâ, sîn-sian ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 縣 ê 名, 神仙 ê 名.

comment: ún-khǹg, kap tha̍k Ián sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 隱khǹg, kap 讀 Ián 相像.

comment: that-tsúi hō͘ i bô lâu, hōaⁿ, tsúi-tsa̍h.
hanlo_comment: 塞水 hō͘ 伊 無 流, 岸, 水閘.

comment: kap tha̍k Ián sio-siāng ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: kap 讀 Ián 相像 意思.

comment: si̍t-tsāi sī Ian, ū lâng chhò tha̍k tsòe Iàn; ì-sù kap Ian sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 實在 是 ian, 有 人 錯 讀 做 iàn; 意思 kap ian 相像.

comment: chia̍h-lo̍h-khì, thun lo̍h-khì.
hanlo_comment: 食落去, 吞 落去.

comment: chia̍h-lo̍h-khì, thun lo̍h-khì.
hanlo_comment: 食落去, 吞 落去.

comment: iàn-khì, chiū-sī kian-līn m̄-ài thé-thiap lâng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 厭氣, 就是 堅吝 m̄-ài 體貼 人 ê 意思.

comment: iàn-khì, chiū-sī kian-līn m̄-ài thé-thiap lâng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 厭氣, 就是 慳吝 m̄-ài 體貼 人 ê 意思.

comment: kiâⁿ tn̂g-lō͘; tn̂g, hn̄g, kú, bān-bān, sio-sòa; khì, kàu, pâi-lia̍t ín-chhōa, iân-chhân, iân-tî.
hanlo_comment: 行 長路; 長, 遠, 久, 慢慢, 相續; 去, 到, 排列 引chhōa, 延chhiân, 延遲.

comment: tsúi lâu-lo̍h; tè tsúi kiâⁿ; sio-liân-sòa; sūn-sūn, le̍k-lâi, iân-hái, iân-lō͘.
hanlo_comment: 水 流落; tè水 行; 相連續; 順順, 歷來, 沿海, 沿路.

comment: iân, bōe thang tsòe to, siah ê lūi, kok-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 鉛, bōe thang 做 刀, 削 ê 類, 國名.

comment: chhùi-nōa, chhùi ê chin-e̍k; kap chit-jī 涎 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 嘴瀾, 嘴 ê 津液; kap chit字 涎 相像.

comment: tsúi lâu-lo̍h, sūn-lâu; chiàu chhù-sū; iân-hái.
hanlo_comment: 水 流落, 順流; 照 次序; 沿海.

comment: chhiⁿ ê kim, o͘ ê siah; pe̍h-iân, iân-hún, a-iân.
hanlo_comment: 青 ê 金, 烏 ê 錫; 白鉛, 鉛粉, 亞鉛.

comment: tōe-hn̄g, kau-kài, bōng ê lō͘.
hanlo_comment: 地遠, 交界, 墓 ê 路.

comment: chhâ tn̂g-ki; tùi-koaiⁿ, tùi-taⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 柴 長枝; 對桱, 對今.

comment: chiáu ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ bā-hio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 ê 名, 親像 覓鴞.

comment: thò͘-á tsáu, siù teh tsáu.
hanlo_comment: 兔á 走, 獸 teh 走.

comment: tek-chhio̍h, toh, pho͘-siat, iân-sia̍h, siat iân-sia̍h.
hanlo_comment: 竹蓆, 桌, 鋪設, 筵席, 設 筵席.

comment: Tēng-kok pak-pêng ê tōe, Chìn-hô͘ hoa̍t Tēng kàu chit só͘-tsāi.
hanlo_comment: 鄭國 北爿 ê 地, 晉侯 伐 鄭 到 chit 所在.

comment: bián-liû chêng-āu sûi-lo̍h, jia-khàm; bō-koan ê kòa.
hanlo_comment: 冕旒 前後 垂落, 遮khàm; 帽冠 ê 蓋.

comment: chháu-miâ; siⁿ-thòaⁿ bô tn̄g, sio chiap-sòa ê ì-sù, bân-iân.
hanlo_comment: 草名; 生湠 無 斷, 相 接續 ê 意思, 綿延.

comment: ké-chí ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ kiat-á; chhiū-miâ chhut tī Kau-chí.
hanlo_comment: 果子 ê 名, 親像 桔á; 樹名 出 tī 交趾.

comment: chhùi ê chin-e̍k; tsúi lâu-lo̍h ê khoán-sit, lâu-nōa; thâm-nōa, thâm-iân.
hanlo_comment: 嘴 ê 津液; 水 留落 ê 款式, 流瀾; 痰瀾, 痰涎.

comment: siuⁿ-kún, kún-liâu; saⁿ-chiap, in-ūi, sūn-thàn, sūn-lō͘, iân-kò͘, in-iân.
hanlo_comment: 鑲袞, 袞條; 相接, 因為, 順趁, 順路, 緣故, 姻緣.

comment: siù ê miâ; siān-lâng kiò-tsòe 祝蜒
hanlo_comment: 獸 ê 名; 蟺蟲 叫做 祝蜒

comment: tn̂g-tn̂g, ín-chhōa, khan, phah, chhim-chhú; un-jiû, hô-pêng; khiú.
hanlo_comment: 長長, 引chhōa, 牽, phah, 侵取; 溫柔, 和平; 搝.

comment: thó͘-khùi; kóng pháiⁿ-oē kóaⁿ-kín ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 吐氣; 講 pháiⁿ話 趕緊 ê 款式.

comment: sòe-bé ê thâng; kiáu-jiáu; lā mi̍h hō͘-i tín-tāng, hoa̍t-phoat.
hanlo_comment: 細尾 ê 蟲; 攪擾; lā 物 hō͘伊 振動, 活潑.

comment: chháu-meh kiáⁿ bē ū si̍t ê; tang-thiⁿ siⁿ kè kôaⁿ chiū sí.
hanlo_comment: 草蜢 kiáⁿ 未 有 翼 ê; 冬天 生 過 寒 就 死.

comment: tōe-hō miâ; soaⁿ-sng ū iân chiáu sio i ê siū; lâng-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 地號 名; 山桑 有 䳒 鳥 燒 伊 ê 岫; 人名.

comment: ū-lâng kóng jī-kù thâu tio̍h tha̍k Iân; thái-thó.
hanlo_comment: 有人 講 字句 頭 著 讀 Iân; thái-thó.

comment: chhù-kòa kîⁿ, nî-chîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 厝蓋 墘, 簾前.

comment: hiat-ka̍k, tû-khì, sún-hoāi, hiàn-hō͘; tôe, tôe chîⁿ-gûn, tôe-iân, koan-tôe.
hanlo_comment: hiat-ka̍k, 除去, 損壞, 獻hō͘; 題, 題 錢銀, 題緣.

comment: bōng ê lō͘, kau-kài, tōe-hng.
hanlo_comment: 墓 ê 路, 交界, 地方.

comment: iân-sui, chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán chhài ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 芫荽, 就是 一款 菜名.

comment: chi̍t-iân chi̍t-iân, saⁿ-iân-pūn, kúi-nā iân.
hanlo_comment: 一沿 一沿 三沿笨, 幾nā 沿.

comment: ū chháu ûi chhiûⁿ ê chhù; kian-kò͘, keng-biō, gê-mn̂g, koaⁿ-miâ; am-īⁿ, tsu-īⁿ, bú-īⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 有 草 為 牆 ê 厝; 堅固, 宮廟, 衙門, 官名; 庵院, 書院, 撫院.

comment: khoài-lo̍k ê lâng.
hanlo_comment: 快樂 ê 人.

comment: chin-si̍t hiān-jīm ê tōa-koaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 真實 現任 ê 大官.

comment: tham, ài, him-bō͘; tn̂g, móa, ū-chhun, siān, him-siān, him-soān.
hanlo_comment: 探, 愛, 欣慕; 長, 滿, 有chhun, 羨, 欣羨, 欣羨.

comment: siuⁿ kún-iān, iān-niá; iān-saⁿ-khò͘.
hanlo_comment: 鑲 袞緣, 緣領; 緣衫褲.

comment: chhèng-iān, chiū-sī tsûn-tó͘-khang ê thang-á; ūi chhèng-iān.
hanlo_comment: 銃iān, 就是 船肚空 ê 窗á; 畫 銃iān.

comment: ēng mi̍h sàng tsoh chhân ê lâng chia̍h; sio-sàng.
hanlo_comment: 用 物 送 作 田 ê 人 食; 相送.

comment: kng-iàⁿ-iàⁿ, sih-nà ê khoán-sit; bō͘-sēng.
hanlo_comment: 光映映, 熾爁 ê 款式; 茂盛.

comment: hé kng-kng; kng-iàⁿ-iàⁿ, sih-nà ê khoán-sit; bō͘-sēng.
hanlo_comment: 火 光光; 光映映, 熾爁 ê 款式; 茂盛.

comment: súi, chhin-chhíⁿ, chhùi-phóe.
hanlo_comment: 媠, 親醒, 嘴䫌.

comment: ēng chi̍t ki tsńg-thâu hōaⁿ, the̍h, bong, hōaⁿ, chhiú ni̍h-teh.
hanlo_comment: 用 一 枝 tsńg頭 hōaⁿ, the̍h, 摸, hōaⁿ, 手 捏teh.

comment: pháiⁿ ê bîn-bāng, pháiⁿ-bāng.
hanlo_comment: pháiⁿ ê 眠夢, pháiⁿ夢.

comment: ng-iap, thau-iap, iap-chîⁿ hō͘-i, iap-chhiú, iap-bé, chhiú iap-āu.
hanlo_comment: 掩iap, 偷iap, iap錢 hō͘伊, iap手, iap尾, 手 iap後.

comment: ng-iap, thau-iap, iap-chîⁿ hō͘-i, iap-chhiú, iap-bé, chhiú iap-āu.

comment: po̍h-po̍h ê chhâ thang tsòe lî-pa ê lō͘-ēng; tek ê chhiam-á.

comment: khin-khin súi ê khoán-sit; iông-ún; bīn-māu.

comment: chiū-sī thang-á.

comment: khin-khin, súi iông-māu; iàm-chiān, pi-bî.
hanlo_comment: 輕輕, 媠 容貌; 厭賤, 𤰞微.

comment: khin-khin, súi iông-māu; iàm-chiān, pi-bî.
hanlo_comment: 輕輕, 媠 容貌; 厭賤, 𤰞微.

comment: thâu-khak; chiâⁿ-têng, chiâⁿ-ia̍h, chheh ê ia̍h.

comment: hé bô kng ê khoán-sit.

comment: chian-bah; ēng iû tsú-mi̍h, chiong kún-tsúi thǹg.

comment: sim-koaⁿ chhùi ia̍p-ia̍p, sim-koaⁿ tsōe-tsōe ia̍p.

comment: ia̍p-ia̍p-sī, chiū-sī chin-tsōe ê ì-sù.

comment: kā i kóng, chhéng-kìⁿ, pe̍h-pe̍h, pài-thàm, pín-bêng; chhì-chha̍k, thàu-kè; pài-iat.

comment: thâng ê miâ, thô͘-phang; sòe io ê phang.

comment: to̍k ê thâng-miâ, giat-á, tsoân-iat.

comment: sek-tī pāi-hoāi, sek-tī piàn.

comment: nâ-âu that, nâ-âu bōe thun-mi̍h, siⁿ nâ-âu that.
hanlo_comment: 嚨喉 that, 嚨喉 bōe 吞物, 生 嚨喉 that.

comment: nâ-âu that, nâ-âu bōe thun-mi̍h, siⁿ nâ-âu that.
hanlo_comment: 嚨喉 that, 嚨喉 bōe吞物, 生 嚨喉 that.

comment: hoaⁿ-hí, khoài-lo̍k; hâng-ho̍k.
hanlo_comment: 歡喜, 快樂; 降服.

comment: iū pêng piⁿ ê mn̂g-sìⁿ; tì chhiú-pún tī mn̂g-ni̍h; khòaⁿ, chhâ, sǹg-siàu, séng-chhat, ia̍t-le̍k.

hanlo_comment: 幾nā 張 車, 相爭 進前; 過頭, 超出, 車, 相刣; 快活, 四散.

comment: hoaⁿ-hí, khoài-lo̍k, thiòng-lo̍k, kap chit jī 悅 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 歡喜, 快樂, 暢樂, kap chit字 悅 相像.

comment: hoaⁿ-hí, khoài-lo̍k ê ì-sù.

comment: ia̍t-hong, ia̍t-hé, ia̍t-sìⁿ; ia̍t kún-tsúi, ia̍t-báng; ia̍t-chhiú.
hanlo_comment: 拽風, 拽火, 拽扇; 拽 滾水, 拽蚊; 拽手.

comment: ia̍t, chiū-sī ní kū si-pò͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: ia̍t, 就是 染 舊 絲布 ê 意思.

comment: sió-khóa ê ì-sù; sòe, iù, chíⁿ, té.
hanlo_comment: 小khóa ê 意思; 細, 幼, 茈, 短.

comment: ín-iú, súi, koh-iūⁿ, kî-koài, koài-bu̍t; iau-koài, tio̍h-iau, siáu-iau.

hanlo_comment: 地氣 反, pháiⁿ ê 兆頭; 妖孽; kap 妖 字 同.

comment: chháu-thâng teh háu ê siaⁿ.

comment: seng-khu ê tiong-tsat; kiat-sòe, iok-sok; sin-io, io-kut.

comment: chiū-sī saⁿ khioh-kéng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 衫 拾襉 ê 意思.

comment: chhut-tàⁿ ê seng-lí-lâng hoah-siaⁿ bōe-mi̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 出擔 ê 生理人 喝聲 賣物 ê 意思.

comment: sió-khóa, sòe, iù, chíⁿ, té, chiū-sī chit-jī ㄠ ê sio̍k-jī.
hanlo_comment: 小khóa, 細, 幼, 茈, 短, 就是 chit字 ㄠ ê 俗字.

comment: chháu-á, bī-khó͘, chia̍h lâi hā-khì.
hanlo_comment: 草á, 味苦, 食 來 下氣.

comment: loán-jio̍k ê khoán-sit.

hanlo_comment: 歡喜 ê 面色; 媠, 茈, 軟, 少年, iáu-kú 茈; 茂盛 ê 款式, 災禍.

comment: chháu-á, chháu chhiong-sēng ê khoán-sit.

hanlo_comment: iau餓, iau寒餓, 克苦 iau餓, 生iau, iau饑 失頓.

comment: khū-thûi; iúⁿ-tsúi ê ì-sù.

comment: siàu-liân sí, sí-sit; iáu-siū, iáu-chiat.

comment: chhim, hn̄g, súi, hó; an-chēng, chheng-hiu.

comment: khū-thûi; iúⁿ-tsúi ê ì-sù.

comment: tsúi bô piⁿ, tsúi sek chhim pe̍h ê khoán-sit.

comment: hó ê bé, chi̍t ji̍t kiâⁿ chi̍t-bān lí.
hanlo_comment: 好 ê 馬, 一 日 行 一萬 里.

comment: bú ê thī-koe teh háu ê ì-sù.

comment: bú ê thī-koe teh háu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 母 ê 雉雞 teh 哮 ê 意思.

comment: hè-siū té, khut-lo̍h, at-chi̍h, iáu-siū, tâng chit jī 殀 jī.

comment: chhim-chhim bô tóe, chhim oang-oang.
hanlo_comment: 深深 無 底, 深 oang-oang.

comment: chhim-chhim, ún-khǹg tī àm ê só͘-tsāi; siang-lo̍h chhù, tang-pêng kak.
hanlo_comment: 深深, 隱khǹg tī 暗 ê 所在; 雙落 厝, 東爿 角.

comment: îm-loān ê siaⁿ; káu tsōe-tsōe ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 淫亂 ê 聲; 狗 濟濟 ê 聲.

comment: chhim, hn̄g, chheng-hiu; thap-ba̍k, khiau ê khoán-sit.

comment: iáu-kú, iáu-ū, iáu-ê, iáu-hó, iáu-bô.
hanlo_comment: iáu-kú, iáu有, iáu-ê, iáu-hó, iáu無.

comment: oê téng-bīn ê phê; be̍h ê be̍h-chhiûⁿ.

comment: lâng ēng mâu-tún ê oē saⁿ kong-kek.

comment: phê-oê ê hia-kóng, sī Bú-koaⁿ khah siông teh ēng ê.

comment: beh, khiàm-kheh, khiàm-ēng, beh-ài; iàu-kín, chhiat-iàu, iàu-sū.
hanlo_comment: beh, 欠缺, 欠用, 欲愛; 要緊, 切要, 要事.

comment: chháu-á, chháu chhiong-sēng ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 草á, 草 充盛 ê 款式.

comment: chhim-chhim, chiū-sī kap tha̍k Iáu sio-siāng ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 深深, 就是 kap 讀 Iáu 相像 意思.

comment: kan-ta koa, ga̍k-su ū bûn-chiuⁿ kap khek ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: kan-ta 歌, 樂師 有 文章 kap 曲 ê 意思.

comment: hoaⁿ-hí, khoài-lo̍k, tek-ì ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 歡喜, 快樂, 得意 ê 意思.

comment: keng-thâu chhoa̍h-chhoa̍h teh kiâⁿ ê khoán-sit; thit-thô, súi, hó.

comment: lê-khak lāi-bīn ê kng-phê, thang tsòe siu-sek ê lō͘-ēng.

comment: iu-būn, kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, bô thang kò-sò͘; loān-loān, giâu-gî.
hanlo_comment: 憂悶, 驚惶, 無 thang 告訴; 亂亂, 僥疑.

comment: chhù-téng po̍h-po̍h ê ì-sù; chhù-kòa.

comment: thiàu-kè; kiâⁿ kha-pō͘ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 跳過; 行 腳步 ê 款式.

comment: tng-chit tsòe koaⁿ ê lâng; chhe-ia̍h, kap 徭 jī sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 當職 做 官 ê 人; 差役, kap 徭 字 相像.

comment: chhe-ia̍h; tng-chit tsòe koaⁿ ê lâng; ha̍k-seng chi̍t-pah liân jī-tsa̍p lâng.
hanlo_comment: 差役; 當職 做 官 ê 人; 學生 一百 連 二十 人.

comment: hoaⁿ-hí; tōa-sòe bô sio-siāng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 歡喜; 大細 無 相像 ê 意思.

comment: hó ê ge̍k, chio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ ge̍k; iâu-tî.
hanlo_comment: 好 ê 玉, 石 親像 玉; 瑤池.

comment: lām-sám chhiùⁿ-koa, húi-pòng, siⁿ pháiⁿ-oē, iâu-giân.

comment: hn̄g-hn̄g, thit-thô, siau-iâu, iâu-oán.

comment: siù ê miâ, káu ê chéng-lūi.

comment: sòe tiuⁿ chhia, hn̄g-hn̄g, hn̄g khòaⁿ ê chhia.
hanlo_comment: 細 張 車, 遠遠, 遠 看 ê 車.

comment: sòe tiuⁿ chhia, hn̄g-hn̄g, hn̄g khòaⁿ ê chhia.
hanlo_comment: 細 張 車, 遠遠, 遠 看 ê 車.

comment: bô an-ún ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 無 安穩 ê 意思.

comment: tín-tāng, tsōe, sim bô pêng-an, hùn-khì; iô-pái, iô-tsoah, iô-hong, iâu-tōng.
hanlo_comment: 振動, 濟, 心 無 平安, 費氣; 搖擺, 搖泏, 搖風, 搖動.

comment: hî miâ, poeh-chhioh tn̂g khoán-sit ná lí-hî, pe̍h-thâu; si̍t hoe-tsōa sin-o͘.
hanlo_comment: 魚 名, 八尺 長 款式 ná 鯉魚, 白頭; 翼 花逝 身烏.

comment: súi, chhìn-chhíⁿ, Sùn ê hō͘-è, lâng ê jī-sìⁿ, iô.
hanlo_comment: 媠, 親醒, 舜 ê 後裔, 人 ê 字姓, 姚.

comment: hong koâiⁿ ê khoán-sit, mi̍h hō͘ hong tín-tāng pe-khì; tín-tāng, phiau-iâu.
hanlo_comment: 風 懸 ê 款式, 物 hō͘ 風 振動 飛去; 振動, 飄搖.

comment: tóe mi̍h ê khì-kū, hûi tsòe-ê; tsúi-pân.
hanlo_comment: 貯 物 ê 器具, 瓷 做ê; 水瓶.

comment: kin-tè, bō͘-sēng, thiu-chhut; lâng ê jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 跟tè, 茂盛, 抽出; 人 ê 字姓.

comment: chháu bō͘-sēng ê khoán-sit, kin-tè, bō͘-sēng, thiu-chhut; lâng ê jī-sìⁿ.

comment: ngó͘-sek ê thī-koe.

comment: sio-hûi ê tsàu, hûi-iô, he-iô, hiā-iô, tsng-á-iô.
hanlo_comment: 燒瓷 ê 灶, 瓷窯, 灰窯, 瓦窯, 磚á窯.

comment: chhái-ūi ngó͘-sek tī lâng ê saⁿ-ni̍h.

comment: oé-oé, oé-lâng, sòe-sòe hàn-hàn ê lâng.

comment: chhiân-tî, iân-oān; bān-bān ê ì-sù.

comment: hé-kng, hé-chiò, kng-bêng, kng-iàⁿ-iàⁿ, iām-iáⁿ.

hanlo_comment: 火光, 火照, 光明, 光映映, 豔影.

comment: gû-i̍h; iûⁿ-i̍h, chiū-sī i pak-tó͘-lāi ê pî; lūn ti tio̍h kóng chhioh.

hanlo_comment: 勇壯 ê 款式; 作穡 人 行 ê 款式.

comment: lâu-ē ê siaⁿ, siaⁿ-ē ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 流下 ê 聲, 聲下 ê 款式.

comment: hî ê miâ, chi̍t-chheng kun; pau-hî chiū-sī hiān-kim ê ip-hî.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, 一千 斤; 鮑魚 就是 現今 ê ip魚.

comment: chháu ê miâ, chháu ām-ām ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 草 ê 名, 草 ām-ām ê 款式.

comment: saⁿ-á ê lak-tē; tîⁿ-tiâu; chheh ê tē-á.
hanlo_comment: 衫á ê 橐袋; 纏tiâu; 冊 ê 袋á.

comment: té-khùi, chhoán tōa-khùi, chhin-chhiūⁿ [lô-siâng|lô-siang] ê pīⁿ-lâng.
hanlo_comment: 短氣, 喘 大氣, 親像 癆傷 ê 病人.

comment: tōa-kng, kng-bêng, hé kim-chhiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 大光, 光明, 火 金星.

comment: oá hī-khang sòe-siaⁿ thau-kóng-oē, chhùi-chi̍h ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: oá 耳孔 細聲 偷講話, 嘴舌 ê 聲.

comment: ip-lé, chhiùⁿ-jiā, saⁿ-niū, kiâⁿ-ló; khiam-sùn, chìn-chêng, tsok-ip, ip-jiā.
hanlo_comment: 揖禮, 唱喏, 相讓, 行路; 謙遜, 進前, 作揖, 揖喏.

comment: mi̍h sīⁿ iâm; lâ-sâm; [âm-tsam|am-tsam].
hanlo_comment: 物 豉 鹽; lâ-sâm; 腌臢.

comment: thian-kan tē-jī jī, sio̍k-chhâ, oan, khiau, ut; chi̍t-ê; soah ê kì-hō.
hanlo_comment: 天干 第二 字, 屬柴, 彎, 曲, 鬱; 一個; soah ê 記號.

comment: sò͘-jī, sǹg-siàu ê khí-thâu; mi̍h ê chì-ke̍k, saⁿ-tâng, ka-nn̂g; sêng-si̍t, chió-chió.
hanlo_comment: 數字, 算數 ê 起頭; 物 ê 至極, 相同, 加nn̂g; 誠實, 少少.

comment: pîⁿ-pîⁿ, jī-sìⁿ, chi̍t ê, chi̍t ē, chi̍t iūⁿ, tē-it, tsoan-it.
hanlo_comment: 平平, 字姓, 一 ê, 一 下, 一 樣, 第一, 專一.

comment: hûi kan that-ba̍t, that-ba̍t, sio-ha̍p, tsòe-chi̍t ē, pîⁿ-pîⁿ, jī-sìⁿ, chi̍t ê, chi̍t ē, chi̍t iūⁿ, tē-it, tsoan-it.
hanlo_comment: 瓷 矸 窒密, 窒密, 相合, 做一 下, 平平, 字姓, 一 ê, 一 下, 一 樣, 第一, 專一.

comment: nâ-âu that, phah-eh.
hanlo_comment: 嚨喉 窒, phah 呃.

comment: chiáu-á ê miâ, [íⁿ-á|ìⁿ-á] ê lūi.
hanlo_comment: 鳥á ê 名, 燕á ê 類.

comment: hū-jîn-lâng ê koaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 婦人人 ê 官.

comment: chiū-sī tōa-hong ê ì-sù.

comment: chhàu-sng pn̄g, pn̄g hoán tâm-sip, chhàu-bī.

comment: tsúi teh lâu, kín ê khoán, chheng-khì ê khoán, kng-bêng ê khoán-sit.

comment: it-hoat, chiū-sī koh-khah ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 益發, 就是 koh-khah ê 意思.

comment: it-tit; it-tio̍h, chiū-sī ū khòaⁿ-kò͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 憶得; 憶tio̍h, 就是 有 看顧 ê 意思.

comment: pi-ai, hoân-ló; phòa-pīⁿ; su-siúⁿ, ún-ba̍t, hiu-àm, thí-jio̍k; thâu-tàm, iu-būn, iu-khó͘.

comment: lo̍k teh-háu ê siaⁿ; siaⁿ-hô; khó͘-khǹg; kan-khó͘ ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 鹿 teh哮 ê 聲; 聲和; 苦勸; 艱苦 ê 聲.

comment: lo̍k teh-háu ê siaⁿ; gîm-si ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 鹿 teh哮 ê 聲; 吟詩 ê 聲.

comment: khàm chéng-chí ê khì-kū, tî-thâu ê khoán-sit; khàm chéng-chí thû chháu-á.
hanlo_comment: khàm 種子 ê 器具, 鋤頭 ê 款式; khàm 種子 鋤 草á.

comment: hô-hia̍p, kàu-gia̍h, ū-chhun; lūn-te̍k, khoan-khoah, jiâu-jū, khah-iâⁿ, êng-êng.

comment: iá-siù ê miâ, lo̍k-bú.
hanlo_comment: 野獸 ê 名, 鹿母.

comment: iu-būn ê khoán-sit, khǹg siū-khì bô kóng-chhut.

comment: kóng-oē bōe tiāⁿ-tio̍h ê khoán, thó͘-khùi, khì ge̍k-chiūⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 講話 bōe 定tio̍h ê 款, 吐氣, 氣 逆上.

comment: khàm chéng-chí ê khì-kū, tî-thâu-pìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: khàm 種子 ê 器具, 鋤頭柄.

comment: tōe-hō miâ, Teng-kok.
hanlo_comment: 地號 名, 鄭國.

comment: bān-bān ê khoán-sit; iu-chhiû ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 慢慢 ê 款式; 憂愁 ê 意思.

comment: kiâⁿ tī tsúi-ni̍h, siû-tsúi, tsúi chhim ê só͘-tsāi teh-tsông; hut-jiân, só͘-tsāi, hit ê, só͘-í, só͘, hn̄g.
hanlo_comment: 行 tī 水裡, 泅水, 水 深 ê 所在, teh傱; 忽然, 所在, 彼ê, 所以, 所, 遠.

comment: tsúi teh lâu ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 水 teh 流 ê 款式.

comment: chhim-hn̄g, o͘-àm, [koaiⁿ-ka|koaiⁿ-kaⁿ], iok-sok.
hanlo_comment: 深遠, 烏暗, 關監, 約束.

comment: tâng sim ê lâng, tâng-phōaⁿ, kau-pôe, pêng-iú, iú-ài.
hanlo_comment: 同 心 ê 人, 同伴, 交陪, 朋友, 友愛.

comment: tâng sim ê lâng, tâng-phōaⁿ, kau-pôe, pêng-iú, iú-ài.
hanlo_comment: 同 心 ê 人, 同伴, 交陪, 朋友, 友愛.

comment: chhin-kūn hó, ín-chhōa.
hanlo_comment: 親近 好, 引chhōa.

comment: kūn-oá se̍k-se̍k, nōa-nōa, bêng-pe̍k, pá, lāu; lō͘-sóe ê chiú; tē-chi ê tē-tsa̍p jī, iú-sî.
hanlo_comment: 近oá 熟熟, 爛爛, 明白, 飽, 老; 露黍 ê 酒; 地支 ê 第十 字, 酉時.

comment: chiū-kūn ê ì-sù; kó͘-jī kap 酉 jī sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 就近 ê 意思; 古字 kap 酉 相像.

comment: chhù khí kú-kú chhâ chhàu-nōa, chhâ-àu.
hanlo_comment: 厝 起 久久 柴 臭爛, 柴漚.

comment: niáu-chhú ê lūi gâu se̍h, kâu ê lūi, ná kâu tsóng-sī bé tn̂g.
hanlo_comment: 鳥鼠 ê 類 gâu se̍h, 猴 ê 類, ná 猴 總是 尾 長.

comment: teh-beh sí, teh-beh pháiⁿ; chhàu, àu-khì, àu-chhàu, o͘-áu.
hanlo_comment: teh-beh 死, teh-beh pháiⁿ; 臭, 漚去, 漚臭, 烏拗.

comment: chiū-sī nńg-nńg ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 軟軟 ê 意思.

comment: tsá-khí chhut-sì ē-hng sí ê thâng, hoat tī tsúi-bīn.
hanlo_comment: 早起 出世 下昏 死 ê 蟲, 發 tī 水面.

comment: chhù khui thang kìⁿ-ji̍t; chi̍t sìⁿ ê thang, thang-á mn̂g; ǹg, tùi-hiòng, kà-sī, ín-chhōa, khui-bêng.
hanlo_comment: 厝 開 通 見日; 一 扇 ê 窗, 窗á 門; 向, 對向, 教示, 引chhōa, 開門.

comment: hî ê miâ, lí-hî, siⁿ tī khoe ê tiong-kan chhin-chhiūⁿ soa-hî.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, 鯉魚, 生 tī 溪 ê 中間 親像 鯊魚.

comment: o͘-sek, sió-khóa chhiⁿ; o͘-sek tsng-thāⁿ thô͘-kha.
hanlo_comment: 烏色, 小khóa 青; 烏色 妝飾 土腳.

comment: chek-tsū chhâ sio chè-hiàn thiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 積聚 柴 燒 祭獻 天.

comment: chek-tsū chhâ sio chè-hiàn thiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 積聚 柴 燒 祭獻 天.

comment: ēng oán-tsoán ê oē kā-lâng kóng; chìn-ji̍p, ín-chhōa, kà-sī; bê-he̍k, ín-iú.
hanlo_comment: 用 婉轉 ê 話 kā人 講; 進入, 引chhōa, 教示; 迷惑, 引誘.

comment: ēng oán-tsoán ê oē kā-lâng kóng; chìn-ji̍p, ín-chhōa, kà-sī; bê-he̍k, ín-iú.
hanlo_comment: 用 婉轉 ê 話 kā人 講; 進入, 引chhōa, 教示; 迷惑, 引誘.

comment: bān-bān ê khoán-sit, iu-būn iu-chhiû ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 慢慢 ê 款式, 憂悶 憂愁 ê 意思.

comment: chiàⁿ-chhiú-pêng, tōa-pêng, chiūⁿ-koâiⁿ, ióng-kiāⁿ, ín-chhōa, khó͘-khǹg; pang-tsān, iū-chhiú.
hanlo_comment: 正手爿, 大爿, 上懸, 勇健, 引chhōa, 苦勸; 幫贊, 右手.

comment: khòaⁿ-kò͘, pang-tsān, pì-iū, pó-pì.
hanlo_comment: 看顧, 幫贊, 庇佑, 保庇.

comment: tóe chiú ê pân, tiong-tsun ê khì-kū; âng-tâng tiáⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 貯 酒 ê 瓶, 中樽 ê 器具; 紅銅 鼎.

comment: Thài-sek ê soaⁿ ū chhiū chhin-chhiūⁿ lâi-á.
hanlo_comment: 太室 ê 山 有 樹 親像 梨á.

comment: iô-thâu ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 搖頭 ê 款式.

comment: bô ê tùi-hoán; tit-tio̍h; tī-teh; kó-jiân; koat-toàn; ū-iáⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 無 ê 對反; 得tio̍h; tī-teh; 果然; 決斷; 有影.

comment: bīn khiap-sì pháiⁿ-khòaⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 面 怯勢 pháiⁿ看 ê 意思.

comment: pháiⁿ ê chháu chhin-chhiūⁿ tiū, sio̍k phōe ê lūi, pháiⁿ, khiap-sì.
hanlo_comment: pháiⁿ ê 草 親像 稻, 屬 稗 ê 類, pháiⁿ, 怯勢.

comment: tn̂g ê chhiuⁿ, tîn-pâi, chhiuⁿ ê lūi.
hanlo_comment: 腸 ê 鎗, 藤牌, 鎗 ê 類.

comment: nî-ji̍t chió, chíⁿ-chhioh, sòe-hàn; tsû-ài; iù-iù, iù-chíⁿ, sòe-hàn iù-siù.
hanlo_comment: 年日 少, 茈chhioh, 細漢; 慈愛; 幼幼, 幼茈, 細漢 幼秀.

comment: kâu ê lūi; giâu-gî, chhin-chhiūⁿ, tùi-tiōng, nā, án-ni, [kè-bô|kè-bô͘]; tô͘-iūⁿ, hoat-tō͘, [êng-kai|eng-kai], iû-goân.
hanlo_comment: 猴 ê 類; 僥疑, 親像, 對重, 若, 按呢, 計謀; 圖樣, 法度, 應該, 猶原.

comment: tsúi-miâ, tsúi-lâu, phû teh kiâⁿ; thit-thô, êng-êng, kiâⁿ-sóa, kah-ì, [iù-ia̍h|iû-ia̍h].
hanlo_comment: 水名, 水流, 浮 teh 行; 𨑨迌, 閒閒, 行徙, 佮意, 優易.

comment: tsúi-miâ, tsúi-lâu, phû teh kiâⁿ; thit-thô, êng-êng, kiâⁿ-sóa, kah-ì, iû-ia̍h.
hanlo_comment: 水名, 水流, 浮 teh 行; 𨑨迌, 閒閒, 行徙, 佮意, 優易.

comment: ēng, kiâⁿ; [ian-kò͘|iân-kò͘], in-ūi, khoán-sit; tùi, thàn, chiông, tsún-i, iáu-kú, tāi-chì, in-iû.
hanlo_comment: 用, 行; 緣故, 因為, 款式; 對, 趁, 從, 准伊, iáu-kú, tāi-chì, 因由.

comment: khah-chē, put-chí; koh-tsài, koh-iūⁿ, kè-thâu, chhò-gō͘, tsōe-kò, tsai-ē, hiâm, oàn-hūn.
hanlo_comment: khah濟, 不止; koh再, 各樣, 過頭, 錯誤, 罪過, 災禍,嫌, 怨恨.

comment: kiâⁿ-sóa, chhut-gōa thit-thô, gô-lâi gô-khì, êng-êng, [poe-phōaⁿ|pôe-phōaⁿ], pêng-iú.
hanlo_comment: 行徙, 出外 𨑨迌, 遨來 遨去, 閒閒, 陪伴, 朋友.

comment: iû-goân, kiâⁿ, kiâⁿ-iû, iû-siúⁿ; hì-iû.
hanlo_comment: 猶原, 行, 行遊, 遊賞; 戲遊.

comment: bah ê ko; kng-kng, ku̍t-ku̍t; iû-ia̍h, bah-iû, gû-iû, teng-hé-iû.
hanlo_comment: 肉 ê 膏; 光光, 滑滑; 油ia̍h, 肉油, 牛油, 燈火油.

comment: hî ê miâ, [pe̍h-iû-hê|pe̍h-iû-hî].
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, 白鮋魚.

comment: lâng ê jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 人 ê 字姓.

comment: kî-chhì teh tín-tāng, kî ê chiam-bé sûi lo̍h-khì; kî ê kòa, kî ê liû.
hanlo_comment: 旗幟 teh 振動, 旗 ê 尖尾 垂 落去; 旗 ê 蓋, 旗 ê 旒.

comment: kóaⁿ-kín, pek-kūn; chīn-thâu, soah, [lō͘-bê|lō͘-bé]; kian-kò͘; tsū-chi̍p; ióng-béng, ngī; hut-jiân.
hanlo_comment: 趕緊, 逼近; 盡頭, soah, 路尾; 堅固; 聚集; 勇猛, 硬; 忽然.

comment: tsúi-chháu ê miâ, hoat tī tsúi-ni̍h.
hanlo_comment: 水草 ê 名, 發 tī 水裡.

comment: phû kiâⁿ tī tsúi téng, tsúi ê miâ, chiú-chiap.
hanlo_comment: 浮 行 tī 水 頂, 水 ê 名, 酒汁.

comment: khì teh kiâⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 氣 teh 行 ê 款式.

comment: chek-tsū chhâ sio chè-hiàn thiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 積聚 柴 燒 祭獻 天.

comment: tsúi piⁿ ê chháu, àu-chháu; chhàu-chhâ, tōe-hō miâ.
hanlo_comment: 水 邊 ê 草, 漚臭; 臭柴, 地號 名.

comment: kin-sûi, ho̍k-sāi ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 跟隨, 服事 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī tek ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 竹 ê 名.

comment: khin ê chhia, khin-khin, khang-khang, sió-khóa.
hanlo_comment: 輕 ê 車, 輕輕, 空空, 小khóa.

comment: tô͘-bô͘, chham-siông, lō͘, hoat-tō͘, tō-lí, ūi-tô͘, ūi-siōng.
hanlo_comment: 圖謀, 參詳, 路, 法度, 道理, 畫圖, 畫像.

comment: kúi-nā hō thâng ê miâ; tōa ê káu-hiā; thô͘-tiong [oe|oē] pe ê thâng, tsá-khí siⁿ, ē-hng sí.
hanlo_comment: 幾nā 號 蟲 ê 名; 大 ê 蚼蟻; 土中 會 飛 ê 蟲, 早起 生, 下昏 死.

comment: chhian-lí bé-koán, ia̍h-tsām; tok tsoh-chhân ê têng, put-chí, kè-thâu.
hanlo_comment: 千里 馬館, 驛站; 督 作田 ê 亭, 不止, 過頭.

comment: [chhi-iû|Chhi-iû] sī tsá tsu-hô͘ ê hō, tha̍k Hôe lâng pak-tó͘-lāi ê tn̂g-thâng.
hanlo_comment: [蚩蚘|=蚩尤] 是 早 諸侯 ê 號, 讀 Hôe 人 腹肚內 ê 長蟲.

comment: iû-iân, chi̍t-hō thâng khoán-sit ná giâ-kang, n̂g-sek.
hanlo_comment: 蚰蝝, 一號 蟲 款式 若 蜈蚣, 黃色.

comment: bô chiàⁿ ê jī; lâng ēng tsòe ba̍t-tsa̍t, jiû-hî ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 無 正 ê 字; 人 用 做 密實, 鰇魚 ê 名.

comment: ut-tsut, khòa-lū, siūⁿ; hn̄g-hn̄g; kú-kú, ta̍uh-ta̍uh, bān-bān, êng-êng.
hanlo_comment: 鬱卒, 掛慮, 想; 遠遠; 久久, 沓沓, 慢慢, 閒閒.

comment: lia̍p-á, lia̍p-á chéng, phê ê téng-bīn tsū-chi̍p koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 粒á, 粒á 腫, 皮 ê 頂面 聚集 懸懸.

comment: chē-kòa, pháiⁿ-tāi, chē-khian, lâng-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 罪過, pháiⁿ代, 罪愆, 人名.

comment: chiū-sī chhiū khui-chhe bō͘-sēng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 樹 開叉 茂盛 ê 意思.

comment: khì teh kiâⁿ ê khoán-sit, chhiò ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 氣 teh 行 ê 款式, 笑 ê 款.

comment: kiat-pīⁿ, lia̍p-á, phê téng tsū-chi̍p koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 橘病, 粒á, 皮 頂 聚集 懸懸.

comment: tn̂g-tn̂g ê chhiū-ńg; the̍h-chhut sòa tsàn-sêng, o-ló.
hanlo_comment: 長長 ê 樹蔭; the̍h出 續 贊成, o-ló.

comment: tsúi kín-lâu ê ì-sù.

comment: kiâⁿ tī tsúi-ni̍h, siû-tsúi, tsúi chhim ê só͘-tsāi teh-tsông; hut-jiân, só͘-tsāi hit ê, só͘-í, hn̄g.

comment: mn̂g sòe-sòe iù-iù ê ì-sù.

comment: jû-chhiáng-chhiáng loān-loān ê mn̂g.

comment: iù-iù ê thâu-mn̂g; mn̂g-pò͘.

comment: koe ê lūi, chhài-koe.

comment: pûi-tōa, kiáu-jiáu; kap chit-jī 娘 sio-siāng.

comment: chháu tú-tú hoat; tsōe-tsōe; tsū-chi̍p; tsńg kah-se ê só͘-tsāi; tsńg-kah-jiông, lo̍k-jiông.

comment: chháu tú-tú hoat; tsōe-tsōe; tsū-chi̍p; tsńg kah-se ê só͘-tsāi; tsńg-kah-jiông, lo̍k-jiông.
hanlo_comment: 草 tú-tú 發; 濟濟; 聚集; 指甲紗 ê 所在; 指甲茸, 鹿茸.

comment: chhut-khùi-la̍t, tsáu ê khoán-sit.

comment: ēng-mn̂g lâi tsng-thāⁿ; mn̂g tsōe ê ì-sù.

comment: ēng-mn̂g lâi tsng-thāⁿ; mn̂g tsōe ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 用毛 來 妝飾; 毛 濟 ê 意思.

comment: khan-lâi sak-khì; thau-the̍h; the-sî; at-chí, tû-khì.

comment: saⁿ chek-pī; thè-khui; khiam-sùn; saⁿ-niū.

comment: chiū-sī kap tha̍k Jiông sio-siāng; mn̂g tsōe-tsōe ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 kap 讀 Jiông 相像; 毛 濟濟 ê 意思.

comment: saⁿ-chhûn; saⁿ-chek-pī; thè-khui; khiam-sùn, saⁿ-niū.
hanlo_comment: 相chhûn; 相責備; 退開; 謙遜, 相讓.

comment: tsáu ê khoán-sit; tui-jip.

comment: kô͘ ê lūi, ka-liâm.

comment: ta̍k-ji̍t só͘ chhēng ê saⁿ; pêng-siông chho͘-pò͘ ê saⁿ.

comment: chiū-sī thún-ta̍h ê ì-sù.

comment: iá-siù ê kha-jiah; kha-tôe, thún-ta̍h.

comment: bô kut ê hî ê miâ; jiû-hî.

comment: siù, kâu, gâu peh-chhiū ê kâu, [jiû-oān|jiû-oân] ê lūi.
hanlo_comment: 獸, 猴, gâu peh樹 ê 猴, 猱猿 ê 類.

comment: ta̍h gō͘-kak, thún-ta̍h.

comment: ut-khiau, ēng-chhâ ut-oan lâi tsòe lôe.

comment: jiû thô͘-kha, chiū-sī sóe-thô͘-kha ê ì-sù.

comment: jōa-tsōe, ū jōa-tsōe; bô jōa-tsōe; jōa-kú.

hanlo_comment: 燒熱, khah熱, 放熱; 鬱熱; 貪熱.

comment: chiū-sī jê, joán ê ì-sù, jê-mi̍h.

comment: sió-khóa chìn-chêng tōa, un-jiû, loán-jio̍k.

comment: chiū-sī pâng-saⁿ ê ì-sù.

comment: tiong-pān ê ge̍k; pe̍h ná peng ū tām-po̍h âng-sek.

comment: tiong-pān ê ge̍k; pe̍h ná peng ū tām-po̍h âng-sek.

comment: hô-pîⁿ ê tōe; siâⁿ-ē ê chhân; soa-thô͘.

comment: ēng chháu pa̍k chhia-lûn, nńg-nńg, nńg-chiáⁿ, nńg-lūn; loán-jio̍k, an-loán.

comment: ēng chháu pa̍k chhia-lûn, nńg-nńg, nńg-chiáⁿ, nńg-lūn; loán-jio̍k, an-loán.
hanlo_comment: 草 縛 車輪, 軟軟, 軟chiáⁿ, 軟韌; 軟弱, 安軟.

comment: thâng kiâⁿ ê khoán-sit; tín-tāng, kún-lún-tsūn; [sò|sô], sô-lô kok ê miâ.

comment: kha ê phòa-pīⁿ, chhiú-kut-tsat.

comment: joán-khui, chiū-sī ēng chhiú tsoān-mn̂g khui ê ì-sù.

comment: nńg-nńg ê gûn.

comment: chiū-sī sio ê ì-sù.

comment: hé-sio, jia̍t; pē-hé, ù-sio, ù-hé, sio-joa̍h.

comment: sán, siau-sán; kau-tîⁿ; ló-jio̍k; tò-phak.

comment: chhó-bo̍k hoe-hio̍h hó-khòaⁿ [sûi-loh|sûi-lo̍h]; sòa-chiap, [ùi-nńg|iù-nńg], jiû-jio̍k.

comment: chiū-sī chíⁿ-kiuⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 茈薑 ê 意思.

comment: kap tha̍k Joân sio-siāng ì-sù, jôe-mi̍h.

comment: sip-pīⁿ, bōe-oē-kiâⁿ, bâ-hong.

comment: ké-chí tōa pha sûi-lo̍h ê khoán-sit, tû-chháu, lôe-chhân.

comment: chháu hoat-siⁿ; tsúi-piⁿ; sòe nńg ê khoán-sit; tîn-pâi āu-bīn ê soh.

comment: tsúi ê miâ, tsúi saⁿ-chhiong ê khoán-sit; tsúi-oan.

comment: sng-ám ê báng-á, báng-á, báng; to̍k ê thâng, to̍k-tsôa ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 酸湆 ê 蚊á, 蚊á, 蚊; 毒 ê 蟲, 毒蛇 ê 名.

comment: sng-ám ê báng-á, báng-á, báng; to̍k ê thâng, to̍k-tsôa ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 酸湆 ê 蚊á, 蚊á, 蚊; 毒 ê 蟲, 毒蛇 ê 名.

comment: khòaⁿ chhim koh-bêng; thong-ta̍t, tì-hūi; sêng-jîn; su-siúⁿ; chhang-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 看 深 koh明; 通達, 智慧; 聖人; 思想; 聰明.

comment: khòaⁿ chhim koh-bêng; thong-ta̍t, tì-hūi; sêng-jîn; su-siúⁿ; chhang-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 看 深 koh明; 通達, 智慧; 聖人; 思想; 聰明.

comment: tsoh-chhân ê ke-si; lôe, chiū-sī kap chit-jī 犁 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 作田 ê 家私; 耒, 就是 kap chit字 犁 相像.

comment: kè-thâu, khah-iâⁿ; it-hoat; lī-ek; chìn-chêng, chha; hó, gâu.
hanlo_comment: 過頭, khah贏; 益發; 利益; 進前, 差; 好, gâu.

comment: jiû-nńg; chhiong-móa; iúⁿ-chhī; pū-nn̄g; ni, leng, ni-thâu; ni-chiap.
hanlo_comment: 柔軟; 充滿; 養飼; 孵卵; 奶, 奶, 奶頭; 奶汁.

comment: tiū-chek tī chhân-ni̍h tsòe-tui; tah pîⁿ-á tī soaⁿ-ni̍h oē thia̍p tóe tsa̍p-la̍k táu.
hanlo_comment: 稻粟 tī 田裡 做堆; 搭 棚á tī 山裡 會 疊 貯 十六 斗.

comment: chiū-sī niû-mi̍h ê khì-kū, tsa̍p-la̍k táu.

comment: pîn-tōaⁿ; siat-nāi ê lâng bōe oē ka-kī khí-lâi, ná tōe-ni̍h ê chhài-koe.

comment: khîm-siù; siaⁿ ná gín-á; hô-ti ê pa̍t-miâ.

comment: chhiò ê khoán-sit; hoaⁿ-hí; niáu-chhú ê siaⁿ.

comment: Tēng Bûn-kong ê sòe-î, Kiat-bōng; lâng ê jī-sìⁿ.

comment: chíⁿ-lāi sòe-bé ê thâng, tn̂g chhùn-gōa.

comment: kín-sīn; khûn-kín; kian-kò͘.

comment: chiū-sī tn̂g-saⁿ ê ì-sù.

comment: tsúi ê miâ, tsúi chhèng-chhut; tsúi tiong ê tóe; tsúi lâu ê khoán.

comment: lī-ek, hó; kai-tsài; chhoe-it; tāi-kiat; tsùn-kiat; kiat-hiong.

comment: bú-gōe; ēng khùi-la̍t ê khoán-sit; kóaⁿ-kín, an-hioh.

comment: môa-sòaⁿ chi̍t tiâu; tsôe-tsáⁿ, chēng-chēng; chheng-khì.

comment: chhiⁿ-mî ê iûⁿ-káng; iam ê iûⁿ-káng, ióng-kiāⁿ.
hanlo_comment: chhiⁿ-mî ê 羊káng; 閹 ê 羊káng, 勇健.

comment: pì-kiat, chiū-sī tāi-piān bōe thong ê ì-sù.

comment: phòa khui thiah-li̍h ê ì-sù; hiong-ok; tam-tng, giâ-khí, bān-lâng ê thâu.

comment: tsâi-tiāu iâⁿ-kè tsa̍p-lâng; lêng-lāi; kiau-ngō͘, seng tōa tsâng ê tiū; hô-kia̍t.

comment: liáu, chīn, bô; giâ, pē, tsài, pāi; soân-tsoán.
hanlo_comment: 了, 盡, 無; giâ, 背, 載, 敗; 旋轉.

comment: chhiú niû mi̍h-kiāⁿ; kia̍h-koâiⁿ.

comment: chhiú niû mi̍h-kiāⁿ; kia̍h-koâiⁿ.

comment: khui, li̍h, thek-kut; thâi cheng-siⁿ pak-kut.

hanlo_comment: 刁持 khiā ê 石. 東海 有 石坊 山, 石坊.

comment: bú-gōe, ēng khùi-la̍t ê khoán-sit; kóaⁿ-kín; an-hioh.
hanlo_comment: 武藝, 用 氣力 ê 款式; 趕緊; 安歇.

comment: hian-kòa; thǹg-bō; chhia-pháiⁿ ê khoán; kia̍h-hoâiⁿ; tam-tng; taⁿ, pē.
hanlo_comment: 掀蓋; 褪帽; 車pháiⁿ ê 款; 舉莖; 擔當; 擔, 背.

comment: chhiⁿ-mî ê iûⁿ-káng; iam ê iûⁿ-káng, ióng-kiāⁿ.
hanlo_comment: chhiⁿ-mî ê 羊káng; 閹 ê 羊káng, 勇健.

comment: siaⁿ-im, siaⁿ-seh; siù ê miâ.

comment: siaⁿ-im, siaⁿ-seh; siù ê miâ.

comment: pò-iông; chhut-siaⁿ; ka-kī pá-chhî ê ì-sù.

comment: pò-iông; chhut-siaⁿ; ka-kī pá-chhî ê ì-sù.

comment: khoa-kháu; khó-lîn, lîn-bín ê ì-sù.

comment: kak bô chiàⁿ, kak-tn̂g, kak koâiⁿ ê khoán-sit.

comment: chi̍t khoán ê io̍h-chháu.

comment: kiau-so, chiū-sī sái-sō ê ì-sù.

comment: hoan-kiau, chiū-sī gû, bé, tó tī thô͘ teh kō ê ì-sù.

comment: ge̍h ê pe̍h ê ì-sù, kap 皎 jī sio-siāng.

hanlo_comment: 蟲, 野蠻 ê 名, 龍 ê 款式; 字姓.

comment: pa̍k-tiâu, pa̍k-saⁿ-liân ê ì-sù.

comment: tsōe-tsōe oē, hì-lāng ê oē; kóng-oē bô-thâu bô-bé.

comment: kng-bêng, chheng-piat ê khoán-sit.

comment: kng-bêng, chheng-piat ê khoán-sit.

comment: chiū-sī tsúi ê siaⁿ.

comment: sòe-niá khò͘, lāi-bīn-khò͘.

comment: kiâⁿ; tsòe; koan-sim, tì-ì ê ì-sù.

comment: ba̍k-chiu bô-nih, kng-bêng, chheng-pe̍h ê khoán-sit.

comment: kak bô sì-chiàⁿ, kap tha̍k Kiau sio-siāng.

comment: kia̍h khí chhiú, khîⁿ, the̍h, ngī; iā kap 矯 jī sio-siāng.

hanlo_comment: 纏tiâu, jû chhiáng-chhiáng; 包 腳骨 ê 布; 進獻, 交互, 繳kè.

comment: ióng-béng, bú-ióng ê khoán-sit; chhiong-sēng.
hanlo_comment: 勇猛, 武勇 ê 款式; 充盛.

comment: poa̍h-kiáu, poa̍h-kiáu lōng-tōng; poa̍h gōng-kiáu, kiáu-kúi.
hanlo_comment: 跋kiáu, 跋kiáu 浪蕩; 跋 戇kiáu, kiáu鬼.

comment: poa̍h-kiáu, poa̍h-kiáu lōng-tōng; poa̍h gōng-kiáu, kiáu-kúi.
hanlo_comment: 跋kiáu, 跋kiáu 浪蕩; 跋 戇kiáu, kiáu鬼.

comment: tōa-siaⁿ kiò, háu, lām-sám kóng-oē, kiò-lâng.

comment: ēng siaⁿ chio-lâng lâi; chhut tōa-siaⁿ; hō-miâ; ín-chhōa; âu-kiò, kiò-lâng.
hanlo_comment: 用 聲 招人 來; 出 大聲; 號名; 引chhōa; 喉叫, 叫人.

comment: ēng siaⁿ chio-lâng lâi; chhut tōa-siaⁿ; hō-miâ; ín-chhōa; âu-kiò, kiò-lâng.
hanlo_comment: 用 聲 招人 來; 出 大聲; 號名; 引chhōa; 喉叫, 叫人.

comment: kiò; khîm-siù háu ê siaⁿ, chhim-chhim ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 叫; 禽獸 吼哮 ê 聲, 深深 ê 聲.

comment: bô an-ún ê ì-sù; bōe an-jiân.
hanlo_comment: 無 安穩 ê 意思; bōe 安然.

comment: sì-kòe-kiâⁿ, sûn-sī; sió-lō͘, jia-ûi; pian-kài; khiò, tsòe-khiò.
hanlo_comment: 四界行, 巡視; 小路, 遮圍; 邊界; 徼, 做徼.

comment: koâiⁿ kap khiau ê khoán; koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ ti̍t-thàu khí ê khoán-sit, khut-khiok.
hanlo_comment: 懸 kap 曲 ê 款; 懸懸 直透 起 ê 款式, 屈曲.

comment: kùi-hoe, sòe-sòe ê chháu, tsōe-tsōe hoe chió-chió hio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 桂花, 細細 ê 草, 濟濟 花 少少 葉.

comment: soaⁿ chiam koh koâiⁿ; soaⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 山 尖 koh 懸; 山 ê 名.

comment: bōe an-jiân, bô an-ún ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: bōe 安然, 無 安穩 ê 意思.

comment: bōe an-jiân, bô an-ún ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: bōe 安然, 無 安穩 ê 意思.

comment: koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ; kheh-tiàm, chiām-sî, hioh, lâng ê jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 懸懸; 客店, 暫時, 歇, 人 ê 字姓.

comment: kiô, kè-tsúi ê pang, thán-hoâiⁿ ê chhâ; chhâ-kiô, kè-tsúi kiô, phû-kiô.
hanlo_comment: 橋, 過水 ê 枋, 坦橫 ê 柴; 柴橋, 過水 橋, 浮橋.

comment: koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ teh pe, pe ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 懸懸 teh 飛, 飛 ê 意思.

comment: ióng-kiāⁿ, gâu-tsáu, kiâⁿ, kia̍h-kha; khin-khin tsáu ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 勇健, gâu走, 行, 攑腳; 輕輕 走 ê 款式.

comment: liân-kiâu chháu, chi̍t-miâ hān-liân chí, Thài-san soaⁿ-kok put-chí tsōe.
hanlo_comment: 蓮kiâu草, 一名 旱蓮 子, 泰山 山谷 不止 濟.

comment: gō͘-kak ê miâ, saⁿ-kak-be̍h, kiô-be̍h.
hanlo_comment: 五穀 ê 名, 三角麥, 蕎麥.

comment: tn̂g bé koe, bé tn̂g la̍k-chhioh, bah put-chí hó-chia̍h.
hanlo_comment: 長 尾 雞, 尾 長 六尺, 肉 不止 好食.

comment: sòe tiuⁿ-chhia, tha̍k Kiāu chiū-sī kiō.
hanlo_comment: 細 張車, 讀 Kiāu 就是 轎.

comment: kiâⁿ tī thô͘-bê ê téng-bīn, kiâⁿ-kiô.
hanlo_comment: 行 tī 土糜 ê 頂面, 行橋.

comment: chiáu-bé ê tn̂g-mn̂g; tsōe-tsōe; hoat-khí; koâiⁿ, kia̍h-khí; nì-kha-bé ǹg-bāng.
hanlo_comment: 鳥尾 ê 長毛; 濟濟; 發起; 懸, 攑起; 躡腳尾 ǹg望.

comment: kéng, the̍h tām-po̍h; ēng khì-kū chhiâu-mi̍h; chhah-ji̍p, kiāu-khí, kiāu-khui.
hanlo_comment: 揀,the̍h 淡薄; 用 器具 撨物; 插入, 撟起, 撟開.

comment: kéng, the̍h tām-po̍h; ēng khì-kū chhiâu-mi̍h; chhah-ji̍p, kiāu-khí, kiāu-khui.
hanlo_comment: 揀,the̍h 淡薄; 用 器具 撨物; 插入, 撟起, 撟開.

comment: keng-thâu kng ê chhia, kiō, âng-kiō; chē-kiō, kng-kiō.
hanlo_comment: 肩頭 扛 ê 車, 轎, 紅轎; 坐轎, 扛轎.

comment: [kàn-kiān|kàn-kiāu], kàn-kiāu-lâng; chhoh kàn-kiāu.
hanlo_comment: 姦撟, 姦撟人; chhoh 姦撟.

comment: kiauh-khí, kiauh-khí-lâi, chiū-sī kiāu-khí-lâi ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 撟起, kiauh起來, 就是 撟起來 ê 意思.

comment: kiauh-kiauh-jióng, kiauh-kiauh-háu.
hanlo_comment: 噭噭嚷, 噭噭哮.

comment: kia̍uh-kia̍uh-kiò, kí-kí kia̍uh-kia̍uh, ki-bú kì-kia̍uh.
hanlo_comment: kia̍uh-kia̍uh叫, 指指 kia̍uh-kia̍uh, 吱bú kì-kia̍uh.

comment: kōng-kia̍uhⁿ, chiū-sī bô tsāi tín-tāng ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 誆kia̍uhⁿ, 就是 無 在 振動 ê 聲.

comment: kng-kiō, kng-thui, kng-kang; kng-pán; kng-tsúi.

hanlo_comment: 米管, 火管, 蔥管; 嚨喉管, 肺管, 硬管.

comment: kui-kńg, kúi-nā-kńg, chit-kńg-chhio̍h.

comment: gû-kǹg, chiū-sī gû-phīⁿ-khian ê ì-sù.

comment: kǹg-chîⁿ; kǹg-kōaⁿ; ge̍k-kǹg-chîⁿ; [má-tsó͘-kǹg|Má-tsó͘-kǹg], [chhit-niû|Chhit-niû] kǹg.

hanlo_comment: 鋼刀, 好鋼, pháiⁿ鋼, 硬鋼, 軟鋼.

comment: chi̍t-pún-kǹg, chhiú-kǹg, khó-kǹg, tsu-kǹg, kau-kǹg.
hanlo_comment: 一本卷, 首卷, 考卷, 書卷, 交卷.

comment: sio-thâi ê ke-si, bô chiam-bé ê kek, chhiuⁿ, khì-hâi, kan-ko.
hanlo_comment: 相刣 ê 家私, 無 尖尾 ê 戟, 鎗, 器械, 干戈.

comment: sòe chiah iûⁿ, iûⁿ-á-kiáⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 細 隻 羊, 羊á kiáⁿ.

comment: siaⁿ-im, kap chit-jī 哥 siāng; hiaⁿ-ko, án-ko, a-ko.
hanlo_comment: 聲音, kap chit字 哥 像; 兄哥, 俺哥, 阿哥.

comment: tsúi ê miâ, San-iông ô͘-lêng ê tsúi, [ko-te̍k|Ko-te̍k].
hanlo_comment: 水 ê 名, 山陽 湖靈 ê 水, 渮澤.

comment: siaⁿ-im, tsá kap chit-jī 歌 sio-siāng; hiaⁿ-ko, án-ko, a-ko.
hanlo_comment: 聲音, 早 kap chit字 歌 相像; 兄哥, 俺哥, 阿哥.

comment: ko-piáⁿ, chiū-sī kap chit-jī 糕 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 糕餅, 就是 kap chit字 糕 相像.

comment: koâiⁿ ê tek, tek-ko ê ì-sù.

comment: khan tn̂g-siaⁿ, chhiùⁿ-koa, chhiùⁿ-chhut-siaⁿ, chhiùⁿ-khek.
hanlo_comment: 牽 長聲, 唱歌, 唱出聲, 唱曲.

comment: chiū-sī phòa-pīⁿ ê ì-sù; thái-ko.
hanlo_comment: 就是 破病 ê 意思; 癩ko.

comment: bí hún-hún, bê-bê, chhiau-thn̂g lâi chhe, ko-piáⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 米 粉粉, 糜糜, chhiau糖 來 炊, 糕餅.

comment: ēng lé-sò͘ lâi o-ló, khan tn̂g-siaⁿ; sio̍k-jī kap chit-jī 皋 sio-siāng.

comment: sio kim-gûn ê khì-kū.
hanlo_comment: 燒 金銀 ê 器具.

comment: gín-á saⁿ ìn-tap ê siaⁿ.

comment: chhâ oē tsòe-tit ki-khì ê khì-kū ê chhiū; cheng-khū.
hanlo_comment: 柴 會 做得 機器 ê 器具 ê 樹; 舂臼.

comment: siaⁿ-im, khan tn̂g-siaⁿ, chhiùⁿ-koa lâi hoaⁿ-hí, chhiùⁿ-khek.
hanlo_comment: 聲音, 牽 長聲, 唱歌 來 歡喜, 唱曲.

hanlo_comment: 縛船, 莊牁 郡 ê 名, 也是 江 ê 名.

comment: Chîn-jîn kiò-tsòe thô͘-tiáⁿ ê ì-sù.

comment: Chîn-jîn kiò-tsòe thô͘-tiáⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 秦人 叫做 塗鼎 ê 意思.

comment: giâ, gô, hiān-sî sī chi̍t-khoán chiáu oē kóng-oē; eng-ko chiáu.
hanlo_comment: giâ, 鵝, 現時 是 一款 鳥 會 講話; 鶯哥 鳥.

comment: kó͘ tn̂g chi̍t-tn̄g nn̄g-chhioh, tōa-kó͘.
hanlo_comment: 鼓 長 一丈 兩尺, 大鼓.

comment: chhia téng tóe tōa keng-chìⁿ ê phê-lông; keng-chìⁿ-tē, chiàn-kah.

comment: chhiūⁿ tsúi ê khì-kū, tiàu-o, chhiū ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 上 水 ê 器具, 吊槔, 樹 ê 名.

comment: tóe ko-iû ê khì-kū; tiáⁿ ê khoán-sit, tâng-e, e-á.
hanlo_comment: 貯 膏油 ê 器具; 鼎 ê 款式, 銅鍋, 鍋á.

comment: tsúi ê miâ, tsúi lâu ǹg ji̍p-hái; tsúi tńg-se̍h teh lâu, jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 水 ê 名, 水 流 向 入海; 水 tńg-se̍h teh 流, 字姓.

comment: lūn-te̍k ê ì-sù; iû-lâ, pûi-pûi, hó ê bu̍t-bī; ko-io̍h.
hanlo_comment: 潤澤 ê 意思; 油膋, 肥肥, 好 ê 物味; 膏藥.

comment: tsûn, tōa chiah tsûn, ūn-mi̍h ê tsûn.
hanlo_comment: 船, 大 隻 船, 運物 ê 船.

comment: chhùi oai bô sì-chiàⁿ; hô-ha̍p, jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 嘴 歪 無 四正; 和合, 字姓.

comment: phah, phah-kó͘, tsá-khí sî ê koe bē thî, kiⁿ-kó͘ ti̍t-ti̍t phah.
hanlo_comment: phah, phah 鼓, 早起 時 ê 雞 未 啼, 更鼓 直直 phah.

comment: ēng lé-sò͘ lâi o-ló, khan tn̂g-siaⁿ; koâiⁿ; chiūⁿ chhù-téng hoah-siaⁿ; tsúi-kîⁿ, bān-bān.
hanlo_comment: 用 禮數 來 o-ló, 牽 長聲; 懸; 上 厝頂 喝聲; 水墘, 慢慢.

comment: ti-ko, khan-ti-ko, chhī-lâng chiâⁿ ti-ko.
hanlo_comment: 豬哥, 牽豬哥, 飼人 成 豬哥.

comment: ko-chhioh, chiū-sī ba̍k-sai-hū teh ēng tn̂g ê chhâ-chhioh.
hanlo_comment: 篙尺, 就是 木師傅 teh 用 長 ê 柴尺.

comment: ko-chhe, tek ko-chhe, chiū-sī khè tek-ko ê khì-kū.
hanlo_comment: 篙叉, 竹 篙叉, 就是 khè 竹篙 ê 器具.

comment: chio̍h-ko, chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán ê mi̍h oē chia̍h-tit.
hanlo_comment: 石膏, 就是 一款 ê 物 會 食得.

comment: thái-ko, chiū-sī seng-khu, kha-chhiú, phīⁿ, nōa bô chiàu-goân.
hanlo_comment: 癩ko, 就是 身軀, 腳手, 鼻, 爛 無 照原.

comment: chhiū só͘ kiat ê lia̍p ū-chí, ū hu̍t, ké-chí; bû-hoa-kó.
hanlo_comment: 樹 所 結 ê 粒 有子, 有 核, 果子; 無花果.

comment: tóe iû ê khì-kū, chhia tiong tóe-iû lâi boah chhia-lûn.

comment: chhia-tiong tóe-iû ê khì-kū.

comment: béng ê khîm-siù, chhin-chhiūⁿ kâu.

comment: pàng-khì, goân-khì kàng-lo̍h.

comment: chiū-sī hó-táⁿ ióng-kám ê ì-sù.

comment: chiū-sī siⁿ-kòe ê pīⁿ.

comment: chiū-sī tîⁿ-pa̍k ê ì-sù.

comment: thâng ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ kak-phang, oan-iuⁿ.

comment: chhiⁿ sek, chhiⁿ-chhioh kiau ê sek; iù ê si-pò͘, pe̍h-sek; sò͘-sek ê bō.

comment: chhó-bo̍k ko͘-tâ; nōa, bô [hoat-ì|hoat-i], chek-tsū, io̍h-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 草木 枯焦; 爛, 無 法伊, 積聚, 藥名.

comment: chhó-bo̍k ko͘-tâ; nōa, bô hoat-i, chek-tsū, io̍h-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 草木 枯焦; 爛, 無 法伊, 積聚, 藥名.

comment: chhó-bo̍k ko͘-tâ; nōa, bô hoat-i, chek-tsū, io̍h-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 草木 枯焦; 爛, 無 法伊, 積聚, 藥名.

comment: chiū-sī tōa-bé-hê ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 大尾蝦 ê 意思.

comment: bí sóe chin chheng-khì, chia̍h ê bí; bí-ké.

comment: piáⁿ, mī-ké, bí-ké, chiū-sī bí sóe chin chheng-khì, chia̍h ê bí; bí-ké.
hanlo_comment: 餅, 麵粿, 米粿, 就是 米 洗 真 清氣, 食 ê 米; 米粿.

comment: piáⁿ-ké oē chia̍h-tit, pe̍h-khak, mī ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 餅粿 會 食得, 白麴, 麵 ê 名.

comment: ji̍t tī chhiū-téng; ji̍t-khí, kng-kng, koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ, jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 日 tī 樹頂; 日起, 光光, 懸懸, 字姓.

comment: pe̍h-pe̍h, kng-bêng, thiⁿ ê kng, chheng-khì.
hanlo_comment: 白白, 光明, 天 ê 光, 清氣.

comment: bêng-pe̍h kng-kng ê khoán-sit; pe̍h-pe̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 明白 光光 ê 款式; 白白 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī chhiū ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 樹 ê 名.

comment: un-sio ê khì-kū, tōe-hō-miâ; chiàu-bêng.
hanlo_comment: 溫燒 ê 器具, 地號名; 鳥名.

comment: khún-pa̍k, kau-tîⁿ; pau-ba̍t; pau ê mi̍h; hoe chháu só͘ kiat ê chí, pâng-lāi.
hanlo_comment: 捆縛, 交纏; 包密; 包 ê 物; 花 草 所 結 ê 子, 房內.

comment: tiū-tsâng ê kut; jī chhó siá bē téng-chin; tiū-kó, chhó-kó.
hanlo_comment: 稻欉 ê 骨; 字 草 寫 未 頂真; 稻槁, 草槁.

comment: tiū-tsâng ê kut; jī chhó siá bē tēng-chin; tiū-kó, chhó-kó.
hanlo_comment: 稻欉 ê 骨; 字 草 寫 未 頂真; 稻槁, 草槁.

comment: chhiah-thé, kok ê miâ, se-hng ê kok.
hanlo_comment: 國 ê 名, 西方 ê 國.

comment: chìⁿ, kóe-tsòe, tōe-hō-miâ, kng-bêng.
hanlo_comment: 箭, 改做, 地號名, 光明.

comment: chhiū ê miâ, i ê chiap oē tsòe-tit chhat.
hanlo_comment: 樹 ê 名, 伊 ê 汁 會 做得 漆.

comment: ta-ta ê hî, pau-hî, ēng chhiⁿ-chhiⁿ ê mi̍h tsòe-chiâⁿ ê.
hanlo_comment: 乾乾 ê 魚, 鮑魚, 用 鮮鮮 ê 物 做成 ê.

comment: chhiū só͘ kiat ê ké-chí; si̍t-tsāi; koat-toàn; móa, chiâⁿ; èng-giām; koan-hē; kó-jiân.
hanlo_comment: 樹 所 結 ê 果子; 實在; 決斷; 滿, 成; 應驗; 關係; 果然.

comment: chiâⁿ-lia̍p, chiâⁿ-tè, chiâⁿ-ki; mi̍h ê siàu-gia̍h; kong-tn̂g ê hō͘-chhù, ko͘-toaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 成粒, 成塊, 成枝; 物 ê 數額; 公堂 ê 護厝, 孤單.

comment: chiâⁿ-lia̍p, chiâⁿ-tè, chiâⁿ-ki; mi̍h ê siàu-gia̍h; kong-tn̂g ê hō͘-chhù, ko͘-toaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 成粒, 成塊, 成枝; 物 ê 數額; 公堂 ê 護厝, 孤單.

comment: chiâⁿ-lia̍p, chiâⁿ-tè, chiâⁿ-ki; mi̍h ê siàu-gia̍h; kong-tn̂g ê hō͘-chhù, ko͘-toaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 成粒, 成塊, 成枝; 物 ê 數額; 公堂 ê 護厝, 孤單.

comment: pôaⁿ-khì, chhiau-koâiⁿ, sit-chhò; tsōe-khian; chek-pī; kè-sit; tō͘-khì; tsōe-kòa.
hanlo_comment: 盤去, 超懸, 失錯; 罪愆; 責備; 過失; 渡去; 罪罫.

comment: pôaⁿ-khì, chhiau-koâiⁿ, sit-chhò; tsōe-khian; chek-pī; kè-sit; tō͘-khì; tsōe-kòa.
hanlo_comment: 盤去, 超懸, 失錯; 罪愆; 責備; 過失; 渡去; 罪罫.

comment: boah-iû, ak-tâm.
hanlo_comment: 抹油, 沃澹.

comment: kau-tîⁿ, khún-pa̍k; pau-ba̍t, hoe-chháu só͘ kiat ê chí, pâng-lāi.
hanlo_comment: 交纏, 綑縛; 包密, 花草 所 結 ê 子, 房內.

comment: chiū-sī koah, tsám-tn̄g ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 割, 斬斷 ê 意思.

comment: ta-la-khì, chhin-chhiūⁿ hé sio-tio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 乾la去, 親像 火 燒著.

comment: gû tak chhâ thong-ti lâng ê khoán-sit; pò-bêng; sī-sòe pín sī-tōa; khui-thiah; kò-sī.
hanlo_comment: 牛 觸 柴 通知 人 ê 款式; 報名; 序細 稟 序大; 開拆; 告示.

comment: chiū-sī pe ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 就是 飛 ê 款式.

comment: [ko-ti|kô-ti], ti-kô, hî-kô, kô-á.
hanlo_comment: 笱豬, 豬笱, 牛笱, 笱á.

comment: kô-lâi kô-khì, kô chi̍t-sin-thô͘; nńg-kô-kô.
hanlo_comment: 翱來 翱去, 翱 一身土; 軟翱翱.

comment: nî-kō, chiū-sī nî ê hō; sím-mi̍h nî-kō.
hanlo_comment: 年閣, 就是 年 ê 號; 甚物 年閣.

comment: nî-kō, chiū-sī nî ê hō; sím-mi̍h nî-kō.
hanlo_comment: 年閣, 就是 年 ê 號; 甚物 年閣.

comment: îⁿ-îⁿ-kō, kō-kō-lìn, kō-lo̍h-khì, kō-lâi kō-khì.
hanlo_comment: 圓圓翱, 翱翱輦, 翱落去, 翱來 翱去.

comment: chhâ-nōa; ta-sò, ta lâ-khì, ko͘-tâ.
hanlo_comment: 柴爛, 乾燥, 乾 lâ去, 枯焦.

comment: chheng-ho͘ hū-jîn-lâng ê jī; lāu-pē ê chí-bē; ta-ke; thun-lún; bóng; koh; hioh; lî-ko͘; ko͘-niû.
hanlo_comment: 稱呼 婦人人 ê 字; 老爸 ê 姊妹; 大家; 吞忍; 罔; koh; 歇; 尼姑; 姑娘.

comment: thâng ê miâ, sek-sut, ia̍h-á, chháu-meh.
hanlo_comment: 蟲 ê 名, 蟋蟀, 蝶á, 草蜢.

comment: bô pē ê kiáⁿ; bô lâng thang chiàu-kò͘; kok-kun tsū-khiam ê oē; toaⁿ-sin, tiâu-tî, to̍k-to̍k.
hanlo_comment: 無 父 ê kiáⁿ; 無 人 通 照顧; 國君 自謙 ê 話; 單身, 刁持, 獨獨.

comment: tsōe-kòa, kè-sit, hêng-hoa̍t; tek-khak, phòa-khui, nôa-tsa̍h, ko͘-hū.
hanlo_comment: 罪過, 過失, 刑罰; 的確, 破開, 攔閘, 辜負.

comment: ām-kún ti̍t-ti̍t; chiáu-pe koâiⁿ; kan-tsà, chhiúⁿ-pak, kiông-chhi̍h; chhong-khiat.

comment: hoaⁿ-hí, tōa-chhiò, chhiò ê siaⁿ.

comment: siáu, kiaⁿ kín-tsáu ê khoán-sit, pe ê khoán, kiaⁿ teh pe; siù teh tsáu.

comment: chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán ê pò͘-chhân-chiáu.

comment: tû-khì chē-ok ê chē-hiàn; iā tha̍k tsòe Khè.

comment: chhiah, khek, khek-khám, khek-jī.

comment: chi̍t-hō phang-phang ê chháu miâ, hoat tī Kang-so͘ séng.

comment: khì-hâi ê miâ, tn̂g ê kek, tsân, bô-pîⁿ, pêng-siông, bô͘-iūⁿ.

comment: khi-phiàn, hiau-hiám, kan-tsà; káu-khiat, khúi-khiat.

comment: saⁿ-á sòe-sòe ê tòa, saⁿ-á liú.

comment: chiū-sī chhoán-khì, chhut-la̍t ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 喘氣, 出力 ê 意思.

comment: soaⁿ ê miâ, khó-lâm; iā-sī chiu ê miâ; soaⁿ oá pîⁿ-tōe ū tsúi-tî, chhut hó-bé.
hanlo_comment: 山 ê 名, 岢嵐; 也是 珠 ê 名; 山 oá 平地 有 水池, 出 好馬.

comment: tsōe-tsōe sòe tè chio̍h ê khoán-sit; tiong-pān ê ge̍k; tsúi ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 濟濟 細 塊 石 ê 款式; 中pān ê 玉; 水 ê 名.

comment: tōa khui-khoah, tōa-li̍h-khui; mn̂g tōa-khui, tōa-tè chiú-poe.
hanlo_comment: 大 開闊, 大裂開; 門 大開, 大塊 酒杯.

comment: chiū-sī ut tek á-sī chhâ lâi tsòe khì-kū ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 ut 竹 á是 柴 來 做 器具 ê 意思.

comment: bô pîⁿ ê tōe; m̄-hó, lô-so, khám-khó.
hanlo_comment: 無 平 ê 地; m̄好, 囉嗦, 坎坷.

comment: tsúi-ta, tsúi-khó, khó ta̍uh-ta̍uh.
hanlo_comment: 水乾, 水洘, 洘 tauh-tauh.

comment: lāu-lâng, pē-bú sí-liáu ê chheng-ho͘, bêng-pe̍k, chhâ-mn̄g, phah, khó-kàu.
hanlo_comment: 老人, 父母 死了 ê 稱呼, 明白, 查問, phah, 考校.

comment: lāu-lâng, pē-bú sí-liáu ê chheng-ho͘, bêng-pe̍k, chhâ-mn̄g, phah, khó-kàu.
hanlo_comment: 老人, 父母 死了 ê 稱呼, 明白, 查問, phah, 考校.

comment: oē-tsòe-tit; put-chí-hó, thang, ha̍p-gî.
hanlo_comment: 會做得; 不止好, 通, 合宜.

comment: hang-hé, chian-mi̍h, chhâ kè hé sio thang tsòe thiāu-kha.
hanlo_comment: 烘火, 煎物, 柴 過 火 燒 thang 做 柱腳.

comment: chháu-á, khoah-tōa ê khoán-sit, iau ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 草á, 闊大 ê 款式, iau ê 意思.

comment: ta-sò, ēng hé chian-ta ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 乾燥, 用 火 煎乾 ê 意思.

comment: chìⁿ, kóe-tsòe, tōe-hō-miâ, kng-bêng; chìⁿ-pé.
hanlo_comment: 箭, 笴做, 地號名, 光明; 箭靶.

comment: chhó-bo̍k ko͘-tâ, nōa bô hoat-i, chek-tsū, io̍h-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 草木 枯焦, 爛 無 法伊, 積聚, 藥名.

comment: tsûn, tōa-chiah-tsûn, sok-le̍k ná bé tī lio̍k-tōe teh tsáu.
hanlo_comment: 船, 大隻船, 速力 ná 馬 tī 陸地 teh 走.

comment: phah lâi chhâ-si̍t; lia̍h, chhiúⁿ.
hanlo_comment: phah 來 查實; 掠, 搶.

comment: chi̍t-khoán chhiū ê miâ, i ê chiap oē tsòe-tit chhat.
hanlo_comment: 一款 樹 ê 名, 伊 ê 汁 會 做得 漆.

comment: ta-ta ê hî, pau-hî, ēng chhiⁿ-chhiⁿ ê mi̍h lâi sīⁿ chiâⁿ-ê.
hanlo_comment: 乾乾 ê 魚, 鮑魚, 用 生生 ê 物 來 豉 成ê.

comment: khó-tsúi-phi; ēng gûn khó-tsúi-phi, chiū-sī lām-sám khai-chîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 洘水披; 用 銀 洘水披, 就是 濫糝 開錢.

comment: chiū-sī phah ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 phah ê 意思.

comment: khòng-hān ê khì, jia̍t-khì ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 炕旱 ê 氣, 熱氣 ê 意思.

comment: saⁿ ûi-ke̍h, saⁿ-liân-sòa, saⁿ i-oá, khòa-tiâu, oá-khò.
hanlo_comment: 相 違ke̍h, 相連sòa, 相 依oá, 掛tiâu, oá靠.

comment: thâi cheng-siⁿ chhiáⁿ kun-peng; siúⁿ peng-teng, khò-siúⁿ, khò-chiòng.
hanlo_comment: 刣 精牲 請 軍兵; 賞 兵丁, 犒賞, 犒將.

comment: hoan-hù kà-sī sī-sòe, kā-lâng kóng; sèng-chí, khò-hong.
hanlo_comment: 吩咐 教示 序細, kā人 講; 聖旨, 誥封.

comment: chiū-sī hî ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 魚 ê 名.

comment: pí-kàu, gī-lūn, chhì-khòaⁿ, ēng kang-hu; khǹg-lâng, hoat-tō͘, khang-khè.
hanlo_comment: 米卦, 議論, 試看, 用 工夫; 勸人, 法度, 工課.

comment: thâu sòe-sòe; sòe-lia̍p-á, chiâⁿ-lia̍p, chiâⁿ-tè.
hanlo_comment: 蟶 細細; 細粒á, 成粒, 成塊.

comment: Chheng-chiu lâng hō be̍h ê jī; hó ê ngó͘-kok, bô phê ê ngó͘-kok.
hanlo_comment: 青州 人 號 麥 ê 字; 好 ê 五穀, 無 皮 ê 五穀.

comment: pî-kut, kha-thâu-u-kut; bô sì-chiàⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 髀骨, 跤頭趺骨; 無 四正 ê 款式.

comment: tsûn chhuh-tiâu tī soa-ni̍h, tsûn-khòa, tsûn-khò-tsúi, khò-ngī.
hanlo_comment: 船 chhuh-tiâu tī 沙裡, 船掛, 船靠水, 靠硬.

comment: gûn-khò, kim-khò; kim-gûn-khò, chi̍t-khò-gûn, chi̍t-khò kim-tiāⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 銀鋯, 金鋯; 金銀鋯, 一鋯銀, 一鋯 金錠.

comment: tîn-ai pe-khí ê khoán-sit; thô͘, soa-hún; chháu ê khì-kū.
hanlo_comment: 塵埃 飛起 ê 款式; 土, 砂粉; 草 ê 器具.

comment: bé-bú ê ì-sù; chiū-sī chháu-bé.
hanlo_comment: 馬母 ê 意思; 就是 草馬.

comment: ta-la-khì, chhin-chhiūⁿ hé-sio-tio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 乾la去, 親像 火燒著.

comment: Chiu-tiâu Bûn-ông ê kiáⁿ só͘ hong ê kok-miâ, Chîn ê siâⁿ, jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 周朝 文王 ê kiáⁿ 所 封 ê 國名, 秦 ê 城, 字姓.

comment: khò-gâi, khiâu-khò-lâng, khò-lâng pan-gî.
hanlo_comment: 酷騃, 蹻酷人, 酷人 便宜.

comment: khô-khô, kiâⁿ-lō͘ khô-khô, khô-teh khô-teh, kek-khô.
hanlo_comment: 酷酷, 行路 酷酷, 酷teh, 激酷.

comment: kng-khō-khō, chiū-sī chhiah-thé bô jia-tsa̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 光裸裸, 就是 赤體 無 遮閘 ê 意思.

comment: kng-khō-khō, chiū-sī chhiah-thé bô jia-tsa̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 光裸裸, 就是 赤體 無 遮閘 ê 意思.

comment: chhiú-khoân ê lūi, keng khui kàu-móa; jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 手環 ê 類, 弓 開 到滿; 字姓.

comment: chhâ tsòe ê chhâ-lián; îⁿ-kho͘-á.
hanlo_comment: 柴 做 ê 柴輪; 圓箍á.

comment: ēng bi̍h pa̍k-mi̍h, bi̍h-kho͘, kim-kho͘, kho͘-tháng, îⁿ-kho͘, ûi-kho͘.
hanlo_comment: 用 篾 縛物, 篾箍, 金箍, 箍桶, 圓箍, 圍箍.

comment: chiū-sī khau-siah ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 剾削 ê 意思.

comment: [te-kho͘|tê-kho͘], iû-kho͘, tāu-kho͘, tê-kho͘-boa̍h.
hanlo_comment: 茶麩, 油麩, 豆麩, 茶麩沫.

comment: tê-kho͘, iû-kho͘, tāu-kho͘, tê-kho͘-boa̍h.
hanlo_comment: 茶麩, 油麩, 豆麩, 茶麩沫.

comment: tê-kho͘, iû-kho͘, tāu-kho͘, tê-kho͘-boa̍h.
hanlo_comment: 茶麩, 油麩, 豆麩, 茶麩沫.

comment: tê-kho͘, iû-kho͘, tāu-kho͘, tê-kho͘-boa̍h.
hanlo_comment: 茶麩, 油麩, 豆麩, 茶麩沫.

comment: chi̍t-kho͘, chi̍t-kho͘-gûn, gō͘-kho͘, tsa̍p-kho͘, chi̍t-pah-kho͘.
hanlo_comment: 一箍, 一箍銀, 五箍, 十箍, 一佰箍.

comment: kho͘-káu; kho͘-koe, koe-bú kho͘ koe-kiáⁿ, kho͘-toaⁿ, kho͘-eh.
hanlo_comment: 呼狗; 呼雞, 雞母 呼 雞kiáⁿ, 呼蛋, 呼呃.

comment: mn̂g, thang, chhùi, kóng-oē, chia̍h, hun kui-lūi ê jī, mn̂g-kháu.
hanlo_comment: 門, 通, 嘴, 講話, 食, 分 歸類 ê 字, 門口.

comment: chhài ê miâ, bô-tiⁿ, khûn-kín, hoân-ló, tiòng-sim, khó͘-chhài, khó͘-bī.
hanlo_comment: 菜 ê 名, 無甜, 勤謹, 煩惱, 悵心, 苦菜, 苦味.

comment: tek ê miâ, lia̍h hî ê khì-kū.
hanlo_comment: 竹 ê 名, 掠 魚 ê 器具.

comment: tio̍h-bôa kè-thâu; seng-khu ū pīⁿ, kan-khó͘.
hanlo_comment: tio̍h磨 過頭; 身軀 有 病, 艱苦.

comment: ēng kim siuⁿ khì-kū ê chhù, ēng kim-gûn tsòe khì-kū.
hanlo_comment: 用 金 鑲 器具 ê 厝, 用 金銀 做 器具.

comment: lêng-khó͘; chiū-sī khah-hó tio̍h ko͘-put-chiong ka-kī tsòe ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 寧可; 就是 khah好 著 姑不將 家己 做 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī lâng ê jī-sìⁿ, Khó͘ Chin-jîn.
hanlo_comment: 就是 人 ê 字姓, 許 真人.

comment: bô khó͘ beh tsòe, bô khó͘ sái-kang, m̄-khó͘-káⁿ, góa m̄-khó͘-tsai.
hanlo_comment: 無 果 beh 做, 無 果 使工, m̄果敢, 我 m̄果知.

comment: gû ê miâ, gû-káng.
hanlo_comment: 牛 ê 名, 牛káng.

comment: tóe-mi̍h ê só͘-tsāi, siu-chhia ê chhù; khò͘-pâng, khò͘-gûn, chhiⁿ-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 貯物 ê 所在, 修車 ê 厝; 庫房, 庫銀, 星名.

comment: pau kha-kut ê pò͘, lâng khǹg gín-á pau tī tiong-ng; kûn-khò͘.
hanlo_comment: 包 腳骨 ê 布, 人 khǹg gín-á 包 tī 中央; 裙褲.

comment: tsân-jím tsòe húi-lūi, oan-siû, chhiúⁿ, chha̍t, chhiong-sēng; chha̍t-khò͘.
hanlo_comment: 殘忍 做 匪類, 冤讎, 搶, 賊節, 充盛; 賊寇.

comment: chiū-sī gín-á hiông-ok pháiⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 gín-á 雄惡 pháiⁿ ê 意思.

comment: pò͘ á-sī sòaⁿ tsòe ê liú-á, pò͘-liú; sng mi̍h hō͘ i tiâu.
hanlo_comment: 布 á是 線 做 ê 鈕á, 布鈕; 拴 物 hō͘ 伊 tiâu.

comment: phah, khin-khin kòng, kha̍p-thâu, khàu-tû.
hanlo_comment: phah, 輕輕 摃, 磕頭, 扣除.

comment: khùn-khó͘, lâng phòa-pīⁿ bōe-hó.
hanlo_comment: 困苦, 人 破病 bōe好.

comment: chiū-sī tiū-á bô kiat-chí ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 稻á 無 結籽 ê 意思.

comment: pō-gio̍k, kiông-pō, kiû-siû, húi-lūi, chha̍t, chha̍t-khò͘, jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 暴虐, 強暴, 仇讎, 匪類, 賊, 賊寇, 字姓.

comment: chiū-sī hoân-ló, ut-tsut ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 煩惱, 鬱卒 ê 意思.

comment: phīⁿ chhoán-khì, pûn-khì.
hanlo_comment: 鼻 喘氣, pûn氣.

comment: chiū-sī chit-mi̍h ê khì-kū.
hanlo_comment: 就是 織物 ê 器具.

comment: tòa ê khì-kū, pau kha-kut ê pò͘, saⁿ-á-khò͘.
hanlo_comment: 帶 ê 器具, 包 腳骨 ê 布, 衫á褲.

comment: koe-á kiáⁿ, chhut-sì chiū pō͘-mi̍h chhī kiáⁿ, chhek-chiáu ê lūi.
hanlo_comment: 街á kiáⁿ, 出世 就 哺物 市 kiáⁿ, 雀鳥 ê 類.

comment: phah, iô-tāng, khin-khin kòng, piān-lūn, mn̄g, khún-kiû, kha̍p-thâu, khàu-tû.
hanlo_comment: phah, 搖動, 輕輕 摃, 辯論, 問, 懇求, 磕頭, 扣除.

comment: chiong chit-jī tsòe kèng-ùi ê ì-sù, khàu-thâu, khàu-kìⁿ, khàu-siā.
hanlo_comment: 將 chit字 做 敬畏 ê 意思, 叩頭, 叩見, 叩謝.

comment: chháu kiat ê hoe-chí, ū loa̍h kòa phang, tō͘-khò͘.
hanlo_comment: 草 結 ê 花籽, 有 辣 掛 芳, 豆蔻.

comment: kha-tó͘, tōa-thúi-kut; khiau-kha teh-chē.
hanlo_comment: 腳肚, 大腿骨; 曲腳 teh坐.

comment: kha-tó͘, tōa-thúi-kut; khiau-kha teh-chē.
hanlo_comment: 腳肚, 大腿骨; 曲腳 teh坐.

comment: khiap-sì, pháiⁿ-khòaⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 怯勢, pháiⁿ看 ê 款式.

comment: gû-gōng ê khoán-sit, kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 愚戇 ê 款式, 驚惶 ê 意思.

comment: pau kha-kut ê pò͘, saⁿ-á-khò͘, kûn-khò͘.
hanlo_comment: 包 腳骨 ê 布, 衫á褲, 裙褲.

comment: tōa siū-khì ê siaⁿ; kiàn-siàu; lêng-jio̍k; lóe-mē.
hanlo_comment: 大 受氣 ê 聲; 見笑; 凌辱; 詈罵.

comment: kap tha̍k Khó͘ sio-siāng; saⁿ-á-liú ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: kap 讀 Khó͘ 相像; 衫á鈕 ê 意思.

comment: kha-tó͘, tōa-thúi-kut; pûi ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 腳肚, 大腿骨; 肥 ê 款式.

comment: pau kha-kut ê pò͘, saⁿ-á-khò͘, kûn-khò͘.
hanlo_comment: 包 腳骨 ê 布, 衫á褲, 裙褲.

comment: chiū-sī khiâ, á-sī khiā ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 騎, á是 khiā ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī khiâ, á-sī khiā ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 騎, á是 khiā ê 意思.

comment: khô͘-chhùi, khô͘-kha̍h, chiū-sī kha̍h-teh ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 糊嘴, 糊kha̍h, 就是 kha̍h-teh ê 意思.

comment: khô͘-chhùi, khô͘-kha̍h, chiū-sī kha̍h-teh ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 糊嘴, 糊kha̍h, 就是 kha̍h-teh ê 意思.

comment: khô͘-chhùi, khô͘-kha̍h, chiū-sī kha̍h-teh ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 糊嘴, 糊kha̍h, 就是 kha̍h-teh ê 意思.

comment: khoa-kháu, khoa-kháu khoah-tōa ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 誇口, 誇口 闊大 ê 意思.

comment: siâ-khì lī-khui tsoa̍t-tn̄g ê khoán-sit, bô sì-chiàⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 邪氣 離開 絕斷 ê 款式, 無 四正.

comment: hó, khoa-kháu, hó phín-hēng, chiat-gī; súi ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 好, 誇口, 好 品行, 節義; 媠 ê 款式.

comment: chiū-sī ēng to phòa-khui ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 用 刀 破開 ê 意思.

comment: ka-kī khoa-kháu, pá-chhî, m̄-chhèng-ì.
hanlo_comment: 家己 誇口, 把持, m̄稱意.

comment: chhùi oai bô sì-chiàⁿ; hô-ha̍p ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 嘴 歪 無 四正; 和合 ê 意思.

comment: théng-khí, kóng tōa-oē bô-si̍t, tōa, khoah.
hanlo_comment: 挺起, 講 大話 無實, 大, 闊.

comment: kha-tó͘, tōa-thúi-kut, kap tha̍k Khò͘ sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 腳肚, 大腿骨, kap 讀 Khò͘ 相像.

comment: sòe-niá ê saⁿ, phàu-kòa ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 細領 ê 衫, 袍掛 ê 意思.

comment: io-kut, kha-tó͘ ê tiong-kan, tōa-thúi-kut; kha-ba̍k.
hanlo_comment: 腰骨, 腳肚 ê 中間, 大腿骨; 腳目.

comment: kóng tōa-oē bô láu-si̍t, tōa, jī-sìⁿ, khoa-kháu.
hanlo_comment: 講 大話 無 老實, 大, 字姓, 誇口.

comment: chiū-sī lâng teh chē ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 人 teh 坐 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī lâng teh chē ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 人 teh 坐 ê 意思.

comment: khoa-kháu, kiau-chhia, îm-loān ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 誇口, 驕奢, 淫亂 ê 意思.

comment: tòa ê khì-kū; pau kha-kut ê pò͘.
hanlo_comment: 帶 ê 器具; 包 腳骨 ê 布.

comment: kiâⁿ kha-pō͘, nn̄g-ki kha-tó͘ ê tiong-kan.
hanlo_comment: 行 腳步, 兩支 腳肚 ê 中間.

comment: kiâⁿ kha-pō͘, nn̄g-ki kha-tó͘ ê tiong-kan.
hanlo_comment: 行 腳步, 兩支 腳肚 ê 中間.

comment: sió-khóa, sió-khóa-kúi, tām-po̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 小khóa, 小khóa幾, 淡薄 ê 意思.

comment: kha-piⁿ ê kut, kha-ba̍k; thiàu-lēng; ko͘-toaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 腳邊 ê 骨, 腳目; 跳倰; 孤單.

comment: hì-khoe̍h, chiū-sī hì-pan ê thiú-á.

comment: pi-ai ê tōa-siaⁿ, thî-khàu.

comment: hêng-hoa̍t ê khì-kū; loān, ka-kī iok-sok; kha-khàu, chhiú-khàu.

comment: chiáu ba̍k-chiu chhiⁿ-kiaⁿ teh-khòaⁿ, ba̍k-chiu chhiⁿ-tso̍h, ba̍k-chiu bô-chiàⁿ.

comment: chiū-sī chio̍h saⁿ kho̍k ê siaⁿ.

comment: gōa-bīn siâⁿ; khui-khoah; khang-khang; chhui-khoah; ēng to lâi-siah.

comment: kín-kín kā-lâng kóng; Hông-tè ê miâ.

comment: bú ê kâu, kâu ê siaⁿ; tōa-chiah oân-kâu, chhin-chhiūⁿ lâng.

hanlo_comment: khà ê 聲; 樸實; 物 ê 殼, 𠕇 ê 皮, khok-khok哮.

comment: kiⁿ-kho̍k, chiú kiⁿ-kho̍k, phah-kho̍k, kòng-kho̍k.

comment: tsúi ê miâ, tsúi chhut tī Kùi-iông-koāiⁿ.

comment: liâm-piⁿ, pek-oá ê khoán-sit.

comment: chiū-sī soaⁿ ê miâ; soaⁿ koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ ê khoán-sit.

comment: chiū-sī lâng teh sàu ê siaⁿ.

comment: bô teh tòa ê chhù, chhù êng-êng; khang-hi, khang-khang.

comment: chiū-sī bé-tsui-kut ê ì-sù.

comment: ngó͘-kok ê phê; bí-khng, chho͘-khng; tâng 糠 jī.

hanlo_comment: 就是 身軀 長長 ê 意思.

comment: tóe-pn̄g ê khì-kū, sì-kak siuⁿ; sì-chiàⁿ; pang-tsān; sì-kak; kiù-lâng.

comment: siaⁿ-seh, chhut-siaⁿ, sàu ê ì-sù.

comment: lâng ê ām-kún; chiáu ê nâ-âu.

comment: hu-sû, khoah-tōa; chīn-thâu, khang-khang, khang-khiah; khong-tiong.
hanlo_comment: 虛詞, 闊大; 盡頭, 空空, 空隙; 空中.

comment: heng-khám-keh, lāi-bīn khang-khang; siaⁿ-im, tiāu-sè, khiuⁿ-kháu.
hanlo_comment: 胸坎膈, 內面 空空; 聲音, 調勢, 腔口.

comment: koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ ê mn̂g, mn̂g koâiⁿ ê khoán-sit, chhiong-sēng.
hanlo_comment: 懸懸 ê 門, 門 懸 ê 款式, 充盛.

comment: heng-khám-keh; lāi-bīn khang-khang; tiāu-sè, siaⁿ-im; bô láu-si̍t; khiuⁿ-kháu.
hanlo_comment: 胸坎膈; 內面 空空; 調勢, 聲音; 無 老實; 腔口.

comment: khak-si̍t ê khoán-sit.

comment: bô ti, m̄-bat, gōng-gōng, khong-khám.
hanlo_comment: 無 知, m̄-bat, 戇戇, 悾khám.

comment: m̄-bat, gōng, tiong-ti̍t, sêng-si̍t; bô tek-ì, khong-khám.

comment: chiū-sī chio̍h-thâu ê siaⁿ; lûi ê siaⁿ.

comment: ū khang ê, khang-phāng; thong-thàu, tōa, ke̍k-hó, Khóng-tsú, khóng-chhiok.

comment: khóng-khài, ì-kiàn kám-kek put-pêng, kám-siong; thó͘-khùi.

hanlo_comment: 心 好 堅固, 勉勵, 大量, 慷慨, 好 款待, 慷交.

hanlo_comment: 山 ê 名, 山 空殼 ê 款, koh再 讀 Khong 意思 同.

comment: giâ-mi̍h ê siaⁿ, cheng tōe-ki, chhut-la̍t the̍h, thûi, bān-khóng.

comment: chiū-sī sin-thé pûi phàng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 身體 肥 胖 ê 意思.

comment: chiáu ê nâ-âu, nâ-âu khang, thun lo̍h-khì, siaⁿ-im.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 ê 嚨喉, 嚨喉 空, 吞 落去, 聲音.

comment: chiū-sī tāi-chì bêng-pe̍k ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 tāi-chì 明白 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī tāi-chì bêng-pe̍k ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 tāi-chì 明白 ê 意思.

comment: bân-khóng, chiū-sī kian-kò͘, chho͘-ióng oē tòng-tit kú-kú; thò-tòng ná tōa khám-tiàm.

comment: nôa-tsa̍h, tí-tng, kú-khí; hoán-pōe, khòng-kū, khòng-khiàm.
hanlo_comment: 攔閘, 抵當, 舉起; 反背, 抗拒, 抗欠.

comment: ín-chhōa, kò-sò͘; tōa pang-kok; khui-keng, chho-chè, tû-khì.
hanlo_comment: 引chhōa, 告訴; 大 邦國; 開弓, 操制, 除去.

comment: ióng-kiāⁿ ê káu, béng bô beh hō͘-lâng khan, siù ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 勇健 ê 狗, 猛 無 beh hō͘人 牽, 獸 ê 名.

comment: ta-ta, ta kàu-ke̍k, sio, kia̍h tī hé-téng lâi hang.
hanlo_comment: 乾乾, 乾 夠極, 燒, 攑 tī 火鼎 來 烘.

comment: chiū-sī chē tī [bīn-chhn̂g|bîn-chhn̂g] ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 坐 tī 眠床 ê 意思.

comment: tōa-tsúi, tōa lūn-te̍k ê khoán, tsúi chhim khoah-tōa ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 大水, 大 潤澤 ê 款, 水 深 闊大 ê 款.

comment: koâiⁿ-kē bô pîⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 懸低 無 平 ê 款式.

comment: chiū-sī hō͘-bé sūn-ho̍k ê mi̍h; bé-le̍k-soh.
hanlo_comment: 就是 hō͘馬 順服 ê 物; 馬勒索.

comment: sin-kiⁿ ê iù-si, mî-hoe.

comment: sin-kiⁿ ê iù-si, mî-hoe.
hanlo_comment: 新經 ê 幼絲, 棉花.

comment: khui-khoah, bōng ê khang, thô͘-khàng, bōng-khòng, kim-khòng, khàng-tōe, khòng-iá.
hanlo_comment: 開闊, 墓 ê 空, 土壙, 墓壙, 金礦, 曠地, 曠野.

comment: khang-khang, kng-kng, hòe-tūi, hn̄g, tōa, kú, lâng ê jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 空空, 光光, 廢墜, 遠, 大, 久, 人 ê 字姓.

comment: bú-ióng ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 武勇 ê 款式.

comment: ba̍k-chiu bô tông-tsú, ba̍k bô sek, khui ba̍k-chiu ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 目睭 無 瞳子, 目 無 色, 開 目睭 ê 款.

comment: chiū-sī soaⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 山 ê 名.

comment: pí-phēng, phit-phè, ngī-ti̍t, tùi-te̍k, sêng-si̍t.
hanlo_comment: 比並, 匹配, 硬直, 對敵, 誠實.

comment: chiáu pe-kē; ām-kún ê ì-sù; khiat-khòng, pêng-téng, phit-phè.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 飛低; 頷頸 ê 意思; 頡頏, 平等, 匹配.

comment: oàn-hūn, thòng-hūn bōe-oē chiàu ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 怨恨, 痛恨 bōe會 照 意思.

comment: koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ ê mn̂g, kap tha̍k Khong sio-siāng.

comment: áu-bân, kiông-kiông; tùi-te̍k; jia-khàm; kè-sit, kàu-ke̍k; khòng-hān.
hanlo_comment: 拗蠻, 強強; 對敵; 遮khàm; 過失, 夠極; 炕旱.

comment: mn̄g-khiā kap hō͘-tēng oē sóa-tit; iâⁿ-ni̍h ê mn̂g; siu-si̍p, chiâⁿ, teh-beh, kàu-bé.

comment: hông-kiong ê hāng-lō͘; pâng-keng ê hāng-lō͘.

comment: ēng soh lâi pa̍k, kiⁿ, chit, pīⁿ; kúi-nā hāng pa̍k tsòe chi̍t-ē, chi̍t-khún.

comment: súi ê tek thang tsòe chìⁿ; phê-kim, o͘-sek; tek-sún.

comment: sòe-hàn; koaiⁿ khu-sok ê khoán; [khùn-khò͘|khùn-khó͘], khún-tio̍k.

comment: sòe-hàn; koaiⁿ khu-sok ê khoán; khùn-khó͘, khún-tio̍k.
hanlo_comment: 細漢; 關 拘束 ê 款; 窘扣, 窘逐.

comment: tio̍h-bôa, ià-siān ê ì-sù.

comment: sêng-chiū; khún-pa̍k; saⁿ-á-ku.

comment: áu-thò͘, thò͘ ê khoán, ài thò͘ ê khoán-sit.

comment: áu-thò͘, thò͘ ê khoán, ài thò͘ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 嘔吐, 吐 ê 款, 愛 吐 ê 款式.

comment: pa̍k kui-pé ê tiū-á; keng-tsoh.

comment: kiông-pek, khùn-khó͘; kóaⁿ-tio̍h, chiàu-kū, iû-goân, khún-pek.

comment: khui-sin ê chhân-hn̂g, chhut-la̍t tī-lí; siong-hāi, khai-khún.

comment: lîn-bín, thun-lún, kàu-ke̍k, sió-khóa, chió-chió.

comment: chhùi-khí lō͘-hiān ê khoán-sit; hā ê ì-sù.

comment: chhùi-khí khòe-mi̍h, kā-khòe ê siaⁿ.

comment: tiong-hō͘, kè-bô͘, gī-lūn.

comment: khòe, khòe ê siaⁿ; ti sio-kā ê siaⁿ.

comment: îⁿ ê chhek-chhng, khut-khiok, pa̍k, kui-khún, khún-pa̍k.

comment: chiū-sī sim-koaⁿ phû-phiò khang-hi ê ì-sù.

comment: oan-ke, siū-khì, m̄-thiaⁿ-thàn, tò͘-hūn ê khoán-sit.

comment: siù ê tòa, soh-á; gín-á pē-to ê tòa, si chit chiâⁿ-ê.

comment: khut-khiok, pa̍k, îⁿ ê chhek-chhng; kui-khún, chiâⁿ-khún.

comment: hioh-khùn, khiā-khùn, khùn pá, tsá-khùn, ài-khùn; khùn-bāng.
hanlo_comment: 歇睏, khiā睏, 睏 飽, 早睏, 愛睏; 睏夢.

comment: hioh-khùn, khiā-khùn, khùn pá, tsá-khùn, ài-khùn; khùn-bāng.
hanlo_comment: 歇睏, khiā睏, 睏 飽, 早睏, 愛睏; 睏夢.

comment: chiū-sī thâng ê miâ.

comment: pòe ê lūi, khak-tōa tsóng-sī gûi-hiám; thâng-miâ.

comment: kip-kè, chhut-la̍t, tio̍h-bôa, kan-khó͘, khûn-khûn, khûn-khiām.

comment: îⁿ ê chhek-chhng, khut-khiok, pa̍k; tiū-khûn, un-lûn-khûn.
hanlo_comment: 圓 ê 粟倉, 屈曲, 縛; 稻囷, 溫圇囷.

comment: ku̍t, lô-lô, loān-loān, hoat-bêng, ēng khùi-la̍t.

comment: phah, saⁿ-tûi; pōaⁿ tîn-ai.

comment: chiū-sī thô͘-khang ê ì-sù.

comment: khui-thô͘; hut-jiân, chīn, ku̍t chiâⁿ-khang.

comment: thâng, tsúi-giat-á, tsúi-tiong ê thâng.

hanlo_comment: 光khu̍t-khu̍t; 孤khu̍t, 就是 死了 chhun 一身, á是 無人.

comment: khu̍t-chhêng chiū-sī pháiⁿ-khòaⁿ; kóng-oē khu̍t-chhêng sī pháiⁿ sèng-tē.
hanlo_comment: khu̍t松 就是 pháiⁿ看; 講話 khu̍t松 是 pháiⁿ 性地.

comment: khu̍t-kô͘, khu̍t-khah-kà, khu̍t-thûi.
hanlo_comment: khu̍t糊, khu̍t-khah-kà, khu̍t鎚.

comment: thoa-lâi, tsang-lâi, bán; at-chi̍h, pāi-hoāi; lak-khí-lâi, ēng tsńg-thâu-á lâi la̍k.
hanlo_comment: 拖來, 摠來, 挽; at折, 敗壞; 落起來, 用 tsńg頭á 來 搦.

comment: la-chioh, sì-kòe-la sì-kòe-chioh.
hanlo_comment: 挪借, 四界挪 四界借.

comment: teh-la, la-êng, chia̍h-liáu la-êng, chia̍h siuⁿ-la.
