comment: saⁿ-kap tín-tāng lâi hoaⁿ-hí ê khoán; phah ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 相合 振動 來 歡喜 ê 款; phah ê 聲.

comment: bô hêng-siōng ò-biāu ê mi̍h, jī-sìⁿ sîn, sîn-biāu, kúi-sîn, sim-sîn.
hanlo_comment: 無 形像 奧妙 ê 物, 字姓 神, 神妙, 鬼神, 心神.

comment: chiū-sī bú ê lo̍k ê ì-sù; tōa-chiah ê lo̍k-bú.
hanlo_comment: 就是 母 ê 鹿 ê 意思; 大隻 ê 鹿母.

comment: chi̍t-khoán chiáu ê miâ, sio̍k bā-hio̍h ê lūi.
hanlo_comment: 一款 鳥 ê 名, 屬 覓鴞 ê 類.

comment: chháu tsōe-tsōe ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 草 濟濟 ê 款式.

comment: hô͘-sîn, hô͘-sîn-hó͘; hô͘-sîn-sái; ku-sîn, gû-sîn, kim-sîn.
hanlo_comment: 胡蠅, 胡蠅虎; 胡蠅屎; 龜蠅, 牛蠅, 金蠅.

comment: bōe iōng sîn-tit, sîn-bāng, sîn hō͘-tsúi.
hanlo_comment: bōe 用 承得, 承網, 承 雨水.

comment: mn̂g-sîn, mn̂g-sîn hō͘-ùi; kô͘-tah mn̂g-sîn; ūi mn̂g-sîn.
hanlo_comment: 門神, 門神 戶尉; 糊貼 門神; 畫 門神.

comment: tsúi-ni̍h ê mi̍h; tōa ê giô-á, kau-lêng ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 水裡 ê 物; 大 ê 蟯á, 蛟龍 ê 款式.

comment: kèng-kín, sêng-si̍t, thiâm-chēng, sòe-jī; su-siúⁿ, kìm-kài ê oē; jī-sìⁿ, kín-sīn.
hanlo_comment: 敬謹, 誠實, 恬靜, 細膩; 思想, 禁戒 ê 話; 字姓, 謹慎.

comment: kèng-kín, sêng-si̍t, thiâm-chēng, sòe-jī; su-siúⁿ, kìm-kài ê oē; jī-sìⁿ, kín-sīn.
hanlo_comment: 敬謹, 誠實, 恬靜, 細膩; 思想, 禁戒 ê 話; 字姓, 謹慎.

comment: chè-hiàn ê chhiⁿ-bah; chè-hiàn siā-chek tóe-bah, Hông-tè tio̍h chhin-sin lâi sàng.
hanlo_comment: 祭獻 ê 生肉; 祭獻 社稷 貯肉, 皇帝 tio̍h 親身 來 送.

comment: chè-hiàn ê chhiⁿ-bah; chè-hiàn siā-chek tóe-bah, Hông-tè tio̍h chhin-sin lâi sàng.
hanlo_comment: 祭獻 ê 生肉; 祭獻 社稷 貯肉, 皇帝 tio̍h 親身 來 送.

comment: ngó͘-tsōng chi̍t-hāng ê miâ, io-sūi; sīn-súi.
hanlo_comment: 五臟 一項 ê 名, 腰垂; 腎水.

comment: hé sio chhun-ê, hé sio kàu kè; hé-siā, chek-lūi, hé-hu.
hanlo_comment: 火 燒 chhun-ê, 火 燒 到 過; 火謝, 燭淚, 火灰.

comment: lī-pia̍t ê sî, saⁿ-sàng ê tsâi-bu̍t, sīn-gî.
hanlo_comment: 離別 ê 時, 相送 ê 財物, 贐儀.

comment: ū-sīn, bat kàu ū sīn; sīn jōa-tsōe, sīn-gûn, sīn-chîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 有剩, bat 到 有 剩; 剩 偌濟, 剩銀, 剩錢.

comment: sio-lio, sio-lio-khì, sio-hu; hé-sio-chhù; sio-pùn, sio-hiuⁿ, sio-bah.
hanlo_comment: 燒lio, 燒lio去, 燒灰; 火燒厝; 燒糞, 燒香, 燒肉.

comment: chiū-sī lâng ê jī-sìⁿ; Sio ông-iâ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 人 ê 字姓; 蕭王爺.

comment: un-sio, sio-lō, sio-joa̍h, sio-sio ê khì.
hanlo_comment: 溫燒, 燒烙, 燒熱, 燒燒 ê 氣.

comment: un-sio, sio-lō, sio-joa̍h, sio-sio ê khì.
hanlo_comment: 溫燒, 燒烙, 燒熱, 燒燒 ê 氣.

comment: [Un-sio|Ûn-sio], siâⁿ ê miâ, chiū-sī tī [Chiu-phó͘|Chiuⁿ-phó͘] kap Chiau-an ê tiong-kan.
hanlo_comment: 雲霄, 城 ê 名, 就是 tī 漳浦 kap 詔安 ê 中間.

comment: Sió-to-hōe, chiū-sī àm-chīⁿ saⁿ-kap kè-bô͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 小刀會, 就是 暗靜 相合 計謀 ê 意思.

comment: Sió-to-hōe, chiū-sī àm-chīⁿ saⁿ-kap kè-bô͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 小刀會, 就是 暗靜 相合 計謀 ê 意思.

comment: sió-khóa, sió-kio̍k; sió-thêng; sió-tō͘; sió-iông-chhun; ge̍h-sió; sió-sim.
hanlo_comment: 小khóa, 小局; 小停; 小肚; 小陽春; 月小; 小心.

comment: sió-kiáⁿ, chiū-sī chho͘-chhùi ê oē, sī chí su-thong só͘ siⁿ ê kiáⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 小kiáⁿ, 就是 粗嘴 ê 話, 是 指 私通 所 生 ê kiáⁿ.

comment: sio=só, sió-kńg=só-kńg chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán hî ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ ba̍k-tsa̍t.
hanlo_comment: sio=sió, 小管=鎖管 就是 一款 魚 ê 名, 親像 墨賊.

comment: siô-siô, chiū-sī khah bái ê mi̍h; bān-bān tsòe-kang, pîn-tōaⁿ, tsòe-sū-siô.
hanlo_comment: siô-siô, 就是 khah bái ê 物; 慢慢 做工, 貧惰, 做事 siô.

comment: chiū-sī lâng ê jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 人 ê 字姓.

comment: siō=siū, gûn-siō, chiū-sī khah ióng ê siuⁿ thang tóe gûn; chi̍t-siū-gûn=1000 gûn.
hanlo_comment: siō=siū, 銀siō, 就是 khah 勇 ê 箱 通 貯 銀; 一siū銀=1000 銀.

comment: ài-sioh, thiàⁿ-sioh, pó-sioh; sioh-thé-biān; sioh bīn-phê.
hanlo_comment: 愛惜, 疼惜, 保惜; 惜 體面; 惜 面皮.

comment: sio̍h-sio̍h; sio̍h-khiàn; sio̍h-phiah ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: sio̍h-sio̍h; 俗掔; 俗癖 ê 意思.

comment: sio̍h-khì, siⁿ-sio̍h; chhàu-sio̍h; tsa̍p-ge̍h-sio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 餿去, 生餿; 臭餿; 十月餿.

comment: gio̍h-sio̍h, chiū-sī ēng oē gio̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 謔誚, 就是 用 話 謔 ê 意思.

comment: bô-sio̍h bô-sio̍h; bô-sio̍h bô-lio̍h, chiū-sī bô-iàu bô-kín ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 無俗 無俗; 無俗 無略, 就是 無要 無緊 ê 意思.

comment: kha-sio̍h, chhiú-sio̍h, chiū-sī kōaⁿ hoán chhàu ê bī.
hanlo_comment: 腳液, 手液, 就是 汗 反 臭 ê 味.

comment: siu-si̍p, chek-tsū; lāu-pē ê sió-tī; siàu-liân; tiōng-hu ê sió-tī; jī-sìⁿ, chek.
hanlo_comment: 收拾, 積聚; 老爸 ê 小弟; 少年; 丈夫 ê 小弟; 字姓, 叔.

comment: tāu ê tsóng-miâ; tāu-á.
hanlo_comment: 豆 ê 總名; 豆á.

comment: kiong-kèng, kín-sīn; kín-kip; kéng-kài; ui-hêng; hân-léng, chìn-chêng, jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 恭敬, 謹慎; 緊急; 警戒; 威形; 寒冷,進前, 字姓.

comment: tsá-khí sî ê kiong-kèng; tsá-tsá, khûn-kín.
hanlo_comment: 早起 時 ê 恭敬; 早早, 勤謹.

comment: tsá-khí sî ê kiong-kèng; tsá-tsá, khûn-kín.
hanlo_comment: 早起 時 ê 恭敬; 早早, 勤謹.

comment: tsá-khí sî ê kiong-kèng; tsá-tsá, khûn-kín.
hanlo_comment: 早起 時 ê 恭敬; 早早, 勤謹.

comment: chiū-sī bōe chhun-ti̍t ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 bōe 伸直 ê 意思.

comment: chhiò ê khoán-sit; chiáu-á teh-háu ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 笑 ê 款式; 鳥á teh哮 ê 聲.

comment: lo̍h-hō͘; tōa hong-hō͘ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 落雨; 大 風雨 ê 款式.

comment: khí-lâi, hô-ha̍p khiām-liám ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 起來, 和合 儉斂 ê 款式.

comment: chiū-sī lâng ê jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 人 ê 字姓.

comment: chheng-khì, tsúi-chheng hó, cheng-chiat.
hanlo_comment: 清氣, 水清 好, 貞節.

comment: hut-jiân, kín-kín tsáu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 忽然, 緊緊 走 ê 意思.

comment: hut-jiân, kín-kín tsáu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 忽然, 緊緊 走 ê 意思.

comment: chhiⁿ o͘ ê sek-tī, hūn-tūn; hut-jiân; kap {焂Siok} tâng.
hanlo_comment: 靑 烏 ê 色緻, 混沌; 忽然; kap {焂Siok} 同.

comment: khúi-khiat; bīn piàn-sek ê ì-sù; bīn-sek.
hanlo_comment: 詭譎; 面 變色 ê 意思; 面色.

comment: loān-loān, that; khiû-khiû, kiù-kiù; siu-liáu tò-thè, pa̍k; jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 亂亂, that; khiû-khiû, 勼勼; 收了 倒退, 縛; 字姓.

comment: gō͘-kak ê miâ, iù ê soa; niû-ni̍h ke̍k sòe ê khì-kū, bí-chhek, jī-sìⁿ chhek.
hanlo_comment: 五穀 ê 名, 幼 ê 沙; 糧裡 極 細 ê 器具, 米粟, 字姓 粟.

comment: chiū-sī phah ê ì-sù; liâm-mi̍h ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 就是 phah ê 意思; 黏物 ê 款式.

comment: chháu ê miâ, bo̍k-siok, oē thang chhī-tit gû-bé ê lō͘-ēng.
hanlo_comment: 草 ê 名, 苜蓿, 會 通 飼得 牛馬 ê 路用.

comment: kha pek-kín, kia̍h-kha chìn-chêng teh thoa, kiu-kha.
hanlo_comment: 腳 逼緊, 攑腳 進前 teh 拖, 勼腳.

comment: chiáu ê miâ, ngó͘-hng ê chiáu, hōng-hông chiáu, iā miâ siok-song.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 ê 名, 五方 ê 鳥, 鳳凰 鳥, 也 名 鷫鸘.

comment: chiū-sī kó͘-tsá hó ê bé.
hanlo_comment: 就是 古早 好 ê 馬.

comment: chiáu teh pe ê siaⁿ, pe ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 teh 飛 ê 聲, 飛 ê 意思.

comment: lō͘-tsām ê chhù, hioh-mî; lâu-teh, iân-chhiân; an-hioh, chip-siú; tsá-chêng.
hanlo_comment: 路站 ê 厝, 歇暝; 留teh, 延chhiân; 安歇, 執守; 早前.

comment: chiū-sī kèng-kín, tiû-tû ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 敬謹, 躊躇 ê 意思.

comment: khek, khau, koah; chhim-chiàm, tī-lí; loán-jio̍k, chhiúⁿ-the̍h, siu-siah.
hanlo_comment: 刻, 剾, 割; 侵占, 治理; 軟弱, 搶the̍h, 修削.

comment: chiáu-mn̂g, chiáu-si̍t jia-teh ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 鳥毛, 鳥翼 遮teh ê 款式.

comment: chiáu-mn̂g, chiáu-si̍t jia-teh ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 鳥毛, 鳥翼 遮teh ê 款式.

comment: chhâ tn̂g-tn̂g ê ì-sù; tn̂g koh ti̍t-ti̍t ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 柴 長長 ê 意思; 長 koh 直直 ê 款式.

comment: chiū-sī tsām kàu sòe-sòe iù-iù ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 鏨 到 細細 幼幼 ê 意思.

comment: hé-to̍h, kng nà-nà, hó-khòaⁿ, sio-sio, iûⁿ-iûⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 火𤏸, 光 nà-nà, 好看, 燒燒, 熔熔 ê 意思.

comment: sio-mi̍h kàu-iûⁿ, siau-iûⁿ, kng-nà-nà, kim, hó-khòaⁿ, kim-siak-siak.
hanlo_comment: 燒物 到熔, 消熔, 光爁爁, 金, 好看, 金爍爍.

comment: khí-thâu, lâm-pêng ê hn̂g, hó, chéng-tùn.
hanlo_comment: 起頭, 南爿 ê 園, 好, 整頓.

comment: hiòng-ji̍t-kûi ê thâng, chhin-chhiūⁿ niû-á; iá-siù ná bé; mn̂g ná hó͘.
hanlo_comment: 向日葵 ê 蟲, 親像 娘á; 野獸 ná 馬; 毛 ná 虎.

comment: ì-ài, ha̍k-si̍p; pêng-siông, bô bûn-ngái; pan-gî, hong-sio̍k, chho͘-sio̍k; sio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 意愛, 學習; 平常, 無 文雅; 便宜, 風俗, 粗俗; 俗.

comment: tsú-mi̍h kàu-hó; nōa, chiâⁿ, siông-sè, tsai-iáⁿ,khí-thâu; tōa sim-pū, sêng-sio̍k.
hanlo_comment: 煮物 到好; 爛, 成, 詳細, 知影, 起頭; 大 新婦, 成熟.

comment: tn̂g-tn̂g ê lāi-saⁿ; tóe-saⁿ, khùn-saⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 長長 ê 內衫; 底衫, 睏衫 ê 意思.

comment: tsún-tǹg, bóe tò-tńg-lâi; tǹg-lâng, jī-sìⁿ sio̍k, sio̍k-hôe.
hanlo_comment: 準當, 買 倒tńg來; 當人, 字姓 贖, 贖回.

comment: soaⁿ ê o͘-a, chhin-chhiūⁿ chiáu, tsóng-sī khah-sòe.
hanlo_comment: 山 ê 烏鴉, 親像 鳥, 總是 khah細.

comment: hó nî-tang, liān-se̍k; chī-tsūi, sím-mi̍h; tah-lo̍h chi̍t-ê.
hanlo_comment: 好 年冬, 練熟; chī-tsūi, 甚物; tah落 一個.

comment: chi̍t-khoán io̍h-chháu ê miâ, sio̍k-toān.
hanlo_comment: 一款 藥草 ê 名, 藚斷.

comment: mn̂g-piⁿ ê tn̂g; o̍h-pâng, chiū-sī o̍h-tn̂g ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 門邊 ê 堂; 學房, 就是 學堂 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī chhiat kàu iù-iù ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 切 到 幼幼 ê 意思.

comment: saⁿ-chiap sio-sòa, saⁿ-liân; jī-sìⁿ, sio̍k, chiap-sio̍k, lio̍k-sio̍k, siong-sio̍k.
hanlo_comment: 相接 相續, 相連; 字姓, 續, 接續, 陸續, 相續.

comment: tn̂g-tn̂g ê saⁿ; lāi-saⁿ, khùn-saⁿ, to-siù.
hanlo_comment: 長長 ê 衫; 內衫, 睏衫, 刀鞘.

comment: hoan-hù, thok-tiōng; kian-kò͘, chiū-sī kap 屬 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 吩咐, 託仗; 堅固, 就是 kap 屬 相像.

comment: oé-oé khiap-sì ê khoán-sit; tín-tāng thâu-khak ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 矮矮 怯勢 ê 款式; 振動 頭殼 ê 款.

comment: thâng ê miâ, ná tsńg-thâu bé, sī chhíⁿ sek; siông tī tāu ê lāi-bīn.
hanlo_comment: 蟲 ê 名, 若 指頭 尾, 是 淺 色; 常 tī 豆 ê 內面.

comment: liân-sòa, tâng-lūi; tsū-chi̍p, chhin-chhiūⁿ; kūn-oá, hā-sio̍k; koàn-sio̍k.
hanlo_comment: 連續, 同類; 聚集, 親像; 近oá, 下屬; 眷屬.

comment: liân-sòa, tâng-lūi; tsū-chi̍p, chhin-chhiūⁿ; kūn-oá, hā-sio̍k; koàn-sio̍k.
hanlo_comment: 連續, 同類; 聚集, 親像; 近oá, 下屬; 眷屬.

comment: hū-jîn-lâng kín-sīn sūn-thàn ê khoán-sit, ài thiaⁿ-thàn ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 婦人人 謹慎 順趁 ê 款式, 愛 聽趁 ê 意思.

comment: khah tóe-kha ê ti-tu; niû-á ia̍h ê thâng; ka-tsáu.
hanlo_comment: khah 短腳 ê 蜘蛛; 娘á 亦 ê 蟲; 虼蚤.

comment: ēng chhiú lâi the̍h; tsân, chha̍k, pio-á.
hanlo_comment: 用 手 來 the̍h; 剸, 鑿, 鏢á.

comment: un-sio ê khì-kū; io̍h ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 溫燒 ê 器具; 藥 ê 名.

comment: gio̍h-sio̍h, chiū-sī kóng-oē gio̍h-lâng, á-sī hì-lāng lâng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 謔誚, 就是 講話 謔人, 抑是 戲弄 人 ê 意思.

comment: chhiū ê miâ, chhiū-phê tiong ū chhin-chhiūⁿ pe̍h-bí sap, i ê hún thang tsòe piáⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 樹 ê 名, 樹皮 中 有 親像 白米 屑, 伊 ê 粉 thang 做 餅.

comment: chháu ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t-lê, hio̍h tōa-tōa.
hanlo_comment: 草 ê 名, 親像 蒺藜, 葉 大大.

comment: tùi gōa-bīn tsai lāi-bīn; chhúi-to̍k, chham-siông, thí-khui, kàng-lo̍h.
hanlo_comment: 對 外面 知 內面; chhē度, 參詳, thí開, 降落.

comment: pêng-siông, tsòe seng-lí; ga̍k-khì ê miâ; jī-sìⁿ, siong-liông, hâng-siong.
hanlo_comment: 平常, 做 生理; 樂器 ê 名; 字姓, 商量, 行商.

comment: thiàⁿ-thàng, iu-būn, sún-hoāi, chha̍k-tio̍h; jī-sìⁿ, siong-hāi, tio̍h-siong.

comment: thǹg-saⁿ tsoh-sit; tû-khì, chiūⁿ-koâiⁿ, kè-thâu, chiâⁿ, chiâu-tsn̂g, jī-sìⁿ.

comment: chháu-ba̍k ê chí; ti ê siaⁿ.

comment: chhó-bo̍k hoe-hio̍h sûi-lo̍h; sòa-chiap, iù-nńg, jiû-jio̍k.

comment: chháu tsòe saⁿ thang jia-hō͘; sûi-lo̍h, tsang-sui.

comment: chháu tsòe saⁿ thang jia-hō͘; sûi-lo̍h, tsang-sui.
hanlo_comment: 草 做 衫 thang 遮雨; 垂落, 棕簑.

comment: siū-khì ê khoán-sit, kia̍h-ba̍k-khòaⁿ, chhiⁿ-miâ.

comment: hó chhut-sui, ám-péng sui-khang; tê-koàn-sui.

comment: ngó͘-hêng ê tē-it hāng; ū liû ê khì-chit, bô tiāⁿ bô tio̍h, kòe-kòe, jī-sìⁿ tsúi.

comment: sì-chiàⁿ teh khòaⁿ ê khoán-sit; ba̍k-chiu chheng-pe̍h kng-bêng, chiâu-tsn̂g, kng-ku̍t ê khoán.

comment: chhim, hn̄g, chīn-thâu ê ì-sù.

comment: chiū-sī in si-soaⁿ ê chhia, iā miâ kiò-tsòe (khúi-chhia=軌車)

comment: sàng tsúi ê siaⁿ, siaⁿ-seh; lim-chiú, kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, kéng-kài, tah-hiahⁿ.

comment: húi-pòng; mē, ki-chhì; saⁿ-niū.

hanlo_comment: 水夔, 柴 ê 性質 滑; 蒪草 發 tī 水裡, 伊 ê 葉 親像 芙夔.

comment: tah-èng, chiū-sī kí-chiàn, á-sī pau-niá ê ì-sù.

comment: kàu-tah-tóe, chiū-sī kàu chīn ē-tóe ê ì-sù.

comment: thún-ta̍h, ta̍h khi-tsāi, ta̍h-thu̍t, kiâⁿ-ta̍h; ta̍h-chhia, ta̍h-tùi, ta̍h-soh.

hanlo_comment: 食, 吞落去, 哺, 試食, 引誘; 字姓.

hanlo_comment: 腹肚 ê 破病, 腹肚內 久長 ê 病.

comment: tám-ho̍k, chiū-sī song-ho̍k, tòa-hà 27 ge̍h ji̍t kú ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 禫服, 就是 喪服, 帶孝 27 月 日 久 ê 意思.

hanlo_comment: 薄 koh 闊大, 扁 koh 薄 ê 意思; 深深 ê 空.

hanlo_comment: 食, 吞落去, 哺, 試食, 引誘.

hanlo_comment: 赤色; 誠實; 藥名, 丹墀, 丹青, 藥丹, 金丹; 紅丹.

hanlo_comment: 古早 縣 ê 名, 邯鄲, 有人 講 屬 趙國.

comment: chi̍t-têng ê saⁿ, phē-toaⁿ, toaⁿ têng-saⁿ.

hanlo_comment: 貯 飯 ê 細kha籃; 竹名, 匏á; 笊籬.

hanlo_comment: 傷害, 盡頭, 剿滅, 盡, 刣.

comment: to̍k-to̍k, po̍h, chīn-thâu, to̍k-to̍k chi̍t-ê, chiu-ûi, tōa, jī-sìⁿ toaⁿ, ko͘-toaⁿ; sêng-si̍t.

comment: lô-khó͘ ê pīⁿ, gín-á pīⁿ, kan-khó͘, tio̍h-bôa, siū-khì.
hanlo_comment: 勞苦 ê 病, gín-á 病, 艱苦, tio̍h磨, 受氣.

comment: chhiáⁿ-tan, chiū-sī chhiáⁿ lâng chiām-sî ēng siàu tak-teh ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 且tan, 就是 請 人 暫時 用 數 tak-teh ê 意思.

comment: ân-tan, chiū-sī kian-kò͘ ióng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: ân-tan, 就是 堅固 勇 ê 意思.

comment: hân-tan, chiū-sī sin-niû kap káu ê lâng tēng-chhin, bē-kè ê sî, in lóng kè-sin.
hanlo_comment: 寒單, 就是 新娘 kap 九 ê 人 訂親, 未嫁 ê 時, in lóng 過身.

comment: chiū-sī koah-tn̄g ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 割斷 ê 意思.

comment: gō͘-kak tsōe-tsōe thang oá-khò; sêng-si̍t, sìn, kok-miâ, jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 五榖 濟濟 thang oá靠; 誠實, 信, 國名, 字姓.

comment: tng-tán, tán-tàⁿ, tán-tsôe, khiā-khiā tán, ihⁿ-ihⁿ-tán, tán-chih.
hanlo_comment: 當等, 等訂, 等齊, khiā-khiā 等, 盈盈等, 等接.

comment: tsá-khí-sî, tsá-tsá, oē-hiáu-tit, kng-bêng; poaⁿ-hì ê lâng, bîn-tòaⁿ, hì-tòaⁿ, tsng-tòaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 早起時, 早早, 會曉得, 光明; 搬戲 ê 人, 明旦, 戲旦, 妝旦.

comment: sòe-sòe keng ê chhù ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 細細 間 ê 厝 ê 意思.

comment: phah, jī-sìⁿ, thai-á, khàm-tsûn ê kòa, tōe-hō miâ.
hanlo_comment: phah, 字姓, 篩á, 蓋船 ê 蓋, 地號 名.

comment: saⁿ kiò ìn ê siaⁿ, kóng-oē bô chiàⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 相 叫 應 ê 聲, 講話 無 正.

comment: chiáu ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ koe mî-ji̍t siông-siông háu; tsá-khí sî oē kiò-kiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 ê 名, 親像 雞 暝日 常常 哮; 早起 時 會 叫更.

comment: khī kan-khó͘, ùi-bôa, ià-lái, kiaⁿ, pîn-tōaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 忌 艱苦, 畏磨, 厭lái, 驚, 貧惰.

comment: lô-khó͘ ê pīⁿ, n̂g-sek ê pīⁿ, n̂g-thán.
hanlo_comment: 勞苦 ê 病, 黃色 ê 病, 黃疸.

comment: chhéng-sàu, pōaⁿ chheng-khì, chhéng-á, phah, tah, kia̍h-khí.
hanlo_comment: 筅掃, 拌 清氣, 筅á, phah, 搭, 攑起.

comment: sim-koaⁿ kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ; tio̍h-bôa, lîn-bín, kóaⁿ-kín.
hanlo_comment: 心肝 驚惶; tio̍h磨, 憐憫, 趕緊.

comment: lô-khó͘ ê pīⁿ, gín-á ê pīⁿ, kan-khó͘, tio̍h-bôa siū-khì.
hanlo_comment: 勞苦 ê 病, gín-á ê 病, 艱苦, tio̍h磨 受氣.

comment: thia̍p-thô͘ khí tī pîⁿ ê tōe tsòe chè-hiàn ê lō͘-ēng; tiâu-lāi ê tiâⁿ; khó-tiûⁿ, chè-tôaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 疊土 起 tī 平 ê 地 做 祭獻 ê 路用; 朝內 ê 埕; 考場, 祭壇.

comment: kúi-nā hō chhâ ê miâ, tēng oē tsòe-tit khì-kū, phang-ê oē tsòe-tit hiuⁿ, jī-sìⁿ; hiuⁿ-chhâ.
hanlo_comment: 幾nā 號 柴 ê 名, 𠕇 會 做得 器具, 芳ê 會 做得 香, 字姓; 香柴.

comment: hō͘ oân-lia̍p-á kiâⁿ; thit-thô ēng keng tōaⁿ-chí, chè-ap áu-bân ê lâng, chek-pī; tôaⁿ-khîm.
hanlo_comment: hō͘ 圓粒á 行; 𨑨迌 用 弓 彈子, 制壓 拗蠻 ê 人, 責備; 彈琴.

comment: î-chhî, the̍h, kiong-kèng, chhiok-tio̍h, tôaⁿ ga̍k-khì.
hanlo_comment: 維持, the̍h, 恭敬, 觸tio̍h, 彈 樂器.

comment: soh-á, chí-sek; tîⁿ-tiâu, joa̍h-thiⁿ sî ê saⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 索á, 紫色; 纏tiâu, 熱天 時 ê 衫.

comment: phòa-pīⁿ, lô-khó͘ ê pīⁿ, un-e̍k ê pīⁿ, kan-khó͘.
hanlo_comment: 破病, 勞苦 ê 病, 瘟疫 ê 病, 艱苦.

comment: bô-sû-tân, chiū-sī bô hō͘-sû ê sîn-tsú, só͘ khǹg ê saⁿ-phìⁿ-piah ê chhù-á.
hanlo_comment: 無嗣亭, 就是 無 後嗣 ê 神主, 所 khǹg ê 三片壁 ê 厝á.

comment: lâng ê jī-sìⁿ; Tân, Lîm, poàn-thian-hā.
hanlo_comment: 人 ê 字姓; 陳, 林, 半天下.

comment: to̍k-to̍k, chí-ū, nā-sī, hoān-nā,khang-khang; m̄-tān-nā.
hanlo_comment: 獨獨, 只有, 若是, 凡若, 空空; m̄但若.

comment: lâm-sì tsá ê tso̍k-miâ; î-hoan; hoe-théng; chiáu-nn̄g, koe-nn̄g.
hanlo_comment: 南勢 早 ê 族名; 夷番; 花艇; 鳥卵, 雞卵.

comment: lâm-hng ê hoan, hoan ê lūi, siù ê miâ, kap {蛋Tān} siāng.
hanlo_comment: 南方 ê 番, 番 ê 類, 獸 ê 名, kap {蛋Tān} 像.

comment: chiū-sī khui-khoah, khoah-tōa ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 開闊, 闊大 ê 意思.

comment: lām-sám kóng tōa-oē; bô-iáⁿ, khi-phiàn, hòng-tōng, tōa, khoah, siⁿ-kiáⁿ, iúⁿ-chhī, siⁿ-ji̍t.
hanlo_comment: 濫糝 講 大話; 無影, 欺騙, 放蕩, 大, 闊, 生kiáⁿ, 養飼, 生日.

comment: lām-sám kóng tōa-oē; bô-iáⁿ, khi-phiàn, hòng-tōng, tōa, khoah, siⁿ-kiáⁿ, iúⁿ-chhī, siⁿ-ji̍t.
hanlo_comment: 濫糝 講 大話; 無影, 欺騙, 放蕩, 大, 闊, 生kiáⁿ, 養飼, 生日.

comment: khī kan-khó͘, ùi-bôa, ià-lái, kiaⁿ, pîn-tōaⁿ.

comment: chhèng-chí, lâng tso̍h lâi thit-thô; phah, tah, thiàu-thah, tōaⁿ, tōaⁿ-chîn, tōaⁿ-chiáu pho̍k-pho̍k-tōaⁿ.

comment: the̍h, î-chhî, kiong-kèng, kiû hok-khì hoán-tńg tú-tio̍h tsai-hō.

comment: chiū-sī hâ io ê tōa-tiâu-tòa, io-tòa, pa̍k-ân.
hanlo_comment: 就是 縖 腰 ê 大條帶, 腰帶, 縛ân.

comment: kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, tok-sìn, kàu-kàu, kóaⁿ-kín.

comment: bīn phê-hu ê pīⁿ, bah ê phê-mo̍͘h.

comment: tang-thiⁿ, ah-tang, tang-koe, tang-sún, ji̍p-tang; nî-tang, tang-chì.

comment: tang-e-chhài, tang-o, tang-o-chhài; ka-tang, ka-tang-hio̍h.

comment: tang-sì, tang-hng, tang-bīn, tang-pa̍k, tang-iûⁿ, tang-sai, soaⁿ-tang-hún.
hanlo_comment: 東勢, 東方, 東面, 東北, 東洋, 東西, 山東粉.

comment: bâng-tang, chiū-sī lô͘-tek tsòe chek-á; kia̍h bâng-tang tsòe koáiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 芒苳, 就是 蘆竹 做 織á; 攑 芒苳 做 桿.

comment: ka-tang, ka-tang-chhiū, ka-tang-hio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 茄苳, 茄苳樹, 茄苳葉.

comment: tin-tin tong-tong, chiū-sī ge̍k tín-tāng sio-kho̍k ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 叮叮 璫璫, 就是 玉 振動 相硞 ê 聲.

comment: tang-hoa-hún, chiū-sī io̍h ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 東華粉, 就是 藥 ê 名.

comment: bāng-tang, bāng-tang-á-chiáu, bāng-tang-á siⁿ giâ-nn̄g.
hanlo_comment: 望冬, 望冬á鳥, 望冬á 生 鵝卵.

comment: tang=tàng, tang-tio̍h, kha-tang-tio̍h, chiū-sī kha hō͘ mi̍h tiam-tio̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: tang=tàng, tang-tio̍h, 腳tang-tio̍h, 就是 腳 hō͘ 物 砧著 ê 意思.

comment: táng-hiahⁿ=tah-hiahⁿ, chiū-sī kiaⁿ-tio̍h ê ì-sù.

comment: lâng ê jī-sìⁿ; táng-sū.

comment: táng-som=tóng-som, chiū-sī io̍h ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 黨蔘=黨蔘, 就是 藥 ê 名.

comment: táng-som=tóng-som, chiū-sī io̍h ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 黨蔘=黨蔘, 就是 藥 ê 名.

comment: huih-táng, chiū-sī huih khó-khó; iā-sī biáu-sī lâng ê oē.
hanlo_comment: 血táng, 就是 血 洘洘; 也是 藐視 人 ê 話.

comment: phàu-táng, chiū-sī khah-tn̂g ê phàu-tâi, á-sī chhiûⁿ-á, hō͘ peng-teng thang siú.
hanlo_comment: 砲táng, 就是 khah長 ê 砲台, á是 牆á, hō͘ 兵丁 通 守.

comment: tàng-chí, tàng-chi̍h, tàng-lō͘; kiân-tàng, tàng-sng, ám-tàng, bah-tàng, ò-giô-tàng.
hanlo_comment: 凍趾, 凍舌, 凍露; 堅凍, 凍霜, 泔凍, 肉凍, 薁蕘凍.

comment: ún-tàng, tàng-chin, tng sím-mi̍h hāng-tàng.
hanlo_comment: 穩當, 當真, 當 甚物 項當.

comment: tàng-á, sī thiāu téng-bīn ê sòe-ki thiāu; hó-ka-tàng, chiū-sī hó-gia̍h.
hanlo_comment: 棟á, 是 柱 頂面 ê 細支 柱; 好家棟, 就是 好額.

comment: tak-ba̍k, kap góa tàng-ba̍k, ba̍k-thâu tàng-tàng, ba̍k-chiu tàng-tàng.
hanlo_comment: 觸目, kap 我 瞪目, 目頭 瞪瞪, 目睭 瞪瞪.

comment: tàng=tang, tàng-chi̍h, ēng tsńg-kah lâi tàng.
hanlo_comment: tàng=tang, tàng折, 用 指甲 來 tàng.

comment: hô-tâng, saⁿ-tâng, tùi-tâng, tâng-sim, tâng-phōaⁿ, tâng-sāi, tâng-mn̂g.
hanlo_comment: 和同, 相同, 對同, 同心, 同伴, 同姒, 同門.

comment: âng-tâng, chhiⁿ-tâng, pe̍h-tâng, tâng-si, tâng-sòaⁿ, phòa-tâng, tâng-chîⁿ.

comment: tâng-ki, chin-tâng, ké-tâng, koan-tâng, thiàu-tâng, chihūⁿ-tâng, thè-tâng.
hanlo_comment: 童乩, 真童, 假童, 關童, 跳童, 上童, 退童.

comment: tek-tâng, chîⁿ-tâng, hiuⁿ-tâng, pit-tâng, ian-tâng, ian-tâng-kho͘.
hanlo_comment: 竹筒, 錢筒, 香筒, 筆筒, 煙筒, 煙筒箍.

comment: kha-tâng, kha-tâng-kut, tōa-kha-tâng, hàm kha-tâng.
hanlo_comment: 腳胴, 腳胴骨, 大腳胴, hàm 腳胴.

comment: tâng=tàng, chiū-sī tòng-liông tiong-ng ê té-thiāu, tâng-á=tàng-á sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: tâng=tàng, 就是 棟梁 中央 ê 短柱, tâng-á=tàng-á 相像.

comment: sông-tâng, chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán phàⁿ-phàⁿ bô-lō͘-ēng ê chhâ.
hanlo_comment: 傖筒, 就是 一款 冇冇 無路用 ê 柴.

comment: sông-tâng, chiū-sī lâng tōa-hàn, chhún-pūn, gōng-gōng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 傖筒, 就是 人 大漢, 蠢笨, 戇戇 ê 意思.

comment: tāng-á, kim-tāng, āng-tāng, kau hê-siūⁿ tò tāng-á-bí.
hanlo_comment: tāng-á, 金tāng, 旺tāng, 交 和尚 倒 tāng-á米.

comment: tāng ihⁿ-ihⁿ, tāng hoaihⁿ-hoaihⁿ, tîm-tāng, chho͘-tāng, khin-tāng, sit-tāng.
hanlo_comment: 動 ihⁿ-ihⁿ, 動 hoaihⁿ-hoaihⁿ, 沉重, 粗重, 輕重, 失重.

comment: tín-tāng, oa̍h-tāng, ba̍k-sîn oa̍h-tāng, ngia̍uhⁿ-ngia̍uhⁿ-tāng; tsáu-tāng.
hanlo_comment: 振動, 活動, 目神 活動, ngia̍uhⁿ-ngia̍uhⁿ動; 走動.

comment: sòe ê gō͘-kak; tāu-á; tam-tng; saⁿ-thia̍p, ū-sî kap ē-jī sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 細 ê 五穀; 豆á; 擔當; 相疊, 有時 kap 字 相像.

comment: thoa-tsûn ê tek-soh; pò-èng, tam-tng; jī-sìⁿ, ìn-tap, pò-tap.
hanlo_comment: 拖船 ê 竹索; 報應, 擔當; 字姓, 應答, 報答.

comment: têng-têng tha̍h-tha̍h ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 重重 疊疊 ê 款式.

comment: chiū-sī tōa-hī ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 大耳 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī phê lēng-lēng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 皮 冗冗 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī koah chháu ê ke-si; liâm-le̍k-to; khau-to.

comment: sòe-sòe niá ê phē; saⁿ phòa ê ì-sù.

comment: khin-khin phah, oá-teh, kòa, moa, bong, kùi, thiⁿ, tah-chhiú, tah-chhia.
hanlo_comment: 輕輕 phah, oá teh, 掛, 幔, 摸, 挂, 添, 搭手, 搭車.

comment: chiū-sī hut-jiân lia̍h-lâng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 忽然 掠人 ê 意思.

comment: seng-khu bah chéng-khí ê pīⁿ, lia̍p-á.
hanlo_comment: 身軀 肉 腫起 ê 病, 粒á.

comment: kiâⁿ-lō͘, thiàu-kè, that, thiàu kè-khì ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 行路, 跳過, 踢, 跳 過去 ê 意思.

comment: sim bô tì-ì; hóng-hut, bô oân-tsoân; ēng chi̍h-chīⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 心 無 致意; 恍惚, 無 完全; 用 舌舐.

comment: mi̍h tūi-lo̍h ê siaⁿ, tūi-thô͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 物 墜落 ê 聲, 墜土 ê 意思.

comment: saⁿ-kha̍p-tio̍h ê siaⁿ; siah, khau ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 相磕tio̍h ê 聲; 削, 剾 ê 意思.

comment: chhun chhiú phah, siàn; bong ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 伸 手 phah, 搧; 摸 ê 意思.

comment: chhap-tsa̍p, kiâⁿ saⁿ-sòa; chhiong-sēng, tsōe-tsōe; tsòng-ióng ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 插雜, 行 相續; 充盛, 濟濟; 壯勇 ê 款式.

comment: chiū-sī bōe oē pān tāi-chì ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 bōe 會 辦 tāi-chì ê 意思.

comment: tsúi oaiⁿ-oaiⁿ lâu ê siaⁿ; ek-chhut, sio-chiap, têng-thâu, siong, jī-sìⁿ, ta̍uh-ta̍uh.
hanlo_comment: 水 彎彎 流 ê 聲; 溢出, 相接, 重頭, 傷, 字姓, 沓沓.

comment: kha oá-tio̍h-tōe, kiâⁿ-tsáu, kha-ta̍h, thún-ta̍h.
hanlo_comment: 腳 oá到地, 行走, 腳踏, thún踏.

comment: lêng teh kiâⁿ, á-sī teh pe ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 龍 teh 行, á是 teh 飛 ê 意思.

comment: saⁿ-kap kóng-oē; loān-loān kóng; sio-chiap, ta̍uh-ta̍uh.
hanlo_comment: 相合 講話; 亂亂 講; 相接, 沓沓.

comment: kín-kín kóng, siaⁿ-seh tsōe-tsōe, kóng-oē bô-soah.
hanlo_comment: 緊緊 講, 聲說 濟濟, 講話 無soah.

comment: chiū-sī thâu-mn̂g ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 頭毛 ê 意思.

comment: pâng chhiú-lok, to-siù; siàn, phah, bong ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 縫 手橐, 刀鞘; 搧, phah, 摸 ê 意思.

comment: pâng chhiú-lok, to-siù; siàn, phah, bong ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 縫 手橐, 刀鞘; 搧, phah, 摸 ê 意思.

comment: só͘ kiâⁿ khoa-kháu ê khoán-sit, chhia-chhí, ēng kha nge̍h lâng.
hanlo_comment: 所 行 誇口 ê 款式, 奢侈, 用 腳 挾 人.

comment: oê, chháu-oê, phê-oê, ēng phê tsòe-chiâⁿ ê.
hanlo_comment: 鞋, 草鞋, 皮鞋, 用 皮 做成 ê.

comment: kiâⁿ-lō͘, that, thiàu-kè-khì ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 行路, 踢, 跳過去 ê 意思.

comment: thiāu-téng ê chhâ, thiāu-táu, thiāu-téng ê lân-kan.
hanlo_comment: 柱頂 ê 柴, 柱斗, 柱頂 ê 欄杆.

comment: chiū-sī báng-tà téng-bīn ê kòa.
hanlo_comment: 就是 蚊罩 頂面 ê 蓋.

comment: chiū-sī chia̍h-mi̍h, pō͘-chhài lâi thun-lo̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 食物, 哺菜 來 吞落 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī ēng kha ta̍h tùi lâi cheng-bí ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 用 腳 踏 碓 來 舂米 ê 意思.

comment: saⁿ-kap kóng-oē, lām-sám kóng, kóng pe̍h-chha̍t-oē, tsōe-oē.
hanlo_comment: 相合 講話, 濫糝 講, 講 白賊話, 濟話.

comment: phah kó͘ ê siaⁿ, cheng kó͘ ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: phah 鼓 ê 聲, 鐘 鼓 ê 聲.

comment: thún-ta̍h, kiâⁿ-ta̍h, kiâⁿ-lō͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: thún踏, 行踏, 行路 ê 意思.

comment: thún-ta̍h, kiâⁿ-ta̍h, kiâⁿ-lō͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: thún踏, 行踏, 行路 ê 意思.

comment: sai-pêng hoan-kok ê miâ; oē bô chiàⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 西爿 番國 ê 名; 話 無 正.

comment: Tiū-ông hō͘-hui ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 紂王 后妃 ê 名.

comment: chhi-chhám, kiaⁿ, kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, khī, tio̍h-bôa, lô-sim.
hanlo_comment: 悽慘, 驚, 驚惶, 忌, tio̍h磨, 勞心.

comment: chhù-tat, phah-chhù-tat, phah-tat; oē thòe lí phah-tat, bōe thòe lí chhut-la̍t.
hanlo_comment: 厝tat, phah 厝tat, phah tat; 會 替 你 phah tat, bōe 替 你 出力.

comment: tat=tah, tiau-tat=tiau-tah, chiū-sī léng-lī hó-khòaⁿ, chhin-chhiūⁿ saⁿ ha̍h-su ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: tat=tah, 調tat=調tah, 就是 伶俐 好看, 親像 衫 合軀 ê 意思.

comment: piàn-piàn, khui-khoah, thong-thàu, hiáu-gō͘, ha̍p-gî, thong-ti, chìn-khì.
hanlo_comment: 遍遍, 開闊, 通透, 曉悟, 合宜, 通知, 振起.

comment: chháu ê miâ, hong chhe chiū chiau-ta̍t ê hio̍h li̍h-khui.
hanlo_comment: 草 ê 名, 風 吹 就 蕉薘 葉 裂開.

comment: chiū-sī sòaⁿ pa̍k-ân ê ì-sù; só͘ phah ê kat.
hanlo_comment: 就是 線 縛ân ê 意思; 所 phah ê 結.

comment: sai-pêng hoan-kok ê miâ, giân-gú bô chiàⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 西爿 番國 ê 名, 言語 無 正.

comment: ta̍t-á, ta̍t-lá, pûn-ta̍t-lá; chiū-sī pûn chi̍t-khoán ê ga̍k-khì.
hanlo_comment: 笛á, 笛lá, pûn笛lá; 就是 pûn 一款 ê 樂器.

comment: ta̍t-chîⁿ, m̄-ta̍t, kè-ta̍t, m̄-ta̍t-tio̍h, tiōng-ta̍t; m̄-ta̍t chiūⁿ chit-ê chîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 值錢, m̄值, 價值, m̄值tio̍h, 重值; m̄值 上 這ê 錢.

comment: tsōe-tsōe oē, khoài-khoài kóng-oē, chhùi-chi̍h lāi.
hanlo_comment: 濟濟 話, 快快 講話, 嘴舌 利.

comment: sio-thâi ê bō; thâu-khoe, hêng-kiông ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 相刣 ê 帽; 頭盔, 形強 ê 意思.

comment: khòaⁿ, ti̍t-ti̍t khòaⁿ, khòaⁿ bōe-soah.
hanlo_comment: 看, 直直 看, 看 bōe-soah.

comment: ki-chhì, thí-chhio, kún-chhiò.
hanlo_comment: 譏刺, 恥笑, 滾笑.

comment: bé lim-tsúi ê khì-kū, bé-tsô, tek-chhia, gû-chhùi-lam.
hanlo_comment: 馬 lim水 ê 器具, 馬槽, 竹車, 牛嘴籠.

comment: ēng chhiú khîⁿ-lâi, ēng chhiú phah, ēng tsńg-thâu-á kí, tau-oá, tau-liû.
hanlo_comment: 用 手 拑來, 用 手 phah, 用 tsńg頭á 指, tau-oá, tau留.

comment: chiū-sī chhim-kē ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 深低 ê 意思.

comment: tau=tāu, niáⁿ-tau, chiū-sī niá-tāu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: tau=tāu, 領脰, 就是 領脰 ê 意思.

comment: bô tau-sau, chiū-sī bô sio-chia̍h-àⁿ, sau-sau ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 無 兜捎, 就是 無 相食向, 捎捎 ê 意思.

comment: ô-á-tau, chiū-sī ēng ô-á kō-hún lâi tsú ê ì-sù; ô-á tau-mī.
hanlo_comment: 蚵á兜, 就是 用 蚵á 滒粉 來 煮 ê 意思; 蚵á 兜麵.

comment: táu-á, chiú táu-á, chin-táu, chi̍t-táu-bí, bí-táu, táu-kài, tōa-táu.
hanlo_comment: 斗á, 酒 斗á, 升斗, 一斗米, 米斗, 斗概, 大斗.

comment: koe-chi̍h-táu, táu-á, pn̄g-táu, hò͘-táu.
hanlo_comment: 雞舌斗, 斗á, 飯斗, 戽斗.

comment: sòaⁿ-táu, chiū-sī peng-teng móa-jīm; á-sī pêng-iú saⁿ kong-kek lī-khui ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 散堵, 就是 兵丁 滿任; á是 朋友 相 攻擊 離開 ê 意思.

comment: chhia-thâu bé ê thih, chhia-lûn ê ì-sù.

comment: kéng-soán, kéng-to̍h, te̍k-soán.

comment: lī-khui, tû-khì, hn̄g-hn̄g, tham-sim.
hanlo_comment: 離開, 除去, 遠遠, 貪心.

comment: tek tn̂g koâiⁿ koh chiam-lāi ê ì-sù.

comment: chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán thâng ê miâ.

hanlo_comment: 恬恬 teh 流 ê 款式, 水 勻勻á ê 意思.

comment: tiâm-lo̍h-tsúi, tiâm-lo̍h-khì, ji̍h-tiâm, tiâm-tēng, ū-tiâm-tóe.

comment: thâu-téng, bé-bīn, tūi-lo̍h, khí-thâu, péng-tó, kan-khó͘, sún-hoāi, jī-sìⁿ, tian-tó.
hanlo_comment: 頭等, 尾面, 墜落, 起頭, 扳倒, 艱苦, 損壞, 字姓, 顛倒.

hanlo_comment: 車 轉 一半, 翻轉, 轉來 轉去, 水磨, 輾轉.

hanlo_comment: 就是 玉 ê 名, 將 玉 來 做 耳鉤.

comment: tè-āu ê kun-peng, tìn-tio̍h, siat-li̍p.
hanlo_comment: tè後 ê 軍兵, 鎮tio̍h, 設立.

hanlo_comment: 就是 平坦, 無 嵁硈 ê 意思.

comment: sin-khui-hng ê chhân-hn̂g, keng-tsoh, phah-la̍h.
hanlo_comment: 新開荒 ê 田園, 耕作, phah 獵.

comment: koaⁿ-hú sè-lâng bóe-bōe ê só͘-tsāi, sio̍k chi̍t ke bó͘-pòaⁿ ê tōe, ke-chhī.
hanlo_comment: 官府 稅人 買賣 ê 所在, 屬 一 家 畝半 ê 地, 街市.

comment: koaⁿ-hú sè-lâng bóe-bōe ê só͘-tsāi, sio̍k chi̍t ke bó͘-pòaⁿ ê tōe, ke-chhī.
hanlo_comment: 官府 稅人 買賣 ê 所在, 屬 一 家 畝半 ê 地, 街市.

comment: tsúi ê miâ, chhut tī Hô-lâm séng ê Hô-lâm hú pak-pêng ê só͘-tsāi.
hanlo_comment: 水 ê 名, 出 tī 河南 省 ê 河南 府 北旁 ê 所在.

comment: hoaⁿ-hí tín-tāng ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 歡喜 振動 ê 款式.

comment: chio̍h ka-la̍uh ê siaⁿ, thiāu-ē ê chio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 石 交落 ê 聲, 柱下 ê 石.

comment: koaⁿ-hú sè-lâng bóe-bōe ê só͘-tsāi, koe-chhī, sio̍k-jī sī chit-jī 廛
hanlo_comment: 官府 稅人 買賣 ê 所在, 街市, 俗字 是 chit字 廛

comment: ge̍k ê miâ, chiong ge̍k lâi tsòe hī-kau ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 玉 ê 名, 將 玉 來 做 耳鉤 ê 意思.

comment: pûn phín-á ê siaⁿ, bān-bān, iân-oān ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: pûn 品á ê 聲, 慢慢, 延緩 ê 意思.

comment: chiáu ê miâ, kap tha̍k Tian sio-siāng.

comment: tî ê miâ, kap tha̍k Tian sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 池 ê 名, kap 讀 Tian 相像.

comment: khàng-tōe, thó͘-tōe; soaⁿ-iá; phah-la̍h; tōe pun tsòe khu, chhân-hn̂g, tiân-thó͘.

comment: chiū-sī phah-la̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 phah 獵 ê 意思.

comment: kim ê hôa-chhái, thâu-kè siuⁿ-kim, iā kap {甸Tiân} tâng.

comment: tsoh-chhân, chhân-hn̂g, phah-la̍h; tiān-hō͘, tiān-phoe; jīn-tiān.

comment: phah, tûi-chio̍h, phah-chio̍h, kap tha̍k Tian sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: phah, 搥石, phah 石, kap 讀 Tian 相像.

comment: kiâⁿ-ta̍h, kha-jiah, tiāⁿ-tio̍h ê lō͘-kèng, î-sóa-kiâⁿ, tiân-tó.
hanlo_comment: 行踏, 腳跡, 定tio̍h ê 路徑, 移徙行, 顛倒.

comment: tsúi tiām-tiām, teh lâu ê khoán-sit, ûn-ûn lâu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 水 恬恬, teh 流 ê 款式, 勻勻 流 ê 意思.

comment: thūn-thô͘, thūn, that, chiâⁿ, ke-thiⁿ, sūn, pê, phah-kó͘ ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 坉土, 坉, that, 成, 加添, 順, 爬, phah 鼓 ê 聲.

comment: chhián-tsúi, phah-la̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 淺水, phah 獵 ê 意思.

comment: Hông-tè kiaⁿ-siâⁿ kéng-sek ê mi̍h ê tāi-lio̍k, chhek-lô-tiān.

comment: chhiⁿ-sek ê ní-liāu, ēng lâm-hio̍h ê chiap hô tsúi kap chio̍h-hoe.
hanlo_comment: 青色 ê 染料, 用 藍葉 ê 汁 和 水 kap 石灰.

comment: kap-tsōa li̍h-khui, phòa-li̍h, pâng, thīⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 合逝 裂開, 破裂, 縫, 綻.

comment: tiāⁿ-tio̍h, hē-teh; hiàn-chè, tiān-chiú, koàn-tiān.
hanlo_comment: 定tio̍h, hē-teh; 獻祭, 奠酒, 灌奠.

comment: kng-bêng, sih-nà, sîn ê miâ, tiān-khì, tiān-bú, tiān-teng.
hanlo_comment: 光明, 熾爁, 神 ê 名, 電氣, 電母, 電燈.

comment: oē-kì-tit, siàu-liām, chhin-chhiūⁿ saⁿ lī-khui ê pêng-iú.
hanlo_comment: 會記得, 數念, 親像 相 離開 ê 朋友.

comment: kim ê hôa-chhái, thâu-kè siuⁿ-kim.
hanlo_comment: 金 ê 華彩, 頭髻 鑲金.

comment: tîⁿ, iok-sok, pa̍k, kap tha̍k Tiân sio-siāng.

comment: kha-jiah; kiâⁿ-ta̍h, tiāⁿ-tio̍h ê lō͘-kèng, tiân-tó, î-sóa-kiâⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 腳跡; 行踏, 定tio̍h ê 路徑, 顛倒, 移徙行.

comment: chiū-sī tsoh-chhân, chèng-tsoh ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 作田, 種作 ê 意思.

comment: tsoh-chhân, chhân-hn̂g, phah-la̍h, tiān-hō͘, tiān-phoe, jīn-tiān.
hanlo_comment: 作田, 田園, phah 獵, 佃戶, 佃胚, 認佃.

comment: chiū-sī mi̍h bô-pîⁿ, chho͘-chho͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 物 無平, 粗粗 ê 意思.

comment: bah-koaⁿ jī-chhioh-jī tn̂g; liâm-liâm.

comment: tang-thiⁿ thâng-thōa ún tī thô͘-lāi; ún-tsông, an-chēng, kiⁿ-ti̍t.
hanlo_comment: 冬天 蟲豸 隱 tī 土內; 隱藏, 安靜, 驚蟄.

comment: chi̍t-ē khì bô tò-lâi, hiat-ka̍k, pàng-lī, tiu-hē, tiu-tsúi.
hanlo_comment: 一下 去 無 倒來, hiat-ka̍k, 放離, 丟下, 丟水.

comment: hō͘-è, sè-hē, sī-tōa, kap chit-jī 冑 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 後裔, 世系, 序大, kap chit字 冑 相像.

comment: ba̍t-tiu-tiu, sán-tiu-tiu; âng-tiu-tiu, sī chin-âng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 密稠稠, 瘦稠稠; 紅稠稠, 是 真紅 ê 意思.

comment: kiān-tiu, chiū-sī sòe-sòe, iù-siù hó-khòaⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 健丟, 就是 細細, 幼秀 好看 ê 意思.

comment: chhiú-kut ê ē-tsat, kó͘-tsá ēng tsòe chhioh, chhiú āu-tiⁿ, ún-khǹg, lâu-tiâu.
hanlo_comment: 手骨 ê 下節, 古早 用 做 尺, 手 後tiⁿ, 隱khǹg, 留tiâu.

comment: po͘-tiú, po͘-tiú-á, chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán sòe-chiah chiáu-á ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 埔tiú, 埔tiú-á, 就是 一款 細隻 鳥á ê 名.

comment: ta-tiú, chiū-sī sek, koa-tôa ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: ta-tiú, 就是 色, koa-tôa ê 意思.

comment: ji̍t-sî, tùi thiⁿ-kng kàu-àm, jī-sìⁿ tiù, tiù-iā.
hanlo_comment: 日時, 對 天光 到暗, 字姓 晝, 晝夜.

comment: chiáu-á ê chhùi, tsōe-tsōe oē ê khoán-sit; chhùi teh-mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 鳥á ê 嘴, 濟濟 話 ê 款式; 嘴 teh物.

comment: chiáu-á ēng chhùi teh mi̍h, bāng-tang tiù ka-tsáu.
hanlo_comment: 鳥á 用 嘴 teh 物, 望冬 噣 虼蚤.

comment: tiū-ām, tsōe-tsōe, siap-ba̍t, kāu-kāu, hó-khòaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 稻ām, 濟濟, 塞密, 厚厚, 好看.

comment: sit-bāng, iu-būn, ut-tsut, oàn-hūn.
hanlo_comment: 失望, 憂悶, 鬱卒, 怨恨.

comment: po̍h ê si, si ê miâ; pa̍k, tîⁿ, kāu-kāu, tiû-toān.
hanlo_comment: 薄 ê 絲, 絲 ê 名; 縛, 纏, 厚厚, 綢緞.

comment: kè-bô͘, phah-sǹg, pâi-lia̍t, kia̍h-chhiam, sî-khek, pàng-tiû, kia̍h-tiû, chiú-tiû.
hanlo_comment: 計謀, phah算, 排列, 攑籤, 時刻, 放籌, 攑籌, 酒籌.

comment: chiū-sī kiâⁿ bōe chìn, tiû-tû ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 行 bōe 進, 躊躇 ê 意思.

comment: sì-lâng sio-ha̍p tóng-lūi, phōaⁿ, tsōe-tsōe lâng, jia-khàm, chī-tsūi-á.
hanlo_comment: 四人 相合 黨類, 伴, 濟濟 人, 遮khàm, chī-tsuiā2.

comment: chèng môa ê chhân; tsoh-chhân, téng-tē, chhù-sū, phit-tùi, tsāi, jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 種 麻 ê 田; 作田, 等第, 次序, 匹對, 在, 字姓.

comment: chhiū ê miâ, kôaⁿ-thiⁿ sî bô-lak-hio̍h, Hó͘-thâu soaⁿ chhut tsōe-tsōe, i ê chhâ oē tsòe-tit tsûn-ko.
hanlo_comment: 樹 ê 名, 寒天 時 無落葉, 虎頭 山 出 濟濟, 伊 ê 柴 會 做得 船篙.

comment: tê-chhài ê ì-sù; tē-jû.
hanlo_comment: 荼菜 ê 意思; 地榆.

comment: iu-chhiû to̍k ê khoán-sit, iu-būn, hoân-ló ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 憂愁 毒 ê 款式, 憂悶, 煩惱 ê 意思.

comment: iu-chhiû to̍k ê khoán-sit, iu-būn, hoân-ló ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 憂愁 毒 ê 款式, 憂悶, 煩惱 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī chhiu-chhìn liâng-léng ê hong ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 秋凊 涼冷 ê 風 ê 意思.

comment: bah-koaⁿ; sió-tō͘ ê pīⁿ; pî ê āu-bīn.
hanlo_comment: 肉干; 小肚 ê 病; 脾 ê 後面.

comment: koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ, bōe pa̍k-ti̍t, kia̍h-khí, hut-jiân.
hanlo_comment: 懸懸, bōe 縛直, 攑起, 忽然.

comment: ēng si chit-chiâⁿ phit, si-tiâu, thâu-sū; khan-ín, siūⁿ, chhâ-khó, tiû-toān.
hanlo_comment: 用 絲 織成 疋, 絲條, 頭序; 牽引, 想, 查考, 綢緞.

comment: tù-hiān, piàn-chiò, phó͘-chiò, khàm.
hanlo_comment: 著現, 遍照, 普照, khàm.

comment: tù-hiān, piàn-chiò, phó͘-chiò, khàm.
hanlo_comment: 著現, 遍照, 普照, khàm.

comment: phē-toaⁿ, khàm, báng-tà ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 被單, khàm, 蚊罩 ê 意思.

comment: hiaⁿ-ko ê bó͘, tâng-sāi.
hanlo_comment: 兄哥 ê bó͘, 同姒.

comment: phah-sǹg, kè-bô͘, pâi-lia̍t, kà-sī, Tiû-tiong chiū-sī pe̍h-chha̍t.
hanlo_comment: phah算, 計謀, 排列, 教示, 譸張 就是 白賊.

comment: tiû-tsúi-hún; kè-tiû, chiū-sī kè-lī, kè-khêng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 淘水粉; 過淘, 就是 過濾, 過窮 ê 意思.

comment: tsài-mi̍h ê khì-kū, tōe, khiā-khí, tùi tsá kàu-taⁿ éng-oán ê sè-tāi, ú-tiū.
hanlo_comment: 載物 ê 器具, 地, khiā起, 對 早 到今 永遠 ê 世代, 宇宙.

comment: tsân-jím; bé-soh; lâng ê miâ, Tiū-ông, Siong-tiū.
hanlo_comment: 殘忍; 馬索; 人 ê 名, 紂王, 商紂.

comment: chiū-sī thâu-khoe, hō͘-è ê ì-sù; ū chhò-siá tsòe 胄 jī.
hanlo_comment: 就是 頭盔, 後裔 ê 意思; 有 錯寫 做 胄 字.

comment: chiok-hok, kóng hó-oē; lâng-miâ, [Iûⁿ-tiû|Iûⁿ-tiū].
hanlo_comment: 祝福, 講 好話; 人名, 楊䛆.

comment: hō͘-è, sè-hē, sī-tōa, jī-sìⁿ, ū ê chhò-siá tsòe 冑 jī.
hanlo_comment: 後裔, 世系, 序大, 字姓, 有 ê 錯寫 做 冑 字.

comment: kāu-chiú, têng chè-tsō ê chiú, hiān-kim kiò-tsòe siang-tho-chiú.
hanlo_comment: 厚酒, 重 製造 ê 酒, 現今 叫做 雙tho酒.

comment: tiū-á siông-se̍k, siu-sêng, siu-koah.

comment: bé heng-khám ê soh, bán chhia ê phê-tòa.

comment: chháu hoat ām-ām, chháu chhiong-sēng ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 草 發 ām-ām, 草 充盛 ê 款式.

comment: Chiu-tiâu ê thài-sú-koaⁿ ê miâ, oá pún thoàn-jī ê thé-sek ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 周朝 ê 太史官 ê 名, oá 本 篆字 ê 體式 ê 名.

comment: sè-hē, hō͘-è, sī-tōa, kap chit-jī 冑 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 世系, 後裔, 序大, kap chit字 冑 相像.

comment: hoân-ló, iu-būn, iu-chhiû ê khoán-sit.

comment: hoân-ló, iu-būn, iu-chhiû ê khoán-sit.

comment: bah-koaⁿ, sió-tō͘ ê phòa-pīⁿ, pî ê āu-bīn.
hanlo_comment: 肉干, 小肚 ê 破病, 脾 ê 後面.

comment: tōe-hō ê miâ, phah-tun, soaⁿ-oan ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 地號 ê 名, phah 墩, 山彎 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī tiū-á sêng-sio̍k ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 稻á 成熟 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī chiong sòe-ki koáiⁿ-á lâi phah, á-sī kòng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 將 細支 枴á 來 phah, á是 摃 ê 意思.

comment: lâng ê jī-sìⁿ, tiuⁿ-saⁿ lí-sì, tiuⁿ thian-su, tiuⁿ thian-kun, tiuⁿ-iū, tiuⁿ-toah.
hanlo_comment: 人 ê 字姓, 張三 李四, 張 天書, 張 天君, 張佑, 張掇.

comment: hâng-tiúⁿ, hé-tiúⁿ, hōe-tiúⁿ, kah-tiúⁿ, tūi-tiúⁿ, ke-tiúⁿ, khu-tiúⁿ, thiaⁿ-tiúⁿ; tso̍k-tiúⁿ, tiúⁿ-ló.

comment: tiúⁿ-tiúⁿ, tiúⁿ-tiúⁿ-háu, sī khah-sòe ê tâng-lô ê siaⁿ; phah-tiúⁿ-tiúⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ chhut-tàⁿ ê seng-lí-lâng.
hanlo_comment: 長長, 長長哮, 是 khah細 ê 銅鑼 ê 聲; phah 長長 親像 出擔 ê 生理人.

comment: báng-tiùⁿ, báng-tiùⁿ-kau, sîn-tiùⁿ, chiong-kun-tiùⁿ, kiō-tiùⁿ, tiùⁿ-pâng.
hanlo_comment: 蚊帳, 蚊帳鉤, 神帳, 將軍帳, 轎帳, 帳房.

comment: siau-tiùⁿ, tiùⁿ-hong, tiùⁿ-tsúi, tiùⁿ-lâng, pá-tiùⁿ, tsúi-tiùⁿ, tiùⁿ-khì.
hanlo_comment: 消脹, 脹風, 脹水, 脹膿, 飽脹, 水脹, 脹氣.

comment: siau-tiùⁿ, tiùⁿ-hong, tiùⁿ-tsúi, tiùⁿ-lâng, pá-tiùⁿ, tsúi-tiùⁿ, tiùⁿ-khì.
hanlo_comment: 消脹, 脹風, 脹水, 脹膿, 飽脹, 水脹, 脹氣.

comment: siau-tiùⁿ, tiùⁿ-hong, tiùⁿ-tsúi, tiùⁿ-lâng, pá-tiùⁿ, tsúi-tiùⁿ, tiùⁿ-khì.
hanlo_comment: 消脹, 脹風, 脹水, 脹膿, 飽脹, 水脹, 脹氣.

comment: tiùⁿ tiàu o͘-bé, tiùⁿ-oá, tiùⁿ-tīⁿ, chiū-sī chhòng kàu hē bē lo̍h-khì.
hanlo_comment: 漲 吊 烏尾, 漲oá, 漲滇, 就是 創 到 hē bōe 落去.

comment: tiùⁿ tiàu o͘-bé, tiùⁿ-oá, tiùⁿ-tīⁿ, chiū-sī chhòng kàu hē bē lo̍h-khì.
hanlo_comment: 漲 吊 烏尾, 漲oá, 漲滇, 就是 創 到 hē bōe 落去.

comment: tiùⁿ-lí, chiū-sī saⁿ-á lāi-lí ê ì-sù; tiùⁿ sím-mi̍h lí.
hanlo_comment: 漲裡, 就是 衫á 內裡 ê 意思; 漲脹 甚物 裡.

comment: soaⁿ-tiûⁿ, sit-tiûⁿ, chhī-tiûⁿ, hì-tiûⁿ, kiáu-tiûⁿ, lián-pó tiûⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 山場, 式場, 市場, 戲場, 檄場, 撚寶 場.

comment: tiūⁿ-lâng, tiūⁿ-ḿ, tōa-tiūⁿ, î-tiūⁿ, ko͘-tiūⁿ, tâng-nn̂g tiūⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 丈人, 丈姆, 大丈, 姨丈, 姑丈, 同郎 丈.

comment: tiuh-chi̍h-bé, tuih-chi̍h-kun, tuih-tôe, chiū-sī kha phòa-siùⁿ kiâⁿ bōe chiàⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 搐舌尾, 搐舌根, 搐蹄, 就是 腳 破相 行 bōe 正.

comment: sán tiu̍h-tiu̍h, chiū-sī chin-sán ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 瘦 tiu̍h-tiu̍h, 就是 真瘦 ê 意思.

comment: tńg-chhù, tńg-sìn, tò-tńg, tńg-chi̍h-koan, tńg bōe-chiâⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 返厝, 轉身, 倒tńg, 轉舌關, 轉 bōe成.

comment: tńg-lâi, tńg-khì, tńg-se̍h, tńg-tsn̄g, tńg-chhù, tńg-âng, tńg-lûn.
hanlo_comment: 轉來, 轉去, tńg-se̍h, 轉旋, 返厝, 轉紅, 轉睔.

comment: pàng-tiau pàng-tńg, chiū-sī kóng tōa-oē beh kap lâng kè-kàu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 放刁 放轉, 就是 講 大話 beh kap 人 計較 ê 意思.

comment: tńg-liân-hoân, chiū-sī chia̍p-chia̍p pàng-chhèng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 轉連環, 就是 捷捷 放銃 ê 意思.

comment: chi̍t-tǹg-pn̄g, kiám-tǹg, iau-ki sit-tǹg; chheng pn̄g-tǹg-chîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 一頓飯, 減頓, iau饑 失頓; 清 飯頓錢.

comment: kā-lâng tǹg, tsún-tǹg, tǹg-tiàm, tǹg-phiò, tǹg-toaⁿ, tǹg-thâu; tng, tng-peng.
hanlo_comment: kā人 當, 準當, 當店, 當票, 當單, 當頭; 當, 當兵.

comment: ǹg-tǹg=ǹg-tn̄g, chiū-sī tùn-tiⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: ǹg頓=向tn̄g, 就是 頓tiⁿ ê 意思.

comment: tǹg=thn̄g=tūn=thǹg, tǹg-sio, chiū-sī thn̄g-sio ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 頓=燙=燉=燙, 頓燒, 就是 燙燒 ê 意思.

comment: tǹg-lo̍h-khì, tǹg-poa̍h-chē, tǹg-sim-koaⁿ, tǹg-heng, tǹg-ìn.
hanlo_comment: 頓落去, 頓跋坐, 頓心肝, 頓胸, 頓印.

comment: lâng-tn̂g, lâng-tn̂g-á, chiâⁿ-lâng-tn̂g.
hanlo_comment: 人長, 人長á, 成人長.

comment: tn̂g-lâng, tn̂g-soaⁿ, tn̂g-jī, tn̂g-oē hàn-jī.
hanlo_comment: 唐人, 唐山, 唐字, 唐話 漢字.

comment: tiong-tn̂g, thiaⁿ-tn̂g, āu-tn̂g, kong-tn̂g, seng-tn̂g, o̍h-tn̂g, sû-tn̂g, lé-pài-tn̂g
hanlo_comment: 中堂, 廳堂, 後堂, 公堂, 升堂, 學堂, 祠堂, 禮拜堂.

comment: tiong-tn̂g, thiaⁿ-tn̂g, āu-tn̂g, kong-tn̂g, seng-tn̂g, o̍h-tn̂g, sû-tn̂g, lé-pài-tn̂g
hanlo_comment: 中堂, 廳堂, 後堂, 公堂, 升堂, 學堂, 祠堂, 禮拜堂.

comment: tî-tn̂g, sī tsúi-tî; thê-tn̂g, chiū-sī séng-siâⁿ Hông-tè kià chiàu ê só͘-tsāi.
hanlo_comment: 池塘, 是 水池; the̍h塘, 就是 省城 皇帝 寄 詔 ê 所在.

comment: tùi-tn̂g, tiong-tn̂g, pòaⁿ-tiong tn̂g soah-khì, ē-tn̂g, tsúi khò-tn̂g.
hanlo_comment: 對段, 中段, 半中 段 soah去, 下段, 水 洘段.

comment: tn̂g-á, tōa-tn̂g, tn̂g-thâu, thó͘-tn̂g-thâu, pháiⁿ-sim-tn̂g, koah-tn̂g koah-tō͘.
hanlo_comment: 腸á, 大腸, 腸頭, 吐腸頭, pháiⁿ心腸, 割腸 割肚.

comment: tn̄g-tio̍h, saⁿ-tn̄g, saⁿ-tn̄g-thâu, ti̍t-tn̄g, nǹg-tsǹg m̄-ta̍t tú-tn̄g.
hanlo_comment: 撞tio̍h, 相撞, 相撞頭, 直撞, 軁鑽 m̄值 抵撞.

comment: tn̄g-jī, tn̄g-jī-thûi, niû-tn̄g, niû kúi-tn̄g; tn̄g-saⁿ-sì.
hanlo_comment: 丈二, 丈二槌, 量丈, 量 幾丈; 丈三四.

comment: lō͘-tn̄g, tn̄g-lō͘, keh-tn̄g, koah-tn̄g, tsām-tn̄g; tha̍k tńg, tńg-tsâi.
hanlo_comment: 路斷, 斷路, 隔斷, 割斷, 鏨斷; 讀 tńg, 剸臍.

comment: koh-tn̄g; sóe-tn̄g, chiū-sī kā-lâng sóe saⁿ-khò͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: koh盪; 洗盪, 就是 kā人 洗 衫褲 ê 意思.

comment: ǹg-tn̄g, chiū-sī kap ǹg-tǹg sio-siāng, sī tùn-tiⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: ǹg頓, 就是 kap ǹg頓 相像, 是 頓tiⁿ ê 意思.

comment: lō͘-tn̄g, tōa-lō͘-tn̄g, hit-ê sī lō͘-tn̄g, m̄-thang chē tī lō͘-tn̄g.
hanlo_comment: 路撞, 大路撞, hit-ê 是 路撞, m̄-thang坐 tī 路撞.

comment: lāi ê khì-kū ê miâ, thih-to, to-á, chi̍t-to-tsóa, chîⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 利 ê 器具 ê 名, 鐵刀, 刀á, 一刀紙, 錢 ê 名.

comment: lāi ê khì-kū ê miâ, thih-to, to-á, chi̍t-to-tsóa, chîⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 利 ê 器具 ê 名, 鐵刀, 刀á, 一刀紙, 錢 ê 名.

comment: sim-koaⁿ chhì-chha̍k; iu-būn ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 心肝 刺鑿; 憂悶 ê 意思.

comment: to-siā; tsōe-tsōe ê ì-sù, to-sū.
hanlo_comment: 多謝; 濟濟 ê 意思, 多事.

comment: khui-chhùi, khoah-tōa ê khoán-sit, kóng-oē pang-tsān ê siaⁿ; to-lô-nî.
hanlo_comment: 開嘴, 闊大 ê 款式, 講話 幫贊 ê 聲; 哆囉呢.

comment: chiū-sī tsûn ê chhâ-pán.

comment: tōa-tn̂g; ti̍t-ti̍t ê khoán; hêng-tsōng, khoán-sit.

comment: hòng-tōng; bô tsún-tsat, thit-thô͘, îm-loān.

comment: ín-chhōa, tín-tāng; lâi-lâi khì-khì bô tiāⁿ-tio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 引chhōa, 振動; 來來 去去 無 定tio̍h.

comment: chiū-sī hòng-chhiòng ê ì-sù.

comment: chiū-sī iô-tāng ê ì-sù.

comment: chiū-sī hn̂g-ni̍h, á-sī chhân-tiong ê lâ-giâ.

comment: chiū-sī hòng-tōng ê ì-sù.

comment: kiâⁿ ê khoán-sit; thiàu kiâⁿ ê khoán.

comment: ka-nn̂g tu, chi̍t-tu-á-thô͘, tōa-tu-thô͘, chiū-sī tōa-tui-thô͘ ê ì-sù.

comment: tu-teh, tu-khì, tu-khui, tu-hong, tu-chha̍t, tu chhiú-bé; saⁿ-kha-tu.

comment: tì-sek, tsai-iáⁿ, lâng-miâ.

comment: kiâⁿ bōe chìn-chêng, tiû-tû ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 行 bōe 進前, 躊躇 ê 意思.

comment: thâi cheng-siⁿ ê só͘-tsāi, tsàu-kha, tsú.

comment: báng-tà, tiùⁿ-ûi; chhài-tû ê ì-sù.

comment: kiâⁿ-lō͘ ê khoán, thiàu teh kiâⁿ ê khoán-sit.

comment: tuh-bîn, tuh ka-chē, tuh-ku, chē kàu tuh-ku, thâu-khak-tuh-tuh.

comment: o͘ tuh-tuh, chiū-sī chin-o͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 烏 tuh-tuh, 就是 真烏 ê 意思.

comment: ti̍h-tu̍h, chiū-sī kóng-oē bô-bêng ham-bān ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: ti̍h-tu̍h, 就是 講話 無明 ham-bān ê 意思.

comment: ti̍h-tu̍h, chiū-sī kóng-oē bô-bêng ham-bam ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: ti̍h-tu̍h, 就是 講話 無明 ham-bān ê 意思.

comment: thô͘ chek-tsū, thô͘-tui, tsòe-tui, kap chit-jī 堆 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 土 積聚, 土堆, 做堆, kap chit字 堆 相像.

comment: sio-ha̍p, ìn-tap, saⁿ-tùi, chi̍t-tùi, tùi-phòe, tùi-bīn.
hanlo_comment: 相合, 應答, 相對, 一對, 對配, 對面.

comment: oàn-hūn, sim-koaⁿ thòng-hūn ê siaⁿ, oàn-tò͘.

comment: tùi-tiōng, chiū-sī pó-sioh, kèng-tiōng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 對重, 就是 保惜, 敬重 ê 意思.

comment: húi-hoāi, ka-la̍uh, tūi-lo̍h, pîn-tōaⁿ.

comment: oàn-hūn, kiat-oàn, oàn-tò͘; lâng-miâ.

comment: hûn-bōng ê lō͘, thô͘-khui ê lō͘, tsoán-tńg.
hanlo_comment: 墳墓 ê 路, 土開 ê 路, 轉長.

comment: phah ga̍k-khì lâi hô kó͘, cheng-thûi, téng-bīn tōa, ē-bīn sòe, phah-cheng lâi hô kó͘.

comment: phòa-pīⁿ, kha-chéng, kha ê pīⁿ.

comment: tūi-gûn, kim tūi-gûn, tūi-kim, tūi-kim-tiâu.

comment: kiâⁿ bōe chìn-chêng, bōe-kiâⁿ, tsoan-tńg, kan-khó͘.

comment: thô͘-tui, sì-chiàⁿ ê tui; kē, ian-tun, tun-á.

comment: chhùi-phóe sán-sán, bah-koaⁿ; pek-chhiat, sêng-si̍t.

comment: ēng kāu-lé lâi an-tsòng.

comment: hûi ê khì-kū, chhin-chhiūⁿ au-á ê khoán-sit.

comment: chhùi thò͘-chhut ê khì; tōa-chhia teh háu ê siaⁿ, tāng bān-bān ê khoán-sit.

comment: chin-chiàⁿ, sì-chiàⁿ, bô chhap-tsa̍p ê ì-sù.

hanlo_comment: 鎗, 戟 下面 ê 銅; 下面, 垂落; 千斤 ê 錘.

comment: chio̍h thang thia̍p-khoân lâi chē ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 石 通 疊環 來 坐 ê 意思.

comment: soaⁿ ê khoán-sit; chhiū-nâ ê tiong-kan lâi chhī cheng-siⁿ.

comment: ba̍k-chiu bô lāi, ba̍k àm-tsông, tūn-ba̍k.

comment: sit-chì, hoân-ló, iu-chhiû, pi-siong ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 失志, 煩惱, 憂愁, 悲傷 ê 意思.

comment: thô͘-tui, sì-chiàⁿ ê tui; kē, ian-tun, tun-á.
hanlo_comment: 土堆, 四正 ê 堆; 低, 煙墩, 墩á.

comment: tsúi-ni̍h ê thâng, chi̍t-miâ tun-gû, tsúi giat-á.

comment: iam cheng-siⁿ ê ì-sù, chhin-chhiūⁿ iam-bé, iam-ti, iam-koe.

comment: chiū-sī i-chiûⁿ ê tē-á, lak-tē; io-tó͘.

comment: chiū-sī phah ê ì-sù.

comment: keng ê miâ; tiau-keng, ūi hoe ê keng.

comment: chiū-sī chhiū ko͘-tâ ê ì-sù.

comment: ūi-hoe ê keng.

comment: un-khûn kà-sī, siông-sè, kàu, sêng-si̍t, chhiat-iàu, se̍k-se̍k.
hanlo_comment: 蝹蜷 教示, 詳細, 教, 誠實, 切要, 熟熟.

comment: hé-ōng, hé-sek; tsú-mi̍h, tīm-mi̍h, tīm-sio, hé tīm-se̍k.

comment: puh-íⁿ, oh-tit chhut, kan-khó͘, tham-sim.

comment: iu-būn, hoân-ló, kiáu-jiáu, loān-loān, iu-chhiû ê khoán-sit.

comment: siū-khì; tōa, kāu, ke-thiⁿ, bō͘-sēng, tiong-hō͘, bián-lē, sêng-si̍t, jī-sìⁿ, tun-tok.

comment: tóe ngó͘-kok ê khì-kū, pūn-á, kap 𥫱 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 貯 五穀 ê 器具, 笨á, kap 𥫱 相像.

comment: ba̍k-chiu bô-lāi, ba̍k àm-tsông, tūn-ba̍k.
hanlo_comment: 目睭 無利, 目 暗藏, 鈍目.

hanlo_comment: 貯 五穀 ê 器具, kap chit字 𦯁 相像; 囤貨.

comment: chiū-sī ē-ki ê hoâiⁿ-koaiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 下支 ê 橫杆.

comment: tóe ngó͘-kok ê khì-kū, pūn-á, sòe-sòe ê chhek-chhng.
hanlo_comment: 貯 五穀 ê 器具, 笨á, 細細 ê 粟倉.

comment: tóe ngó͘-kok ê khì-kū, pūn-á, sòe-sòe ê chhek-chhng.
hanlo_comment: 貯 五穀 ê 器具, 笨á, 細細 ê 粟倉.

comment: hūn-tūn, chiū-sī bô khai-thong ê ì-sù; o͘-àm ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 混沌, 就是 無 開通 ê 意思; 烏暗 ê 款式.

comment: só͘-chhun-ê; tsàn-keng, tún-hè, chiū-sī khǹg-mi̍h ê ì-sù.

comment: chhiū bô thâu ê ì-sù, chhiū só͘ chhun ê.

comment: chiū-sī lâu-á ê chhiûⁿ; chhù-lāi khǹg-teh, khiā-khí; siok-sià.

comment: ti-pûi, pûi, chhiong-sēng, móa ê ì-sù.

comment: kha̍p-thâu, hioh, só͘-tsāi, liâm-piⁿ, sǹg kúi-pái, sún-hoāi, pàng-sak, jī-sìⁿ, pn̄g-tǹg.

comment: iô-tāng, ín-chhōa, bôa, lòe ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 搖動, 引chhōa, 磨, 鑢 ê 意思.

comment: sǹg tsûn só͘-tsài mi̍h-kiāⁿ ê khin-tāng, kok-tùn sī 40 li̍p-hong ê eng-chhioh.

comment: kóng-oē bōe bêng; khì saⁿ-chhiong ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 講話 bōe 明; 氣 相沖 ê 意思.

comment: chhùi-kháu ê phê-bah, chhùi-tûn phê.
hanlo_comment: 嘴口 ê 皮肉, 嘴唇 皮.

comment: chhùi-kháu ê phê, kap {唇Tûn} tâng.
hanlo_comment: 嘴口 ê 皮, kap {唇Tûn} 同.

comment: chiū-sī kha-chhng-phóe.
hanlo_comment: 就是 尻川䫌.

comment: sòe-chiah-ti, ti-kiáⁿ, ti-kha, ti-thûn, gín-á thûn.
hanlo_comment: 細隻豬, 豬kiáⁿ, 豬腳, 豬豚, gín-á 豚.

comment: sòe-chiah-ti, ti-kiáⁿ, ti-kha, ti-thûn, gín-á thûn.
hanlo_comment: 細隻豬, 豬kiáⁿ, 豬腳, 豬豚, gín-á 豚.

comment: hî ê miâ, hô-tûn, chhin-chhiūⁿ kho-tó͘; tōa-bé ê chhioh-gōa, sek-tī chhiⁿ-pe̍h.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, 河豚, 親像 蝌蚪; 大尾 ê 尺外, 色緻 青白.

comment: chháu ê miâ, gû-tûn-tsang chháu.
hanlo_comment: 草 ê 名, 牛扽鬃 草.

comment: tsúi ê piⁿ, tsúi-piⁿ téng-bīn pîⁿ-pîⁿ, tsóng-sī ē-bīn tsúi-chhim.
hanlo_comment: 水 ê 邊, 水邊 頂面 平平, 總是 下面 水深.

comment: peng-teng ê chhia ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 兵丁 ê 車 ê 意思.

comment: hó, hó-chiú, kāu-chiú ê ì-sù, chiú-bī kiap.
hanlo_comment: 好, 好酒, 厚酒 ê 意思, 酒味 kiap.

comment: piáⁿ ê lūi,ēng bí-sap tsòe piáⁿ tiong-ng pau āⁿ, khoán-sit ná chhèng-chí hiah-tōa.
hanlo_comment: 餅 ê 類,用 米屑 做 餅 中央 包 餡, 款式 ná 銃子 hiah大.

comment: chiū-sī hé iām-iām teh-to̍h ê ì-sù; hé to̍h ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 就是 火 炎炎 teh𤏸 ê 意思; 火 𤏸 ê 款式.

comment: chhài chhin-chhiūⁿ chhì-tit; chháu-ba̍k khí-thâu hoat-siⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 菜 親像 刺竹; 草木 起頭 發生 ê 款式.

comment: chiū-sī tsū-chi̍p, pé-siú ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 聚集, 把守 ê 意思.

comment: bô tek-ì, bōe hoaⁿ-hí, iu-būn, hoân-ló.
hanlo_comment: 無 得意, bōe 歡喜, 憂悶, 煩惱.

comment: khì bē tiāⁿ-tio̍h, bē khai-thong ê khoán-sit, tsúi ê sè-bīn.
hanlo_comment: 氣 bōe 定tio̍h, bōe 開通 ê 款式, 水 ê 勢面.

comment: chhian-sóa, tô-tsáu, ún-khǹg, tūn-tsáu, thó͘-tūn, tūn-tōe.
hanlo_comment: 遷徙, 逃走, 隱khǹg, 遁走, 土遁, 遁地.

comment: chhian-sóa, tô-tsáu, ún-khǹg, tūn-tsáu, thó͘-tūn, tūn-tōe.
hanlo_comment: 遷徙, 逃走, 隱khǹg, 遁走, 土遁, 遁地.

comment: ta-chio̍h kè-tsúi; tsúi tōng chio̍h ê siaⁿ; ēng saⁿ ùn-tsúi.
hanlo_comment: 乾石 過水; 水 動 石 ê 聲; 用 衫 搵水.

comment: chiū-sī chi̍t-ki chhâ thang lâi chhòaⁿ-mn̂g ê ì-sù, mn̂g-lōng.
hanlo_comment: 就是 一隻 柴 thang 來 閂門 ê 意思, 門弄.

comment: bô lāi ê mi̍h; gû-chhún, to-tun; bān-tūn.
hanlo_comment: 無 利 ê 物; 愚蠢, 刀鈍; 慢鈍.

comment: oàn-hūn, sim-koaⁿ thòng-hūn ê siaⁿ. Oàn-tò͘.
hanlo_comment: 怨恨, 心肝 痛恨 ê 聲. 怨妒.

comment: oàn-hūn, sim-koaⁿ thòng-hūn ê siaⁿ. Oàn-tò͘.
hanlo_comment: 怨恨, 心肝 痛恨 ê 聲. 怨妒.

comment: piáⁿ ê lūi, ēng bí-sap tsòe-ê, tiong-ng pau-āⁿ, kap tha̍k Tûn sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 餅 ê 類, 用 米屑 做ê, 中央 包餡, kap 讀 Tûn 相像.

comment: oh-tit kiâⁿ, jī-sìⁿ, tūn-chek, tūn-tsat, tūn-hoan.
hanlo_comment: oh得 行, 字姓, 囤積, 屯紮, 屯番.

comment: gû-gōng, ham-bān; iu-chhiû ê khoán-sit, iu-būn, hoân-ló ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 愚戇, ham-bān; 憂愁 ê 款式, 憂悶, 煩惱 ê 意思.

comment: ti-pûi, pûi, chhiong-sēng, móa ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 豬肥, 肥, 充盛, 滿 ê 意思.

comment: tūn=thn̄g=tǹg, ûn-ûn-á tūn, tūn-khi-nōa, tūn hō͘-i sio.
hanlo_comment: 燉=燙=頓, 勻勻á 燉, 燉去爛, 燉 hō͘伊 燒.

comment: khó tut-tut, kāu tut-tit, chiū-sī chin kāu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 洘 腯腯, 厚 腯得, 就是 真 厚 ê 意思.

comment: hut-jiân, saⁿ-kìⁿ, liâm-piⁿ, chhiok-tio̍h chhiⁿ-chin, pháiⁿ-bé, bô mn̂g, tōng-tu̍t, tu̍t-jiân.
hanlo_comment: 忽然, 相見, liâm-piⁿ, 觸tio̍h 生真, pháiⁿ馬, 無 毛, 撞突, 突然.

comment: chhiok-hoān, chhiok-tio̍h, tông-tu̍t, chin tông-tu̍t.
hanlo_comment: 觸犯, 觸tio̍h, 唐突, 真 唐突.

comment: chiū-sī tsúi teh-lâu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 水 teh流 ê 意思.

comment: bô saⁿ-niū, bô khiam-sùn ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 無 相讓, 無 謙遜 ê 意思.

comment: tsai-chèng, chèng-tsoh; liû-thoân ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 栽種, 種作; 流傳 ê 意思.

comment: té-té ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 短短 ê 款式.

comment: saⁿ-kap kóng-oē, hoah ê siaⁿ; tsôaⁿ ê miâ, kiaⁿ kî-koài ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 相合 講話, 喝 ê 聲; 泉 ê 名, 驚 奇怪 ê 聲.

comment: saⁿ-kap kóng-oē, hoah ê siaⁿ; tsôaⁿ ê miâ, kiaⁿ kî-koài ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 相合 講話, 喝 ê 聲; 泉 ê 名, 驚 奇怪 ê 聲.

comment: teh-beh chhut khang ê khoán-sit; mi̍h tī khang-ni̍h ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: teh-beh 出 空 ê 款式; 物 tī 空裡 ê 款.

comment: chiū-sī chi̍t-hō ko-phín ê miâ, hō͘ gín-á chia̍h tiⁿ ê.
hanlo_comment: 就是 一號 糕品 ê 名, hō͘ gín-á 食 甜 ê.

comment: tsàu ê tsàu-khang ê ì-sù; kap chit-jī 突 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 灶 ê 灶孔 ê 意思; kap chit字 突 相像.

comment: niáu-chhú kap chiáu siāng tsòe bih chi̍t ê hia̍t; niáu-chhú ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 鳥鼠 kap 鳥 siāng 做 bih 一個穴; 鳥鼠 ê 名.

comment: phòng, phòng-khí, thóng-chhut ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 膨, 膨起, thóng出 ê 意思.

comment: kiâⁿ-lō͘ bōe oē chìn-chêng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 行路 bōe 會 進前 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī chhiū-thâu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 樹頭 ê 意思.

comment: iu-būn ê sim-koaⁿ; kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 憂悶 ê 心肝; 驚惶.

comment: hut-jiân, bōe kì-tit, bô hun-piat ê khoán, hòng-sù.
hanlo_comment: 忽然, bōe 記得, 無 分別 ê 款, 放肆.

comment: hn̄g-hn̄g, tsáu, tsáu ê khoán-sit; khì chhut bān-bān ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 遠遠, 走, 走 ê 款式; 去 出 慢慢 ê 款.

comment: tsúi lâu-chhut ê khoán, tsúi tiāⁿ-tio̍h, tsúi sia̍p-lâu.
hanlo_comment: 水 流出 ê 款, 水 定tio̍h, 水 洩流.

comment: ti-pûi, pûi, chhiong-sēng, móa ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 豬肥, 肥, 充盛, 滿 ê 意思.

comment: ko-tu̍t-biân, chiū-sī gōa-kok chi̍t-khoán khah-sio ê nî-pò͘.
hanlo_comment: 高tu̍t棉, 就是 外國 一款 khah燒 ê 呢布.

comment: tu̍t-mi̍h, chiū-sī chiong nî-pò͘, á-sī pa̍t-mi̍h, bôa ke-si hō͘-i kng-ku̍t.
hanlo_comment: tu̍t物, 就是 將 呢布, á是 別物, 磨 家私 hō͘伊 光滑.

comment: hit-ê, i, pa̍t-ê, chī-tsūi; put-chèng.
hanlo_comment: 彼ê, 伊, 別ê, chī-tsūi; 不正.

comment: tsúi-bú, ná iûⁿ ê ūi, bô ba̍k-chiu, só͘-í m̄-tsai thang siám-pī lâng.
hanlo_comment: 水母, ná 羊 ê 胃, 無 目睭, 所以 m̄知 通 閃避 人.

comment: pûi-pûi, hok-siòng; pak kut chhú-bah ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 肥肥, 福相; 剝 骨 取肉 ê 意思.

comment: iù-chíⁿ, siàu-liân ê tsa-bó͘ gín-á ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 幼茈, 少年 ê tsa-bó͘ gín-á ê 意思.

comment: iù-chíⁿ, siàu-liân ê tsa-bó͘ gín-á ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 幼茈, 少年 ê tsa-bó͘ gín-á ê 意思.

comment: bô tùi-tiong ê khoán, bô siong-se̍k ê khoán-sit; hong chhe chhiū ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 無 對中 ê 款, 無 相熟 ê 款式; 風 吹 樹 ê 款.

comment: khoa-kháu kóng pe̍h-chha̍t, giâu-gî, kî-koài, kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 誇口 講 白賊, 僥疑, 奇怪, 驚惶.

comment: sit-chì ê khoán-sit; khoa-kháu.
hanlo_comment: 失志 ê 款式; 誇口.

comment: chhek-to̍k, siūⁿ, phah-sǹg; hoân-ló, sì-chiàⁿ; ì-kiàn bē tiāⁿ-tio̍h.
hanlo_comment: 測度, 想, phah算; 煩惱, 四正; 意見 bōe 定tio̍h.

comment: pi-siong, lîn-bín, pûn-khì, hiâm, siū-khì ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 悲傷, 憐憫, pûn氣, 嫌, 受氣 ê 聲.

comment: thà-là, thà-thà, thà-là chhut-lâi, thà-khui, thà-oá, thà-ha̍p.
hanlo_comment: 挓喇, 挓挓, 挓喇 出來, 挓開, 挓oá, 挓合.

comment: hit-ê, i, pa̍t-ê, chī-tsūi; put-chèng.
hanlo_comment: 彼ê, 伊, 別ê, chī-tsūi; 不正.

comment: pîⁿ-tháⁿ, khín-tháⁿ, pîⁿ-pîⁿ tháⁿ-tháⁿ, sī pîⁿ bô khâm-khia̍t ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 平坦, 墾坦, 平平 坦坦, 是 平 無 嵁硈 ê 意思.

comment: tháⁿ-koâiⁿ, tháⁿ-koâiⁿ khì-phah, ēng chhiú tháⁿ-khì, phô͘-tháⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 坦懸, 坦懸 去phah, 用 手 坦去, 扶坦.

comment: tsng-thāⁿ, gâu tsng-thāⁿ, tsng-hoe thāⁿ-hún.
hanlo_comment: 妝飾, gâu 妝飾, 妝花 飾粉.

comment: tsng-thāⁿ, gâu tsng-thāⁿ, tsng-hoe thāⁿ-hún.
hanlo_comment: 妝飾, gâu 妝飾, 妝花 飾粉.

comment: thiàu-thah, chiū-sī thiàu-that ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 跳踢, 就是 跳躂 ê 意思.

comment: tsō-thah, saⁿ-tsàn thah, chhit tsàn-thah, hiuⁿ-thah, káu-tsàn-thah.
hanlo_comment: 造塔, 三層 塔, 七 層塔, 香塔, 九層塔.

comment: tsō-thah, saⁿ-tsàn thah, chhit tsàn-thah, hiuⁿ-thah, káu-tsàn-thah.
hanlo_comment: 造塔, 三層 塔, 七 層塔, 香塔, 九層塔.

comment: chhâ-thah, kih-thah, chiū-sī chhâ-liâu thia̍p hoâiⁿ-ti̍t lâi tsòe thah ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 柴塔, kih塔, 就是 柴條 疊 橫直 來 做 塔 ê 意思.

comment: chhâ-thah, kih-thah, chiū-sī chhâ-liâu thia̍p hoâiⁿ-ti̍t lâi tsòe thah ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 柴塔, kih塔, 就是 柴條 疊 橫直 來 做 塔 ê 意思.

comment: chhâ-thah, kih-thah, chiū-sī chhâ-liâu thia̍p hoâiⁿ-ti̍t lâi tsòe thah ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 柴塔, kih塔, 就是 柴條 疊 橫直 來 做 塔 ê 意思.

comment: tha̍h-la̍h, saⁿ-tha̍h, saⁿ-liân-tha̍h, tha̍h-lâu, chiâⁿ-tha̍h-tsóa.
hanlo_comment: 疊疊, 相疊, 相連疊, 疊樓, 成疊紙.

comment: tha̍h-la̍h, saⁿ-tha̍h, saⁿ-liân-tha̍h, tha̍h-lâu, chiâⁿ-tha̍h-tsóa.
hanlo_comment: 疊疊, 相疊, 相連疊, 疊樓, 成疊紙.

comment: tha̍h-la̍h, saⁿ-tha̍h, saⁿ-liân-tha̍h, tha̍h-lâu, chiâⁿ-tha̍h-tsóa.
hanlo_comment: 疊疊, 相疊, 相連疊, 疊樓, 成疊紙.

comment: kok ê miâ, tsá Chiu sian-tsó͘ khì-sak siā-chek hōng tī chit só͘-tsāi, sī hiān-kim Siám-sai séng koāiⁿ-lāi.
hanlo_comment: 國 ê 名, 早 周 先祖 棄捒 社稷 奉 tī 這 所在, 是 現今 陜西 省 縣名.

comment: hô-ti hî ê pa̍t-miâ, tōa chhioh-gōa; lāu, hè-siū, iā chí lāu-lâng phê-hu siau-sán ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 河豬 魚 ê 別名, 大 尺外; 老, 歲壽, 也 指 老人 皮膚 消瘦 ê 意思.

comment: hū-jîn-lâng ké-tsòe ê thâu-mn̂g, tsáng, tsáng-pâi.
hanlo_comment: 婦人人 假做 ê 頭毛, 總, 總牌.

comment: sin-īn saⁿ-ge̍h ji̍t bōe chhut-sì, khí-thâu, tsún-tǹg, tô-tsáu, hoâi-thai.
hanlo_comment: 身孕 三月 日 bōe 出世, 起頭, 準當, 逃走, 懷胎.

comment: chio̍h-thâu só͘ siⁿ ê mi̍h, chhin-chhiūⁿ chháu, chhiⁿ-thî.
hanlo_comment: 石頭 所 生 ê 物, 親像 草, 青苔.

comment: kú-khí, kng-mi̍h, giâ-teh; khai-kú, thê-thâu, toaⁿ-thê, thai-khí.
hanlo_comment: 舉起, 扛物, giâ teh; 開舉, the̍h頭, 單the̍h, 抬起.

comment: kú-khí, kng-mi̍h, giâ-teh; khai-kú, thê-thâu, toaⁿ-thê, thai-khí.
hanlo_comment: 舉起, 扛物, giâ teh; 開舉, the̍h頭, 單the̍h, 抬起.

comment: chiū-sī hé-ian hun ê kiaⁿ-lâng mi̍h, ian-thûn.
hanlo_comment: 就是 火煙 薰 ê 驚人 物, 煙塵.

comment: chiū-sī hé-ian hun ê kiaⁿ-lâng mi̍h, ian-thûn.
hanlo_comment: 就是 火煙 薰 ê 驚人 物, 煙塵.

comment: chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán chhiū ê miâ, i ê chhâ oē-tsòe-ti̍t lôe-bé.
hanlo_comment: 就是 一款 樹 ê 名, 伊 ê 柴 會做得 犁尾.

comment: kóng-oē bô chiàⁿ, chhàu-leng-tai.
hanlo_comment: 講話 無 正, 臭奶呆.

comment: chhiò ê ì-sù, iā-sī lâng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 笑 ê 意思, 也是 人 ê 意思.

comment: giâu-gî; khi-phiàn kan-tsà; tîⁿ-tiâu, bān-bān ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 僥疑; 欺騙 奸詐; 纏tiâu, 慢慢 ê 意思.

comment: ēng tek-pán phah seng-khu, kéng-kài, tek-pe.
hanlo_comment: 用 竹板 phah 身軀, 警戒, 竹棓.

comment: khoah-tōa ê ì-sù; khoàiⁿ-oa̍h ê khoán-sit; khiap-sì ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 闊大 ê 意思; 快活 ê 款式; 怯勢 ê 款.

comment: koâiⁿ, tōa, tsun-kùi ê chheng-ho͘, lí, lāu; chhiⁿ-sîn ê miâ, jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 懸, 大, 尊貴 ê 稱呼, 你, 老; 星辰 ê 名, 字姓.

comment: chhiū ê miâ; toh-á, hì-tâi.
hanlo_comment: 樹 ê 名; 桌á, 戲台.

comment: koâiⁿ ê chhù khòaⁿ sì-hng; chhe-ēng; koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 懸 ê 厝 看 四方; 差用; 懸懸 ê 意思.

comment: koâiⁿ ê chhù khòaⁿ sì-hng; chhe-ēng; koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 懸 ê 厝 看 四方; 差用; 懸懸 ê 意思.

comment: tsúi ê miâ, liāu-lí kàu hó-sè; thài-pêng.
hanlo_comment: 水 ê 名, 料理 到 好勢; 太平.

comment: tsúi ê miâ, liāu-lí kàu hó-sè; thài-pêng.
hanlo_comment: 水 ê 名, 料理 到 好勢; 太平.

comment: thai-táu, thai-táu kiâⁿ, bí-thai, mī-thai, kè-thai, thai-lâi thai-khì.
hanlo_comment: 篩斗, 篩斗 行, 米篩, 麵颱, 過篩, 篩來 篩去.

comment: hong-thai, hong-thai-hō͘, tsòe hong-thai, hé-thai.
hanlo_comment: 風颱, 風颱雨, 做 風颱, 火颱.

comment: gô͘-kok lâng kóng phòa-chhâ lia̍h-pêng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 吳國 人 講 破柴 掠平 ê 意思.

comment: kóng-oē bô soah; oē tsōe-tsōe m̄-tio̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 講話 無 soah; 話 濟濟 m̄-tio̍h ê 意思.

comment: thái-ko, thái-ko-iâⁿ, thái-ko i-chiâⁿ si-lô, thái-ko thái chiūⁿ bīn.

comment: thì-thâu, thâu-tsang thok, thâu-mn̂g sûi-lo̍h só͘ chhun ê.

comment: tōa chè-hiàn ê miâ, Hông-tè chè-sū ê miâ, chè-hiàn ê mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 大 祭獻 ê 名, 皇帝 祭祀 ê 名, 祭獻 ê 物.

comment: koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ, ke̍k-thâu, kan-khó͘, sim-koaⁿ bô pêng-an.
hanlo_comment: 懸懸, 極頭, 艱苦, 心肝 無 平安.

comment: koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ, ke̍k-thâu, kan-khó͘, sim-koaⁿ bô pêng-an.
hanlo_comment: 懸懸, 極頭, 艱苦, 心肝 無 平安.

comment: tiô-thiàu, thiàu-kè, pôaⁿ-kè; kiâⁿ bōe sì-chiàⁿ, pái-kha.

comment: chiong chit-kha kiâⁿ-lō͘, chhe̍k-kha-koe.

comment: chhut siaⁿ háu, koe-thî, thî-khàu.

comment: hōaⁿ, ēng hōaⁿ saⁿ-keh; lō͘.

comment: thê-tông, chiū-sī ge̍k ê miâ.

comment: ngiâ-chih teh khòaⁿ, hn̄g-hn̄g teh khòaⁿ, chē teh khòaⁿ.

hanlo_comment: 好 ê 馬, 戰馬, 出世 7 日 久, 就 贏過 伊 ê 母.

comment: chiáu ê miâ, tsú-kui-chiáu, tāu-á-chiáu.

comment: chiáu ê miâ, thê-ô͘, lēng-gōa chi̍t chéng hioh tī soaⁿ-ni̍h soaⁿ-koe.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 ê 名, 鵜鶘, 另外 一 種 歇 tī 山裡 山雞.

comment: hok-khì, an-ún, an-jiân; kèng-sîn ê ì-sù.

comment: the̍h, hōaⁿ, kú-khí; pu̍t ê miâ; thê-khí, thê-tok, phô͘-thê.

comment: nńg-thē, chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán hî ê miâ.

comment: thē-thē, chiū-sī lâng lán-tō, pîn-tōaⁿ, bô-oa̍h-tāng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 傫傫, 就是 人 懶惰, 貧憚, 無活動 ê 意思.

hanlo_comment: 解, 疑騃, 變換, 過頭, 差錯, 不止.

hanlo_comment: 解, 疑騃, 變換, 過頭, 差錯, 不止.

hanlo_comment: 除去, 托起, 割 肉 到 骨, 剔剔, 剔骨.

hanlo_comment: 懸 ê 所在 peh上, hō͘人 peh上, 振起.

comment: kiaⁿ, kèng-ùi, khûn-kín, iu-būn.

comment: kiaⁿ, kèng-ùi, khûn-kín, iu-būn.

comment: khui-khui, khui-lī, khui-mn̂g, thián-khui ê ì-sù.

comment: iu-būn kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ ê khoán-sit; kiong-kèng.

comment: kiaⁿ, kèng-ùi, khûn-kín, iu-būn.

hanlo_comment: 法度, 敬謹, 聖旨, 敕令, 也 kap chit字 勅 相像.

comment: chhian, ún-ba̍t; chim-chiok; sì-chiàⁿ, tsôe-tsáⁿ, hó-khòaⁿ.

comment: oh-kiâⁿ, oh-tit, kín-sīn kiâⁿ ê khoán-sit; pái-kha kiâⁿ ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: oh行, oh得, 謹慎 行 ê 款式; 跛腳 行 ê 款.

comment: oh-kiâⁿ, oh-tit, kín-sīn kiâⁿ ê khoán-sit; pái-kha kiâⁿ ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: oh行, oh得, 謹慎 行 ê 款式; 跛腳 行 ê 款.

comment: bīn liap-liap, jiâu-jiâu chhin-chhiūⁿ lāu-lâng.
hanlo_comment: 面 攝攝, 皺皺 親像 老人.

comment: puh-chhut chhin-chhiūⁿ íⁿ, piak-khui, pit-li̍h.
hanlo_comment: puh出 親像 穎, 煏開, pit裂.

comment: tìm-lo̍h, hiat-lo̍h ê ì-sù, hiat-ka̍k.
hanlo_comment: tìm落, hiat落 ê 意思, hiat-ka̍k.

comment: koâiⁿ-kia̍h, koh-iūⁿ, chhái-ūi ê chheh.

comment: thek-siⁿ, chiū-sī biáu-sī lâng ê oē.

comment: khiā-khí ê só͘-tsāi, chhù, khiā-khí, tiāⁿ-tio̍h, chhù-the̍h, ké-chí-the̍h.
hanlo_comment: khiā起 ê 所在, 厝, khiā起, 定tio̍h, 厝宅, 果子宅.

comment: soaⁿ ê khoán-sit; soaⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 山 ê 款式; 山 ê 名.

comment: chiū-sī soaⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 山 ê 名.

comment: sit-chì ê khoán-sit, khoa-kháu.
hanlo_comment: 失志 ê 款式, 誇口.

comment: chīn-tiong, sì-chiàⁿ, ì-kiàn bē koat-tēng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 盡忠, 四正, 意見 bōe 決定 ê 意思.

comment: koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ ê soaⁿ, soaⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 懸懸 ê 山, 山 ê 名.

comment: koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ ê soaⁿ, soaⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 懸懸 ê 山, 山 ê 名.

comment: soaⁿ kē-kē thò͘ chhut tī tsúi-ni̍h, tsúi-piⁿ, só͘-tsāi-miâ, Theng-chiu.
hanlo_comment: 山 低低 吐 出 tī 水裡, 水邊, 所在名, 汀州.

comment: kha-āu-tiⁿ; kha-tó͘-kut ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 腳後tiⁿ; 腳肚骨 ê 意思.

comment: phê-tòa; si-sòaⁿ pīⁿ ê tòa.
hanlo_comment: 皮帶; 絲線 辮 ê 帶.

comment: phê-tòa; si-sòaⁿ pīⁿ ê tòa.
hanlo_comment: 皮帶; 絲線 辮 ê 帶.

comment: kut tn̂g-tn̂g ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 骨 長長 ê 款式.

comment: chhù-lāi kong ê só͘-tsāi, gê-mn̂g, hun tōe-hng kap koaⁿ ê miâ, thiaⁿ-tn̂g, kong-thiaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 厝內 公 ê 所在, 衙門, 分 地方 kap 官 ê名, 廳堂, 公廳.

comment: sì-chiàⁿ teh-khòaⁿ, âng-sek, khòaⁿ chiàⁿ-chiàⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 四正 teh看, 紅色, 看 正正 ê 意思.

comment: bîn-chhn̂g chêng ê toh; thiāu ê lūi.
hanlo_comment: 眠床 前 ê 桌; 柱 ê 類.

comment: chia̍h-mi̍h tsōe-tsōe ê ì-sù, chia̍h-pá.
hanlo_comment: 食物 濟濟 ê 意思, 食飽.

comment: chia̍h-mi̍h tsōe-tsōe ê ì-sù, chia̍h-pá.
hanlo_comment: 食物 濟濟 ê 意思, 食飽.

comment: ti̍t-ti̍t khòaⁿ, khòaⁿ bô nih ê khoán-sit.

comment: jī-bú, tú-mi̍h ê thiāu, tú-khui ê koaiⁿ, tú-teh, poah-khui, thìⁿ-koâiⁿ, the-ko, thí-khui.
hanlo_comment: 字母, 抵物 ê 柱, 抵開 ê 杆, 抵teh, 撥開, 撐懸, 撐篙, thí開.

comment: tú-mi̍h ê thiāu, tú-khui ê koaiⁿ, tú-teh, poah-khui, thìⁿ-koâiⁿ, the-ko, thí-khui.
hanlo_comment: 抵物 ê 柱, 抵開 ê 杆, 抵teh, 撥開, 撐懸, 撐篙, thí開.

comment: tú-mi̍h ê thiāu, tú-khui ê koaiⁿ, tú-teh, poah-khui, thìⁿ-koâiⁿ, the-ko, thí-khui.
hanlo_comment: 抵物 ê 柱, 抵開 ê 杆, 抵teh, 撥開, 撐懸, 撐篙, thí開.

comment: siaⁿ-ji̍p hī-khang, ēng hī-khang thiaⁿ, chēng-chēng thiaⁿ, chhut-tsāi-lâng, saⁿ-thàn.

comment: ba̍k-chiu thí-khui, bô hoaⁿ-hí teh-khòaⁿ, siū-khì.
hanlo_comment: 目睭 thí開, 無 歡喜 teh看, 受氣.

comment: chi̍t-pé-chhâ, chi̍t-khoán chhiū-ki ê chhâ.
hanlo_comment: 一把柴, 一款 樹枝 ê 柴.

comment: kóaⁿ-kín bô chim-chiok, hó-táⁿ; kóe-tû, chīn-thâu, khoàiⁿ-oa̍h, théng-koâiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 趕緊 無 斟酌, 好膽; 解除, 盡頭, 快活, 挺懸.

comment: chhe-ēng, gê-ia̍h; keng-kè, kiâⁿ-lō͘ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 差用, 衙役; 經過, 行路 ê 意思.

comment: hó, gâu; kut, chháu-ba̍k ê tn̄g; chhù ê niû.
hanlo_comment: 好, gâu; 骨, 草木 ê 斷; 厝 ê 樑.

comment: pîⁿ-pîⁿ, pîⁿ-tháⁿ, chhân thún-ta̍h ê só͘-tsāi.
hanlo_comment: 平平, 平坦, 田 thún踏 ê 所在.

comment: tn̂g-tn̂g ê khoán-sit; kiong-kèng, pîⁿ-tháⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 長長 ê 款式; 恭敬, 平坦 ê 意思.

comment: thûi-á chi̍t-ki, to̍k-to̍k, ngī-ti̍t.

comment: pu̍ih-khí, ín-chhut, ti̍t-ti̍t-the̍h, khoan-iông, khì-hâi, théng-khí, théng-sēng.
hanlo_comment: 拔起, 引出, 直直the̍h, 寬容, 器械, 挺起, 挺sēng.

comment: tsûn-sin-tn̂g, ia̍h bô tōa-chiah, théng-á-tsûn.
hanlo_comment: 船身長, 亦 無 大隻, 艇á船.

comment: ì-kiàn bô kiông-chīn ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 意見 無 窮盡 ê 意思.

comment: ge̍k ê miâ; ge̍k ê tsàu-pán, tsàu-pán, bián-liû ê ge̍k.

comment: hiat-mi̍h lo̍h tsúi tóe, thiām-hái, thiām-lo̍h-chíⁿ.

comment: chiū-sī chháu ê miâ.

comment: tōe ê téng-bīn, chì-koâiⁿ, téng sī thiⁿ, thiⁿ-tōe, thian-tōe.

comment: chiū-sī lâng ê jī-sìⁿ.

comment: bu̍t-bī tsōe-tsōe; kāu, hó, kàu, bōe kì-tit, kú-kú, gâu.
hanlo_comment: 物味 濟濟; 厚, 好, 夠, bōe 記得, 久久, gâu.

comment: chiū-sī phah ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 phah ê 意思.

comment: bêng-pe̍k, bēng-lēng, pī-pān ê ì-sù.

comment: lâ-sâm, lô-lô, tiâm-tī tsúi-ni̍h.
hanlo_comment: lâ-sâm, 濁濁, 沉tī 水裡.

comment: thiu-mi̍h hō͘-i tn̂g-tn̂g; chia̍p-chia̍p chhì-khòaⁿ ài tsòe-chiâⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 抽物 hō͘伊 長長; 捷捷 試看 愛 做成 ê 意思.

comment: lâng teh chhiò ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 人 teh 笑 ê 款式.

comment: m̄-hó; kiàn-siàu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: m̄好; 見笑 ê 意思.

comment: thiu-hiòng ê chhân ê khoán-sit; lo̍k ê kha-jiah.
hanlo_comment: 抽餉 ê 田 ê 款式; 鹿 ê 腳跡.

comment: chīn-thâu, tsoa̍t-tn̄g, tsâu-bia̍t, hó, kāu-kāu tsōe-tsōe.
hanlo_comment: 盡頭, 絕斷, 剿滅, 好, 厚厚 濟濟.

comment: ge̍k ê miâ, ēng ge̍k lâi tsòe hī-kau.
hanlo_comment: 玉 ê 名, 用 玉 來 做 耳鉤.

comment: kiâⁿ-ta̍h, thún-ta̍h, kóaⁿ-tio̍k; sàu bô soah.
hanlo_comment: 行踏, thún踏, 趕逐; 嗽 無 soah.

comment: thô͘-ún ê khoán-sit, ū-lâng chhò-gō͘ kán-séng siá tsòe chhâm, niû-á.
hanlo_comment: 土蚓 ê 款式, 有人 錯誤 簡省 寫 做 蠶, 娘á.

comment: thián-khui, chiū-sī hiàn-khui ê ì-sù; thián-si̍t.
hanlo_comment: 展開, 就是 現開 ê 意思; 展翼.

comment: ge̍k ê miâ, chiong ge̍k lâi tsòe hī-kau ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 玉 ê 玉, 將 玉 來 做 耳鉤 ê 意思.

comment: hé sio ê koáiⁿ-á, hiâⁿ tī tsàu-khang ê chhâ.
hanlo_comment: 火 燒 ê 枴á, 燃 tī 灶孔 ê 柴.

comment: phah-kó͘ ê siaⁿ, kap chit-jī 填 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: phah 鼓 ê 聲, kap chit字 填 相像.

comment: tóe-mi̍h, chhiong-sēng; khui-mn̂g ê siaⁿ; phah kó͘ ê siaⁿ; kui-kûn teh kiâⁿ ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 貯物, 充盛; 開門 ê 聲; phah 鼓 ê 聲; kui群 teh 行 ê 聲.

comment: phah-kó͘ ê siaⁿ, thūn, thūn-thô͘ chiâⁿ; sūn, that, pê, ke-thiⁿ.
hanlo_comment: phah 鼓 ê 聲, 坉, 坉土 成; 順, 塞, 扒, 加添.

comment: thí-khui ba̍k-chiu; bô hoaⁿ-hí teh khòaⁿ ê ì-sù; siū-khì.
hanlo_comment: thí開 目睭; 無 歡喜 teh 看 ê 意思; 受氣.

comment: móa-móa ê khì, tōa-siaⁿ, tōa-siū-khì, mē-lâng.
hanlo_comment: 滿滿 ê 氣, 大聲, 大受氣, 罵人.

comment: thiân-sam-tāi, chiū-sī bē khó-kàu ê sî, seng siá sam-tāi kau-tài tsú-khó.
hanlo_comment: 謄三代, 就是 未 考校 ê 時, 先 寫 三代 交帶 主考.

comment: ēng-tsóa tiû-toān lâi chih, hâng-ho̍k, lâng ēng tsòe chhiáⁿ-lâng ê lé, pín-thiap.
hanlo_comment: 用紙 綢緞 來 摺, 降服, 人 用 做 請人 ê 禮, 稟帖.

comment: ēng-mi̍h tsòe tsún-tǹg; pang-tsān, lī-ek, oá-khò, liâm-tiâu, pang-thiap.
hanlo_comment: 用物 做 準當; 幫贊, 利益, oá靠, 黏tiâu, 幫貼.

comment: hâng-ho̍k, sok-chēng bô jiáu-loān ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 降服, 肅靜 無 擾亂 ê 意思.

comment: chhì-chia̍h ùn-huih lâi chiù-tsōa, sòe-sòe ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 試食 搵血 來 咒誓, 細細 ê 意思.

comment: tūi-lo̍h, ta̍p-lap; kha thoa oê kiâⁿ, chhia̍t-chhia̍t háu.
hanlo_comment: 墜落, 踏塌; 腳 拖 鞋 行, chhia̍t-chhia̍t 哮.

hanlo_comment: 妝thiap 就是 將 ta-pô͘e 來 裝做 戲旦 ê 意思, 妝旦thiap.

comment: iap-thiap, chiū-sī tsòe-sū, m̄-ài hō͘ pa̍t-lâng khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ê ì-sù, bah, khàm-ba̍t.
hanlo_comment: iap貼, 就是 做事, m̄-ài hō͘ 別人 看見 ê 意思, 肉, khàm密.

comment: thò-thiap=thò-thiat, chiū-sī lâng ti̍t-ti̍t piān-lūn, á-sī pān-sū, bô thàn lé-sò͘ kàu kè-thâu.
hanlo_comment: 透貼=透徹, 就是 人 直直 辯論, á是 辦事, 無 趁 禮數 到 過頭.

comment: thia̍p-khí-lâi, thia̍p-hó, thia̍p-koâiⁿ, thia̍p chiâⁿ-tui; kha-thia̍p-khoân.

comment: thia̍p-khí-lâi, thia̍p-hó, thia̍p-koâiⁿ, thia̍p chiâⁿ-tui; kha-thia̍p-khoân.
hanlo_comment: 疊起來, 疊好, 疊懸, 疊 成堆; 腳疊環.

comment: thia̍p-khí-lâi, thia̍p-hó, thia̍p-koâiⁿ, thia̍p chiâⁿ-tui; kha-thia̍p-khoân.
hanlo_comment: 疊起來, 疊好, 疊懸, 疊 成堆; 腳疊環.

comment: tsúi-chheng, kng-bêng, tsúi-chīn, thiat-tí.
hanlo_comment: 水清, 光明, 水盡, 徹底.

comment: thong, thàu, sió-lō͘, pîⁿ, pa̍k, tû-khì, húi-hoāi, pâi-lia̍t.

comment: sóa, m̄-ti̍h, tû-khì, thiat, thiat-khì, thiat-hôe.

comment: chiū-sī kan-kúi ê ì-sù.

comment: bōe kì-tit; bô hun-piat ê khoán-sit; hòng-sù; hòng-tōng.

comment: chi̍t-khoán thâng ê miâ, Tia̍t-e̍k, chiū-sī siān-lâng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 一款 蟲 ê 名, 蛈蜴, 就是 蟺蟲 ê 意思.

comment: o͘-kim ê lūi; kian-ngī, jī-sìⁿ, thih, thih-khì.
hanlo_comment: 烏金 ê 類; 堅硬, 字姓, 鐵, 鐵器.

comment: o͘-kim ê lūi; kian-ngī, jī-sìⁿ, thih, thih-khì.
hanlo_comment: 烏金 ê 類; 堅硬, 字姓, 鐵, 鐵器.

comment: thiat=thiap, thò-thiat chiū-sī thò-thiap; thiat-thò, oē thiat-thò.
hanlo_comment: 徹=貼, 套徹 就是 套貼; 徹套, 會 徹套.

comment: sim-koaⁿ iu-būn ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 心肝 憂悶 ê 款式.

comment: áu-bân, lām-sám, iô-tāng, tiau-bân, thiau-lân.

comment: thek-kut, koah-tn̄g ê ì-sù.

comment: chhian-sóa tsó͘-biō, ho̍k-sāi sîn-tsú.
hanlo_comment: 遷徙 祖廟, 服事 神主.

comment: tsoh-chhân ê khì-kū.
hanlo_comment: 作田 ê 器具.

comment: bī tīⁿ ê khoán-sit, bô móa ê só͘-tsāi.
hanlo_comment: 未 滇 ê 款式, 無 滿 ê 所在.

comment: khin-khin bô tsū-tsāi; pe̍h-chha̍t, thau, kheng-thiau.
hanlo_comment: 輕輕 無 自在; 白賊, 偷, 輕佻.

comment: tsoh-chhân koah-chháu ê khì-kū.

comment: tsoh-chhân koah-chháu ê khì-kū.
hanlo_comment: 作田 割草 ê 器具.

comment: chè-hiàn ê miâ, chè-hiàn ê bah.
hanlo_comment: 祭獻 ê 名, 祭獻 ê 肉.

comment: ēng tek-ko taⁿ, pē, kéng, khí, tín-tāng, kiau-so, kiáu-jiáu; thio-bêng.
hanlo_comment: 用 竹篙 擔, 背, 揀, 起, 振動, 攪唆, 攪擾; 挑明.

comment: thiàu-kè khin-khin kiâⁿ, chhut-thâu, chhiau-téng.
hanlo_comment: 跳過 輕輕 行, 出頭, 超頂.

comment: khin-khin bô tsū-tsāi; pe̍h-chha̍t, thau, kheng-thiau.
hanlo_comment: 輕輕 無 自在; 白賊, 偷, 輕佻.

comment: ke̍k-chhim, chheng-hân; súi, hó ê sek, sòe-sòe, sió-khóa.
hanlo_comment: 極深, 清閒; 媠, 好 ê 色, 細細, 小khóa.

comment: chiū-sī ēng chhùi kâm-mi̍h á-sī suh-mi̍h ê ì-sù; ap 含 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 就是 用 嘴 含物 á是 欶物 ê 意思; kap 含 相像.

comment: ge̍h-bé chiū ge̍h khòaⁿ-kìⁿ tī sai-pêng; ge̍h kiâⁿ kín tī ji̍t ê thâu-chêng.
hanlo_comment: 月尾 就 月 看見 tī 西爿; 月 行 緊 tī 日 ê 頭前.

comment: ba̍k-chiu bô sì-chiàⁿ, ba̍k-chiu chhoah; hn̄g-hn̄g teh khòaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 目睭 無 四正, 目睭 chhoah; 遠遠 teh 看.

comment: soaⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 山 ê 款式.

comment: saⁿ kiò ín-iú ê ì-sù; thit-thô, hì-lāng, ké-tsòe.
hanlo_comment: 相 叫 引誘 ê 意思; 𨑨迌, 戲弄, 假做.

comment: saⁿ kiò ín-iú ê ì-sù; thit-thô, hì-lāng, ké-tsòe.
hanlo_comment: 相 叫 引誘 ê 意思; 𨑨迌, 戲弄, 假做.

comment: chhn̂g-pán, bîn-chhn̂g pang ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 床板, 眠床 枋 ê 意思.

comment: chè-hiàn ê miâ, chè-hiàn ê bah.
hanlo_comment: 祭獻 ê 名, 祭獻 ê 肉.

comment: ēng tek-ko taⁿ, thiáu-hān-lîm, thiáu-soán, kap tha̍k Thiau tâng.
hanlo_comment: 用 竹篙 擔, 挑翰林, 挑選, kap 讀 Thiau 同.

comment: ti̍t-ti̍t hó-khòaⁿ ê khoán-sit; óng-lâi ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 直直 好看 ê 款式; 往來 ê 款式.

comment: iô-tōng, thòe-oāⁿ, saⁿ kha̍p-tio̍h, bia̍t-bô, hiat-lo̍h, ka-la̍uh, lak-lo̍h-khì.
hanlo_comment: 搖動, 替換, 相 磕tio̍h, 滅無, hiat落, 交落, 落落去.

comment: saⁿ khòaⁿ; phèng mn̄g saⁿ-kìⁿ ê lé-sò͘, hn̄g-hn̄g teh khòaⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 相 看; 聘 問 相見 ê 禮數, 遠遠 teh 看 ê 意思.

comment: seng-khu tn̂g-tn̂g ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 身軀 長長 ê 款式.

comment: ba̍k-chiu bô sì-chiàⁿ, ba̍k-chiu chhoah; hn̄g-hn̄g teh-khòaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 目睭 無 四正, 目睭 chhoah; 遠遠 teh看.

comment: chi̍t-khoán chháu ê miâ, âng chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t-lê; io̍h-chháu ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 一款 草 ê 名, 紅 親像 蒺藜; 藥草 ê 名.

comment: àⁿ-thâu, phèng-mn̄g ê lé-sò͘; pài-kìⁿ; sio̍k kok ê tōa-koaⁿ lâi chìn-kòng.
hanlo_comment: àⁿ頭, 聘問 ê 禮數; 拜見; 屬 國 ê 大官 來 進貢.

comment: that-tio̍h, tsông-khí, ta̍h-tian, chiūⁿ-koâiⁿ, tiô-thiàu, thiàu-bú.
hanlo_comment: 踢tio̍h, 傱起, 踏顛, 上懸, 趒跳, 跳舞.

comment: chhek-chiáu-á teh kiâⁿ, tiô-thiàu, pôaⁿ-kè.
hanlo_comment: 粟鳥á teh 行, 趒跳, pôaⁿ過.

comment: bōe gō͘-kak, thiò bí-chhek ê ì-sù, thiò-chhut.
hanlo_comment: 賣 五穀, 糶 米粟 ê 意思, 糶出.

comment: thiàu-kè, pôaⁿ-kè, tsáu, khin-khin kiâⁿ, chhut-thâu.
hanlo_comment: 跳過, pôaⁿ過, 走, 輕輕 行, 出頭.

comment: chiū-sī bīn siⁿ thiâu-á.
hanlo_comment: 就是 面 生 𤶃á.

comment: hî ê miâ, chhin-chhiūⁿ liâm-hî hiah-tōa; pe̍h-sek; hoe-thiâu.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, 親像 鰱魚 hiah大; 白色; 花鮡.

comment: chi̍t-bé kng thiâu-thiâu, chiū-sī kng-kng chhin-chhiūⁿ chhiah-thé bô-mi̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 一尾 光 條條, 就是 光光 親像 赤體 無物 ê 意思.

comment: sì-thiāu, poeh-jī pâi sì-thiāu, thiāu-pôaⁿ, thiāu-kha, thiāu-tsu, chhù-thiāu.
hanlo_comment: 四柱, 八字 排 四柱, 柱盤, 柱腳, 柱珠, 厝柱.

comment: chhiⁿ-thih, kǹg-thih, bé-kháu-thih, phah-thih; thih-sái, thih-sòaⁿ, thih-kho͘.
hanlo_comment: 生鐵, 鋼鐵, 馬口鐵, phah鐵; 鐵屎, 鐵線, 鐵箍.

comment: chhiⁿ-thih, kǹg-thih, bé-kháu-thih, phah-thih; thih-sái, thih-sòaⁿ, thih-kho͘.
hanlo_comment: 生鐵, 鋼鐵, 馬口鐵, phah鐵; 鐵屎, 鐵線, 鐵箍.

comment: thoa-thi̍h, gâu thoa-thi̍h, chiū-sī gâu-sô ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 拖喋, gâu 拖喋, 就是 gâu趖 ê 意思.

comment: thi̍h-thi̍h kiò, thi̍h-thi̍h kóng, thi̍h-thi̍h háu, thi̍h-kiû.
hanlo_comment: thi̍h-thi̍h 叫, thi̍h-thi̍h 講, thi̍h-thi̍h 哮, thi̍h 求.

comment: thi̍h=gi̍h=khi̍h, sán-thi̍h-thi̍h, chiū-sī chin sán ê ì-sù.

comment: thi̍h=tih, chhìn-thi̍h-thi̍h, chiū-sī chin kôaⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: thi̍h=tih, 凊thi̍h-thi̍h, 就是 真 寒 ê 意思.

comment: Kùi-iông koāiⁿ ê miâ; jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 桂陽 縣 ê 名; 字姓.

comment: soah, hó, i-chiûⁿ ê mn̂g, si̍t sûi-lo̍h ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: soah, 好, 衣裳 ê 毛, 翼 垂落 ê 款式.

comment: pó-ge̍k, chìn-kòng Hông-tè ê pó-mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 寶玉, 進貢 皇帝 ê 寶物.

comment: pó-ge̍k, chìn-kòng Hông-tè ê pó-mi̍h.

comment: ok-to̍k ê chiáu, lī-hāi, to̍k; im-thim-to̍k, im-tim.

comment: jia̍t-pīⁿ, jia̍t bōe thè ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 熱病, 熱 bōe 退 ê 款式.

comment: chiong to lâi tsân; chhiū tó ê siaⁿ.

comment: thìm=tìm=tàm, thìm-thâu, chiū-sī tìm-thâu; thâu bô thìm, thìm-éng.
hanlo_comment: thìm=tìm=tàm, thìm頭, 就是 tìm頭; 頭 無 thìm, thìm湧.

comment: tìn bé-āu kóaⁿ-kín kàu, thàn-lâng, thàn-ki-hōe, thàn-chîⁿ.

hanlo_comment: 鎮 尾後 趕緊 到, 趁人, 趁機會, 趁錢.

comment: jia̍t-pīⁿ, kap tha̍k Thìm sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 熱病, kap 讀 Thìm 相像.

comment: lim-thîn, thîn-tê, thîn-chiú, thîn-iû.
hanlo_comment: lim斟, 斟茶, 斟酒, 斟油.

comment: seng-khu ê téng-bīn, koâiⁿ, tē-it, thâu-khak, kú-thiô.
hanlo_comment: 身軀 ê 頂面, koân, 第一, 頭殼, 舉頭.

comment: chhin-thiô, chiū-sī pún-sin lâi kéng-mi̍h; tùi ka-kī ê kong-lô tit-tio̍h ê.
hanlo_comment: 親挑, 就是 本身 來 揀物; 對 家己 ê 功勞 得tio̍h ê.

comment: tsúi tsū-chi̍p, sek hùn-khí ê khoán-sit; kóaⁿ-kín ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 水 聚集, 色 奮起 ê 款式; 趕緊 ê 意思.

comment: khan, chè-ap, iô-tāng, tín-tāng; thòng-hūn.
hanlo_comment: 牽, 制壓, 搖動, 振動; 痛恨.

comment: khí-lâi, sim-koaⁿ hoân-ló ê siaⁿ; iúⁿ-chhī; kiau-ngō͘; oàn-hūn.
hanlo_comment: 起來, 心肝 煩惱 ê 聲; 養飼; 驕傲; 怨恨.

comment: chek-tsū, bô chek-thiok; kap 畜 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 積聚, 無 積蓄; kap 畜 相像.

comment: chhī cheng-siⁿ, kap 畜 jī sio-siāng.

comment: lap-o ê chháu-po͘ thang chhī cheng-siⁿ, chek-tsū, nôa-tsó͘; pat-kòa ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 蹋窩 ê 草埔 通 飼 精牲, 積聚, 攔阻; 八卦 ê 名.

comment: ti lô-kha teh kiâⁿ ê ì-sù.

comment: ti lô-kha teh kiâⁿ ê ì-sù.

comment: chiáu ti̍t-ti̍t pe chiūⁿ koâiⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 直直 飛 上 懸 ê 意思.

comment: soaⁿ-á, soaⁿ-chiam; tōa, hûn-bōng, koâiⁿ, thióng-soaⁿ.

hanlo_comment: 墓, 塚, 塚山, 義塚.

hanlo_comment: khiā 懸 ê 位; 愛惜, 深痛, kap 寵 相像.

hanlo_comment: khiā 懸 ê 位; 深痛, 愛惜, 寵愛, 榮顯, 驕傲.

comment: khiā koâiⁿ-ūi, chhim-thiàⁿ, ài-sioh, thióng-ài, êng-hián, kiau-ngō͘.
hanlo_comment: khiā 懸 ê 位; 深痛, 愛惜, 寵愛, 榮顯, 驕傲.

comment: khiā koâiⁿ-ūi, chhim-thiàⁿ, ài-sioh, thióng-ài, êng-hián kiau-ngō͘.
hanlo_comment: khiā 懸 ê 位; 深痛, 愛惜, 寵愛, 榮顯, 驕傲.

comment: chhân bōe hoat-siⁿ mi̍h ê ì-sù; tn̂g-tn̂g, tōe-hō miâ.
hanlo_comment: 田 bōe 發生 物 ê 意思; 長長, 地號 名.

comment: chhân bōe hoat-siⁿ mi̍h ê ì-sù; tn̂g-tn̂g, tōe-hō miâ.
hanlo_comment: 田 bōe 發生 物 ê 意思; 長長, 地號 名.

comment: chiáu ti̍t-ti̍t pe chiūⁿ koâiⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 直直 飛 上 懸 ê 意思.

comment: ēng chhiú the̍h-khí, thiu-chhut.

hanlo_comment: 大條 絲 彩畫, 抽出, 粗絲 織 成 ê.

comment: hiaⁿ-tī ê bó͘, Tio̍k-lí, chiū-sī tâng-sāi.
hanlo_comment: 兄弟 ê bó͘, 妯娌, 就是 同姒.

comment: ki-ki-thiu, chiū-sī gín-á siông-siông ài thó-mi̍h; á-sī kúi teh ki ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 嘰嘰啾, 就是 gín-á 常常 愛 討物; á是 鬼 teh 吱 ê 聲.

comment: tē-chi ê tē-jī jī, chhiú ê khoán-sit, hì-kioh, thiú-sî, thiú-á-kioh.

comment: chiū-sī lâng ê jī-sìⁿ.

comment: chhâ ê miâ, oē tsòe-tit keng-kut, khì-hâi, tek-poe, chhiú-khàu.

comment: thiúⁿ-sî, chiū-sī kah-chí thian-kan ê tē 2 jī.
hanlo_comment: 丑時, 就是 甲子 天干 ê 第 2 字.

comment: thng-sî, thng-thâu, io̍h-thng, tê-thng, chhài-thng, gû-bah-thng.

hanlo_comment: 褪毛, 褪牙, 褪 舊毛 換新.

comment: thǹg lâng taⁿ, góa kā lí thǹg, mi̍h thǹg-lâng, chiū-sī mi̍h bóe liáu, koh bōe-lâng.
hanlo_comment: 褪 人 擔, 我 kā 你 褪, 物 褪人, 就是 物 買 了, koh 賣人.

comment: pe̍h-thn̂g, peng-thn̂g, thn̂g-sng, kiuⁿ-bú-thn̂g, thn̂g-á, thn̂g-liāu.
hanlo_comment: 白糖, 冰糖, 糖霜, 薑母糖, 糖á, 糖料.

comment: pe̍h-thn̂g, peng-thn̂g, thn̂g-sng, kiuⁿ-bú-thn̂g, thn̂g-á, thn̂g-liāu.
hanlo_comment: 白糖, 冰糖, 糖霜, 薑母糖, 糖á, 糖料.

comment: hà-thn̄g, hàu-thn̄g, hàu-thn̄g tsat, sek-thn̄g, sek-thn̄g-chiam.
hanlo_comment: 孝杖, 孝杖, 孝杖 節, 錫杖, 錫杖簪.

comment: chi̍t-tè bô oân-tsoân, chhin-chhiūⁿ chhiū-thn̄g, chhiú-thn̄g, kha-thn̄g.
hanlo_comment: 一塊 無 完全, 親像 樹段, 手段, 腳段.

comment: mn̂g-thn̄g, chiū-sī tn̂g koh tōa-ki ê chhâ, thang lâi lōng-mn̂g.
hanlo_comment: 門thn̄g, 就是 長 koh 大支 ê 柴, thang 來 弄門.

comment: thn̄g=tǹg, thn̄g-sio, chiū-sī koh-tsài hiâⁿ hō͘-i sio ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: thn̄g=tǹg, thn̄g燒, 就是 koh再 燃 hō͘伊 燒 ê 意思.

comment: thn̄g-kng, kè-thn̄g, lâm-thn̄g, bô-thn̄g, ū-thn̄g, kòa-thn̄g.

comment: soa-thn̄g, chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán sòe-bé hî ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 沙tn̄g, 就是 一款 細尾 魚 ê 名.

comment: tham-chia̍h siuⁿ kè-thâu, tham-sim, put-chí-ài; tsū-khiam ê oē.
hanlo_comment: 貪食 傷 過頭, 貪心, 不止愛; 自謙 ê 話.

comment: tsúi tōa lâu-lo̍h, tsúi-tiòng, pôaⁿ kè-khì, chhèng-koâiⁿ tsúi-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 水 大 流落, 水漲, 盤 過去, 衝懸, 水名.

comment: hoaⁿ-hí, chhìn-chhái, tāi-bān, kî-koài, kú-kú, siu-khǹg.

comment: chiū-sī Hu̍t-kàu chi̍t-khoán chheh ê miâ, Chhut-to-lô-nî keng.
hanlo_comment: 就是 佛教 一款 冊 ê 名, 出陀羅尼 經.

comment: kun-á; pīⁿ si-sòaⁿ tsòe soh.
hanlo_comment: 巾á; 辮 絲線 做 索.

comment: chi̍t-hō chhiū ê miâ; kui-liâu sam ê ì-sù.

comment: ún-khǹg, khoan-khoah, kiàm-sok, lâng-miâ.

comment: kiàm-sok, keng-tē; gī-lí, siu-khǹg, hoat-su̍t, tsâi-tiāu.
hanlo_comment: 劍束, 弓袋; 義理, 收khǹg, 法術, 才調.

comment: kiàm-sok, keng-tē; gī-lí, siu-khǹg, hoat-sut, tsâi-tiāu.
hanlo_comment: 劍束, 弓袋; 義理, 收khǹg, 法術, 才調.

comment: pīⁿ si-sòaⁿ tsòe soh, bō iaⁿ ê tsng-thāⁿ.

comment: khan, liân-lūi, iân-chhiân, thoah-khui, thoa-kng, khan-thoa.
hanlo_comment: 牽, 連累, 延chhiân, 屜開, 拖扛, 牽拖.

hanlo_comment: 牽, 連累, 延chhiân, 屜開, 拖扛, 牽拖.

comment: chiū-sī tham-chia̍h kò͘-chia̍h, tham-sim ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 貪食 顧食, 貪心 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī tham-chia̍h kò͘-chia̍h, tham-sim ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 貪食 顧食, 貪心 ê 意思.

comment: the̍h, kia̍h, gia̍h-pit, kéng-mi̍h, thiu-chhut.
hanlo_comment: the̍h, 攑, 攑筆, 揀物, 抽出.

comment: chiū-sī kéng-mi̍h ê ì-sù, kéng-soán.

comment: chìn-chêng tsáu, óng-lâi khòaⁿ ê khoán-sit; lâng siông-siông chhò siá tsòe 本.
hanlo_comment: 進前 走, 往來 看 ê 款式; 人 常常 錯 寫 做 本.

hanlo_comment: 替毛, 補替, 替換, 相替, 偷替, 替人.

comment: thoa-thūi, thām-thūi, sì-kòe thām-thūi lâng; bó͘ kiáⁿ thām-thūi.

comment: chiū-sī n̂g-sek ê ì-sù; un-thun, un-thun-kúi.
hanlo_comment: 就是 黃色 ê 意思; 溫吞, 溫吞鬼.

hanlo_comment: 樹 ê 名, 會 活 極久, 老爸 ê 稱呼, 椿樹.

hanlo_comment: 火 ê 色, 光明, 火 炎炎 充盛 ê 款式.

comment: thun=thûn, chhin-chhiūⁿ gín-á-thûn; ti-thûn-á.

comment: tsúi chhiâng-mi̍h; lâng tī tsúi-téng siû ê ì-sù.

comment: un-thún, bô tì-sek, gōng-gōng ê ì-sù.

comment: chiū-sī tóe pùn-sò ê khut, á-sī ha̍k-á ê ì-sù.

comment: ti-pûi, pûi, chhiong-sēng, móa.

comment: gû-thún, chiū-sī gû-chhún, gōng ê ì-sù.

comment: thún-ta̍h, lām-sám thún, chiū-sī loān-loān-lap ê ì-sù.

comment: bú-thún, bú-thún bú-thún, pûi-thún; chiū-sī chin pûi ê ì-sù.

comment: chiū-sī phòa-pīⁿ lâng gâu-chia̍h pn̄g ê ì-sù.

comment: chiū-sī ham-bān, bōe-oē pān tāi-chì.

comment: i-chiûⁿ thoat-khui; hoe-siā, thǹg-saⁿ.

comment: ùn-thùn, chiū-sī bô ki-khiàu ê ì-sù.

comment: chiū-sī thô͘-soa hún, tîn-ai ê ì-sù.

comment: sòe-sòe ê khòng-iá; ti ê miâ.

comment: gín-á-thûn; ti-á thûn, káu-thûn-á, gû-thûn-á, niáu-chhú-thûn.
hanlo_comment: gín-á豚; 豬á 豚, 狗豚á, 牛豚á, 鳥鼠豚.

comment: gín-á-thûn; ti-á thûn, káu-thûn-á, gû-thûn-á, niáu-chhú-thûn.
hanlo_comment: gín-á豚; 豬á 豚, 狗豚á, 牛豚á, 鳥鼠豚.

comment: thûn-bú, chiū-sī ti-bú bōe siⁿ-kiáⁿ ê ì-sù.

comment: chháu chham thô͘ nôa tsúi bōe-lâu; thūn-ba̍t.

comment: sió-táⁿ, kiaⁿ, iú-he̍k.

comment: chiū-sī kiám-chió, tò-thè ê ì-sù.

comment: káu-koài, kan-kúi; saⁿ khi-phiàn ê ì-sù.

comment: chiū-sī thâu-khak ê phòa-pīⁿ.

comment: ēng koáiⁿ-á lâi chí-tēng ê ì-sù.

comment: chek-pī, tû-khì, kàng-kip, lo̍h-kē, lut-chit.
