comment: koah chháu-á, chhī cheng-siⁿ ê chháu; chia̍h chháu ê cheng-siⁿ, jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 割 草á, 飼 精牲 ê 草; 食 草 ê 精牲, 字姓.

comment: khì, chìn-chêng; tsûn hē-teh, kok-miâ, soaⁿ-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 去, 進前; 船 hē-teh, 國名, 山名.

comment: chhù tang-pêng ê piah; hū-jîn-lâng ê miâ; súi ê tsa-bó͘ gín-á.
hanlo_comment: 厝 東爿 ê 壁; 婦人人 ê 名; 媠 ê tsa-bó͘ gín-á.

comment: chiú-kiⁿ ê lâng phah kiⁿ-khok ê ì-sù; ēng chhiú the̍h, á-sī tùn-chhiú ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 守更 ê 人 phah 更柝 ê 意思; 用 手 the̍h á是 頓手 ê 意思.

comment: chhiū ê chhâ, chhâ-pé; chhiū ê miâ; tsū-chi̍p chháu-á.
hanlo_comment: 樹 ê 柴, 柴把; 樹 ê 名; 聚集 草á.

comment: ló͘-kok ê siâⁿ, Khóng-tsú ê hiuⁿ-lí, Tso͘-ló͘ koāiⁿ, jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 魯國 ê 城, 孔子 ê 鄉里, 鄒魯 縣, 字姓.

comment: chiū-sī ngó͘-kok ê miâ, sio̍k sóe-á ê lūi.
hanlo_comment: 就是 五穀 ê 名, 屬 黍á ê 類.

comment: chiú-láng thang tóe chiú ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 酒籠 通 貯 酒 ê 意思.

comment: pe̍h-hî, sòe-bé hî, chhap-tsa̍p ê hî-á, sòe-hàn lâng ê khoán; tsū-khiam ê oē, tso͘-seng.
hanlo_comment: 白魚, 細尾 魚, 插雜 ê 魚á, 細漢 人 ê 款; 自謙 ê 話, 鯫生.

comment: chiū-sī hái-ni̍h ê tsûn-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 海裡 ê 船名.

comment: kím-pò͘ chhiⁿ âng-sek, chhiⁿ kàng-sek, tsòe tsng-thāⁿ ê lō͘-ēng.
hanlo_comment: 錦布 青 紅色, 青 絳色, 做 妝飾 ê 路用.

comment: chi̍t-khoán chhiū ê miâ, jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 一款 樹 ê 名, 字姓.

comment: chham-siông, kè-bô͘, tsòe-hé gī-lūn, chèng-sū, kéng-to̍h.
hanlo_comment: 參詳, 計謀, 做伙 議論, 政事, 揀𤏸.

comment: phian-phiah ê só͘-tsāi, siâⁿ-chhiûⁿ, tsòe-hé khiā-khí, kiàn-siàu.
hanlo_comment: 偏僻 ê 所在, 城牆, 做伙 khiā起, 見笑.

comment: siâⁿ ê miâ, chiū-sī Khóng-tsú chhut-sè ê só͘-tsāi, jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 城 ê 名, 就是 孔子 出世 ê 所在, 字姓.

comment: siâⁿ ê miâ, chiū-sī Bēng-tsú chhut-sì ê só͘-tsāi, jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 城 ê 名, 就是 孟子 出世 ê 所在, 字姓.

comment: chháu-á, chháu hoat-siⁿ; hó ê chìⁿ; liú-chhiū thang tsòe chìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 草á, 草 發生; 好 ê 箭; 柳樹 thang 做 箭.

comment: hó ê siù, sio̍k bé ê lūi, bé tn̂g-tn̂g kàu seng-khu, Se-hng ê siù.
hanlo_comment: 好 ê 獸, 屬 馬 ê 類, 尾 長長 到 身軀, 西方 ê 獸.

comment: oh-tit kiâⁿ, kiâⁿ bōe chìn-chêng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: oh得 行, 行 bōe 進前 ê 意思.

comment: pháiⁿ-oē lóe-mē; hoân-ló, iu-chhiû ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: pháiⁿ話 詈罵; 煩惱, 憂愁 ê 款式.

comment: ēng tsńg-thâu-á lâi ngoe̍h; le̍k-chhiú-ńg, tháu-khui, chhâ-khó.
hanlo_comment: 用 tsńg頭á 來 挾; 勒手袂, tháu開, 查考.

comment: gû ê gû-phīⁿ-khian; pang hē bōe-pîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 牛 ê 牛鼻圈; 枋 hē bōe平.

comment: chhùi-khí bô chiàⁿ, tò-ha̍h-khí, sio kek-oē; chhùi-khí tsū-chi̍p ê khoán.
hanlo_comment: 嘴齒 無 正, 倒合齒, 相 激位; 嘴齒 聚集 ê 款.

comment: chè-hiàn, sîn-bêng só͘ hioh ê só͘-tsāi.
hanlo_comment: 祭獻, 神明 所 歇 ê 所在.

comment: chìn-chêng, khì, kiám-chhái, iáu-kú, koh-tsài.
hanlo_comment: 進前, 去, kiám-chhái, iáu-kú, koh再.

comment: chhut-siaⁿ kiáu-jiáu hì-lāng ê oē, sòe-siaⁿ àm-chīⁿ hō͘-lâng.
hanlo_comment: 出聲 攪擾 戲弄 ê 話, 細聲 暗靜 hō͘人.

comment: pē ê sī-tōa-lâng ê chheng-ho͘, pún-goân, ha̍k-si̍p, jī-sìⁿ tsó͘, tsó͘-kong, tsó͘-biō.
hanlo_comment: 父 ê 序大人 ê 稱呼, 本源, 學習, 字姓 祖, 祖公, 祖廟.

comment: tsó͘-keh, gûi-hiám, kan-khó͘, giâu-gî, iu-būn, tsó͘-tòng.
hanlo_comment: 阻隔, 危險, 艱苦, 僥疑, 憂悶, 阻擋.

comment: lóe-mē pháiⁿ-oē, chiù-chhàm, chiù-tsó͘.
hanlo_comment: 詈罵 pháiⁿ話, 咒讖, 咒詛.

comment: saⁿ-kha ê pôaⁿ tóe seng-lé, teh chè-hiàn ê mi̍h, tiān-chiú ê chiú-pân.
hanlo_comment: 三腳 ê 盤 貯 牲禮, teh 祭獻 ê 物, 奠酒 ê 酒瓶.

comment: saⁿ-kha ê pôaⁿ tóe seng-lé, teh chè-hiàn ê mi̍h, tiān-chiú ê chiú-pân.
hanlo_comment: 三腳 ê 盤 貯 牲禮, teh 祭獻 ê 物, 奠酒 ê 酒瓶.

comment: chìn-chêng, tōa-pō͘-kiâⁿ, ti̍t-ti̍t hiòng, tōa-pō͘ tsáu kín-kín tsáu.
hanlo_comment: 進前, 大步行, 直直 向, 大步 走 緊緊 走.

comment: si-sòaⁿ ê chhiu, bō-iaⁿ, phah-kat, kat thâu-mn̂g ê kè-soh; thīⁿ ê sòaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 絲線 ê 鬚, 帽纓, phah 結, 結 頭毛 ê 過索; 綻 ê 線.

comment: ēng chhùi lâi suh; chhì-chia̍h; tam-khòaⁿ tsu-bī.
hanlo_comment: 用 嘴 來 suh; 試食; 啖看 滋味.

comment: chiū-sī chhân ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 田 ê 意思.

comment: chio̍h tsài thô͘, chio̍h soaⁿ tsài-thô͘ ê ì-sù; tsó͘-gô͘, soaⁿ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 石 載 土, 石 山 載土 ê 意思; 岨峿, 山 ê 款式.

comment: chiū-sī ge̍k ê ì-sù, ge̍k téng-bīn thóng-chhut, súi, hó-khòaⁿ, ge̍k ê hûn.
hanlo_comment: 就是 玉 ê 意思, 玉 頂面 捅出, 媠, 好看, 玉 ê 痕.

comment: kiâⁿ bōe chìn-chêng, kiâⁿ bô sì-chiàⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 行 bōe 進前, 行 無 四正 ê 意思.

comment: chhùi-khí tò ha̍p-khí, thap-lâi thap-khì, khí bô-pîⁿ, khòe, pō͘, tsó͘-gú.
hanlo_comment: 嘴齒 倒 合齒, 塌來 塌去, 齒 無平, 齧, 哺, 齟齬.

comment: chho͘-chho͘, soe-làng, khoah-tōa; kiâⁿ thiàu hn̄g ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 粗粗, 疏閬, 闊大; 行 跳 遠 ê 意思.

comment: ge̍k thang tsng-thāⁿ, bé-káng; lâng ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 玉 通 妝飾, 馬káng; 人 ê 名.

comment: tsù-ba̍k khòaⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 注目 看 ê 意思.

comment: tsù-ba̍k khòaⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 注目 看 ê 意思.

comment: ngâu-mi̍h, chian-chhá, chian ta-ta ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 熬物, 煎炒, 煎 乾乾 ê 意思.

comment: tsó͘-chí, saⁿ lī-khui ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 阻止, 相 離開 ê 款式.

comment: tsó͘-chí, soah, lún-neh, piàn-sūi, pāi-hoāi, lāu-chhut.
hanlo_comment: 阻止, soah, 懍懾, 半遂, 敗壞, 漏出.

comment: tsù-sîn-khòaⁿ, tsù-ba̍k khòaⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 注神看, 注目 看 ê 意思.

comment: Hông-tè ê gîm-kîⁿ; Hông-tè ê chè-hiàn.
hanlo_comment: 皇帝 ê gîm墘; 皇帝 ê 祭獻.

comment: tsàu-chiuⁿ, chìn-chêng, kú-chiàn, hián-bêng, o-ló, pín Hông-tè, tsok-ga̍k.
hanlo_comment: 奏章, 進前, 舉荐, 顯明, o-ló, 稟 皇帝, 作樂.

comment: oá-phê ê bah, bah ê hûn; mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: oá皮 ê 肉, 肉 ê 痕; 物.

comment: chhia-lûn ê tiong-sim; tsū-chi̍p ê só͘-tsāi, chhia tsū-chi̍p.
hanlo_comment: 車輪 ê 中心; 聚集 ê 所在, 車 聚集.

comment: lâng tsū-chi̍p tī tsúi-téng, chek-tsū, saⁿ kūn-oá; lāu-jia̍t; saⁿ-chiⁿ chìn-chêng.
hanlo_comment: 人 聚集 tī 水頂, 積聚, 相 近oá; 鬧熱; 相爭 進前.

comment: iu-chhiû bô hoaⁿ-hí ê khoán; ba̍k-chiu gîn-gîn ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 憂愁 無 歡喜 ê 款; 目睭 猌猌 ê 款式.

comment: lâng tsū-chi̍p tī tsúi-téng; chek-tsū, saⁿ-kūn-oá, saⁿ-chiⁿ chìn-chêng; lāu-jia̍t.
hanlo_comment: 人 聚集 tī 水頂; 積聚, 相近oá, 相爭 進前; 鬧熱.

comment: hōng-lo̍k, hok-khì, ki-gia̍p, tsō-ūi, kok-ūn; nî-hè, siúⁿ-sù.
hanlo_comment: 俸祿, 福氣, 基業, 座位, 國運; 年歲, 賞賜.

comment: sòe-tsâng ê tek, hō͘ niû-á kiat-kéng ê khì-kū; chìⁿ-bah; tsòe piáⁿ ê khì-kū.
hanlo_comment: 細欉 ê 竹, hō͘ 娘á 結繭 ê 器具; 箭肉; 做 餅 ê 器具.

comment: saⁿ-khò͘ chhìn-chhái hē, ū jiâu-jiâu ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 衫褲 chhìn-chhái hē, 有 皺皺 ê 款式.

comment: lú-pī, sī-sòe; tsa-bó͘-kán; pîⁿ-pòe ê lâng, pîⁿ-pîⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 女婢, 序細; tsa-bó͘𡢃; 平輩 ê 人, 平平 ê 意思.

comment: sòe-tsâng ê tek, hō͘ niû-á kiat-kéng ê khì-kū, kap 簇 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 細欉 ê 竹, hō͘ 娘á 結繭 ê 器具, kap 簇 相像.

comment: iù-iù ê tōe-á, chit ū hoe ê tiû-toān, jiâu-jiâu, jiàu-se.
hanlo_comment: 幼幼 ê 苧á, 織 有 花 ê 綢緞, 皺皺, 抓紗.

comment: khiû-khiû bô ti̍t, iu-būn, bâi-thâu-kat; an-jiân, jiâu-hûn.
hanlo_comment: khiû-khiû 無 直, 憂悶, 眉頭結; 安然, 皺痕.

comment: tàu chhut-khùi-la̍t, pang-tsān, lī-ek, hû-tsō͘, pang-tsō͘.
hanlo_comment: 鬥 出氣力, 幫贊, 利益, 扶助, 幫助.

comment: koah-tn̄g, chhiat iù-iù, chhò-chhâ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 割斷, 切 幼幼, 剉柴 ê 意思.

comment: bé pháu-tsáu chin-kín, chhiⁿ-chin, kóaⁿ-kín, liâm-piⁿ, ta̍uh-ta̍uh.
hanlo_comment: 馬 跑走 真緊, 生瞋, 趕緊, liâm-piⁿ, 沓沓.

comment: chiū-sī bé kui-tùi ê ì-sù, phit-phòe; bé pháu-tsáu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 馬 規對 ê 意思, 匹配; 馬 跑走 ê 意思.

comment: chho͘-chho͘, soe-làng, khoah-tōa, kap tha̍k Tso͘ sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 粗粗, 疏閬, 闊大, kap 讀 組 相像.

comment: saⁿ-kap pang-tsān, tsoh kong-ke ê chhân.
hanlo_comment: 相合 幫贊, 作 公家 ê 田.

comment: chè-hiàn ê bah; hok-khì, pò-tap, tsō-ūi, siâⁿ-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 祭獻 ê 肉; 福氣, 報答, 座位, 成名.

comment: kè-tsoa, chiū-sī kè-sî ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 過遭, 就是 過時 ê 意思.

comment: tsoa-chhiam; tsoa pâi-á, chiū-sī chiong pâi-á lām hō͘-i chiâu, chhap-pâi-á.
hanlo_comment: tsoa籤; tsoa 牌á, 就是 將 牌á 濫 hō͘伊 齊, 插牌á.

comment: jī-tsóa, tsóa-to, tsóa-tsām, tsóa-lián, tsòe-tsóa, kô͘-tsóa, pàng-tsóa, tsóa-chîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 字紙, 紙刀, 紙鏨, 紙撚, 做紙, 糊紙, 放紙, 紙錢.

comment: jī-tsóa, tsóa-to, tsóa-tsām, tsóa-lián, tsòe-tsóa, kô͘-tsóa, pàng-tsóa, tsóa-chîⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 字紙, 紙刀, 紙鏨, 紙撚, 做紙, 糊紙, 放紙, 紙錢.

comment: goán-tsóa-ê, chiū-sī goán-ché ê tiōng-hu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 阮tsóa-ê, 就是 阮姊 ê 丈夫 ê 意思.

comment: tsôa-ê, tsôa-kóng, mn̄g ê oē, chī-tsūi ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 誰ê, 誰講, 問 ê 話, chī-tsūi ê 意思.

comment: to̍k-tsôa, tsôa-thâu, tsôa-chhiu, tsôa-khak; pe-tsôa, chháu-hoe-tsôa.
hanlo_comment: 毒蛇, 蛇頭, 蛇鬚, 蛇殼; 飛蛇, 草花蛇.

comment: to̍k-tsôa, tsôa-thâu, tsôa-chhiu, tsôa-khak; pe-tsôa, chháu-hoe-tsôa.
hanlo_comment: 毒蛇, 蛇頭, 蛇鬚, 蛇殼; 飛蛇, 草花蛇.

comment: tsôa=tôa, tsôa-tsôa tsòe chi̍t-tui, chiū-sī thai-thai tsòe chi̍t-ē ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: tsôa=tôa, tsôa-tsôa 做 一堆, 就是 篩篩 做 一下 ê 意思.

comment: chiù-tsōa, chiù-tāng-tsōa, chiù sí-che̍h-tsōa, lām-sám chiù-tsōa.
hanlo_comment: 咒誓, 咒重誓, 咒 死絕誓, 濫糝 咒誓.

comment: chiù-tsōa, chiù-tāng-tsōa, chiù sí-che̍h-tsōa, lām-sám, chiù-tsōa.
hanlo_comment: 咒誓, 咒重誓, 咒 死絕誓, 濫糝 咒誓.

comment: chhân-hōaⁿ tsōa, chiū-sī chhân-hōaⁿ ê kài-chí.
hanlo_comment: 田岸 畷, 就是 田岸 ê 界址.

comment: gâu-phīⁿ-tsōa; kà bōe chiūⁿ-tsōa, chiâⁿ-tsōa, pò͘-tsōa, se-tsōa.
hanlo_comment: gâu鼻逝; 教 bōe 上逝, 成逝, 布逝, 紗逝.

comment: tsoaⁿ-tê, tsoaⁿ tê-thng, tsoaⁿ-io̍h, tsoaⁿ-io̍h-tê.
hanlo_comment: 煎茶, 煎 茶湯, 煎藥, 煎藥茶.

comment: tsóaⁿ-lî, chiū-sī tek-bi̍h tsòe ê khì-kū, thang tùi tiáⁿ-ni̍h lâi hô͘-pn̄g.
hanlo_comment: 笊籬, 就是 竹篾 做 ê 器具, 通 對 鼎裡 來 撈飯.

comment: chiú-tsóaⁿ, po-lê-tsóaⁿ, ge̍k-tsóaⁿ, teng-hé-tsóaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 酒盞, 玻璃盞, 玉盞, 燈火盞.

comment: chiū-sī tsòaⁿ-iû, tsòaⁿ bah-iû; khah-siông ēng chit-jī 煎 jī.
hanlo_comment: 就是 炙油, 炙 肉油; khah常 用 chit字 煎 字.

comment: chhùi-tsôaⁿ, bak chhùi-tsôaⁿ, niau-tsôaⁿ, bak-káu-tsôaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 嘴殘, bak 嘴殘, 貓殘, bak狗殘.

comment: tsúi-tsôaⁿ, oa̍h-tsôaⁿ, sí-tsôaⁿ; chhut-tsôaⁿ, khui-chíⁿ pu̍ih-tsôaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 水泉, 活泉, 死泉; 出泉, 開井 拔泉.

comment: kùi-tsōaⁿ, nōa-tsōaⁿ, i ê chîⁿ-gûn nōa-tsōaⁿ, kam-nōa m̄-kam-tsōaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 貴賤, 懶賤, 伊 ê 錢銀 懶賤, 甘懶 m̄甘賤.

comment: tsōaⁿ-chhut, tsōaⁿ-hu̍ih, tsōaⁿ-jiō, chhun-kôaⁿ hō͘ ná-tsōaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 濺出, 濺血, 濺尿, 春寒 雨 那濺.

comment: tsoah-chhut, iô-tsoah, phah-tsoah, tsoah-chhut-lâi.
hanlo_comment: 泄出, 搖泏, phah 泏, 泏出來.

comment: chián-tsoa̍h, ka-tsoa̍h, hái ka-tsoa̍h, ka-tsoa̍h-si̍t; ka-tsoa̍h-hiàn.
hanlo_comment: 剪蠽, 蟉蠽, 海 蟉蠽, 蟉蠽翅; 蟉蠽羶.

comment: chián-tsoa̍h, ka-tsoa̍h, hái ka-tsoa̍h, ka-tsoa̍h-si̍t; ka-tsoa̍h-hiàn.
hanlo_comment: 剪蠽, 蟉蠽, 海 蟉蠽, 蟉蠽翅; 蟉蠽羶.

comment: cheng-tsoa̍h, tsoa̍h-tsōe; tsoa̍h-tio̍h, tsoa̍h-hn̄g, tsoa̍h-pān.
hanlo_comment: 精差, 差濟; 差tio̍h, 差遠, 差範.

comment: poa̍h-tó tio̍h-siong, khîⁿ, khiú, oāi-tsoāi.
hanlo_comment: 跋倒 tio̍h傷, 拑, khiú, oāi-tsoāi.

comment: ka-chiah kut bé ê só͘-tsāi, bé tsui-kut; pháiⁿ khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 胛脊 骨 尾 ê 所在, 尾 椎骨; pháiⁿ 款式.

comment: ka-kī phah-sǹg, tì-ì, séng-chhat, sêng-si̍t, to̍k, tsoan-sim, tsū-tsoan, jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 家己 phah算, 致意, 省察, 誠實, 獨, 專心, 自專, 字姓.

comment: ēng thô͘ lâi tsòe, chiah sio ê mi̍h, oē pho͘-tit thô͘-kha kap khí-chhù, tsng-phia̍h.
hanlo_comment: 用 土 來 做, chiah 燒 ê 物, 會 鋪得 土腳 kap 起厝, 磚甓.

comment: ēng thô͘ lâi tsòe, chiah sio ê mi̍h, oē pho͘-tit thô͘-kha kap khí-chhù, tsng-phia̍h.
hanlo_comment: 用 土 來 做, chiah 燒 ê 物, 會 鋪得 土腳 kap 起厝, 磚甓.

comment: siàu-gia̍h; saⁿ-niū, lâng-miâ, Tsoan-tsông.
hanlo_comment: 賬額; 相讓, 人名, 諯崇.

comment: chi̍t-ê, tsoan-it, thàng-thiàⁿ ê khoán; bî-sòe.
hanlo_comment: 一個, 專一, 疼痛 ê 款; 微細.

comment: tōe-hō miâ, Tsoan-bûn siâⁿ ê miâ, sio̍k tī Tēng-kok ê só͘-tsāi.
hanlo_comment: 地號 名, 鄟門 城 ê 名, 屬 tī 鄭國 ê 所在.

comment: kiâⁿ m̄-tio̍h lō͘ ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 行 m̄-tio̍h 路 ê 款式.

comment: soaⁿ pâi-lia̍t ê khoán-sit, chiam-lāi ê soaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 山 排列 ê 款式, 尖利 ê 山.

comment: khiau-kha teh-chē, tsū-ko ê khoán-sit; kiâⁿ-ta̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 曲腳 teh坐, 自高 ê 款式; 行踏 ê 意思.

comment: khiau-kha teh-chē, tsū-ko ê khoán-sit; kiâⁿ-ta̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 曲腳 teh坐, 自高 ê 款式; 行踏 ê 意思.

comment: tiū-á tsū-chi̍p tsòe-hé; koah kui-liām ê tiū-á.
hanlo_comment: 稻á 聚集 做伙; 割 規捻 ê 稻á.

comment: mi̍h hoat-hêng ê goân-thâu, khah sī-sòe ê koaⁿ-miâ, tsoan-hông.
hanlo_comment: 物 發形 ê 原頭, khah 序細 ê 官名, 耑防.

comment: hî ê miâ, khoán-sit chhin-chhiūⁿ hô͘-lî; lâng ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 魚 ê 名, 款式 親像 狐狸; 人 ê 名.

comment: chhì, lak-khang, chha̍k-thàu, bô tiâu-ti̍t, tsǹg-á, lak-tsǹg, tsǹg-khang, nǹg-tsǹg.
hanlo_comment: 刺, 戮空, 鑿透, 無 條直, 鑽á, 戮鑽, 鑽孔, 軁空, 軁鑽.

comment: chhì, lak-khang, chha̍k-thàu, bô tiâu-ti̍t, tsǹg-á, lak-tsǹg, tsǹg-khang, nǹg-tsǹg.
hanlo_comment: 刺, 戮空, 鑿透, 無 條直, 鑽á, 戮鑽, 鑽孔, 軁空, 軁鑽.

comment: koah iù-iù, chhiat-bah ê khoán-sit; tsū-tsoan.
hanlo_comment: 割 幼幼, 切肉 ê 款式; 自專.

comment: thâu-khak kia̍h koâiⁿ, kiong-kèng, kín-sīn, bū-bū, to̍k-it; chhoan-hiok.
hanlo_comment: 頭殼 攑 懸, 恭敬, 謹慎, 霧霧, 獨一; 顓頊.

comment: tsū-chi̍p; bô bâi-tsòng chiū iám koaⁿ-chhâ; tōe-hō-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 聚集; 無 埋葬 就 掩 棺柴; 地號名.

comment: tńg-lâi tńg-khì, tín-tāng, ēng khùi hō͘-mi̍h tńg, chhia-lûn-tńg.
hanlo_comment: 轉來 轉去, 振動, 用 氣 hō͘物 轉, 車輪轉.

comment: chiáu teh háu ê siaⁿ, chhin-chhiūⁿ chia̍uh-chia̍uh háu.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 teh 哮 ê 聲, 親像 嚼嚼 哮.

comment: chhò-chhâ, che̍h-tn̄g, tsām-tn̄g ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 剉柴, 絕斷, 鏨斷 ê 意思.

comment: tsoán-jiông, chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán hoe ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 剪絨, 就是 一款 花 ê 名.

comment: chian-tsoán, chiū-sī tāi-seng chian, āu-lâi tsú ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 煎爨, 就是 tāi先 煎, 後來 煮 ê 意思.

comment: tsoán-thàn, tsoán-chia̍h, tsoán-chîⁿ; hiau-hēng tsoán, kiông-tsoán, hó-tsoán.
hanlo_comment: 賺趁, 賺食, 賺錢; 僥倖 賺, 強賺, 好賺.

comment: tek tsòe koáiⁿ-á; tsài koaⁿ-chhâ ê chhia; chhiuⁿ kek ê pìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 竹 做 枴á; 載 棺柴 ê 車; 鎗 戟 ê 柄.

comment: tek tsòe koáiⁿ-á; tsài koaⁿ-chhâ ê chhia; chhiuⁿ kek ê pìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 竹 做 枴á; 載 棺柴 ê 車; 鎗 戟 ê 柄.

comment: chiū-sī chhiú tín-tāng ê ì-sù, chīn-thâu.
hanlo_comment: 就是 手 振動 ê 意思, 盡頭.

comment: chiū-sī chhiú tín-tāng ê ì-sù, chīn-thâu.
hanlo_comment: 就是 手 振動 ê 意思, 盡頭.

comment: khì-kū ê miâ, chha̍k-thàu, bō tiâu-ti̍t, ēng lak-tsǹg lak-khang, nǹg-tsǹg.
hanlo_comment: 器具 ê 名, 鑿透, 磨 條直, 用 戮鑽 戮空, 軁鑽.

comment: khì-kū ê miâ, chha̍k-thàu, bō tiâu-ti̍t, ēng lak-tsǹg lak-khang, nǹg-tsǹg.
hanlo_comment: 器具 ê 名, 鑿透, 磨 條直, 用 戮鑽 戮空, 軁鑽.

comment: tsū-chi̍p ê ì-sù, at-chi̍h, kap {鑽Tsoàn} sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 聚集 ê 意思, at折, kap {鑽Tsoàn} 相像.

comment: tsoàn thâu-lō͘, khit-i tsoàn-khì, tsoàn bô-khì ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 篡 頭路, khit伊 篡去, 篡 無去 ê 意思.

comment: mi̍h chiâu-pī bô khiàm-kheh, chiâu-tsn̂g, oân-tsoân, tsoân-jiân.
hanlo_comment: 物 齊備 無 欠缺, 齊全, 完全, 全然.

comment: mi̍h chiâu-pī bô khiàm-kheh, chiâu-tsn̂g, oân-tsoân, tsoân-jiân.
hanlo_comment: 物 齊備 無 欠缺, 齊全, 完全, 全然.

comment: chhut-tsúi ê só͘-tsāi, chiú-chîⁿ chhiⁿ kiàm ê miâ, jī-sìⁿ, tsôaⁿ, tsúi-tsôaⁿ, Tsoân-chiu.
hanlo_comment: 出水 ê 所在, 酒泉 星 劍 ê 名, 字姓, 泉, 水泉, 泉州.

comment: kap {泉Tsoân} sio-siāng, chiū-sī kó͘ jī.
hanlo_comment: kap {泉Tsoân} 相像, 就是 古 字.

comment: sian-jîn ê miâ, tī Giâu-tè ê sî-tsūn.
hanlo_comment: 先人 ê 名, tī 堯帝 ê 時陣.

comment: phang-phang ê chháu; iù-iù ê pò͘, chìm mi̍h tī tsúi-ni̍h hō͘ hî thang-chia̍h.
hanlo_comment: 芳芳 ê 草; 幼幼 ê 布, 浸 物 tī 水裡 hō͘ 魚 通食.

comment: gû chiâu-tsn̂g ê sek-tī, sin-thé oân-tsoân bô hâ-hûn.
hanlo_comment: 牛 齊全 ê 色緻, 身體 完全 無 瑕痕.

comment: sio̍k ge̍k ê lūi, pó-pòe ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 屬 玉 ê 類, 寶貝 ê 意思.

comment: o-ló kè-sin ê lâng, gī-lūn; tsòe bûn-chiuⁿ, kóng hó-oē.
hanlo_comment: o-ló 過身 ê 人, 議論; 做 文章, 講 好話.

comment: lim-chia̍h, sàng-mi̍h, pn̄g-tǹg, kap 饌 jī sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: lim食, 送物, 飯頓, kap 饌 字 相像.

comment: chhùi suh-mi̍h ê khoán-sit, lim-chia̍h, pn̄g-tǹg; ēng pn̄g kap chhài hō͘-lâng-chia̍h.
hanlo_comment: 嘴 欶物 ê 款式, lim食, 飯頓; 用 飯 kap 菜 hō͘人食.

comment: kó͘-tsá tóe chia̍h-mi̍h ê khì-kū, ēng tek-bi̍h tsòe-ê, lâi tóe ké-chí; ín-su̍t.
hanlo_comment: 古早 貯 食物 ê 器具, 用 竹篾 做ê, 來 貯 果子; 引述.

comment: pān-lí, hoat-tō͘, tù-chheh, kéng, tsòe; tsoān-chi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 辦理, 法度, 著冊, 揀, 做; 撰折.

comment: pān-lí hiuⁿ-siā iân-toh ê lâng, sǹg, pâi-lia̍t, siàu-gia̍h.
hanlo_comment: 辦理 鄉社 筵桌 ê 人, 算, 排列, 賬額.

comment: chhia-tsoān, lō͘-tsoān, gâu-lián-tsoān, mn̂g-tsoān.
hanlo_comment: 車鏇, 路鏇, gâu輾鏇, 門鏇.

comment: chháu-ba̍k khí-thâu puh-íⁿ ê khoán-sit, chháu ê gê, ûn-ûn-á tōa.
hanlo_comment: 草木 起頭 puh-íⁿ ê 款式, 草 ê 芽, 勻勻á 大.

comment: gâu ê tùi-hoán, gōng, m̄-chiâⁿ-mi̍h, ka-kī khiam-pi ê oē, gû-tsoat.
hanlo_comment: gâu ê 對反, 戇, m̄成物, 家己 謙卑 ê 話, 愚拙.

comment: kat-tiâu, pâng-liáu só͘ chhun-ê ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 結tiâu, 縫了 所 chhun-ê ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī chhùi-lāi kâm chia̍h-mi̍h móa-móa ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 嘴內 含 食物 滿滿 ê 意思.

comment: bīn chheng-siù ê kut, chhùi-phóe-kut, thâu ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 面 清秀 ê 骨, 嘴䫌骨, 頭 ê 款式.

comment: tiau-khek, koah, siah, chhì, chha̍k ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 雕刻, 割, 削, 刺, 鑿 ê 意思.

comment: sio̍k thâng ê lūi, tsúi-tiong ê thâng; giat-á.
hanlo_comment: 屬 蟲 ê 類, 水中 ê 蟲; 蠍á.

comment: koāiⁿ ê miâ, sio̍k tī Ek-chiu kūn; kap 梲 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 縣 ê 名, 屬 tī 益州 郡; kap 梲 相像.

comment: siū-khì, sio-mē ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 受氣, 相罵 ê 聲.

comment: chhù-lāi thong-niû téng-bīn ê tóe-thiāu.
hanlo_comment: 厝內 通樑 頂面 ê 短柱.

comment: chhùi saⁿ-chim, chhì-chha̍k, kóng tsōe-oē ê khoán, chheh-chhù.
hanlo_comment: 嘴 相唚, 刺鑿, 講 濟話 ê 款, 啜chhù.

comment: niû tsōe-chió ê miâ, tām-po̍h, tiah, kéng-soán.
hanlo_comment: 量 濟少 ê 名, 淡薄, 摘, 揀選.

comment: chhân tiong-ng ê lō͘, chhân ê keh-kài, chhân-hōaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 田 中央 ê 路, 田 ê 隔界, 田岸.

comment: tsoat-chhut-lâi, chiū-sī tóe kàu siuⁿ-tīⁿ, móa á-sī tsoah chhut-lâi ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: tsoat出來, 就是 貯 到 傷滇, 滿 á是 泄 出來 ê 意思.

comment: si-sòaⁿ tsām-tn̄g bô saⁿ-chiap, chīn-thâu, kè-thâu, bia̍t-bô, tsoa̍t-tn̄g.
hanlo_comment: 絲線 鏨斷 無 相接, 盡頭, 過頭, 滅無, 絕斷.

comment: tsúi-tsôaⁿ chhèng chhut ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 水泉 衝 出 ê 意思.

comment: chhiat tn̄g-mi̍h ê ì-sù, thoa, hiat-ka̍k, hiat-teh.
hanlo_comment: 切 斷物 ê 意思, 拖, hiat-ka̍k, hiat-teh.

comment: nńg-tsoe, tēng-tsoe, piáⁿ-tsoe, ké-tsoe; liám-piáⁿ-tsoe.
hanlo_comment: 軟tsoe, 𠕇tsoe, 餅tsoe, 粿tsoe; 斂餅tsoe.

comment: pháiⁿ-kut-tsoe, hó gín-á tsoe, saⁿ-á tsoe.
hanlo_comment: pháiⁿ骨tsoe, 好 gín-á tsoe, 衫á tsoe.

comment: ba̍k-kia̍h-tsoe, chiū-sī ba̍k-kia̍h taⁿ-chiah phuh thâu-piàn bē-siu.
hanlo_comment: 木屐tsoe, 就是 木屐 旦才 phuh 頭遍 未收.

comment: tsóe-lâng, ná tsóe-lâng, chiū-sī ná bô-oā lâng ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: tsóe人, ná tsóe人, 就是 ná 無oā 人 ê 意思.

comment: lân-san, ū-chhun, tsún-tǹg; pa̍k-tiâu tī-hia, tiàm tī tiūⁿ-lâng tau sêng-chhin, chìn-tsòe.
hanlo_comment: 零星, 有chhun, 準當; 縛tiâu tī hia, tiàm tī 丈人 兜 成親, 進贅.

comment: lâng ēng teh chìm-chiú, á-sī teh tè-chiú ê chháu, sió-khóa.
hanlo_comment: 人 用 teh 浸酒, á是 teh 滯酒 ê 草, 小khóa.

comment: chiū-sī tek-bi̍h tsòe ê khì-kū.
hanlo_comment: 就是 竹篾 做 ê 器具.

comment: hô͘-sîn báng-á tsōe-tsōe saⁿ-kap tsam, tōa-chhùi-chia̍h, khòe, giat suh.
hanlo_comment: 胡蠅 蚊á 濟濟 相合 沾, 大嘴食, 齧, 蠍, 欶.

comment: siⁿ-thiàⁿ, bah chéng-khí-lâi, siⁿ lia̍p-á.
hanlo_comment: 生痛, 肉 腫起來, 生 粒á.

comment: kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ; tām-po̍h chia̍h-chiú; kóng-oē ê siaⁿ, tsōe-tsōe siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 驚惶; 淡薄 食酒; 講話 ê 聲, 濟濟 聲.

comment: chè-hiàn ê chiú; sio chiap-sòa lâi chè-hiàn ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 祭獻 ê 酒; 相 接sòa 來 祭獻 ê 意思.

comment: pâng saⁿ-khò͘, pó͘-saⁿ, tsòe-saⁿ, thīⁿ-saⁿ, kún-saⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 縫 衫褲, 補衫, 做衫, 綻衫, 袞衫.

comment: ke̍k-thâu, tē-it, kàu-ke̍k, it-khài, tsū-chi̍p, iàu-kín, tùi-tiōng.
hanlo_comment: 極頭, 第一, 夠極, 一概, 聚集, 要緊, 對重.

comment: chhân tiong-ng ê lō͘, chhân ê keh-kài, chhân-hōaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 田 中央 ê 路, 田 ê 隔界, 田岸.

comment: siⁿ-tsòe, tsòe-chiâⁿ, tsòe-kang, tsòe-chêng; tsòe-ba̍k tsòe seng-lí; tsòe-hong; tsòe-phōaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 生做, 做成, 做工, 做情; 做木, 做 生理; 做風; 做伴.

comment: chhim-chhim, chhiⁿ-bêng; ba̍k-sái lâu-lo̍h ê khoán; tsúi ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 深深, 鮮明; 目屎 留落 ê 款; 水 ê 名.

comment: ge̍k ê kng, ge̍k ê miâ; tsu sûi-lo̍h ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 玉 ê 光, 玉 ê 名; 珠 垂落 ê 款式.

comment: soaⁿ koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ, koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ ê khoán; si tōa-tiâu ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 山 懸懸, 懸懸 ê 款; 絲 大條 ê 款式.

comment: sng-seh chek-tsū, tsū-chi̍p ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 霜雪 積聚, 聚集 ê 款式.

comment: ēng-chhiú jê-mi̍h; nôa-tsa̍h, at-chí, keh-kài, oe-khoeh, chhia-tó, bia̍t-bô, ki-chhì.
hanlo_comment: 用手 揉物; 攔閘, at止, 隔界, 挨khoeh, 扯倒, 滅無, 譏刺.

comment: khui-chhùi, chhùi tín-tāng ê khoán-sit; chhùi khiap-sì.
hanlo_comment: 開嘴, 嘴 振動 ê 款式; 嘴 怯勢.

comment: chhun ê tùi-hoán, kiám-chió ê ì-sù; pak, siah; kiu-liu-khiû-khiû.
hanlo_comment: chhun ê 對反, 減少 ê 意思; 剝, 削; 勼溜khiû-khiû.

comment: tsôe-tsôe, tsôe-thâu-to; tsôe-chéng, tsôe-tsáⁿ, pí khì-tsôe.
hanlo_comment: 齊齊, 齊頭刀; 齊整, 齊嶄, 比 去齊.

comment: hó-sin-tsôe, chiū-sī lâng seng-khu bô hok-siòng iā bô lōa sán, tiong-pān ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 好身齊, 就是 人 身軀 無 福相 也 無 偌 瘦, 中pān ê 意思.

comment: hoān-hoat, kap 罪 jī sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 犯法, kap 罪 字 相像.

comment: tó-hî ê tek-bāng, hoat-hoat, tîⁿ-tiâu, hêng-hoa̍t, liân-lūi, chē-kòa, gí-tsōe.
hanlo_comment: 搗魚 ê 竹網, 發發, 纏tiâu, 刑罰, 連累, 罪過, 擬罪.

comment: soaⁿ ê khoán-sit; koâiⁿ-koâiⁿ gûi-hiám bô tsôe-tsáⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 山 ê 款式; 懸懸 危險 無 齊嶄 ê 意思.

comment: poa̍h-tó tio̍h-siong, khîⁿ, khiú, oai-khiau, oai-tsāi.
hanlo_comment: 跋倒 tio̍h傷, 拑鉗, khiú, 歪曲, 歪在.

comment: tsū-chi̍p, só͘-tsāi-miâ; sió-khóa, phí-lō͘.
hanlo_comment: 聚集, 所在名; 小khóa, 鄙陋.

comment: tsū-chi̍p, só͘-tsāi-miâ; sió-khóa, phí-lō͘.
hanlo_comment: 聚集, 所在名; 小khóa, 鄙陋.

comment: tsōe-tsōe; hiah-tsōe, tsōe-chió, jōa-tsōe, chhùi-tsōe, tsōe-oē.

comment: keng-tsoh, tsoh-sit; tiū-á sí-khì.

comment: tsu-chià, chiū-sī kam-chià ê ì-sù.

comment: chhim o͘ ê sek-tī, ní o͘-sek ê ì-sù.

comment: tóe sóe-á tī pôaⁿ-ni̍h lâi ho̍k-sāi sîn-bêng.

comment: i-chiûⁿ ê ē-kha-pô͘; saⁿ-á ē ê kûn.
hanlo_comment: 衣裳 ê 下腳裒; 衫á 下 ê 群.

comment: khui-chhùi khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chhùi-khí ê khoán-sit.

comment: tsúi ê miâ, tī Pak-ge̍k ê só͘-tsāi.

comment: sèng-tē, iông-māu, thé-thài, súi ê khoán-sit; hó-hong-tsu.

comment: kó͘-tsá teh ēng ê sòe-gûn, ū chi̍t-pah lia̍p sóe-á ê tāng, sió-khóa, tun jī-sìⁿ tsu.

comment: tsúi ê miâ, chhut tī Thài-san kūn.

comment: phê bōe chhun-ti̍t jiâu-jiâu ê ì-sù.

comment: tsúi-khut; ke-lāi só͘ chhī chi̍t-hō cheng-siⁿ ê miâ, ti-kang, ti-bú; chháu-io̍h ê miâ.

comment: tsúi-khut; ke-lāi só͘ chhī chi̍t-hō cheng-síⁿ ê miâ, ti-kang, ti-bú; chháu-io̍h ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 水窟; 家內 所 飼 一號 精牲 ê 名, 豬公, 豬母; 草藥 ê 名.

comment: chiū-sī chhiū ê chhiū-kun; kun tī thô͘ ê téng-bīn ê ì-sù; chhò-chhiū.
hanlo_comment: 就是 樹 ê 樹根; 根 tī 土 ê 頂面 ê 意思; 剉樹.

comment: kóng tsōe-tsōe oē ê khoán-sit; chiáu ê chhùi, chiáu ê siaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 講 濟濟 話 ê 款式; 鳥 ê 嘴, 鳥 ê 聲.

comment: chiong hm̂-chháu lâi khàm chhù-kòa; chhì-á siⁿ tī chhiûⁿ-téng, chek-tsū.

comment: teh tiū-á ê thâu; khau tiū-á chháu ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: teh 稻á ê 頭; khau 稻á 草 ê 意思.

comment: pha-hng ê chhân hoat tsōe-tsōe chháu, sin khui ê chhân, tû chhó-bo̍k, tsai-ē.
hanlo_comment: 拋荒 ê 田 發 濟濟 草, 新 開 ê 田, 除 草木, 災禍.

comment: chia̍h bô bī-sò͘, chiáⁿ-chiáⁿ ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 食 無 味素, chiáⁿ-chiáⁿ ê 意思.

comment: lia̍h thò͘-á ê bāng; phah-la̍h lia̍h siù ê bāng.

comment: khun-thâng ê miâ, giâ-kang.
hanlo_comment: 昆蟲 ê 名, 蜈蚣.

comment: chiū-sī sio̍k kâu ê lūi, kâu ê ì-sù.

comment: kang-iâu-tsū, chiū-sī chi̍t-hō hái-ni̍h ê bah, pha̍k-ta tsòe-koaⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 江珧柱, 就是 一號 海裡 ê 肉, 曝ta 做干.

comment: ēng koáiⁿ-á phah, tûi ê ì-sù.

hanlo_comment: 地號 名, 就是 現今 吳 郡 ê 嘉興縣.

comment: soaⁿ ê soaⁿ-bé-liu, koâiⁿ, gûi-hiám, chek-tsū, tsōe-tsōe, chiam-chiam.

hanlo_comment: 日本 製 ê 字, 生理 學 濟濟 用 伊; tiⁿ肉 消化 食物 ê 路用, tsōng=臟

comment: hoaⁿ-hí, thiàu-bú, tì-ì ê ì-sù.

comment: chiáng-koán, khì-kū, pâi-lia̍t, pī-pān.

comment: bô cheng-chha, hóng-iūⁿ, hóng-hoat, kap 準 sio-siāng.

hanlo_comment: 照 法度 行, 設法 到 好勢, 聚集, 約束, 撙節.

hanlo_comment: 無 精差, 仿樣, 仿法, 平正, 鼻 準準, 憑準.

comment: tsū-chi̍p, chèng-lâng, kiong-kèng; tsòe-hé kóng-oē.

comment: kiám-chió, tsām, koah-tn̄g ê ì-sù.

comment: chiū-sī tsū-chi̍p tsòe-hé kóng-oē ê ì-sù.

comment: âng-ba̍k-hî, i ê lân sòe-sòe; tōa-hî.

comment: chiáu ê miâ, chiū-sī tsún-chiáu, i teh pe put-chí kín; tiau-khek.

comment: chiàu hoat-tō͘ kiâⁿ, siat-hoat kàu hó-sè; iok-sok, tsū-chi̍p.
hanlo_comment: 照 法度 行, 設法 到 好勢; 約束, 聚集.

comment: chiū-sī chhân-hōaⁿ tsúi-kau ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 田岸 水溝 ê 意思.

comment: kang-tiâⁿ bêng-pe̍k, thè-lâng khiā, kiau-ngō͘, oân-tsùn, soah.

comment: koâiⁿ, kiā, gûi-hiám, tōa, tn̂g, koâiⁿ-soaⁿ, giâm-kín, hiám-tsùn.

comment: tûi, bong, hōaⁿ, ê ì-sù.

comment: hé teh to̍h, hé ê kng, hé to̍h iām-iām; hé hoa ê ì-sù.

comment: kiàn-siàu, tò-thè, the-sî; kiâⁿ bōe chìn-chêng, taⁿ kap 逡 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 見笑, 倒退, 推辭; 行 bōe 進前, 今 kap 逡 相像.

comment: khui chhim-chhim ê khut, thèng-hāu, tōa-tōa, tsúi-tsùn, hiám-tsùn.

comment: ge̍h soân-tsoán ê ì-sù; kiàn-siàu, tò-thè, the-sî, kiâⁿ bōe-chìn.
hanlo_comment: 月 旋轉 ê 意思; 見笑, 倒退, 推辭, 行 bōe進.

comment: chhân-hn̂g ê sîn-bêng, koán chhân-hn̂g ê koaⁿ, chho͘-sio̍k lâng, tsoh-sit lâng.
hanlo_comment: 田園 ê 神明, 管 田園 ê 官, 粗俗 人, 作穡 人.

comment: chè-hiàn liáu só͘ chhun ê mi̍h, chia̍h liáu-liáu, chia̍h-chhun ê mi̍h.
hanlo_comment: 祭獻 了 所 chhun ê 物, 食 了了, 食chhun ê 物.

comment: súi ê bé ê chheng-ho͘, hó ê bé, gâu-tsáu ê bé, kóaⁿ-kín.

comment: chiáu ê miâ, âng-kha, ti̍t-chhùi, n̂g-hûn; chhin-chhiūⁿ hōng ū chhái-sek.

comment: káu-koài ê thò͘ miâ.
hanlo_comment: 狡獪 ê 兔 名.

comment: chio̍h-chhú chhut tī sio̍k-kok, i ê mn̂g thang tsòe pit; niáu-chhú ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 石鼠 出 tī 蜀國, 伊 ê 毛 thang 做 筆; 鳥鼠 ê 名.

comment: khòaⁿ ê ì-sù, lâng ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 看 ê 意思, 人 ê 名.

comment: kng-bêng, tsá-khí sî; kng-kng ê ì-sù.

comment: iâⁿ-kè, koh-iūⁿ, kap chit-jī 俊 sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 嬴過, 各樣, kap chit字 俊 相像.

comment: chiū-sī tsâi-tiāu, tì-hūi ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 才調, 智慧 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī Oat-tsùn kūn-siâⁿ ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 越嶲 郡城 ê 名.

comment: phê iù-iù lak-khí-lâi, chho͘-phê, phê-pit ê ì-sù.

comment: khui chhim-chhim ê tsúi-khut, tsúi-kau, chhim-khut.
hanlo_comment: 開 深深 ê 水窟, 水溝, 深窟.

comment: pháu-tsáu lâi tàu su-iâⁿ, sio kek-khì ê oē.

comment: teng-lêng kā lâng kóng, chīn-tiong, kèng-kín, pang-tsān.
hanlo_comment: 叮嚀 kā 人 講, 盡忠, 敬謹, 幫贊.

comment: chiū-sī ēng kha lâi that ê ì-sù.

comment: o͘ ū hûn; o͘; o͘-sek.
hanlo_comment: 烏 有 痕; 烏; 烏色.

comment: sin-īn pāi-hoāi; sim-koaⁿ iu-būn; bān-bān ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 身孕 敗壞; 心肝 憂悶; 慢慢 ê 款式.

comment: ēng hé tóe tī khì-kū-lāi, lâi ut-saⁿ hō͘-i pîⁿ, ut-táu.
hanlo_comment: 用 火 貯 tī 器具內, 來 熨衫 hō͘伊 平, 熨斗.

comment: chháu-á chhiong-sēng, nńg, io̍h-miâ.
hanlo_comment: 草á 充盛, 軟, 藥名.

comment: thâu-khak tsai tī tsúi-ni̍h ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 頭殼 栽 tī 水裡 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī ut-tsut ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 鬱卒 ê 意思.

comment: lāu ê hū-jîn-lâng, lāu-pô, lāu-bú; thó͘-tōe ê sîn.
hanlo_comment: 老 ê 婦人人, 老婆, 老母; 土地 ê 神.

comment: ut-lut, ut teh-chē, ut-khì, kha-ut-tio̍h, áu-ut; ut sí lâng ê tsâi-tiāu.
hanlo_comment: 屈訥, 屈 teh坐, 屈氣, 腳屈tio̍h, 拗屈; 屈 死 人 ê 才調.

comment: siá-jī ê pit, ín-lâng ê oē lâi kóng, kóng-khí, saⁿ-thàn, sûi-sî, chiū.
hanlo_comment: 寫字 ê 筆, 引人 ê 話 來 講, 講起, 相趁, 隨時, 就.

comment: pe ê khoán-sit, pe kín-kín; pe sóng-khoài ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 飛 ê 款式, 飛 緊緊; 飛 爽快 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī hûn saⁿ-sek ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 雲 三色 ê 意思.

comment: chiū-sī hong put-chí thàu ê ì-sù, tōa-hong.
hanlo_comment: 就是 風 不止 透 ê 意思, 大風.

comment: chiū-sī iu-būn ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: 就是 憂悶 ê 意思.

comment: saⁿ-thàn, tè, kóng-khí, thoân-sòa, chi̍t-ê, hit-ê, jī-sìⁿ.
hanlo_comment: 相趁, tè, 講起, 傳續, 一個, 彼ê, 字姓.

comment: o͘-sek ê bé, āu-thúi pe̍h.
hanlo_comment: 烏色 ê 馬, 後腿 白.

comment: chiáu ê miâ, oē tsai beh lo̍h-hō͘, ian-chhun ê khoán-sit.
hanlo_comment: 鳥 ê 名, 會 知 beh 落雨, 鵪鶉 ê 款式.

comment: chiū-sī chi̍t-khoán sòe-bé hî ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 就是 一款 細尾 魚 ê 名.

comment: mi̍h tōa ê khoán-sit; hûn kúi-nā sek, hó-khòaⁿ, sîn ê miâ.
hanlo_comment: 物 大 ê 款式; 雲 幾nā 色, 好看, 神 ê 名.

comment: chiū-sī chhiūⁿ-tsúi ê soh, kap tha̍k Su̍t sio-siāng.
hanlo_comment: 就是 上水 ê 索, kap 讀 Su̍t 相像.

comment: i̍h-u̍t, i̍hⁿ-u̍t, i̍hⁿ-i̍hⁿ u̍t-u̍t; chiū-sī put-ti-chiok bô chhèng-ì ê ì-sù.
hanlo_comment: i̍h-u̍t, i̍hⁿ-u̍t, i̍hⁿ-i̍hⁿ鬱鬱; 就是 不知足, 無稱意 ê 意思.
